item.text: nurla@#// rgya gar skadad/ Ar+yag ga na gan dza pa'i srid
nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skadga pa chen po'an de//
pa zhes bya ba
bla @#// bam po dang po/// sas rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa la rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ de
na gshegs pa'i gnas bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyi tshogs bsags pa// spyod pa chen
po'i rgyu 'thun pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par smin bas mngon par grub ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po'i gnas
mtha' yas ra nges bar bstan ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma chags pa'i spyodalul gyi yi shes la 'jug
ba na dga' ba rgya chen po rab tu bskyed pa/ dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogos pa la 'jug ba/ kun nas ma smad pa/ ye shes kyis rnam bar
dpyodab/ de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa la 'jug kha/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mngon du bstod pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad dbag tu med
ban bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das tshes thams cad kyi mnyam ba nyid ni mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo narib tu bskor/
'bargyu// slob ma shin du dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs mnga'/ chos thams cad la mnga' brnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
bya bani shin tu mkhyen/ dbang po dam pa'i pha rol tu ni byon/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba ya nga dag par 'dzoms
ba lani khas shing/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyanam bcad de// dge slong sa ya phrag drug gis dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs
cig ste// thams cad kyang cang shes kyis mas dang ldan pa/ gang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag
chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la brtson pa// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ chos bamo la gnas bar mkhas pa/
dmigs su med pa'i chos las nges par byung ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
bkar la shin du zhugs desha stag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dang bas na sa dang bachanapo dpag tu nad/ srangs/ mdangs ma gyas ma bya/

mtshungs pa med nga/ gzhal du med pa// byed nad brjod du med pa'i ya ngang rjod du mang pa'i byang chub sems dang pa'i tshogs chen po dang rang phugs cig taM/ bAnasacad kyang sa mas kyi skad cig gis sas

rgyas kyi zhing ma 'a yus par 'gro ba la mkhas pa// deng zhani gshegs pa sngon sa rung la mchod pa dang/ rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa// chos mnyan pa la mi ngon sa par ya/ngadag nga ra tshel ba/ rtag tu
rgyun mi 'chad pa/sems can thams cad ye/ngas su sminapar du da pa la brtson ba/ thangs dang ga'ang dmu da'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la rab tu gnas nga// rtog
dro dang rnam par rtog pa dang/ sngos pa de nas rtsed 'as pa nga dag par 'dus pa thams cad mkhyen da' yang shas 'bar gyur pa sha stag la 'di lta sta/ byang chub sems dpa' grog
ga lha zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub gnas dang 'gayul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sanas dang 'a rnam par snang mdzad snying po zhes bya budang/ byang chub sems
dang 'a rnam par gnonang dang 'a ngo zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dang ba ni dganyis pa ngadag par 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bsgrags ldan zhes bya ba
'a @#// dang/ byang chub sems dang/'a rnam par lta ba'i mig ces bya ba dang/ byang chub nas dpa' mun pa dang bral zhes bya ba dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chung sems dpa'
sums dang ba chen po dpag tu nad/ tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis ma khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du nad/ dpag gis ni 'ang/ brjod du ma dang 'i yang brjod du
mad pa dag dang yang thabs cig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa chen po'i le'u zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po rnams
@#1la rab tu ston to/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pan thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor donam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod cing bkod pa chen po'i khang pa btsugs pa'i
nang na bdag 'dug pa snyam du shes so// khangar ba rigs dag de dag gi bkod pa de nyid sems can rnams kyi mig sngar snang nga ra gyur tA/ khang pa brtsigs pa na 'khod pa'i byang chub
sems dang bsams dpa' chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos chen po rnams dang/ gzhan yang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri bra'i 'khor de dag thams cad ma gtogs par
stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang lhag ma gzhan thams cad med par gyur te/ thams cad kyang nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa snyam du shes so// 'di lta ste//
dpar na bskal pas shin tu bsrags te/ nam mkha' bzhin du gyur pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba gang yang mig sngar snang bar mi 'gyur nga de
bzhin du/ de'i tshon gang gzugs su snang ba rnams sems can dag gi mig sngar ma snang bar gyur to// 'di lta ste/ dpar nade bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa'i 'jig
rten gyi khams bkod nga chen po zhes bya ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi khang pa brtsigs pa yongs su longs spyodang de 'dra ba'i khang pa brtsigs pa de na snang ngo// nam mkha' la khangang
brtsigs pa 'dug pa dudag ma gtogs par stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sa'i stong dang gzhi'i bar du thams cad kyang mi snang ba snyam du rang khushas te/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab
dang/ khor yug gi ri dang/ khor yug gi ri chen po dag sems can gang gi mig sngar yang mi snang bar gyur to// grong dang/ shing khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dwang/ yul 'khor dang/

rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams kyang ma snang ste/ gzhan du nanam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa de dag nyid du shes shing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sang ge'i khri ni 'phang du dpag tshad khrir

'phags par rab tu snang ngo// gang la bcon ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i seng ge 'i khri de'i 'od kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ gang stong gsum gyi
stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nyi ma dang/ zla ba dang/ skar ma dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od de dag thams cad kyang mog
mog por byas par gyur to// de nas byang chubs mas dang 'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis 'di lta bu'i tshe 'phrul ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba mthong nas/ phan tshun du sna ba/ khang pa brtsigs pa
'di'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba dan/ bdag cag gi tsho'i tshadabaskal par 'dug par gyur kyang/ bdag cag gis rgya cher rnam par dbya babastan par sla ba ma yin te de tsam du khang pa brtsigs pa 'di
dag gi yon tAnabakod pa ni tshad med de zhes 'dzer to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ma brus gnas brtan shA ri'i bu khang pa brtsigs nga de nas langs nas nam mkha' la 'dug ste/ pus mo
rgyu gas sa pa'i lhang btud nas 1 bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la bde skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das na/
mkha' la mchis pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di ma lags pa// gzhan stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtenagyi khams thams cad nam mkhar gyur cing/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin du gda' ba 'de
su'i snga ltas 'gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu khyedakyis rangang brtsegs pa 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu khyod kyis khang pa brtsigs pa 'di dag dag bsngags pa yongs su brjod ng 'i sab+hAb shes par nus gan/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi tsho'i tshad
nges par gyur kyang/ khang pa brtsigs pa 'di dag gi bsngags pa'i mtha' rtogs pa rami nus so// bka' stsal nga/ shAri'idu ji ltar 'khor 'di dag thams cad nam mkha' la song zhing/ khangang/
btsugasar bkod pa chen por zhugs par snang ba bzhin du/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khang pa brtsigasang de ring 'di 'drago/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po

'jig rten gyi khams de gang gi phyogs na mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shari'i bu de ni 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis yongs su gang ba snyad
kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'das ra na/ bkodang chun po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya bad lta na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la
chos kyang ston to/ shAri'i bu bkod pachen po'i 'jig rtenagyi khams den/ byang chub kyis ma sa rinapo ma las rin po chu gzhan mi 'byung ngo// de bas nade bzhin gshegs pa de rin po che bkod pa gcig/
pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos 'chad pa de na sang ga'i khri dang bcas ti/ ta la bya ba phrag brgyad cu srid kyi nam mkha'i dkyil du
mngon par 'phags so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang bu btsugs pa bkod pa chen po dang nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon ng ra 'phrogs nas// de bzhin gshag
pa de la chos nyan te/ de bzhin gshags mde'ang nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston to// shar 'i bu bkod pa chen po'i 'jig
rten gyi khams de na gang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi khang nga brtsegs pa'i yongs su longs spyod pade ni bskul par yang brjod mi nus so// shA ri'i bu khyod kyis nga'i seng ge 'i khri 'di mthong
ngan gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo// ngacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shAri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig de'i seng ge 'i
dri yang 'di 'dra ste/ de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa/ nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi
phyag rgyu yang dag par rab tu ston to// rnam pasum murtsa gnyis la 'jug pa nam mkha'i dkyil yangs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgyu de gang zhu na/ 'di lta ste/ dngos po med pasachos thams
cad yod pa dang mad pa dang bral ba dang/ rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid pas/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang/ snang bar 'gyur pa med pas chos thams cad rnam par rig pa med pa dang da
rgyu dang dmigs pa med pas chos thams cad snang bar gyurapa med pa dang/ nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid pas/ chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa dang/ gnyis su med pas chos thams
cad nye bar zhi ba dang/ so so tha dadapa med pas chos thams cad ganyis su med pa dang/ tshul gcig la zhugs pas chos thams cad tha dad pa mad pa dang/ ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid
dang bral ngas chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang/ dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pas/ chos thams cud ngo bo nyid med pa dang/ thams cad la ma gnas pas chos
thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil dang/ thams cad du ma snang bas chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i sgo dang/ gul gyi lam las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad snang ba med pa
dang nang dang phyi rnam par dag pas chos thams cad yul med pa dang/ rang bzhinagyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dang/ ngo bo nyid kyis
nyi ngar zha bas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa drang/ sams dang/ yid dang/ rnam nga rangashes pa med pas/ chos thamasacad nye bar zhi ba dang/ gzod ma nas ma byang bas
chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang/ nga' ba medacing yongs su 'dzin pa mad pas/ chos thams cad gzidamanas mu khyud bdang/ bdag po med pas/ chos thams cad nga'i ba med cing de ngos su
'dzin pa med pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos rngams cad bdag po nad pa dang/ gzod mnas rnam par dag pas// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis bdag
med pa dang ldog pa med pas chos thams cad gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa dang/ sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin pas// chos thams cad ldog pa med pa dang/ dngos
po med pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos thams cad dngos ngo na da pa dang/ sems dang lus dban nga sa/ chos
thams cad mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang/ mtshan nyid med cing mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i mtshan nyid med pas/ chos thams cad dbyen pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid
las ma ga yos nga sa chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang/ gnas dmigs su med pa sachos thams cad ma g.yos pa dang/ dmagis nga med pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas ngas/
gtsi chos thams cud gnas pa med pa dang/ kun gzhi mdang sa chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa dang/ kun gzhi dang bral bas ches drams cad kun gzhi med pa sta/ shA ri'i bu de ltar de bzhin
gshegs pa rin po cha bkod pa gcig pade byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnamapa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgyu yang dag par rab tu ston te/
de rjes ngas kyang byang chub sems dang 'tshad med pa duga mngon pa rang shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes ba la bad pa/ chos thams cad la dbang byed pa rjes su 'thob bo// yang rgyu'i bu/
bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pas brgyan cing ngaskal pa grangs med par gtong ba rjes su song ba/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan cing blo shin tu byang ba
bzed pas brgyan ning sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan ng/ brtson 'grus kyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyis chos kyis chos thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa/ bsam
gtan gyis brgyan cing/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtsen pa/ shes rab kyis brgyan
cing bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ byams pa chen pos brgyan cing/ sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gnas pa// snying rje chen pos brgyan
cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa// dga' ba chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ rang tu dga' ba la so sor 'god pa'i rgyun mi
gcod pa/ btang snyoms chen ngos brgyan cing/ samasacan thams cad ma mtho mi dma' ba la 'god pa rgyun mi gcod ngar sbyor ba sha stag go/ yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhon
gshagasapa rin po che bkod pa gcig padi'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod cesabya ba 'dug ste/ bsod nams kyi gzi
brjid kyis shin tubarjidapa/ ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med pa/ mtshan rnams kyis lus brgyanang/ dpabyad bzang po rnams kyis byams pa brgyan pa/ spobs pas ngag brgyan pa//
gzungs kyis sems brgyan pa// thos pas dran pa brgyan pa// nges par sems pas bden pa brgyan pa// rtogs pas don rtogs pa brgyan pa/ bsam pas dam bcas pa brgyan pa// khyad
paradu 'grobs lhag pa'i bsam pa brgyan pa/ sbyor bas brgyan cing chos thams cad la thartsom mad bar gyurapa/ btang snyoms chen pos brgyan cing mtho dman med pa/ mngon ng rags pa chen
bos brgyan cing/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par nang thams cad mngon par shes pa// bsod nams kyis brgyan cing/ laganarin po chagatong ba mngon par grub pa// ye shes kyis brgyan cing sen sa
can thams cad kyi sams kyi bsam pa la zhugs pa/ blos brgyan cing sems can thams cad dgaba'i rtsa ba rtogs par byed pa 1mig gis brgyan cing mig lda'i yul la shin tu rnam par dag pa//
rna bas brgyan cing sgra dang/ don thams cad rtogs pa snying po dang ldan pa/ mo so yang dag par rig pas brgyan cing/ don dang/ chos dang/ nges pa'i tshig dang/ slobs ra so so yang dag par rig pa
da0 mi brad par ston pa/ stobs kyis brgyan rung/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rjes su thob pa// mi 'jigs pas brgyan cing/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis ma nenang/ yon tan
gyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa thob pa/ chos kyis brgyan cing spu'i bu ga thams cad nas chos sgrog pa/ so sor rig pa'i rjes su song ba/ snang bas brgyanarung sangs rgyas kyi

chos thams cad lag mthil du thebang/ 'od kyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byed pa// kun nas ston pas brgyan cing chad par lung ston pa/ gdams nga dang rjes su bstan pas brgyan
cing de byed pa 'i chos tshar phyin pa// rdzu 'phrulagyi cho 'phrul gyis brgyan cing rdzu 'phrul rnam par dag pas rnam par grol ba thams cad ston pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pas
brgyan cing gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i yashas la gnas pa// tshogs thams cad kyi yin tan gyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos 'dul ba'i rjes su zhugs pa sta/ shAri'i bu gang bkod
pa 'di ltadu kun tu snangang da na byang chub sems dang ba nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs so// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa nam mkha' mdzod de nga la blta ba dang
phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bsnyan bakur bya ba dang/ 'dus pa chen po 'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i
byang chub sems dang ba 'di dag chos kyi dga' ba dang/ bde da dung/ mchog tu dga' ba bskyed pa dang/ theg pa chen po 'di'ang rang tu yongs su gzungab dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyang yongasasugazung ba'i phyir nga'i gan du 'ong ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'
mdzod de bzhin gshegs pa rin po chab kod pa gcig pa de la gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu mngon du gyur
pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mi byed pa// sas rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pasabakodar chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas ma snang bar gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig
'byung ba tsam gyis ma mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas de bar snang la 'dug ste/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi ma tog dung/ 'phreng bdang/ phyi ma dang/
spros dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i char rab tu phab pa 'di lta ste/ bla bdang/ zla ba chen po dang/ shin tu mdzes pa'i zlob dang/
nyi ma'i 'od dang/ rnam rab tu 'bar dang/ mongashal dang/ mdog mdzes dang/ mdog mdzes chen po dang/ mdog mdzas par 'dug pa dang/ sgra la dang/ smra la chen po dang/ sbrul
rab tu mdzes pa dang/ dris med dang/ kun tu dri ma med pa dang/ rnam dag 'od dang/ gsar du snang dang/ nam mkha' snang dang/ reg gyur dang/ dri chen dkar dang/ 'dab brgya pa dang/
brag snying ldan dang/ mn gnas ol dang/ dga' byed dang/ lhas bstod dang/ klu'i ma togadang/ dga' bad kun spyi dang/ bsam gtan yan lag dang/ dris dga' dang/ lus sems
tshim byed dang/ stong gsum dridang/ nad kun zhi byed dang/ nad kun sel dang/ bdag gi gzi brjid kyis brgyan cing dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyis grub pa// phyogs bcu'i byang chub
sams dang saragapa de lta bu'i me tog gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu khebs par byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyidakyil 'khor thams cad du me tog pus mo nub tsam
du gang bar gyur to// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sngon ma thos ma mthong ba'am tog de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das 'di lta bu'i ma tog blta na sdug pa 'di dag ga las mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mar 'a'i mdzod de
bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'dir 'ongs te/ de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dug nas/ 'di lta bu'i ma tog gi char rab tu phab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
nam mkha' mdzod byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po de dag dang lhan cig tunam mkha'i dkyil de nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag/
'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ra rin po cha bkod pa gcig pan/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod
pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyan gsol zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa

[% ]byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcuganyis po 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam gros nyan 'tshal ba 'di dag ji ltar chos thams cad la dbang bgyidacing chos chen po dang ldan pas/ slar ldog par
'gyur ba'i chos kyi bka' mchid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mgu bar mdzod cig ces de skad kyang gasungango// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyis bcom
ldan 'das kyi seng ga'i khri'i steng gi bar snang la dang ga tshad stong phrag bcu tsam gyi rin po che'i gdugs su byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su
bcad pa dgags mngon par bstod pa/ chos dang don dang yon tan ye shes 'phags pas na// yongs dag rnam dag sn gnas dag cing dri ma med// gnas med nam mkha'i 'dra bar mi g.yo rab tu brnyes/
rab zab kun nas spyod yul man la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba chos kyi skusani rab pa sku mnyam yang// gzugs mdzesaldan zhing gzugs badrang sku yang ston par mdzad// sems can rnams la phan

pa'i sdugs rje rab bskyod nas// bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyi sku yi mchog kyang ston// khyod ni mi gsung rtog mad sgradang tshig kyang med// tshig gis rang bzhin brag ma'i mtshan nyid gzung du med//
sgra med rtag med yi ge med mkhyen nas kyang// byanas pa khyod ni snying rjecan bas rgyal ba'i tshig kyang gsung// sems can kun gyi sems dang sems byung rjes su rig/ khyod nasams kyi rang bzhin sgyu
ma'i mtshan nyid mkhyen// sems kyi rgyud kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra rab mkhyen kyang// sems dang yid rnams la ni khyod kyi sems mi gnas// 'gro ba rnams la khyod kyis spyod pa kun bstan te// bde bar
gshags pa'i sku ni gyur ba yongam mchis// gangag gzugs dang sems dang yon tan ci 'dra bar// mtshan dang spyod lam dag kyang da ya tshul tu ston// bde gshegs chos 'di la ni nga yir 'dzin pa
mad/ khyod ni tshos la gnas pa med cing 'dzin pa med// sems can mang po kun rtog chos kyis 'dulamkhyen nas// khyod ni blanamed pa'i chos rnams rtag tu ston// rgyal ba'i sku la 'khor 'di kun gyis
bltas lan/ gzugs dang mtshan ma tha dad skal ba mi mnyam gnas// khyod kyi skun mi 'gyur rtog mdamtshan mdade// 'khor rnams ji lta'i sems dang bsam bzhin tshim par mdo// chos 'di/
thamasacad rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa ste// byed med ngo bo nyid med kun tu rtog las skyes// bde gshags de 'dra'i chos kyi tshul rnams mkhyen nas su// byang nubam 'gyur zhi ba blan/

med pa brnyes// mtha' dang de bzhinadabus bcad rnam par rtog pa med// stong zhang gsog la rang bzhin gsob sta ya ma brla// khyed kyis de 'dra'i chos nyid rnam dag mkhyen nas su// 'gro ba rnams la rgyu/
dang las dang byed pa ston// chos dasems can med cing srog dang gang zag med// nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pas ni mang yang rnam par dag/ sems can gan du nyer gshegs yang dag bdag med pa/
ma 'cha 'dus ma byas la sems can mang sad mdzad// brtson 'grus mthu dang stongs kyis byang chub 'di tshol phyir// khyod kyis bskal pa bsam yas bye ba phrag brgyar bshad// sgrub pa med pa'i
nan tan mtshan nyid byang chub ste// gang phyir spyod pa'i dond rjes su thob par gyur// chos rnams mnyam pa nyid ni mnyam par bzhag mkhyen pas// rab dang 'bring dang bla ma dag kyang mnyam par
kyi mkhyen// mnyam pa nyid la mnyam nyid rtag bzhugs rnam mi rtog/ de phyir rgyal ba mnyam par bzhag cing mi 'gyur ba// phung po khams dang dbang po ji ltar sgyu ma bzhin/ 'jig rten

gsum pachu zla 'dra ste 'pho ba mod// soms cano rnams na rmi lam lta bur dngos med de// mkhyenang sa rmi lam bzhin du rtogs nas chos 'di gsung// byang chub mchog rab brta yi rang bzhan khyod kyis brnyes/
nga ni ngang ma thob pa zhes brjod du med// ji ltar byang chub khyod kyis de bzhin 'khor lo yang/ d+hAtshul dang tshul min 'jug pa'i mtshan bral rab tu bskor// brgal nas sems can mang po bsam yas/
rab snyol ba// grol nas brtsis pa'i nang na mchis pa shin tu 'grol// thag chen bla med 'di la 'gro ba dbugs 'byin cing// nges 'byin mnyam pa bar s ba mya ngan 'das la 'god// gang na'ang sems
can nam yang mya ngan 'das ma mchis// sems can gdod nas rnam dag sems can nyid mi sgrub// sems can sgyu ma'i mtshan du byang chub sangs rgyas nas// 'di yi mtha'a rnams sems run mang po rtogs par
mdzad// nam mkha' la ni gzugs rnams nam yang mi snang bzhin// de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gzugasan gzugs nyid mtshungs// chos de gzugs dang gzugs med gzugs min mtshan nyid de// gang gis
de ltar rten rnams yang dag par rtogs pa// ji tsam rgyal ba'i bsngags pa ngag gi dper bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bsngags pa 'di la mthong chags te// rang gi yon tan rnams kyi 'dren bsngags
nam mkha' 'dra// gnyis med bsngags brjod 'di ni rgyal ba'i bsngags pa 'o// sangs rgyas 'gro ba sad par mdzad cing dmigs med pa// sems med sems nyid ngaras pa khyod la phyag 'tshal la
ji ltar 'dren pa kun gyis ma ya sang ge bsngags// de ltar de bzhin nyid phyir yang dag yon tan bsngags// sems can thams cad bdag med mtshan nyid ye shes mnyam// thams cad rtogs nas chos
dbyings rjes su rig par bgyid// chos kun 'dod chags bral ba'i mtshan gyi tshul shes pa// des nimanyam pa nyid kyis 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur// byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' ma dzod kyisatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smrasum thag tu/ nam mkha' la 'dug pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa bkod pa chen po de'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/

bar snang las kyang gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par nga sgrubs nga/ bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ponam mkha'i mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis kun brjod do// byang chub sems dapa' de dag ni rmi lam na 'ong mngon par zhan pas dmigs par lta ba

ma 'byung ngo// gang dag tshigs su bcad pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas mos pa dang/ gong yang thosanas sgrub pa de dag ni/ ji ltar byang chub sems dang 'anam mkha' mdzod da ltar so nga ga'i sgra sgrog pa
bzhin du de dag kyang seng ge 'i sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas/ mi mjed kyi 'ag rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das

la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bang chos snang bar bgyi ba gang cung zad bstan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang skyes bu dam pa/
'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di larang rang gi chos la rje tsom du gyur pa nges par bstan// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo la rab
tu gnas pas de dag gi the tshom thams cad kyang rang tu bsal nga/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thAms cad snang bar bgyis pa de legs so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la skabs phyi
na chos rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa'i bka' mchid cung zad cig bdag zhu'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das ni mi chags nga 'i ye shes can te/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang/
mchog ma lags pa mkhyen nga 1 ye shes la mkhas pa bcom ldan 'das ni snang nga brnyes pa lta/ mun pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni don mkhyen pa sta/ tshigs thams cad rab tu dbya ba'i
bar shes lamakhasapa/bcom ldan 'das ni dus mkhyen pa sta/ dalas mi 'da' zhing khyad par lung ston pa/bcom ldan 'das ni tshodamakhyan pa ste/sems can thams cad la so soru rigs par chos ston pa//

bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par rol pa ste/ mngon par shes pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkangapa rnam par nges pa'i yang shas lamakhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni shin tu rnam par gzigs pa'i blo dang ldan pa ste/ sems
can thams cad kyisoms kyi spyod pa phyug mthil du 'jog pa na kun ston nga/ bcom ldan 'das ni mngon par 'phags pa ste/ spyi gtsug blta mi mthong ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni
zil gyis mnon pa lta/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dpa' bo gcig po/ bcom ldan 'das ni rang byung ba ste/ slob dpon mad nga ra chos thams cad rang gis mngon par rdzogs par

sangs rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa ste/ 'dren pa med pa dang 'a ma ngan par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i lam ston pa// bcom ldan 'dasani sman pa'i rgyal ngo sto/ breg ma dang tha ma ma mchis
ny+nyo pa'i 'dod pa ste/ nyon mongs pa dang/ kun tu sgrib pa dang/ shin tu sgrib pa dang/ kun nas ldang bas bsgribs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa rnams nad ma mchis pa/ 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i gnas kyi 'a ma
larab tu 'god pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni stobs dang drag shul 'chang ba ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa la mkhas shing gsum rag pa'i rig pa bar s pa/ bcom ldan 'das na mi 'jigs
@# pachen po brnyes pa ste/ zag pa zad cing mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa la mkhas pa/ lhadang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun
du khyu mchog sang ga'i sgra sgrog pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dras pa dang ldan pa sta/ dus gsum la thogs pa med pa'i yenashas can/ bcom ldan 'das na sku dang/ gsung dang// thugs
yongs su dag pa ste/'khrul pa dang bco ma mnga' ba/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa chen po la gnas pa ste/ zhi/
dang sa pa mad pa'i blo dang ldan ng/ sems can thams cad la sa mas snyoms ra/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer gyis gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'dun shugs rje chen po la gnas
pasta lags ra ra byas pa dang/ nyes par byas pa dang/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal bas ma bskyod pa dang// sems can thams cad mnyam par 'jug pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ btsem ldan bs
nas nigs rgyas thams chud dang mnyam pa ste/ mnyam pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa la zhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das na bye brag med pa ste/ nam mkha' lta bur shin tu rnam par dag cing/ sems
can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dod pa mdang sta/ shes rab kyis ngems pa/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa dang bral ba/ bcom ldan 'das
ni thams rud mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa// spyan lnga'i tshul yodongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshags pa yon tanadang/ chos dang/ ye shes tshadam mchis pa dang ldan/

par bdag gis rig nas chos rab tu brjod pa'i sgo yongs su zhu bar 'tshal te/ gus pa dang bcas shing chos la gces spras su bgyi ngadang ldan pa ste/ nga rgyal ma mchasangashing sems can thams cad chos la rab
thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pasachos 'tshal ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu'o/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa ji ltar khyod gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyisangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dris pa rnams lung bstan pa thobang/ rigs kyi bu khyod dang ma 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs paladris shig dang/ dris pa de dang de nyid lung bstanangs jas khyed kyi sems
rangs par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems
dang ba chen po nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// ci zhig gi phyir rigs kyi bu khyodad bzhin gshags pa la zhu bar 'dod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ngo
nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snangab la tshigs subacad pas smras pa// gang rnams sems dang sams la sems yid mtshungs// shin tubasams/
sams ye shes mnyam la gnas// sems la sams med par ni zhugs pa'i tshul// de dag dond rgyal la bdag zhu 'o// snang ba thob cing mun padrim da// yid gnyis can gyi yid gnyis blo gcod pas//
sa dus rnam par thar pa lag bzhag pa// dedag ched du bde bar gshegs la zhu// bdag la bdag mdazhin tu rnam dag yid// sems can don zhugs sems can med la dga'// sems can bdag med
gnyis las thar byed pa// rnam par nges pa'i chos kyigatam 'dri'o// reg spyod pa 'jul zhugs yongs su dag/ bsam pa dag cingasams ni nam mkha' 'dra// lhun po lta bur brtan zhing ma ga re ba/
dadagached du yon tan mdzad la zhu// blo zlogs brtan brtson 'grus kun nas bzang// dpa' bo bdud kyi dgra yi nga rgyal bcom// nyon mongs rab tu nyon mongs dra sbyong ba// mthong dgab de dag don du 'di
zhu 'o thos sbyin tshul khrims bzodapa brtson 'grus dga'// bsam gtan rnam ra shes rab mchopa tu gyur// mngon shes bsam gtan rnam par grol ba'i 'od// rab dag dri med don du bdag zhu 'o//

stong pa mtshan ma med cing ma smon gnas// bsams bzhin bu 'a pho dang ni skye ba ston// skyes pa mdacing mi gnas 'chi 'pho med// de dag don du ma yi spyod pa zhu// nyan thos rang rgyal skye bo gzhan dag gis//
rtogs par dka' zhing drab mo mthong dka' ba// skya bo kun gyi yid rnams bskul ba yi// chos kyi gtamanib de bar gshegs la zhu/ legs rar byas pa rdzogs pa'i chos la dga'/ dachos la chos med
'dzin pa gnyis las 'grol// rtag tu mnyama bzhi g mchog gi chos la dga'// sems kyang nam mkha'i ma tshungs nga 'i don du zhu// gang dag sangs rgyas rigs gnas chos la dga'// rtag tu sangs
u// rgyas bstodang kun mad blo// grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du thos// yon tan rgya na mo de phyir 'di zhug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dang 'a/
sams dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasaji ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a dag sbyin pa nam mkha' dang ma tshungasang rnams lags
tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang/ brdod pa nam mkha ba dang mtshungs pa dang/ brtson 'grusanam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang/ bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang/ shes rab
nam ma la 'dang mtshungs pa dang/ bsod namasanam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/
chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dran ng dang/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rdzas su dran pa
dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ myang n las 'das pa dang mnyam pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'ang spyod de/ sems can thams cad kyis spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa rnams
lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa dang/ mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan
nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas// sems can thams cad yongs su smin ra ra bgyid pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du/ tshul bzhin du'ang rab tu sbyor ba rnams lags/ mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang bgyid pa rnams lags/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu rtogs nga ra dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la zhugs pa rnams lags rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ ma ra gnyis su lta ba thams
cad dang bral ba rnams lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btabangs de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu zhugs shing chos kyi dbyings
thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba rnams lags/ bsam pa rdo rje ltar su zhing mi phyed de theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyi phu la rjes su thob rung
rang gi yul yongs su dag pa rnams lags/ gzungs thob nga rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa rnams lags/ spobs pa thogs nga med cing rgyunam 'chad la rtag tus pas rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis
brlabs pa rnams lags/ skye ba dang/ 'chi 'pho ba dang/ 'byung ba rnams la dang da theng nga rnams 'a gas/ bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams
cad bcom pa rnams lags bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams lags/ sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang
sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa rnams lags rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob rung/ sems can thams cud kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa rnams
lags/ chags pa thams cud las yang dag par 'das pa dang/ nam mkha' la rlung mar ltabu'i sems dang ldan pa rnams lags tsheg dang spyod pa'i tshulangs pa dang mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob
ba rnams lags/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'dzeg cing rang byung gi yang shasangashin tu rtogs pa rnams lags/ myur du shug pa chen po la thams cad mkhyen pa'i yishas 'di thob par 'gyur lags/
zla de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs
so skyes bu chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'dri 'dabar sams pa legs so// 'di lta ste/ khyod nasoms can thams cad kyis gsol ba ma btab pa'i bshes gnyan/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i go bgos nga/ bgrang ba las 'das pa 'i sangs rgyas la bsnyan nga kur byas// rtag tu chos tshol bas mi ngoms pa
par shes kyi mtshonamadun/ nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyi don la nga rtsonapa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las yang dag pa ra/
'das pa// nam mkhub dang mtshungs nga 'i sems kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag por sgrub paste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin no// de'i
phyir rigs kyi bu khyod legs par rang du nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni mas dpa' chan po rnams yon tan rnams dang gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba bshad do//
darom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsolanas/ byang chub sems dapa'i nam mkha'i mdzod bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dnga mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste// bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag pa la 'jug
pa dang/ sems can rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la 'jub pa dang/ sbyanepa rnam par dag pas bsngo ba rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang/ bsngo ba rnam par dag pas/ byang chub rnam bar dag

ba la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyanapa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// des rnam par dag pa brgyad kyi sgo nas sbyin pade sbyin te/ brgyad gang
zhen 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ nga yir 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ rgyu rnam par dag par sbyin ng de sbyin/ lta ba rnam par dag par
sbyin pade sbyin/ mtshan ma rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ thadad pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ rnam par smin pa la mar rnam poradag par sbyin pad sbyin/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
zla sems rnam par dag par sbyin pade sbyin// rnam par dag pa brgyad po 'di dag gi sgo nas sbyin pad sbyin no// ji ltar nanam mkha' mtha' med pa de bzhin du sems mtha' med par byas te/ sbyin pa de

sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che zhing bsgribs pa med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub tubasngos te sbyin pa de sbyin/ jiltar nam mkha' la gzugs med pa de bzhinadu/ gzugs thams cad la mi gnas par sbyin pa de

sbyin ji ltar nam mkha' la tshor ba med pa de bzhin du tshor ba thams cad dang bral bar sbyin ng de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la 'du shes med pade bzhin du/ 'du shes thams cad kyi 'dud pa med par sbyin pad sbyin
ji ltanam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa de bzhin du/ 'dus byas thams cad med par sbyin pad sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha'i mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa med pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa mi gnas par sbyin
pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkhas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab pa de bzhin du/ sems can la byams pas khyab par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ja ltar nam mkha' ma zad pa da bzhin du/ dkona mchog gsum gyi

gas mi zad par basngo zhing sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' lamun pa mad9/ de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi mun pa med par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji lto namam pa'i rtag par rab tu snang ba de

bzhin du/ sems kyi rang bzhin yongs sudag par sbyin pade sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' sems can thams cad kyi go skabs 'byed pade bzhin du/ sems can thams cad nyang ra batsho bar sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar

nam mkha' la pa'i ba medar de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pade sbyin/ ji ltar sprul pas sprulapa la sbyin pa de sbyin pa lta bur rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis

'grub ste/ sems dang/ yid dang/ rnam par shes pa dang bral zhing chos thams cad la re ba med pa da ltar gnyi dang bral ba'i phyir/ sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi de bo nyid rnam par dag par byang chub sems dadas

sbyin pa de sbyin te/ rigs kyi bu gang de lta bur sbyin pa yongs su gtong bde ni shes rab kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su 'dor zhing/ thabs kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can
thamasacud mi gtong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de lta bur gtong ba'i sems ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag
namar zhes bya ba 'khor de nyidadu 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso la to/// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dapa' gang dag gi sbyin pa
yongs su gtong ba 'di dra ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga 'a stsal pa// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dbu' sams dpa' chen po gang de dag rnam pa med pa ste/ rnam pa//
rnam par dag pa sems can gyi rnam pa ste/ sems can rnamapar dag pachos kyi rnam pa ste/ chos rnam nga ra dgang sengashes kyi rnam pa sta/ ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/ shes rab
rnam par dag pa sems kyi rnam pa ste// sems rnamangar dag pa 'jig rten gyi rnam pa sta/ bajig rten rnam par dag pa// gzugs med pa gzugs su ston pa dang/ ma ston pa'i ye shes rnam
bar dag ba/ mun pa med cing mun pa rab tu snang bar byed pa/ mtshan ma thams cad rnam par shig pas mtshon ma med pa'i mthar gyur pa// mthar phyin pa'i mngashes rnam par dag pa/ mi zad
pa'i badrodapa dang ldan pa// de bzhin gshags pa'i yeshes kyis mkhyen pa'i lung bstan pa theb/ mtshams bcad cing byang chub sems dpa'i nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa/ phyirami ldog pa'i
phyag rgyus btabacing dbang bskur ba theb pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par zhugs shing mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par spyod pa// legs par spyod pa' spyad pa/ sems can thams

cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang chog shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen nga u0f7cda dag gi spyod yul te/ skyes bu dam pa da dang de dganadi lta bu'i sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// bstan pa
'di ngangashad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stonganam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sbyin pa la bzod pa skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rmi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
gsungs so// dag pa'i soms kyis rtag tu sbyin pa byin// byang chub phyirate rnam smin yang mi 'dod// dga' zhing mgunasarjes su gdung med de// zab tu grolanas rtag tu sbyin pa byin// mkhas pas
chos rnams sgyu 'drar shes nas// lus dang srog la'ang chags par mi 'gyur zhing// de dag lananams kyang 'dzin pa mad// de ltar du dag bsam pa byang chub nges// thams cad btang yang mi
dgar ma bgyur zhing// de la zhum pa med de gong ba med// de yis nam mkha' mtshungs par chos rnams bsgoms// de bas dga' bar mi 'gyur zhum pa'i ng med// bdag gi ring bzhin sn gnas rnam
par dag/ byang chub rnam par dag pas sbyin pa sbyin// dunasems kyi rgyud la ma chags par// spros pa med par sbyin par ba tu sbyin// sems mnyam nyid kyang mnyam pas kun tu sbyin pa gtong//
rab 'bring tha mgasum yang mad par sbyin// bsam pa yongasadagadri ma med pa yis// thams cad gtong yul rnam par smin ma 'dod// lus dang tshe ni mi rtag sgyu ma 'dra// longs spyod rmi lam glog
bzhin snying po med// 'jig rten kun la snying rdzabartse bskyod nas// 'jig rten chos kyis ma gos sbyin pa sbyin// nyon mongs dag phyir bdag gi nor kun gtong// rgyal ba'i tshig gi gnas su 'gyur snyam
ste// bdud rnams kyis kyang bdag la glags mi rnyed/ de ltar brtags nas khrums cad gtong ba yin// stobs bcus sbyin pa rtsa ba yin zhes gsungs/ de la rab tu gnas
dang tshul khrims ldan// tshul khrims yon tan gnas niasabasam gtand// bsam gtanam chags nags rab rdzogs par byed// sbyin pa dang ni dul bas sams rab ma// nyon mos rnams
kyang tsha gnas phyir mi skye// sbyin pa bdag dang gzhan la phan pa gsungs// phan dang bde ba 'dus byas sbyin ngas mgu// sbyin gtong nyon mongs spangs shing dge ba'i phyir// des n 'dzin pa la ni

chags mi 'gyur// pha rol nyon mongs phyir ni mi gtong ste// bdag blo rnam dag byang chub phyiragatong ngo// ji lta ji ltar ma zhum sems kyis gtong// de ltar ngas ni byang chub yon tan mthong// ji lta ji
ltar byang chub yon tan mthong// de lta de ltar sems can brgya tshim byed/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ponam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/

rigs kyi buchos ngazhi dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims nam mkha'adang mtshungs pa yin te/dazhigang zhan/'di lta ste/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i lus mnyam pa nyid de dang/ brag cha lta

bu'i sgra mnyam pa nyid dang/ sgyu ma lta bu'i sems mnyam pa nyid dang/ nam mkha' lta bu'i blomanyam pa nyid da/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims nam mkha' dang
mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa lta/ brgyadag pa na/ 'di lta sta/ sems rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi/
sams dang mi 'bral bdang/ tshad mar gyur pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sams nad pa dang dam bcas pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bslab pa thams cad ma 'dor ba dang/ smon

lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ skya ba thams cad du ma 'jug pa dang/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir mi lhod pa dang/ mtshan ma yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub tub sdob dang/ nyon mongs
pa yongs su dag pa'i phyi'i/ kun nas gdung ba med pa dang/ byang chub yongs su dgapa'i phyir/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dgan byang chub sems dang ba rnams
kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag panAnam mkha' dag pa sto/ tshul khrims de'ang dag pa'o// nam mkha' dri ma med pa sta/ tshul khrims du'ang dri ma med
pa'o/ nam mkha' zhi ba sta/ tshul khrims nga'ang zha nga 'o// nam mkha' mamatho bsta/ tshul khrumasadi'ang ma mtho ba'o// nam mkha'am dma' ba ste// tshul khrims de'ang ma dma' ba'o//
nam mkha' gzung du med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang gzung du mad pa'o// nam mkha' gnas med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang gnas med pa'o// nam mkha' mod pa med ma yin te/ tshul
khrims de'ang med pa ma yin pa'o// nam mkha' rtag pa sta/ tshul khrims de'ang rtag pa'o// nam mkha' mi zad pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi zad pa'o// nam mkha'
mtshan ma med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mtshan ma med pa'o// nam mkha' rgyu ba med pa sta/ tshul khrims de'ang rgyung med pa'o// nam mkha' spros pa med pa sto/ tshul khrims de'ang spros pa mod/
ba'o/ nam mkha' zag pa med pa ste/ tshul khrims dbang zag pa med pa'o// nam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang 'dus ma byas pa'o// nam mkha' mi 'gyur ba ste/ tshul
ts+tsA khrims de'ang ma 'gyur ba'o// nam mkha' rnam par ma rtog pa ste/ tshul khrims debang rnamarar ma rtog pa'o// nam mkha'athams cad du songang ste/ tshul khrims de'ang thams cad du song ba'o/
nam mkha'am chod ma byed pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mchod ma phyed pa'o// nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mtshungs par sbyor ba'o// nam mkha' rang bzhin gyis
kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste/ tshul khrims dbang rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims
nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di skad gsungs so// soms na tshul khrims dramod srungazhangagadung ba med// lus
dang sems kyang rnam drug ngag 'di thams cad basdams// mkhas pa rtag tunang zhi tshul khrims dregs mi snyams/bang sems lami gnas byung chub sems la rton// las gang ma byas ma bsanas
de bzhinam brtags te/ de ni dmar sde ser min kha dog gzugs mi gnas// gzung med na bden ma ga yo dngan panam mkha' bzhin// tshul khrims lta ba gnas med mkhas pa kun gyis bsngags/

tshul bunasaden rab zhi zhi byed nyon mongs zhi// zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gi mthar phyin mar ston ng// gangasu bcingasalas grol ba de dag tshul khrims bsnyen// de bas tshul khrims rdar byed byang chub rtsa
ba'i gzhi// gang su sbyangs pa dgon gnas 'dod ltung myog shes pa// yo byad bsnyus shing bsam gtan dang na tshogs sems sbyangs// tshul khrims de yi gnas nges sems rkang thar pa'i rten// de phyir
tshul khrims brgyan pa lam bde thams cad sgrung// g.yo ba rlom sems kun bral lta ba'i nyon mongs gcod// nam mkha' mtshus mnyam byams pas khyab cing mthar 'dzin sbyong/ byang chub par nges/
gtong byang chub kun ma rtog gang mkhas tshig shes de 'dra tshul khrims pharel phyin////gru bzhanam khamadzod kyi mdo bam po gnyis pa// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang/
chub sems dpa' bzodapanam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gangazhe na/ 'di lta sta
tshig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ gshe yang sur ma gshe ba dang/ lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyi'i brdegs kyang sa ma rig pa dang/ sems nam mkha'
[A, ]dnga mtshungs pa'i phyir/ skyes kyang spur ma spyi ba dang/ bsam pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyi'i/ khros kyang slar m khrob ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhu redi dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sem
dbang bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// 'gas kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'alto
rgyu ste nam mkha' la zhe 'gras pa med de/ sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras ba med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang/ nam mkha' la rjes su chags pa med de/ red ba dang bkur skul
rjes su chags pa med pa 'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang/ nam mkha' namanyam par sbyor ba ste/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang/ nam mkha' nam
smad ma nyams pa ste/ lus dang sems zad pas nyams pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang/ nam mkha' na bgal nyal thams cad spangs pa ste/ bag la nyal med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag
pa dang/ nam mkha' na yod dang dmags pa med pa ste/ yod dang dmags la med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang/ nam mkha'am skyes ma byung ba ste/ ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzodapa can gyi bzod
ba pa yongs su dag pa dang/ nam mkha' na gzugs dang/ gzugs med ba thams cad la khyab pa ste/ byams pas khyab pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag na//
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa yongs su dag pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// 'gagakyi bu byang chub sems dang 'anams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'i brgyad//
brgyad gang zhen/ 'ad lta ste/ stong pa nyid la bzod kyang lta bar/zhug pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa la bzod kyang mtshan ma sel ba ma yin pa dang/ smon pa med pa la bzod kyang/ byang
chub tu smon pa med pa med pa ma yin pa dang/ mngon par 'du ma byed pa la bzod kyang/ 'dus byas rnam par gzhug pa'i phyiri ma yin pa dang/ skyeb med pa la bzodakyang/ 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan
nyid kyis ma yin pa dang/ 'byung ba med pa la bzod kyang/ skye ba dang gnas pas ma yin pa dang/ sems can med pa la bzod kyang/ dngos po rnam par gzhag pa'i phyi'i ma an pa dang/ lta ba
bzhin du bzod kyang dus rnam par gzhagi ba'aphyi ma yan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o// bzod pa zhes bya ban 'di dag/
bdag lagashe'ang bzod do snyam pa de na re yar 'dzan pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'dani nem mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// 'di dag gshe ba bdag gse bzod par bya'o snyam pa den 'dzin pa'i
bzod pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// 'ad dag na yo leg snor ba'o snyam pa de ni sgra dang skad kya ba byed pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
bzod pa ma yin no// 'dabeng stong pa bdag kyang stong pa'o snyam pa de na yode la byed pa sbyar ba'i brjod pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// bdag gis bzod pa bya'o snyam
pa de ni rnam par rig pa'i bzod pa ste/ de na nam mkha' dang mtshungs ba'i bzod pa ma yin no/ 1/ 'di lta ste/ dper na shing sA la chen pa'i geg la yod par la la zhage 'ongs te/
shing sprul bcad na/ de la shing sA la bcad pa'i lhag ma rnams 'di snyam dur do degan bcad do// bdag name bcad do snyam du ma sems te/ de dag la rjes su chags pa'i ng med/ khong khro ba'ang
med de/ ma rtog/ rnam par ma rtog yongs su ma rtog pa de bzhin du/ gang bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag pa'i achog go
ni/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di deg gsungs so// zad pa shes pa bzod pa ma zad gtsang// yid na yul la ma chags shin tu bsgoms// nang gan tu rnam
dag tsha gnas pa/ nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam sems mchog bzodapa'o// lus 'di gzugs brnyan shing rtsig pa 'dra// sems kyang gzugs med ma snang sgyu ma 'dra// chos 'dilta ba'i gan
med mamakha' bzhin// lus kyang ma 'gyur yid la khro ba med// bkur sti byed la dga' dang zhe sdang med// mtho dang dma' ba rnam par rtog pa med// theg pa gang 'dra sa ltar sbyar ba de//
sems can dag pa bstan 'di'i brjod smras yani// srog med gang zag bdag med sems can med// sa 'di thams cad stong pa'i gang bzod cing// rgyu dang rkyen dang byed dang 'galam byed//
de na bstan 'di bzoda mchog yang dag nyid// kha nganazer ba'i tshig thos ma gshe zhing// byed pa med pa nam mkha' sngonaskya bzhin// bdag mubasal yid stod pa'i mchog mthong de// bstan
'di'i sems can gtsang ma bzod pa yin// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus nam mkha'i dang mtshungs pa yin zhen/ gi sa kyi bu chos pan deng ldan na/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dba' chen pa brtson 'grus nam mkha' dngamatshus ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rtsom mang chos thams cad yongs su ma grub pa'
rab tu shes pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang/ rim gro bya ba mngon bar 'du byed kyang/ de bzhinagashigs pa rnams chos kyi skumanyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang/ sems
can longs su smin par byed kyang/ sems can rnam par dag pas sems nam dgos pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma pa'i chos lo sa su 'dzazhigyang/ 'dod chags dang bral bar bya/
pa'i chos yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos pa'i mi de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nam mkha'adang mtshungs
[A ]pa yin no/ 'gos kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa 'da brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhen/ brtson 'grus gang gas lus brgyan pa'i lus de gzugs brnyan lta bur
rig pas ma dmags pa dang/ brtson 'grus gang gas tshag mngon bar 'du byed pa'i tshig de ya ma brlar rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang/ brtson 'grus gang gis sems tange de 'dzin gyi gnas su/
'jog pa'i sems de sems kyi chos nyid kyis rnam par brtags te ma dmigs pa dang/ brtson 'grus gang gis bkol tu phyin pa'i phyogs thams cad rab tu sdud par byed kyang/ de gcig nas gcig tu
sems zad pa'i chos de kyis shin tu brtags te mdamags pa dang/ brtson 'grus gang gas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub kyang byang chub de dngas pa'i mtshan nyid du rnam par
brtags te yang dag par rjes sum mthong ba dang/ brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i zhing de'ang nam mkha' dang tshudas pas rnam par brtags te ma demages pa dang

brtson 'grus gang gas thos pa thams cad 'dzan par byed pa de sgra brag cha dang mtshungs par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba dang/ brtson 'grus gang gas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrub pa//
deb chos kyi dbyangs dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid du rnam par brtags nas ma ngamags pa ste/ 'gis kya bu brgyad pa de dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa'o// dgesakyi
bu 'di gnyis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus te/ gnyis gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus so// de la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus
ni/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems dang rab tu ldan pa'o// yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni'an pa med pa/ 'dor ba med ba/ gnas pa med pa ste/ nam byung chub sems dang 'khus
dang dag dang/ sems sbyar ba'i ri rtson 'grus rtsa ba nas ma gnas pa shin tu brtags nas/ ma dmigs shang yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus chos kyi dbyangs kyi rjes su 'jug pas rjes su
'gro ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub rigs dpa' brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// jaltar nam mkha' gzugs med cing sems can thams cad rab tu rgyu ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sem/
dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang chos thams cad la ma gnas shing sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed do// ji ltar nam mkhas gzugs thams cad la go skabs 'byed tsang bla gab
med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'o// ji ltar nam mkha' las rtswa dang/
nags tshal dang/ lo tog skye'ang rtsa ba med cing gnas med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed kyang
'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba la gnas pa me da do// ji ltar namam khab thams cad dusong yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus de'ang dge ba'i chos
thams cad rjes su song yang 'bo ba'i mtshan nyidim yin no// ji ltar nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor zhing/ gzugs tha dad par ston pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson
'grus de'ang sems can thams cad la chos thams cad mtshungs par sbyor zhing spyod pa sna tshogs kun tu ston to// nam byang chub sems dpa' gang kun tu sgrub par byed pa de mnyam pa nyidi pas yang
dag par rjes su ma mthong zhing gangal rtsom pa de'ang rnam par brtags na me dmags te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis de 'tshi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyasemathu bskyed nas// lus dang sregala'ang 'phangs bar ma byed cing// bdag nyid chen po byang chub spyad/
ba spyad// sems can phanang 'din byed phan sems pa// sngon gyi srid par 'dus byas ji srid pa// byang chub yon tan phyare na de srid 'khor// de dag skye bar 'gyur ba'ang yong med de// phyi phyi'i/
thabartson 'grus dag na re ba tu skyed// sems can bsam mi khyab ba 'grol bar brtson// sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab pa mchod par brtson// zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab blta bar brtson//
bsam gyis ma khyab bdud rnams gdul bar brtson// sbyin pa bsam gyis ma khyab gtong bar brtson// tshul khrims bsam gyis ma khyab bsgoms par brtson// bzod pa bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom
bar brtson// brtson 'grus bsam gyis ma khyab dge bar brtson// bsam gtan bsam gyis ma khyab sems par brtson// shes rab bsam gyis ma khyab bsgom par brtson/ khyams pa bsam gyis mi
khyab bsgom par brtson// don dang yon tan sgrub par rab tu brtson// srog dang lus kyang ma 'phas brtson par byed// nyon mongs thab kun las rnam par grol// stong pa rnam thar bdag med mngon
brtson// bdag la bdag med che ba'i bdag nyide brtson// lta bas rnamagrol byang chub phyir yang spyod// sgyu ma smig rgyu'i ngo btod du brtson// sems med sems kyang sems ma yane mthob// g.yo ba med

pa'i chos rnams ston par brtson// 'gro ba kun tu spyod cing rnam par grol// bshad cinge klog pa la na'i ba tu brtson// chos dang chos min gnyis las shin tu 'das// sgra dang yi ge'i ngo bo de la brtson//
'gro ba rnams la mdo sde stong rnams/ sangs rgyas yon tan rnams namatha' yang med// sems can spyod pa rnams la'ang mtha' med de// mkhas pa de la rtag tu pa rtson 'grus sbyor// sems can
spyod mkha'amed la rab tu 'jog tshos 'di rnams na skye med 'gog med de// mkhas pa de dag sems kyang ma zhum zhing/ phyi'i brtson 'grus rlungs rab bskyed de// 'di/
'dra'i chos la sems can bsgomo du btsud// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ ragisakyi khu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
dpa' bsam gtananam mkha' dang mtshungs ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems nang du yang dag 'jog la/ nangadusems gnas par yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba dang/
'o gams phyi rol nas kyang bzlog la// phyi rol tu sems rgyu ba ma dem gas pa dang/ bdag gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang mnyam pa de du snyoms par 'jug pa dang/
sems mnyam pa nyid de'ang sems sgyu ma'i chos su mnyam pa nyade dusnyams par 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzha pa de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtananam mkha' dang
mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ni 'od brgyud de/ brgyad gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan byed kyang phung po la gnas te/
bsam gtan mi byed pa dang/ bsam gtan byed kyang khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan ma byed pa dang/ bsam gtan byed kyang mched la gnas te/ bsam gtan ma byed pa dang/ bsam
0 go tan byed kyang 'adzi'i rten 'di la gnas te/ bsam gtan ma byed pa dang/ bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten pa rol la gnas te/ pasam gtan mid pa dang/ bsam gtan byed kyang 'dod/
ba'i khams la gnas te/ bsaM gtan ma byed pa dang/ bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs kyi khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan ma byed pa dang/ bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs med pa'i khams
la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'o// gzhan yang nges par rtog pa'i sems na bsam gtan
yongs su dag pa ste/ de la nges par rtog pa'i sems nyid gang zhen/ gangs rnams la sa mtho mi dema' ba/ mi stod mi snod ba/ 'gyur ba med// rnam par ma rtog pa// sogs pa med pa//
'bri ba med pa// 'dzan pa med pa// gtong ba med pa// mun pa med pa// snang ba med pa/ rtog pa med pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ 'du shes med pa// yid la byed pa med da/ gcige nga
'ang ma yin/ gnyis pa 'ang ma yin/ gnyis pa yin pa'i ng ma yin pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ rlom sems med pa smos pa med pa// sogs pa medang/ phra ba med pa/ sgom pa med pa//
'jig pa med pa ste/ gang mtshan ma dang dmags pa thams cad la ma gnas pa'o// gang sems mi gnas pa de ni sems nges par rtog pa'o// sems nges par rtogs pan gzugasa rnam
kha ma rgyug ste/ mgo dang/ gzugs dang/ rnam par shes pa 'ge cang rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni sgra rnams
la ma rgyug ste/ rna ba dang/ sgro dang/ rnam par shes ba 'gatsang rang gi mtshan nyare rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni dri rnams la ma rgyug ste/ sna dang/ dri dang
rnam par shes pa rig 'di rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni ro nam la ma rgyug ste/ lce dang/ ro dang/ rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan/
'di rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni rig pa rnams la ma rgyug ste/ lus dang/ reg pa dang/ rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par basam
gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni chos rnams la ma rgyug ste/ yid dang/ chos dang/ rnam par shes pa rig cing/ rang gi mtshan tid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// rigs kyi
bu 'di lta ste/ dper na bskol bas bsreg pananam mkha' ma'og cing/ chus 'jig pananam mkha' gshar ba ma 'gyur pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems pa'i bsam gtananam mkha'amatshug
pa'i ng nyon mongs ba thams cad kyisama'itshig cing/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzanadang/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la'ang mchags pa yin no// mnyam par
bya bzhag pa'i ng mnal/ sems rnam par g.yengs pa 'asems can rnams kyang shin tu 'god do// mnyam par bzhag kyang dga' bamed la/ langasanasakyang khong khro ba med pa yin no// 'phags
baspyi bo rnams la zhing chu bar ston kyang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams yongs su sman par bya ba'i phyi'i/ brtson 'grus rab tu 'bar bar yang byed do/ mnyam par gzhag cing mnyam pa'i ng yin/
la tshamanyam par spyod pa rnams la tha dad par ston pa'i ng rab tu ston to/ mnyam pa nyid kyis mamanyam pa'i ng ma mthong al/ mamanyam pas mnyam pa de dang 'gal bar yang ma byed do// de ni mo
'gal zhing 'gal ba med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyi bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// shes rab che ba'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa rab tu ma gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa
nas bya'o// gang gis bsam gtan de ltar mngon par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bsam gtananam mkha'adang mtshungs pa ste/ mi gnas pa'i nges gtan yin no// de nas bcom ldan
'drasakyis de'atshigs su bcad pa 'dodig gsungs so// bsam gtan rnams kyi dbang ba yongs su dag/ dran pa rtse gcig yid namanyam par gzhag gnas rnams thams cad la yang ma ges
shing/ 'grobakun lamanyamanyid snyams ' bzhi g/ nangadang phyi rol dag na gnas pa yi// phung pa skye mched khams la m gnas shing// nye bar zhi ba dben pa spyod yul te// mkhas pa de
dag rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/ mnyam pa nyid kyis rtag tu mnyam bzhag kha/ chos kyi dbyangs dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i yod// shin tu dben pa'i sems kyang ston byed nga
[A ]mkhas pa bsam gtan kun la'ang mchags sa/ 'gro ba rnams kyang yongs su sAn bya'i phyir//chi 'pho skye 'chib nyer ston kyang// ting ngo'adzalas dedag mnyams te// de ni sems rtogs dbang
gis de 'dra'o// gzugasamed ting nge 'dzin kyang spyod yul la// sems can rnams ni yongs su snyan bya'akhyer/ 'dod pa'i khams su'ang rab tu snang byed do// dedag bdag dang sems can ma gan
( nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul te/// sgyu ma dang yang mtshungs ji smagargyu 'dra// malam chu zla sprinagyi mtshan nyid du// chos rnams shes nas rtag tu mnyam por bzhag/ 'gro ba kun gyi
shes pa'i spyod yul du// 'gro ba rnams la sems dang blo 'jug cing// sems rgyud lanab nges pa med pa ste// rang gi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes// bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul mngon shes mkhas pa
yis rngazhing rnams mang po bya bar da 'grozhung// mashes nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa yi// rgyal ba bsam ma khyab la mchod par byed// dbang po rnams ni dul zhing zhi ba'o yod// zhi gnas pha rol
nicing mi rtog pa// den 'gro ba rnams la zhiba'i yid// rtag tu ye shes stobs la mnyam par bzhag/ mnyam pa nyid dang mnyam pa'i ng yong med la// mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba mtshan med de/ mnyam
da de la gang dag ba gnas pa// de dag rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa yane// lags kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a shas rub nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang
ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ra shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshus pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'alta ste/ nam mkha' rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad rnam par dag
ba'ajug pa dang/ ye shes rnam par dag pas/ rnam par shes pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi dbyangs rnam par dag pas bdag dang/ sems can dang/ sra go dang/
gang zag rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang/ dona rnam par dag pas/ yi ge thams cad rnam par dag par rab tu rtogs pa ste/ ragisakyabu chos bzhi pa dedag dang ldan na/ byang chums dpa' sa'ar
nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dgapa ni'ad brgyad de/ brgyad gang nan/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par

sgrub kyang rtag par lta bar ma sbyor ba dang/ mi dgaba'achos thams cad stong bar brtson 'grus rtsom yang chad par lta bar mi ltung ba dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jugakyang mi skye ba'i bzod pa dang
'gal bar mi byed pa dang/ sa so yang dag par rig pa pa shes par snang yang/ nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa la ma chags pa dang/ chos kyi sdom bzhi'ang ston la mo rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/
khyu// bdag med pa dang/ zhib nyid du dngos po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba dang/ las dang bya ba la 'jug pa rab tu ston kyang las med cing rnam par smin pa med pa las kyang mi g.yo ba/

dang/ spros pa med pa 'a rtsis shes pa la gnas pa yin yang/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba nges par bstan pa rab tu ston pa dang/ chos thams cad kyi snang ba rab tu rnyed pa yin yang/ kun nas
nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang ba'ang sems can rnams la rab tu ston pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kya shes rab yongs su dag pa'o// ye shes rab ces bya ba 'di

ni/ rnam par rtog pa kun nas 'bar ba med pa'i phyir/ nye bar nA ba'i tshig go/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam nga ra dag pa'i phyir 'don ma 'gyur ba'i tshig go/ gnas med pa'i phyir 'don rnam par mi rtog pa'i

tshig go yang dag pa 'di lta ba'i phyi'i 'dun ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshogi 'o// 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'don bden pa'i tshig go/ ma rung bar ma 'gyur ba'i phyi'i 'dan yang dag pa'i tshig go/ bcings pa yang

ba'i dag par gcod pa'i phyir 'dan yid rno ba'i tshig gro/ 'phags pa'i yon tan gyi phyir 'di na ngoms pa'i tshag go/ shin tu brtags pa'i phyir 'dani nges par 'byed pa'i tshog go/ brjod du med pa'i phyir 'di

ni don gyi tshig go/ khyadapar med pa'i phyir 'don mtshungs pa'i tshig go/ ma shigs pa'i phyi'i 'don snying pa'i tshig go/ ma gnas pa'i phyir 'di ni ma g.yos pa'i tshig go/ rab tu 'bags pa'i phyir 'di ni rdo rje'i

tshig go/ byed pa byas pa'i phyi'i 'don sgril ba'i tshig go/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyi'i 'di ni rnam par dag pa'i tshig go/ snang ba ma dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'di ni mun pa med pa'i tshig go/

sgrob tags pa med pa'i phyi'i 'don gnyis su med pa'i tshig go/ shin tu zab cing byang ba phyi'i 'donazid pa'i tshig go/ 'dus ma byas pa'i phyi'i 'din mo zad pa'i tshig go/ sbyar ba med pa'i phyi'i 'dus ma byas kyi
tshig go// shin tu rnam par dag pa phyi'i/ 'di nam mkha' tsheg go/ bsgribs med pa'i phyir 'di zhim mkha'i tshig go/ gnas pa'i le gnas kyi phyir 'di'i kun nas gsal byed kyi tshig go/ ngo bo nyid
med pa'i phyi'i 'don mdamags pa'i tshig go/ rnam par shes pa dang ye shes gnyis su med pa 'i phyi'i 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig go/ gnyen po med pa'i phyi'i 'dun ma brdziba'i tshig go/ mngon par ma grub
pa' phyi'i 'dani lus med pa tshig go kun tu rtog pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phyir/ 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i tshig go/ sred pa'i bag la nyal yang dag par bcom pa'i phyi'i/ 'dan kun 'byung spangs pa'i tshig
go/ rab tu ma byung ba'i phyi'i/ 'dini'i gog pa 'tshag go/ gnyis su med pa'i lam la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir/ 'dan sgom pa'i tshig go/ rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas pas rag tu phye ba'i gi go/ rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir/ 'dinas nigs rgyas kyi tshig go/ rab tu 'dod chags dang bral kha'aphyi'i/ 'di nitshes kyi tshig ste/ gang de lta bu'i gal 'jug pa'i ye shes snang ba gzhan gyi
dring la 'jog pa 'di ni shes rab ces bya'o// gang nges par bstan pa thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bstan pa'i rjes su 'gro ste/ rjes su 'gro bas tshosachung du la'ang mi
[+ ]rtog rnam par ma rtog pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin panam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'atsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/
shes rab lta dang mun ng nyon mngos gcod// rtag tu bag chags nyon mongs rab bsal cing// rgyudang rkyen dang byed pa nges par ston// mtha'i rnams thams cad yongs su gcod par byed// bdag dang sems
can l yang m gnas shing// gang zag srog la'ang rtag tu gnas pa med// dngos dang dngos med gnyis las thar byed de// shes rab pha rol 'gro ba rab tu bstan// shes rab bdud las rgyal te nyon mongs/
med/ shes rab chub sabasgral rab tu sgrol// shes rab ye shes byed cing rnam par sbyang// shes rab thar pa bde ba'i mchog kyang ston// shes rab kyis na sgrib pa'i rtsa ba sbyong// phung po khams
[j]na yongs su shes pa'i mtshan// mtshan dang mtshan gazhi mtshungs mtshan grol byed pa// shes rab thob pa srid pa gsum n mdzes// yongs su dag spyod shes rab ces bya ste/ 'jig rten thams
cad kyis nam gos spyod// spyad pa spyod pa rab tu rtogs par spyod// shes rab dag pa'i m ni rnam par mdzes// mag lnga dgan yongs su dag byed cing// dbang po ldan rab tu snang bar byed// 'gro ba lnga
rnams rab tugacod par byed// phung po lngan zad phyir chos ston to// ba rol tshu rol rtag tu ma gnas shing// chos kyi dbyangs gnas gnas la shin tu gnas// bar snang dang ni mtshungs mnyam 'dra/
ba ste// sangs rgyas ye shes rjes su 'thun zhing 'phags// red dang ma red gnyis ka'i mtha' las grol// dbus la rtog pa kun rtog ma rtog pa// ganganu'athags pa thams cad song ba yi// 'chi
kha med pa'i lam du 'jug pa ston/ stagabasngal shes shing de bzhin sred pa spangs// lam rnams ston cing 'gog pa'i ng rab tu'achad// bden pa shes pas shes rab 'od 'jug ste// des n sngon gyi mar
mang rab tu bcad// zhing rnams thamasaM cad zhing mtshungs zhing ma yin// chos rnams thams cad chos mtshungs rab tu dben// sems can thams cad bdag med sems can mtshus// shes rab blo spyod
bsana' deshes so// rages bya ba de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha' dang mtshus te/ de dag ni byang/

chub kyi sems kyis bon de'ang nam mkha' dang mtshungs so// rigs kyi du byang chub sems dpa' bsad nams ji snyed mngon par 'du byed pa de dang byang chub kyi sems dang ma 'bral te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags

pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sngo bar byed cing/ de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs par tshang med par rab tu gnas so// de la byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar nam mkha' tshad med pa'i
@#// 'i 9 bdag gis ba sod nams tshad med pa mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad med par brtsams pas tshad med pa'i don 'phel ba yin te/
de'abyung chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu tshad med pa bcu pa 'di dag ni/ gang byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshog sakyis yongs su rdzogs bar
bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pa yongs su rdzogs pas/ lus kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i/
dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pas/ ngag gi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su 'jug pas/ sems kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongs

!/ su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ spyod pa dang/ ye shes dang/ spyod lam tshang med pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ rnam pa tshad med pa rnams kyi sangs

rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ bsod nams dang sems nges par rtog pa dang/ spyod pa tshad med pas/ sangs rgyus kyi spyod lamatshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par

bya ba dang/ rgyun bkod pa thams cad dang/ spyod pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin yongs su rdzogs pas/ mdzod

skya yongs su byang ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ blam la rim gro byed cing 'dud pa tshad med pa dang/ nga rgyal bcom pa tshad med pas/ dbu'i gtsug tor spyi gtsug bltar ma mthong ba tshad

med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang/ sgyu dang g.yo med par 'ong ba dang/ 'gro ba dang 'thun par 'dzin pas don yod par rnam par gnon pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/ rigs kyi butshad
med pa bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// gzhan yang rags kyi bu rnam byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur
ba de na/ nam mkha' tshad med pas/ de'i rtsom pathams cad kyang tshad med pas kun tu gnas te/ de bas na bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub
sems dpa' ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ gang sems can thams cad kyi sems la ye shes des khyab pa byed tsang/ sems can thams cad kyi sems 'dod chags dang bcas
ba'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhesdud dang bcas pa'i sems kyang zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
rab tu shes so// gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems kyang gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa jirtib bzhin du rab tu shes so// de ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pasems kyang des nye ba'i nyon
mos pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes// des bdag 'dod chags med pa'i tshis kyirang bzhin las ma g.yos bar sems can gzhan rnams
[A ]nga gang zag gzhan dgal 'dod chags 'dul ba'i phyi'i chos 'chad do// de bdag nyid zhe sdang med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos bar sems can gzhan rnams dang/ gang zag gzhan dag la na
sdong 'dul ba'i phyi'i chos 'chad do// debadag nyid gti mug med pa'i tshes kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang/ gang zag gzhan dag la gti mug 'dul ba'i phyi'i chos 'chad do//
sgyu des bdag nyid nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang/ gang zag gzhan dag la nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// des
'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnam bar dag par bya ba'i phyi'i chos 'chad do// 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtachugadang/ dba'i nyon mongs ba'i sems la dman
bar yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la mchog tu yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// dpa'i
'i nan/ 'daltar byang chub sems dpA de gnyis su med pa'i matha'i sgonas chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes te/ chos kyi dbyangs gang yin pa de 'dod chags kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyangs gang yin pa
de zhe sdang gi dbyings/ chos kyi debyangs gang yin pa gti mug gdapyis/ chos kyi dbyangs gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i dabyang sas// de bas na chos thams cad chos kyi dbyangs su yang dag par du'o
zhes bya ste/ chos kyi dbyangs ni gar yang 'gro ba'ang med/ ma 'gro ba'ang med do// chos thams cad nachos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/ gang bdag gi dbyangs shes pa des chos kyi dbyangs/
kyang shes so// deltar na chos kyi dbyas dang bdag gi dbyangs de dag mi gnyis so// deci phyir zhen/ bdag rnam par dag pas chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dag go/ de bzhin du chos thams cad

kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ gang ma par dag pa de rab tu snang ba'o// gang rab tu snang ba de bla ga ba med pa'o// gang bla gab med pa de la mtshan ma thams cad kyi skabs med do// gang mtshan ma med pa de la gan
pa gang yang med de/ mi gnas pa ninam mkha' 'o// gang de ltar ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro zhing ye shes des chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba den/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shesanam mkha' dang mtshungs/
ba'o rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dang 'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gang tshul khrims las sangs rgyas rjes su dran ng/ zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims
las kyang ma nyams pa'o// tang nge 'dzan las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing/ chos kyi dbyangs mnyam pa thams cad las kyang ma 'gyur ba'o// shes rab las sangs myas rjes su dran zhing/
ba/ @#// chos thams cad rgyu ba med par yang rnam par ma rtog bko rnam par grol ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran ng/ sems gnyis la'ang ma gnas pa'o// rnam par grol
ba ye shes mthong ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing shes pa thams cad la 'ang mgas pa'o// stobs las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing/ dus gsum mtshungs pa'i yongs las kyang mi
g.yo ba'o// ma 'jigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing/ zag pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu'ang mi gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing/ chos kyi
dbyings mnyam pa nyid du'ang rnam par ma rtog pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang/ gzugs las sangs rgyas yang dag pa rjes su ma'athongal/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas/
dran pa'i yishes rjes su'ang 'gro ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa las sangs rgyus yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong la/ rnam par shes pa'i/
ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su'ang 'gro ba'o// phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong l/ phung pa dang/ khams dang/
skye mched kyi bo nyidi shes pas/ dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su'ang 'gro ba'o// gang yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas/ shes rab che ba'i dran pa de ni yid la byed pa thams cad med de//
lta ba thams cad kun nas ldang ba med bko/ gang de lta bu'i rnyog pa med pa'i dran bas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes byago/
gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni/ gang spyod lam thams cad du sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par mkhyed/ 'greng ba dang/ brtags pa dang/ 'dug pa dang/ nyal ba dang/ 'gro ba
dang Da'ong ba dang/ snab dang/ mis bar yang sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par ma byed do// de mngon par ma chagos pas dran pa'i ng dran par mi byed/ mi dran pa'i ng dran pa'i m byed do//
de dran pa yid lam byed pas/ gzugs dang/ mtshan dang/ chos nyid du'ang sangs rgyas rjes sumadran no// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ste/
gangal mtshan madang dmigs pa thams cad kun tu spyod pa med pa'o// gas kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'achos rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ chos zhes bya
ba 'dod chags med bgo/ de la nga tshos ci li chugs kyang rung/ de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi med pa'o// de la gang chos gang la sbyar ba de
dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// tshos zhes bya ba niti ba na ba ste/ gang sems dang yid 'bar bar byed pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos zhes bya ba ni mtshan
ma med pa ste/ gang mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang 'dus

byas su rab tu bzhag pa la gnas pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med de/ yang chos rjes su dran pa ni gong gas 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par mthong ste/ yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la
'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dar sa sa thams cad rang bzhan gyis ma skyes par 'ge nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo// gang de lta bu'i gnas na yang dag pa'i chos kyis gnas so//
gang gis de ltar man par rtogs pa de ni/ chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni slob pa dang/ ma slob pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a dang/ yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rtogs pa'o// de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa na/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba ste/ de la tshes gang yang kun tu spyod pa med de// chos gang/
