tshang kun tu spyod pa med pa den/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa gang zhen/ ga
'dunazhes bya bana'idus ma byas pa skyed de/ mngon par 'du byed pas rjes su dran pa'i m nus la/ gang na lus kyis dad/ ngas ga las dang/ yid kyi las kutu spyod pa med pa de nas ngan pa 'a
'dumabyed pa zhes bya'o// de la 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni gdags pa dang tha snyad do// 'dus ma byas pazhigadugs bathams cad yang dag par 'dzem pa'o// tha snyadathams cad las yang dag par 'das pa

ste/ rigs kyi bu'adazhisangs rgyas kyis gnang pa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa 'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa gang zhen/ gtong ba zhes bya
ban lung pa thams cad 'dor zhing rab tu gtong ba'o// de ci'i phyi zhe na/ des tshos gang yang btang ba med do// 'di ltar de la gang gtong ba'i chos gang yang snang bar ma'agyur te/ 'di la nga tshos
thams cad tsha'adzan pa de na gtong ba'i mchog go/ gang 'dzan pa de ni mi gtong ngo// gong ma gtong ba denaoM snyems so// gang ma sems pa de na dmagis bar ma byed do// dmags par mkhyed pa
la sems skyo ba med de// rgyu ba med pa na sems kyis rnam par rig pa med pa'o// gang la sems kyis rnam par dag pa med pa de nam par shes pa mi gnas pa// rnam par shes pa mi gnas
pa den sangs rgyas gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dranupa'o// gang yang byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba de ni thams cad mkhyen par bsngos pa ste/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa na thams cad kyi mnyam pa

nyid do// gang mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa ni ri ba tu gtong zhing byang chub tu'ang sngo ste/ derjes su dran yang tshos gang yang rjes su dran pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos dang
tshog ma yin pa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin te/ gang 'di nyis su med pa de la yid byed datsa'ing med do// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos shes pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub/

sems dpa' na sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ tshul khrims zhes
bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ zag pa med pa/ smon lam med pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ brtul zhugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid
blo ma yin no// ting nge 'dzan gyi gnas te/ sems kyi dmags pa'i gnas ma yin no/ shes rab kyi rtse pa ste/ skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// rnam par grol ba'i rgyu mthun pa ste/ gnyis kyis
'batuphye bam nano/ mkhas pasa'ab tu bsngags pa ste/ gzugs snang bam yazhino// nyon mongs pa zhi ba ste/ su rnam par 'ge ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// bde ba thams cad kyi rjes

su 'gro zhing gnyen pos bskyed pa ma yin te/ gang de lta bu'i tshul khrims rjes su dran zhing dran pa la rtog pa med pa de rigs kyi bu gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang
chub sems dang 'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran ba gang zhen/ lha'i ris gnyis rjes su dran par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gnas gtsang ma 'a ris kyi lha dang/ skye ba gcig gis thog
ba pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas na 'khod pa rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpas gnas gtsang ma ris kyi lha rnams rjes su dran no// yang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub

sems dbab dga' ldan gnas na gang dag 'khod pa de dgunaspyi bo lta bu bcus rjes su dran te/ bcu gang zhen/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyin ngan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi bo gyur pa dang/

ma ngon par shes pa thams cad kyi nangan/ mnyegs pa'i mngon por shes pa dang/ sa thams cad kyi nang na dbang bskur ba'i sa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi nang na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba/
dang/ ting nge 'dzan ma nyams pa dang/ so so yang dag pa'i nang na don dang/ spobs pa rgyunama'achad pa dang/ shes pa thams cad kyi nang na/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang/ dbang po tham
cad kyi nang rab 'bring tham la 'jug pa shes pa dang/ stobs dang ma 'jigs pa la snang ba' ya shas rjes su 'grol dang/ sbyin thams cad kyi nangan/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu gzigs ba dang/

sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'di dag ga lag mthil du song ba ltar 'dug pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas sems kyi skad cage ba/tsag dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
ba'o zhes spu bo'i// chos rnam pa bcu pa de dag gis rjes su dran no// de'i drin pa de na lta bas ma 'khrugs/ bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang bas ma 'khrugs/ yid la byed pas ma 'khrugs/
@#// spros pas ma 'khrugs pa ste/ deltabu'adren pa rtog pa med pas/ lha rjes su dran ba 'dazhi'igs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ dgis kyi bu

de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ mnyam pa nyid thob kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa 'ang sbyod pa yin zhen/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ninyon mangs pa thams
cad rab tu zhi ba ste/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa/ dmags pa thams cad zhi ba/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa de mya ngan las/

zla8 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob cing sngon gnas bcas pa'i sAng rje chen pa dang/ thabs dang/ shes rab dang/ ye shes kyisan rnam par rol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlag

shes rab dang ye shes nipishin tu bsgoms/ sngon gyi byin gyi rlabasakyis na bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la na gnas te/ nyon mongs pa gang gis 'khor ba rab tu bskyed

pa'i 'khor bar 'ching ba de dag rab tu sngangs shang/ ye shes gang gas mya ngan las 'das par ston pa de la dbang thob pas ma sgrib las skye zhing ma 'byung ba las 'byung ba ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang
mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par zhugs kyang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'ang ma 'chad do// de rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyogs su tshang ba zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgo ste/ ye
sa kyi sgo gang la gnas pas/ byang chub sems dba' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems

dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ chog shes pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/ 'dun sdom gyi rtsa ba'i tshig go/ gang yang sen

can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ brjod du med pa de sangs rgyas kyayi shes kyis mkhyen te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yi shes kyis ma rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i
bshes kyis ma'i kha de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ rang gtishes pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su rab tu 'jug ste/ spyod pa de'i ging
nga bo nyide dag/ gang mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ rkyen kyi mtshan nyid dam/ byed sgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ ma 'dra
ba'i mtshan nyidi dam/ 'dod chags kyi tshan nyid dam/ zhe sdang gi mtshan nyid dag/ gti mug gi mtshan nyid dam/ skal ba mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sems can dmyal ba'i mtshan
nyid dam/ dud 'gro skye gnas kyamtshan nyid dam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid dag/ lha'i mtshan nyid dam/ ma'o mtshan nyid dam/ nyan thos kyi nges par 'gyur ba'amatsan
nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyidi dag/ sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rang po'i rgya'i mtshan nyid dam/ bar ba'i rgyu'i

mtshan nyid dam/ nye ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ spyod pa de dag thams cad kyimtshan nyid yang dag pa jalta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ ye shes thams cad la kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no/
'bis kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dar 'a sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang tsheg shes pa yin no/ gas kyi bu de la jaltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus
bdag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag gi chos dkon mchog ga mdzodan mozad ba ste/ sems can thams cad gyi spyod pa na/
'di la rab tu'ajug pa ji snyed pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyatshos dkon mchog gi mdzod la gzud ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i ng de snyedado// ji ltar sems can gyi spyod pa mazad cing mtha'
med pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyatshos dkon mchog gamadzod kyang ma zad tsang mtha' med pa'o// chos dkon mchog gamadzod ces bya ba ni/ gang gi nub mo de bzhin gsheg
khag byang chub brnyes pa nas/ gang ga nub ma yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang/ 'chad pa dang/ 'chad par 'gyur pa de thams cad na de/
khananano/ ma nor ba de bzhin no// gzhan ma yin pa'o// ci'i phyi'i de bzhin zhes bya zhe na/ de bzhin nyidi na ba 'a yang dag par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir na ma nor ba

da bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ don dam pa'i bden pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de'i phyi'i ma ra ba de bzhin zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir na gzhan m yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ de dag gi ngo bo nyid/
ma yin par gzhan dum btsal te/ de'i phyi'i gzhan ma yin pa'o// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams gtogs pa'i sems can rnams mang du thos pa kun dga' ba lta bur gyur kyang/ de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba phrag steng du'ang yi ge khong du chud par ma nus so// yang don gcig
tu bstan te/ ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa 'di lta bu nas nigs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod do// de byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzin te/ ji ltar yi ge thams
cad ma kherjed tsang/ don thams cad mnyis par sems can thams cad mgu bar byed/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mnyes par byed/ bdud thams cad pham par byed/ mu stegs can
gzhan thams cad tshar gcod/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed cing de dag la chos dkon mchog rab tu sgrog pa de ltar 'dzin to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
ga/ bcom ldan 'das rnams kyatshos dkon mchog gamadzod 'dzan pa yin no// yang rigs kyi bu chos gang gi ngo bo nyid dungs chos rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa de'i ngo bo nyid du/
cung chub sems dpas chos rnams gzung bar bya'o// yang ja lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs gshin/ yongs su ma grug pa 'tshul gyis sgyu ma'i ngo
nyid dang/ gul las shin tu 'das pa 'tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang/ shin tu skye ba med pa 'tshubs smag rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang// ma'athob tshul gyis ma g.yor gyi ngo bo nyid dang/ rang
sgyu bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid dang/ rag las pa'i tshul gyis stong pa'i de banyidi dang/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang/ sems
chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis sman pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang/ 'dod chags thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul gyis 'dod chags pa'i ngo bo khyod dang/ gras thams cad las 'das pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
ma byas pa'i ngo btodidu/ de ltar 'gos kyi khu tha snyad du gzhan gyi rnam par 'gog pa la brten nas/ de 'dra bar chos de ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ gangs de'i ngo bonyid kyi mtshan
dade natshig gis brjod bar ma nus so// de la chos rnams 'dzan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i ngo bod kyi chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te/ yi ge dang
sa pa'i tshig gis kyang sems can gzhan rnams dang/ gang zag gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas/
sems can rnams yongs su sman par byed ce na/ gas kyi bu sems can gyi khams na thog ma nas rnam par dag pa ste/ de la sems can rnams kyi rtsa ba'i dngos po med de/ byang chub sem
dar 'chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yongs su chad par ragi nas/ sems can gang rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de la bdag tu lta bar mi 'gyur/ sems can du lta bar ma yan/ srog tu lta par
ma yin/ gang zag tultabar yang ma 'gyur ro// de'ang bdasnyam du sems te/ sems zhes bya ba 'dan phyin ci log ste/ rgyuralta ba'i nanas dkris pa dang/ ma rig pa dang/ sride ba dang/
sred pa 'dus pa dang/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa las sems can zhes brjod snyam mo// de la byang chub sems dpas med pa phyin ci log las byung ba'itonamangs pa rab tu snang ba'i
'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/ das pa gang yang chud ma gzonato/ sems can med cing sems can dben pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar byang
chub sems dpa' thog ma nas rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su sman par byed do// rigs kyi bu de dzaltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi
[]// chos thams cad yid dag par sgrub cen/ tshul bzhin zhes bya ba na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'byung ba'o// de ci'i phyi'i zhen/ rgyudang rkyen ca'adrab de 'dra bar 'bras bu man/

[A ]bar grub bo// sbyin pa na longs spyod chen pa'i rgyu ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' gang gtong ba de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsdus nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
tshul khrims ni lhadang ma skye ba'i rgyu ste/ lha dang ma'i skyes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams tshul khrims la rab tu 'dzud de/ tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ba de'ang thams cad
sgyur mkhyen par bsres nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bzod pa dang des pa ni lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems kyi rgyan gyi rgya ste/ lus dang/ ngag dang//
sems brgyan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang/ gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin te/ phan par 'dod pa/ bzed pa'i gnas de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsdus nas/
bzod pa 'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// brtson 'grusan sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud ra ba rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
thams cad yang dag par sgrub cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
[0f7a] da de bsam gtanan sems dga' ba dang cang shes pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dga' ba dang cang shes pas ni gnas kyi tshogs kun tu skong ste/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs de'ang tham/
cad mkhyen pa'i bsngos nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// thes pa ni shes rab chen po'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po ni dmigs par lta ba ma
'dzin cing/ dmas pa med pa'i thos pa de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du dgaba'achos thams cad de//

dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu gang dang gang bsags pa de dang de'i 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pas mngon par skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyu dang rkyen de ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya
ba la tshes thams cad kyitshul bzhan na bdag yin te/ jaltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la bdag med do// ltar bdag stong pa de bzhin du/ chos thams
cad stong ngo// jalta bdag mang du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang mang du btags pa tsam du zad do// de ltar tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
na tshos thams cad mnyam par sbyor ro// gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyidi din sas rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ de ltar tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' nisangs rgyas
ka @#/ kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing/ chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin zhen/
de la rags kyi bu dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'ajig tshogs la lta ba ma bam pas mngon par shes pa bskyed pa de dag ni// mngon par shes pa rnams las nyams par yang 'gyur ro// yang bang chub sems
dpa' ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par bcom nas/ lta ba dang len pa thams cad med par mngon par shes pa skyed de/ ye shes dang ldan/
shes rab dang ldan/ blodang ldan/ bzod pa dang ldan/ tshul khrims dang ldan te/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing/ lus dben/ sems dben te/ 'a'adra ba'i yi shes kyis nad
tabar naMzhing phyi'il du mi rgyu ba/ yul med pa'i yul can/ cang shes ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ shin tu brtags pas brtags pa/ rab tu dkar ba'i blo/
nyon mongs pas ma 'khrugs pa/ snang ba thob pa/ ye shes rab rib med pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa// zha gnas kyi tshogs bsags pa//
lhag mthong gi tshogs bsags pa/ sbyin pas brtan pa/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa/ bzod pa'i rkyen pa/ brtson 'grus kyi ya lad bgos pa/ bsam gtan la gnas pa/ shes
rab shAn tu bsgoms pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ byams pas rjes su 'thun pa/ snying rje la rab tu gnas pa/ thabs kyis mngon par bsgrungs pa de lta bu 'atshos dang ldan pas mngon par shes pa skyed de//
byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du mngon par shes pa de dag gis shin tu 'phags shing/ de mngon bar shes pa de dag gis chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ gzugs thams cad mthong/ sgra
thams cad thos/ sems can thams cad la 'jug cing bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran te/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul/ zag pa zad pa'i bde ba red cang yid kyi rnam par rtog
pa ji snyed pa la rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyod pa thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ das chos thams cad la de bzhin du lhun gyis grub par gnas so// bags kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sem
dpa' mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la dza lta na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs shang/ nyan thos dang
rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu zab mo zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul ni 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i
rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis
reg pa Da reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshorab/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred ba'i rkyen gyis len ba/ len pa 'byin gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis
rgashi dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdugabasngal gyi phung pa mon pa 'di'aba' zhig 'byung

bar 'gyur ro// sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kun 'byung ba'i tshul
zhes bya'o// de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul la/ngan na/ 'di lta ste// ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag// 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa
'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ mang dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag// reg pa 'gags pa sa tshong pa 'gag/ tshor ba
'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skyeb 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang/ mya nganadad
smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen pa 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro// de ni rigs kyi
du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul zhes bya'o// sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ de nas
kyi tshul zab la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyisam yin pa'o// de ci'i phyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sam yanazhen/ sems can thams cad/
khedunanas tonams ba dang/ rnam par byang r shes pa nas nigs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul la/ rang gi ye shes dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' kyang de'i
brab mo zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig tshogs dang/ bdag rnam par dag pa dang/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'o/ de ci'i 'i zhen/ 'ge tshogs ni
kun tu btsal kyang mi ngoms sa// gang mi dmigs pa den thob ma'o bda gnas nigs rgyas thamasacad kyis kyang ma b.res go/ de ci'i phyi zhe na/ bdag thogo sa nas kyang rnam par dag ste/
ji ltar bdag rnam par dag pa de bzhin du/ sa thams cad rnam par dag go/ de ci'i phyi'i rnam par dag pa zhes bya zhen/ de la sa gang yang ma skyes ma bskyed/ ma 'gag/ ma 'gags pa
ste de bas na rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa/ rab rib med pa/ don dam ba zab mgong la mig med cing mgo 'gog pa med pa nas/
yod kyi bar du med cing yid 'gog pa med ste/ na yul dubagrang ba ma yin no// gang yul ma yin zhing yul med pa de ni don dam pa ste/ de'i phyi'i zab mo zhes bya'o// de la
sems dang yid 'dzanib med de/ rtogs par dka' ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ long du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i chos tshul zabamal ye shes gzhan gyi drang la ma'ajog cing/ sems can
gzhan la'ang rab tu ston te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul zab ma lo rab tu zhugs pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no////
'dag zhag mdzakyi yodobs pa gsum pa// 'gas kyi bu de la dzaltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mtha' gnyis su lta ba
thams cad dang bral ba yin zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byung chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang brten pa de natse'ing ma yan pa/ gang brtan pa de ni dngos po med pa/ gang brten pa de ni
yongs sum grub pa/ gang brten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de nam rtag pa/ sdug bsngal pa/ bdag med pa/ zhi ba/ gdung brten pa de lan bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/
gso ba med/ skyes bu med/ gang zag med/ shid las skyes med/ shod bu med/ gang brten pa de la ni yang dag par 'byung ba gang yang med/ gang brtan ba de la ni ci'ang med pa// rtsol
ba med pa// steng ba/ mtshan ma med pa// dben pa/ rtsub med pa/ ma skyes ba/ spros pa med pa ste/ de'i phyi'i skye ban tshos khon skye/ 'gag pa na chos kho na'agag ste/ 'di la/
kha dag gam/ sems can nam srog gam/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu med ces bya'o// chos gang dag rten cing 'brel
par 'byung ba de dag la naskyi ba ci'ang med cing bdugapo med de/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ni rtswa dang/ shing dang/ rtsig pa dang/ lam dang/ mag yor lta bu zhes bya ste/ ji ltar phyi lo/
gyi dngos po rnams skyeb na/ skyed par byed pa med/ 'gag la na'ang 'gog par byed pa med pa de bzhin du/ nang ga tshos rnams skye ba na'ang skyed par byed pa med/ 'gag pa na'ang 'gog par byed pa
med de/ gzhan dun rkyen rnams yod na 'byung gi/ rkyen ma tshang na 'gog go snyam du sems te/ deltar shes pa la sbyor ba nam thar lta ba thams cad rab tu sbyong go/ de la mtho'i lta ba gang zhe na/

mtha' zhes bya ba ni chad pa dang rtag kha ste/ gang dem skyed cing rnam par ma 'jig kha na chad pa dang/ rtag pa dang bral ba ste/ de'i phyi'i dag pas na mtha' lta ba thams cad rnam par dag pa ste/ 'gisakyi
khu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel ba 'byung ba la 'jug pa'ishes pa la mkhas te mthar ltakha thams cad dang bral yin no// ji sa kyi bu de la ji ltar nabyang chub sems dang 'a de
pazhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas// de bzhin nyid du dbyer med pa shes pa la mkhas pa yan zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa zhes bya ba la de bzhin
'di da byer med pa de ni phyag rgya ste/ bye ba med pa/ 'jug pa med pa/ mngon par zhen pa med// ma bskyodang/ bskyod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ lhadang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
'jig rten gyis bskyed par ma nus so// de ci'i phyir na/ lha dang/ mdang/ lham yon du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na phyag rgya des btang ba da do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de shin tu

ma skye ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu sman pa med pa'i phyogargyu/ shin tu'adus ma byas pa'i phyagargyu/ shin tu 'dod chags dang bral
ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyu/ na tu yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyu/ shin tu nam mkha'i phyag rgya ste// dper na nam mkha' la rgyam snang ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i phyag rgya de 'ong spyan lngam snang ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi tha snyad ja snyid du 'dogs pa de dag thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas
btab bzhin du tha snyad 'dogs so// de la gang dag rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ba de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par byed do// gang dpo/ rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni chos rnam par 'jong/
bar ma byed/ sa tha dad du mi byed do// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas na/ de dag de bzhin nyid 'byed par ma byed do// de la de bzhin nyid tha dad pa gang zhe na/ gang dag
tha ma dang/ 'bring dang/ bkyi chos rnams su rnam par rtog pa'o// gang dgachos thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin nyid tha dad du ma byed do/ gang ji snyid mang por brtags shing/
rnam par brtags kyang de bzhin nyid dbye bar mi nus te/ dper nasems can thams cad nanem mkha' la rnam par rgyu yang nam mkha'i khams na'adres par yang ma byed do// de bzhin du sems can

thams cad de bzhin 'di la rnam par rgyu yang de bzhin nyid ni'adres par ma byed do// gang 'dir de lta bu'i chos rnams shes pa'i byang chub sems dar 'o de lta bu n de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab
ba yin te kwa de bzhin nyid kyang 'dris par mnyid do// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dbang chos kyi dbyangs gyi tshul la zhugs shang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par
gzhol ba yin zhe na/ chos kyi dbyingesazhes bya ban rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyangs so// yang dag par bsgrubs pa med pa'i phyir ma skyes pa'i de byis
so/ a byung ba'i phyi'i mi 'gog ba'i dbyings sa// 'gro bamed pa'i phyi'i mi 'gro ba'i dbyangs so// rgabamed pa'i phyir 'ong bamed pa'i dpyad ge so// 'byung ba med pa'i phyi'i gnas
med pa'i dbyangs sa// dus gsum mnyam pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin gyi dbyangs sa/ gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i 'i/ bdag gi dbyangs so// don dam pa yin
ba'i phyir gang zag med pa'i dbyangs so// gnas med pa'i phyi'i rnam par rig pa med pa'i dbyangs so// 'dre ba med pa'i phyir kun gzhi med pa'i dbyangs sa// nges par gyur ba'i phyir skye ba med pa'i
dbyanges so// rang bzhin rgyas yongs su dag pa'i phyir nam ma kha'i dbyangs so// gnyen po med pa'i phyi'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyangs te/ 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes

ts+tshA bya'o/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad de ltar zhugs pas de la/ byang chub sems dar 'a de ltar chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa'i gang pa sma ba dang/ rjod pa dang/ ston pa de thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings
su yang dag par gzhol ba nyid do// chos kyi dbyangs kyi tshul la zhugs pa de 'dod chags kyi 'ams dang/ chos kyi dbyangs de dag gnyis su med par rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyi'i zhenA/

'dod chags ni tshes kyi demya nges kyi reng bzhin can no// zhe sdang gi khams dang/ sakyi dbyings de dag na gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyi'i zhe na/ zhe sdang na chos kyi dbyangs kyi'ang nga tshan can no//
gti mug gi khams dang/ chos kyi dbyangs de dag nags su med de/ de ci'i phyi'i zhen/ gtamuganatshes kyi dbyangs kyi rang bzhin can no// nyon mongs pa'i khams dang/ tshes kyi dbyings
de dag naganyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa na chos kyi dbyings kyi ring bzhin can no// 'dod pa'i khams dang/ chos kyi dbyangs de dgan gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe/
'dod pa'i khams na chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhinano// gzugs kyi khams dang/ chos kyi dbyangs de dag nA gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ gzugs kyi khams na chos kyi dbyangs
kyang pazhin can no// gzugs med pa'i khams dang/ chos kyi dbyangs de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ gzugs med pa'i khams na chos kyi dbyangs kyi rang bzhin can no//
mag ga khams dang/ chos kyi dbyings de dgan gzhis su med de/ datsa'i phyir zhe na/ mgon chos kyi dbyangs kyi rang bzhinatsanano// gzugs kyi khams dang/ chos kyi dbyangs de dag
naganyis su med de/ de ci'i phyi'i zhenA/ gzugs chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ chos kyi da byings de dag ni gnyis su med de
de ci'i phyir zhen/ mig gi rnamabar shes na chos kyi dbyangs kyi ri ngajazhan can no// yid kyi bar gyi khams dang/ chos kyi dbyangs de dag gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi
khams ni chos kyi dbyangs kyi rang bzhin can no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ chos kyi dbyangs de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni/
ca3[]// chos kyi de bas kyang bzhin can no// phung po'i khams dang/ chos kyi dbyangs de dgan gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyi zhen/ phung po'i khams na chos kyi dbyings kyi
rangabazhin nano// sa'i khams dang/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dang/ chos kyi dbyangs de dgan gnyis su med de/ daci'i phyir zhe na/ sa dang/ chu dang/

me dang/ rlung nachos kyidabyangs kyi rang bzhin can no/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stongo dang/ spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ sa thams cad kyi bar dang/ chos kyi dbyangs de dag ni ga'i
su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad na tshes kyi dbyangs kyirang bzhin can te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang tshos mnyam pa nyidi 'dal zhugs pa de na chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang
dag par gzhol ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad rab tu shes pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyangs kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin no// rigesakyi bu de la jaltar na
byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo ltar sra zhing ma skyed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shang na g.yo ba yin na na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra
nga ma phyed pa bcu gnyis kyis na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis ma phyed pa yin te/ bcugs gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma phyid pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i
bsam pas sbyor ba mi phyed pa dang/ sbyin pa la phyed pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab mi phyed pa dang/ byams pa chen
bdar snying chen po mi phyed pa dang/ bsduba'i dngos po mi byed pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ma byed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ma phyed pa dang/ 'go
bas yongs sutshaskyobs byed pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bas mi ngoms pa ma byed pa dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang bo'i phyi'i gtan ba med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa ma byed pa dang/ dam pa'i chos
yongs su gzung ba'i phyir lus dang srog 'dor ba ma phyed pa dang/ sems can gzhan dang/ gang zag gzhan gyi phyi'i dge ba'i rtsa ba pa snga ba ma phyed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang ga
bar bsgrub pa ma byed pa ste// rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di lta bu 'di dag las ma phyed pa de 'tshe/ bsam pa rdo rje ltar sranang ma phyed pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ dpe
nanor bu rin pa rdo rjen nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bags kyang bdag nyid ni mi 'bags so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i bsam rdorjeltar srazhing ma phyed pa 'ang sems can thams cad kyi bag
la rtal dang/ 'onamongs pa kun nas ldang ba dang/ lto bar gyur pa rnams sel kyang/ bdaganying nithig pa chen pa'i di las 'phyid do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i bsam
ka/ pa rdoltar sra zhing ma skyed de/ theg pa chen po 'ad la legs par gnas shang ma g.yo ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag ba yin zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bya ba ni yul ma yin pa// yul med pa/ yul thams cad yongs su dag pa'o/ de' byang chub
sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su dag pas/ rang gi yul yongs su sbyong ste/ de 'di snyam dumag gi yul na sangs rgyas kyi yul yun yang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul na chu dang yang nye ba
'am 5 'angeb ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul na dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyi'i/ dben pa'i yul la mig gi yul gang yang med do// rna ba'i yul ni
sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul na su dang yang lta ba'am 'dri ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul na deb nApa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dpon pa
yul lan rna ba'i yul gang yang med do// sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul na su dang yang tepa 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// sangs rgyas kyi
yul dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul lan sna'i yul gang yang med do// lce'i yul na sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul na su dang yang nye ba'am rang
bam yin no// de ci'aphyi zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi yul na dben pa'i yul yan pa'i phyor te/ dben pa'i yul lan lce'i yul gang yang med do// lus kyi yul nas ngas rgyas kyi yul yan/
yang Da sangs rgyas kyi yul na su dang yang te pa 'ama'ang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul na dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyi'i te/ dben pa'i yul lan lus kyi yul gang
yang med do/ yid kyi yul na sangs rgyas kyi yul yan yang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul na su dang yang nye ba'am nga ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul nadaben pa'i yul
yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa yul la ni yod kyi yul gang yang med do// phung po rnams dang/ khams rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brelapa 'byung ba yan lag
bcu gnyis pa la'ang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu deltar na byang chub sems dang 'a sangs rgyas kyi yul dpen pa nyid kyis yul thams cad dban par 'jug po// rang gi nang yongs su dag par sangs
rgyas kyi zhing la zhul sa pa de na chos gang dag de'i dbang po drug la snang ba 'gyur ba de dag thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pas 'jug go/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul chags pa
med cing thogs pa med pa de bzhin du/ de yul thams cad la'ang ma chags ma thogs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul la rjes su zhugs shang rang
dag yul yongs su dag pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thob pa rtag tu ma brjed par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub
sems dpa'i gzungs yongs su sbyang ba bya bas gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ de la gzugayosasu sbyang ba byed pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sum cu rtsa gnyis pa 'di dag ni gzungs yongs su sbyang
ba byed pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis po gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa dang/ chos don du gnyer ba dang/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mosapa dang/ chos la mos pa dang/
pa'i sa la 'bab pa dang/ chos la bab pa dang/ mang du thos pa rnams la sten cing bstanal bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ slob dpon dang/ mkhan po rnams la nga rgyal med cing btsun par
gus par byed pa dang/ chos yongs su tshol bas ma ngoms pa dang/ rjes su bstan pa rnams la bka' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin pa dang/ chos skya pa'i gang zag rnams la ston pa tsam du
shes shing 'khrul pa mtshol ba dang/ kun 'dzin pa dang/ 'dzani ba dang/ klog pa dang/ ston pa la le lo med pa dang/ chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med cade zang zing med par
chos sbyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi rtsa pa ' gnas thos pa dang/ tshul bzhin gyi chos la sbyor ba dang/ ji ltar thos pa 'chos la so sor brtag pa'i ri/ mang du shes pa mu med pa byas pa dang/
tshangs bar spyod pa la gnas pa mu med par bcas pa dang/ rtag tu dben pa la sems gzhol ba dang/ rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang/ yang dag pa'i chags par 'gyur ba drugam/
'dor ba dang/ gus par bya ba'i gnas drug yongs su mgatong ba dang/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la gyur ba dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang
ma'agal ba'i las dang bya ba la 'jug pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la sems nges par rtogs pa la ma skrag pa dang/ 'phags pa'i 'gas dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan gu 'dzin
pas yongs su ya mi 'chad pa dang/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la sems zhum pa med pa dang/ sems can la ltabs snying rjer ba dang/ sa la lta bas lus dang srog 'don/
ba dang Da ye shesal lcabs rtag tu nga rgyalamed pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs sum skyo ba ste 'dano ba khungs yongs su sbyang ba byed pa zhes bya// 'gas
kyi bu de la gzungs gnan/ gang kun bazung ba'achos rnams ma brjedapa dang/ jiltar thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjod pa dang/ dran pa rjes su dran pa dang/ rtogs par khong du chud
ba dang blo gros 'dod pa dang/ ya gi mi zad pa dang/ nges pa'i tsho dang skad la 'jug pa shes pa dang/ khas pa bstan pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chad pa dang/ nges pa'i
don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang/ drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang/ kun rdzob mi zad pa bstan pa shes pa dang/ don
dam pa dbyer med pa'i de kho na bstan pa shes pa dang/ bden pa la 'jug pa nges par shes pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa shesapa dang/ yang dag par spong ba'i brtson
'grusama'agong ba shes pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rol ba shes pa dang/ dbang po'i rim pa shes pa dang/ stobasal gnas pa mi bskyod par shes pa dang/ byang chub kyi
yan lag rtogs pa dang 'thun pa shes pa dang/ lam la 'jug pa gnas shes pa dang/ zhi gnas kyis sems gnas par shes pa dang/ lhag mthong gis chos sgrol bar shes pa dang
'gi pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rjes su 'thun ba shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang/ mngon par shes pa'i yashes skyed pa shes pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa
drug la 'jug pa shes pa dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis so ci rigs par shes pa dang/ sgra skad dang ngag gi lam la 'jug pa shes pa dang/ chos kyi brda ston pa shes pa dang/ nadabye
med par shes pa dang/ tshig 'bru mi zad par shes pa dang/ sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba shes pa dang/ so so ci 'ogis par sa ston pa shes pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams
cad kyis gsungs pa dran pas 'dzin pa shes pa dang/ tshig dang yi ge gathams cad mtshams sbyar ba'i nges ba'atsheg la 'jug pa shes ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang
ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa shes pa dang/ rgyu dang bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang/ chos thams cad la snang ba rab rib med par shes pa ste/ 'di na ga zungs zhes bya'o//
lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems dang 'dra ba'i chos kun tu 'dzan pa gang yin pa de ni mazad pa ste/ sa kyi char 'bebs pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang//
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par skyed pa 'di yin te/ gzungs thob pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mibarjod par spyod pazhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu deltar na byang chub sems dang 'a
gzungs thob pa rtag tu ma brjod par spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la dza ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyunam 'chad la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi khyon gyi
rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa na zhi na/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/
spobs pa myur ba dang/ slobs pa mgyogs pa dang/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang/ spobs pa rgyun ma'achad pa dang/ shin tu nges pa'i tshig la stobs ba dang/ zab ma la slob
pa dang/ sna tshogs la lcebs pa dang/ legs par brgyan pa'i spobs pa dang/ zhum pa med pa'i thebs pa dang/ 'jigs pa med pa'i sdebs pa dang/ tshigs//
su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa ga la spobs pa dang/ mdo dang rtogs pa brjod pa dang/ sngon byung ba la spobs ba dang/ ma 'thun pa'i sdebs pa dang/ tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi
zad pa la slebs pa dang/ bas pa shin tu gsal zhing shin tu mdzes pa dang/ gi btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs pa dang/ sa ston pa 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs pa dang/ lha'i 'khor
gyi rgyan gyi spobs pa dang/ rnatsam thams cad gcod pa'i spobs pa dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig na las 'das pa'i chos la spobs pa dang/ 'khrul pa med pa 'i skyobs pa dang/
'khol bam sa kha dang/ sAng dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms kyi stabs pa dang/ skye ba dran pa mngon par shes pa'i spobs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byan gyis
brlabs pa'i skabs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhapo de dgan/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin no// de dag kyang yongs su sbyang ba bya ba nyi shu rtsa bzhis 'grub ste/
nyishu rtsa ban gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ blama' ngas mgacog ngas myur ba'i spobs khar 'gyur ro/ tshu shog ces bya ba dang/ song zhes bya ba la g.yo med pas skyobs pa mgyogs par/
'gyur// nyon mongs pa thams cad chags ba med pas spobs pa med par 'gyur ro// de la ma chags bar gnas pas skyabs pa rgyunama'achad par 'gyur ro// phra ma'i tshig med pas shin
tu nges pa'i tshig la babs par 'gyugo/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pas zab mal stobs par 'gyura'o// sbyin pa snatshogs bsags pas snatshogs la stobs par 'gyur ro//
chung malegs par brgyan te/ rab tu byin pa legs par brgyan pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems las mi nyams pa'i zhum pa med pa'i stobs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi phung
po legs pa'i kun tu gsungs pas 'jigs pa med pa'i skyobs par 'gyur ro// gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ ladu sna tshogs byin pas tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs
bstan pa'i sa pa tshig la skyobs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang/ rim gro byed pa dang/ bsnyen bkur byed pa sngon du 'gro bas mdo dang rtogs pa brjod pa dang/ sngon byung ba la
spobs pa 'gyuro// sdug bsngal ba dang/ dbul ba dang/ mgon med ral mkhanas pas ma sbrel ba'i stobs bar 'gyur ro// gterami zad pa sbyin pa dang/ pha rol chos l sbyor bas
tshig rab tu dbye bas zad pa laspobs par 'gyur ro// tshig bden pa dang/ tha ba med pa dang/ ngag rtsub po med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pas skyobs pa shin tu gsal zhing mdzes par 'gyur ro//
ka @#// bla ma'i ga khyad du ma gsod ba dang/ gzhan gyi tshig mi gcog pas tshagi btsunanang gzung ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro// rang gi yon tan gyi chos sgrub pas chos bsten pa/
'bras bu yod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// bdag la ma stod pa dang/ gzhan l ma snyed pa dang/ 'phas pa'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi stobs par 'gyur ro//
sa la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa dang/ chos ji ltar thos pa bzhin du ston pas the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs par 'gyur// bstan chos thams cad shes pa dang/ gzhan
lami gnod pa dang/ nad pa rnams kyi nad g.yog byed pa dang/ smanarab tu sbyin pas 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la spobs par 'gyur ro// pha 'o
la 'khrul pa'i skabasam tshol ba dang/ gzhan dag ga ltung ba ma gleng ba dang/ 'khrul pa la mi rtogs pas 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la sems snyams
pa dang/ sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyor ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'god pa dang/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa thams cad don dum
gnyer bas/ 'khor la byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms kyi spobs par 'gyur ro// dka' blo bde ba dang/ des pa dang/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang/
ba/ sems dga' ba dang/ gzhan gyi rgyud 'khrug par ma dang/ skye ba dran pa'i mngon par shes ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ theg pa chen po las mnyems pa dang/ theg pa dman pa ma 'dod
pa dang/ sems can la snying rje ba dang/ thams cad nan tan la 'god pas sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa sogs par 'gyur go// sems can gzhan la go bar byed pas de'i phyi'i skyobs pa zhes
bya'o sems can gzhan la nan tan du bya ba ston pas de'i phyir lcebs pa zhes bya'o// gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud mi bar byed pas/ de'i phyi'i sa rlobs pa zhes bya'o// sems can gzhan
gyi sems dang 'thun par ston pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/ lags kyi bu chos dang/ yon tan dang/ yoshas de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' na sdebs pa thogs pa me dacing
rgyunama'achad la/ rtog tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang/ 'chi'apho dang/ 'byung ba rnams
la dbang thob pa zhen/ rigs kyi bu chos btsugs dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang/ 'chi 'phodang/ 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ sdig pa'i grogs pa yongs su spangs shing rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen la stan pa dang/ lta ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims ]
kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang/ ting 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ ldang ba shes pa dang/ shes ba dang/ thabs zung du 'brel ba dang/
mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa 'thob pa dang/ ma skyes pa dang/ ma byung bar so sor rtogs pa dang/ bsams bzhin du skye ba dang/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ sems can
la lta ba'i byams pa la sbyor ba dang/ snying rje chen pa la'ang nges bar sems pa dang/ chos la sgyu ma lta bur rtog pa dang/ 'chi'apho med par 'pho zhing skye ba dang/ sakyi mtshan nyade rmi lam/
gyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos l 'jug pa dang/ phyin ci log gi chos la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs nas skye ste/ 'pho zhing
'byung la skye ba dang/ 'pho ba dang 'byung bar yang ma sems pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du skyes nas/ sems can gyi don byed pa'i skyes pa'i rabs bstan
pa tshad med pa'i skyes pa'i rabs de dag thams cad ni rtsa ba gnyis la gnas pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa'i yis la gnas pa dang/ snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba la gnas pa//
rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang/ 'chi 'pho dang/ 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yano/ rigs kyi bu del ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i bdud bzhi'i lam las
[d; ]yang dag par 'das shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dar la chos thams cad skyam lta bur shes shing rtogs pas/
phung po'i bdud las yang dag par 'da' 'o// ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin so sor rtogs pas nameg pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'da' 'o/u0f7c/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtog
pas 'tshi bdag gi bdud las yang dag par 'da' 'o// byang chub kyi sems las ma nyams pas lha'i bu'i bdudalas yang dag par 'da' ko/ yang des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa yin/
te des bdud kyi las rnams bcol ba gang zhen/ gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la bdud kyis glugs ma rnyed pa ste/ theg pa dmanapa 'dod pa bdud kyis dang/ byang chub
kyi sems ma srung ba bad kyi las dang/ sems can tha dad par sbyin pa bdud kyi las dang/ skye ba la gnas pa'i tshul khrims bdud kyi las dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs su
bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang/ de la chags shing ro myang ba'i bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyis chos ngan pa la smod pa bdud kyi las
dang Da 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba bdud kyi las dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma sngab bdud kyi las dang/ nyon mongs pa la smad pa bdud kyi las dang/ ltung ba 'ab pa bdud kyi las
dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la sdang ba bdud kyi las dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba bdud kyi las dang/ byas pa rgyun gcod pa bdud kyi las dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa
rnams yongs su mtshel ba bdud kyi las dang/ dam pa'i chos mnyan par ma'i dad pa bdud 'a sa dang/ chos la slob dpon kyi dpe mkhyud byed pa bdud kyi las dang/ zang zing dang 'brel
bar tshos ston pa bdud kyi las dang/ thabs dang bral bas sems can yongs su snyan par byed pa bdud kyi las dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po 'dor ba bdud kyi las dang tshul khrims 'chal
rgyu pa rnams la khong khro ba bdud kyi las dang/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la ma gus pa bdud kyi las dang/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i rjes su 'thun pa bdud kyi las dang/ rang sangs rgyas
kyi thig pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa bdud kyi las dang/ dus ma yin par sgrub 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang/ snying rdzachen po bo nas rigs la rtogs pa bdud kyi las dang/ 'dus ma byas 'dod
kha bdud kyi las dang/ 'dus byas la stod pa bdud kyi las dang/ sems can gyi tsa bya'o cog la g.yal ba bdud kyi las dang/ nga rgyal la gnas shing mi 'dud pa dang/ lce gnyis smra ba
dang Da g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang/ bcos mi la dga' ba dang/ madrang ba dang/ rtsub cing brlang ba dang/ sdig pal ma skyod pa dang/ chos kyi drungs 'byin pa dang/ thos pa cung zad
tsam byas chog par 'dzin pa dang/ chos ma yin pa don du gnyer ba dang/ chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang/ sgrib pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ kun nas ldang ba rnam par mi gnod pa bdud
kyi las dang/ sems kyi dramal rtog pa bdud las dang/ dge sbyong gi dri la ma mjed pa bdud kyi las du/ rigs kyi bu ji tsam du ma dge ba'achos la 'jug pa dang/ dge ba'i
sa'ador ba de thams cad na bdud kyi las so// chos bzhisan bdud kyi las 'di dag las shin tu 'da' ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pa'i pha rol
tu thun pa drug po dag dang/ dad pa dang/ brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i bag yod pa dang/ thabs mkhas pa la gnas te/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang/ chos kyi
tshul zab mo la gnas te/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' n bdud bzhi'i 'a ma las yang dag bar 'das shang/
bdud dang phyi rgol ba thams cad bcom pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsad nams tshad med pa bsags sharje sems can thams cad 'tsho bar gyur/
pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la byams pas gnas pa yin/ 'byung pa rnams la stang rjebar gnas pa yin/ bsam gtan
[s/ ]@#// rnams l de la ma chags par gnas pa yin/ slong ba rnams la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin/ bsod nams dag gis las spyod mi zad pa yin//
bsam pa dag pas lag na rin po chayin/ mtho dman gyi yod med pas sems dang mtshungs pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas bsam pa 'byor pa yin/ mchod sbyin thams
cad sgrub pas sems grol zhing sgo bsgribs pa med pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pas gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par 'gro bas mngon
shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa yin no// ji ltar phyi rol gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhapo 'di dag sems can thams cad kyi 'tshopar gyur ba de bzhin du/ bdag ga nang gi 'byung ba chen po 'di dag/
kyang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cig/ bdag gi dag pa'i rtsa ba dang/ chos shes pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ma yin par ma gyur cig ces de ltar
dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing/ sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la
ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rig kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' na gnas dang
gnas ma yin pa'i bya ba shes pas stobs bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ zag pa zad pa'i phya ba shes pas ma 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dus
gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bya ba shes nga sa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyud yongs su sbyang ba bya ba tshamkhyen ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan snang ba thob bas/ sbyin lnga
yongs su sbyang ba bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba thob pas/ mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tsha phyin pa yin/ nyon mongs nga 'bag chags yang
dag par bcad pas/ dge ba'i ches thams cad yongs su bskang ba tshar phyin pa yin/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pas lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems dang/ mtshan dang/

dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dbang bskur ba thob pas sa bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad yongs su spung bar bya ba tshar phyin te/ 'gis kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma 'byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la lta bar gnas pa yin no//
rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la ma chags pa yin zhe na/ gis bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/
'dzam bu'i gling nasems can rnams kyi gzugs snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dang 'dra 'i phyag rgya rgya mtsho chen po la yod du/ de'i phyi'i rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o// de bzhin
dusems can thams cad kyi sems su snang ba 'am/ gzugs su snang ba 'am/ sgrar snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems

kyi snang ba gcig la snang bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyi'i rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i tingade 'dzani ces bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chan po ni re gcig ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang 'a yang chos
la rnam par grol ba'i rir shes pas ro gcig pa yin no/ 'di lta ste/ dperanargya mtsho chen po ni dus las ma yol ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang 'a yang dus dang dus ma yin pa la so sor
rtag pas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i dus las ma yol lo// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtshon po ni shi ba re dang lhan cig ma gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa
thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems can thams cad dang lhan cig ma gnas so// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu thams cad zad pas bri ba 'am/ gang ba med do//

da bzhin du byang chub sems dang ba yang chos thams cad zad pas chos kyi dbyings ba ba 'am gang bar ma byed do// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni kha tshonatshad med do// de bzhin du byang chub semA
dpa' yang shes rab kyis tshad med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtshon po ni zad cing gang dang ga dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang srab cingan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas/
thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yonan/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyalatshomanabani sems can tshad med pa'i gnas yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dang 'a sems can yongs su smin par bya ba

tshad med pa'i gnas yin no// 'dani rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang po spyod pa la
ma chags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dang ba chags ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin zhen/ chags pa zhes bya ba zhigang chos rnams la lta ba kun nas ldang
ba'o// byang chub sems dpa 'an lta ba kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas chags pa thams cad las yang dag pa'i das ba yin no// 'di ltaste/ dper na rlung dmar ni nam mkha'i dkyil la
chagasalo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung dmar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa'i ng sems can thams cad la mchagasas// yang skyag bu dam pa de dag ni spyad pa dang/ cho ga'i tshul shes

khayin te/ de la cho gan dran pa'o// spyad pa ni rnam par ma g.yeng ba'o/ de dag gan mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa'i ng yin te/ de la mun pa zhes bya ba ni bang chos rnams la tshashes ba'o//
snang ba zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la ye shes thogs pamed pa ste/ de phyir de dag mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa zhes bya'o// skyes bu dam pa de dag ni yi shes gzhan/
gyi dri la ma'ajog cing rang gis ye shes thob pa yin te/ deci'i phyi'i zhen/ dedag rang byung gi ye shes la mnganapar gnas shing sems can gzhan ye shes 'dod par byed pa yin no// gang gi
byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la 'bebs pa'i gshes bstan pa 'dis gzhan gyi dring lam 'gatsang nang gas ye shes thob par gyur pa de'atsi/ myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes thob par/
'gyuro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig lta ba kun las sems dben zhing// mkhasaM pa bsod nams tshog san re ba byed la// mtshan
ma ldang ba yongs su spangs nas su// byang chub phyir bsngos denazad m 'gyur// nga rgyal las kyang ng rgyal kun spangs nas// denayi shes tshogs rnams tshol bar byed/ mtha' yas blo ldan nam mkha'i
ba nyidi// kun mkhyen ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed// rgyal ba'i sras de sangs rgyas rjes dran pa// gzugs dang mtshan gyis tshogs sum yin te// nang na sems dang yid ni ma rgyu ba//
da ni'athun par sangs rgyas rjes su dran// chos ni 'dod chags bral zhing rang bzhin dban// zhi ri rab na rtag tu mtshan ma med// gang zhig dmigs pa thams cad bgyur pa// de 'di'i chos ni/
00 rjes su dran ng na// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun shin tu 'dus ma byas/ stong pa mtshamed smon lam rnam par grol// de la sems med drand 'jug ba med// de ni dge 'dun rjes su dran ba
ni bung bo yongs su gtang ba thams cad gtong/ nyon mongs dngos bothams cad legs par 'dod// sems pa medatsang rtogs dang rnam rtogo dag 'di ni gtong ba legs par rjes su
dran tshul khrims zag pa medatsang 'dus ma byas// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis 'jug pa med// 'byung ba med cing sAde gsum mi gnas pa// den tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yin//
lcagang dag cing dri med nyon mngos med// dga' ldan pho/nas pa dbang bskur thob gyur pa// sems can dag pa de dag 'di'i dran zhing// bdag kyang myur du de 'drar 'gyur snyam sems du
ban gshegs kyi dem chos 'an pa ni// nyon mongs dngos po thams cad 'adzanim byed// chos dang chos man gnyis las rnam par grol// do'adra de na la ba'i sa 'dzin yin// rgyal
bas byang chub mtshan de ga nga ba rnyes pa/ chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni yongs 'dzin cing// gang gis rdul med mtha' 'dir bshes pa// den sangs rgyas kun gyi sa 'dzanAyan// bdag ni
rab tu dag pas sems can dag chos kun dag par mkhas pa susag pa// den sems dag rang bzhin 'od gsal te// sems can gdon pa'i rtag tu yongs smin byed/ sems
can khams rnams ma rung mkhyid cing// den bri zhing gang bar mthong ba med// lta ba no ba 'a bu spang bar ston// de 'dra de ni sems can mang po sbyang// 'jig
rten yul kun rab tu gang ston pa// des ni las rgyus yul yang rab tubastan// sangs rgyas yulananam mkha' mtshungs pa ste/ de bzhin 'jig rten yul yang rab tu shis/ sgra skad
dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad ni// brag cha'adrab de yis rab mthong zhing// de la nyan pa'i ng shan tu yod man par// deltar rab tu shes pa gzungs 'thob go/ kun tu 'adzin dang 'dzin cing klog
pa dang// chos rnams bstan pa'i rnam pa'i rab bshad kyang// bdag dang sems can tshos su rlom sems med// de ni gzungs la rab tu gnas pa yin// rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs ba 'dzin
byed cing// legs par gsungs pas sems can tsham byed nga// dran dang ting nga'adzan dang bral ma'agyur// gzungs la nges pa'i yon tan 'di dag go/ chos ni rnam pa kun tu bsags med pas//
chos la mi 'phro 'thos pa med pa'i ng mni// dper na glu mar rgyun 'bebs pa ltar// de ltar de yang chos kyicharang 'debs// yon tan 'byung gnas rnams kyi spobs pa ni// thogs med rgyun chag
rgyun chad ma'agyur la// mdo sde stong phrag bye ba rang tu 'chad// sems can dbang par sems can 'du shes med// sangs rgyas mthu yis bskal pa bye stong du/ rgyunas 'chad par chos ni rab
[ston cing// bsam pa ji bzhin sems can tsham par byed// sras ba'atshul gyis sangs rgyas yon tan gnas// chos 'di thams cad nam mkha' 'dra bzhes// gang gis chos rnams
kun gyi tshul shesal// sems can srog dang gang zag 'dzin pa// den rgyal ba rnams kyi dam chos 'dzin/ sems can thams cad shan tu mya ngan 'das// de dag de ltar kun tu skye ba med//
su yi bzod 'di dri med 'od gsal la// de ni bstan pa 'dul bag yod yin/ phung po yang dag ma lta bur mthong// tshes dbyangs ci 'dra de bzhin khams rnams shes// dbang po drug 'gro
stong 'drar mthong ba// de ni phung bo'i bdud las yang dag 'dar// sprinabartsegs phung pa lta bur nyon mongs rnams// bag yod tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed cing// chos la ma rtog rnam par ma
rtog pa// de ni nyon mongs bdud las yang dag 'da'// gang zhig skye ba rtag tu skye medashes// 'dal gang yang 'bo med 'grob med// chos rnams 'ongasamed song ba med shes pa// den 'chi
bdag bdud kyi dbang ma'agro/ gang zhig g.yo dang rlom sems mi byed cing// byang chub gnas kyang byang chub 'du shes med// bdag dang sems can med kyang stang rje'ajug/ de ni dpung dang bcas
pa'i bdud 'dul lo// rnam shes ye shes gnyis mnyam par mthong// 'dus byas ma gnas 'dus ma byas la mni// 'groba'isimasan skya ma 'drar mthong ba// de ni sems pa'i rdzings
med pa ni/ 'ol tshur gang la'ang ma chags la// chos ldan gun yang dag su sbyor zhing/ sems can sgrol yang sems can 'dushesna med// mnyam pazhes bya byang chub
sems dpa' de/ sridapa gsum po'abrog dgon 'dra ba dang// stong pa 'gyur ba med pa' bshesang/ lam gyi mi rgyas rtag tusems can sgrol// de na ded dpon bdud rdung lam ston nga//
mdzangs pa de ni tshul dang tshul tsha mkhas// o rnams 'dod nas stong par rab tu shes// tshul dang bgis pas mya ngan 'dus la 'dzud// byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'dren ces bya/ sems
kyi rgyud na gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur// sems kyi las la zhams kyang mtshams mi sbyor 'gro ba'i sems rgyud de dag rab shes pa// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su'adran ces bya// nam
mkha'i ngo bo de dang chu zla ltar// chos rnams thams cad dag cing rnam dag cas// nyon mongs kun dang 'dra bar ma byed pa// sems can dag pa de nam smad pa// gang zhig chos gcig gis ni
chos rnams kun// sgyum smage rgyu 'dra bar gzung med dang// gsag dang brdzun dang rtag pa med pa shes// de ni byang chub snying par myur du 'gro// tshes gtan la 'bebs pa bstan pa 'di bshad
pan// lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ ma'im cad ng/ 'bu chen po'i srog chags khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
[z]byang chub sems dpa' sum khrinyis stong ni ma skye ba'achos 'khazod pa ba par gyur to/ stong gsum gya stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ing rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// snang ba chen po
kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to// lha brgya stong dag kyang me tog gi chard tu 'bebs shing sil snyan dag kyang dkrol nas 'daskad ces gang dag bstan pa 'di thos mos pa dang/ 'dzanipa dang/

nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag na se ngas rgyas kyi yul du rjes su dang ba yin no// gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mkhas pa rnams kyis rgyan
gyis legs par ba rgyan pa byas te phyag bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na/ chos 'dalta bu 'di rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i chos dang
ldan pa 'di dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes ched brjod pa ched du brjod de// de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis zhus pa lung bstan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba nam mkha' mdzod
gnodu'angs bsad pas mu tig gi drab 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa stong gsum yongs su gang ba rib bcom ldan 'das kyi skul mnabar gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yi shes na chog pa ma mang 'azhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/ bstan pa ni rgyun ma'achad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyisik+ka
la gzags shing/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa bstan pa des 'ag
ka thams cad kyi sems tshim par gyur to// theg pa chen po 'di'ang rgyas par brjod pa mdzad par gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dgala'ang

chos kyi snang nga chen pos rgyas par mdzad par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la'ang chos 'byung ba'i sgo bstan ngas chos 'byung ba'i sgo des chos 'byung ba'i sgo tshad ma mchis pa
bstan par bgyi'o// 'grwa panas bsad kyis dga' bo bzhi pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur bar spobs pa zhes bya ba de 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur
te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces gsaso// rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyi mong nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba de/ cinam mkha' khyod kyi mdzod dam/ smras pa/
rags kyi bu de bzhin te/ nam mkha' na khe si'amadzod do// myur bar spobs pas smras l gis kyakhu nam mkha' mdzod kyi bye brag bdag cag gis kyang blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam ma ba'i mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyi khyad par ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'amadzod kyis/
byang chub sems dpa'i myur bar slobs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yid la gang 'dod pa de kho bas nam mkha' las char dbab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' myur ba'
bsal 'disnyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che ut+pala'i depal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba na/ 'od thams cad rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad+margyan rgyang grang
tshod/ 'dab ma bye ba stong phrag mang po 'jam zhing gzhon pa/ gos ka tsa yin dke ltar rig na bde ba/ drus nu sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyab pa/ kha dog mang po brgya stong dang ldan pa/ mthong
na yid du 'ong zhing chog tsha shes pa/ pad+ma de mthong ba dang drab snams pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de dag gis mthong ste/ 'khor 'di'i de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i
char phob cig snyam pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pas bsags ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nam mkha'i ngos las
de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char mngon par bab ste/ den 'khor de dag thams cad rang de dag gi dri tshor zhing mthong bas dga' ba'i zas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'kho
de thams cad ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// skyes bu dam pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang/ ye shes kyi
stobs legs solags so// sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par gyur cig/ den byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod ces bya ba'adu bar
gyur te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyed kyis nam mkha' las gsa' phyi'i char phob cig/ byang chub sems dpa' ni
chen bakod kyis tshig de skad ces sa ma thag tu/ de'i mod la nam mkha'alas gser phye'i char mngon par pab bo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' pan chen bkod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam

'ag+haM mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smrases// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' las rinapo che thams cad kyi char phab cig/ tshig de skad ces smras mthag tu/ de'i med la phyogs bcu na ji tsam rin po che

grongs med dpag tu med pa mang tha dad pa kha dog tha dad pa yod pa de dag kha char chen po mngon par phab pa 'di lta ste/gsar dang/ dngul dang/ shel dang/ bo zlurma dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ mu tig dmar po
dang/ smyug dang/ dpal gyi snying pa'i ze ba can dang/ dri med dang/ rin chen byu ru dang/ zla ba'i 'od dang/ me shel dang/ snang byed dang/ 'od mchog dang/ 'dzam gling 'od dang/
me 'od dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang byu ru dang/ an nIl dang/ yon tan 'byung gnas dang/ rab tu naba'a'od dang/ chu 'od dang/ chu mdog dang/ chu dang bar byed dang/ sa'i 'od dang//
mkhyed pa'i gnas dang/ mag ma bzod pa dang/ brgya byin thogs pa dang/ rgyal ba dang/ cher rgyal ba dang/ gzi brjidi 'bar dang/ dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal pa dang/ rdo ze ba can/
dang Da 'jig rten snang byed dang/ skar ma dga' dang/ 'od 'dzin dang/ zla gam dang/ 'dzam bu'i tshe 'od dang/ 'dzam bu'i gling ga'od dang/ 'od stong ldan dang/ skar mda'i sgo dang me'i
'od dang/ rgyal bas btsan pa dang/ tsha ba zhi byed dang/ gdung ba med pa dang/ nad sel ba da to/ mgi sbyang dang/ rnab dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yang sbyong dang/ yan lag
rnam par snang ba dang/ rnam par snang ba'i 'od dang 'od ston pa dang/ bod ser po dang/ dkarapo dang/ shel gyi kha dog dang/ rin pa che'i drab dang/ rin po che thams cad yang dag par
bsdus pa dang/ ming de lta bu dang mang de ma yin ba'i rin pa che'i char rab tu bab ste/ nor bu ni bo tshade dag gamang bsal bar yang dpar sla ba ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems da nga 'a dus
kyi rgyal ba zhes bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' ma tshod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bum mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ne sems can sdug bsngal zhing dbul ba zas dang/
skom med pa/ gcer bu gos med pa/ gos ral pa gyon pa dang/ yi dgas rnams bkres shing skom pas yongs su zin pa/ gcer bu rang gi sgras yog pa/ mchil ma dang/ ngar snabs dang/
khrag dang/ rnago za'adod ba delta bu'i sems can de dag bskyab pa'i phyir/ sa dang/ skom dang/ gos kyi char khyed kyis phob cig// de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems/
dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ myang ba dang/ bldag pa sna tshogs kyi cher rab tu phab ste/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i khu ba dang btung ba thams cad kyi

char gyi rgyun shing rta'i srog gang tsam gyi char mngon par phab bo// gos kha dog du ma dang/ kha dog tha dad pa dang/ kha dog brgya stong du ma dang/ phrazhing 'jam pa ka tsa lin da ka ltar reg na bde ba'i
char rab tu bab ste/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasan bkren pa dang/ dbul po thams cad dang/ yi dgas thams cad kun tsham par byas so// de nas byang chub sem
zla dpal sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des/ byang chub sems dar 'a nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smag so// rigs kyi bu sems can na ba g.yog med/ nad du mas reg pa yod pa de dag
don du/ smanachen po'i char gang gsan ba de dag thams cad nad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba thob ga/ de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las bdud rtsi'i sman gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste/ des
nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song sbyong nas bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces sas so// rigs kyi ba
[s]khyed kyis ngan song gsum zhingar gyis shig/ de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las 'od rab tu btang ste/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas ba dang/ gshin rje'i 'dzig rten pa'i/
sems can rnams 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang rab tu ldan par gyur te/ ngan song gsum kho thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la rab tu sbyor pa'i bar
du me tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ sngos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ chos gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdag la sogs pa dang/ rol mo sna lnga dang ldan pa dang/
klu'i dmangs dang/ dran pa dang/ bran mo dang/ chung ma dang/ 'dang/ bu mo dang/ slas dang/ rta dang/ bal rlung dang/ shing rta dang/ dpung bu chung dang/ bzhon pa dang/
khyim dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang/ skyed mas tshol dang/ mang thog dang/ khang pa brtsegs pa dang/
khang bzangs dang/ rta babs dang/ skar khung dang/ zla ba kham pa lta bu dang/ khA dang/ khyogs dang/ glang bzhi ba dang/ gling bcu drug pa nas/ rta cang shes stong gas drang ba dang ldan
ba'apishing rta'i bar gyi char bar snang las mngon par rab tu bab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la smras
kha/ 'gis kyi bu dag 'di degalang la byin mig/ yongs su gtong bar gyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig/ de nas byung chub sems dpa'
tshul khrims []rgyan ces bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i char na phab na/ de'ang tshul khrims kyi

ba rol tu phyin pa'i char ba ci'i/ des tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi bsngags pa ji snyed brjod ba de snyed
ts+tshA tshul khrims kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa'i sgra bar snang las byung ngo// de bzhin dubazod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtanadang/ shes rab kyi yon tan gyi sgra yang ji tsam phyogs bcu

nas nigs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yi ge dang/ nges pa'i tshig dang/ brda dag gis chos kyi sgo brgya stong ston pa 'chos kyi sgra dedag thams cad ma chadam lhag khyad ma zhugs bar bar snang
las ma lus bar rdzogs par byung ngo// chos kyi sgra des stong gsum gyi stongachen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar byas so// den tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can theg pa gsum la yos
su smin bar byas par gyur te// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba de 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bkod pa 'jige rten 'di 'ba' zhig na
ma 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dbang yod snyam pa dang de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba'i sems kya kun tu rtog pa sems kyis shes so
shesas kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snangal 'di skad ces smras so/ gisakyi bu khyod shani tu dril medacing shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lha 'amige rnyed na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i 'ji
rten gyi khams rnams su tsa mthong ltos ge/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang bas lha'i mig gas phyogs bcu'ajig rten gyi khams rnams su bltas na/ des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
ning grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nipo tshathams cad kyi la rab tu phab pa dang/ sa 7skya thams cad grag pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi nang de dag na'am
chad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs bar 'di lta bu'i bya ba rnams rab tu 'byung bar mthong// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi

sman lam gyi byin gyi rlobs pa de ni bsam gyis mkhyab ste/ galar yang tsage la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skyes bu dam pas 'di'i drab 'i char sngon par rab tu bab pa zhes ched du ba rjod pa 'dached du/
brjod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin rgyu nubasakyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des gang duranipo tsho'i char dang/ chos kyi char rab tu 'bab
ka pa'i sangs rgyas bya zhing de dag mthong ngo// yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ na po tshab cher dang/ chos kyi char gyi cho'aphrul 'di bstan pas bgrang ba las//
[A ]'das pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyes so// de nas rgyal po'i khabanas bud med yug sa ma lnga brgya byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lcags/
nas Na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'amadzod la 'ad skad ces smag so// skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa rdzogs par mdzad na/ bdag cag la'ang khyo stsal cig/

de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi khyon che rlabs kyis bud med de dag gi sngon gyi bya nyidi kha dog dang/ mtshan ma dang/ dbyibs ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i skyes pa lnga brgya nam
mkha' las babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdunan 'khod de// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ bud med de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//
srang mo dag bdag bdag gi bya dzalta ba bzhin du khri cig/ de nas bud med de dag gis ji lta burang rang gi khyo gang yin pa khrid nas dga' mgu rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ yid bde ba skyes nas rang

'angag khyim du dong ngo// de nas sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gis nag bdunang bud med de dag ji ltar blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyi'im ldog pa de lta de ltar snyan par byas so//
de nas yang bud med lnga brgya bo de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi thad du lhags nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces As so// chos kyi rang bzhin stong pa sgyu ma 'dra// chos kyi mtshan
'de de ni sngon ma 'tshal// de yi byed kyis sprul pa'i khyo cul te// bdag cag theg pa'i mag la des snyan bagyis// chos 'di thams cad yang dag sprul pa ste// g.yo ba med tsang byed med snga nas
stong Da khag med ye shes dag gsi rab rtogs te// slan chad nyon mongs dbang du ma mchi'o// byang chub mchog ga sems na bskyed par bgyi// sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer bar bgyi//
sems can rgya chen khyod kyis phal ba bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang chos mchog char pa dbab// 'dren mchog thub pas de dag lung bstan pa// khyed cag ma 'ongs dus na 'gyur ba ni// spyad
ba spyar nas rgyal ba'i dbang po dag shan tu dul zhes bya ba'i bde gshegs 'gyur// yang de'atshin ma lnga brgyugasad par chad de gsad du khrid pa las/ de dag gis bar snang las sems can
mas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'amadzod ces bya ba gang 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la ma 'jigs pa spyan pa zhig yod kyis/ de la khyed cag phyag tshol cig dang/ gsad pa 'di las thar
par 'gyur ro nas sgra tshayig thosas// de nas de dag thams cad sha bsa'ajigs skrag pas sgra skad gcig tu/ byang chub sems dar 'a sems dar ba chen po nam mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal
@#/ lo nas tshig de skad gsaso// tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ skad cig de nyid la par snang las ma lnga brgya bas te der lhags nas/ gshed ma ma de dag la 'di skad
ces smras so// khyed cag gis mdabu' le 'ad dug gsad de ca rung/ ded cag gi gos dang rgyan rnams khyed la/ nged cag ga srog chod de ma 'di dag khye zhig/ de dag chags pas nan pa'i
phyiragasad par chad pa'i mi lnga brgya po de dag btang ste/ sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gsad do// de nas ma gsad pa las btang ba de dag gsadang sa 'jigs shing skrag pa las dbugs 'byin pa
rnyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'amadzod ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la'ang mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
la'ang thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tsha nas 'di skad ces gsol to// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis bdag gi srog dang/ dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par bgyis na bdag cag chos gang la nan tan du nga gyis pas
bdag la sman pa dang/ gzhan la sman pa la zhugs par 'gyur pa'i chos bstan pa bdag cag la rtsal du gsel/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod rgyas pas ra/ rigs kyi bu khyed
cag na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed ga dang/ 'di ltar khyed rnams bdag la phan pa dang/ gnan la phan par zhugs par 'gyur ro// de dag la de skad sa
smras pa dang/ bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyedad// de dag la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdakyis ba stong ri pa'i res baabu zung gcig byon te/
grogs po dag las bcas bu zung 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol cig/ de dag thams cad kyis ras bcos bu zung de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par gsol te/ de dag thams cad
bam ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas ma 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'gi rten du 'byung nga
zhes lung bstan to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i ma dzod la 'di skad ces smas so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang ma skam ma zad ma des
pa'i nam mkha' la mdzod bzha gnas ji sridi lan/ nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shar 'i bu 'di dzasnyam du sims/ tsanam mkha'i skamam 'am/ zad pa yod dam/
dengs par 'gyur ma// sma ra/ rigs kyi bu de lta ma yin no// smras pa// btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub de na nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/ de la bdag
ga dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams der bsdus pas/ de bas na nam mkha' la mdzod ma skams mazad ma dengs sa// yang khyed kyis nam mkha' la mda bzhi g nas ji srid len zhes zer ba ni//
[s ]@#// kho bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid len pa de srid do/ sus pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis khung chutu sems bskyed nas ji srid len/ snyaa nga/ bcom ldan
'das kyis mkhyen pas mkhyen te// de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang ba nam mkha' mdzod kyis
byang chub sems bskyed nas ji sride lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams myos//
ts+tshA par 'gyur ro// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'din sems can gang rnams rtog pa mang zhing dad par 'gyur ba dag mchis kyis bshad du gsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/

la/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dang ra na gang+ga'i klung gi byim snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis yongs su gang

gyur te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag ji snyed yodapa de snyed kyi bskal pa brgya stong zhing rdul phra mo gcig bzhag la/ de lta bur bgrang ba dang mtshan mar bzhag pas de snyad kyi rjelaphram thams cad ni/
zad par 'gyur gyi/ ji sridi nas byang chub sems dang ba nam mkha' mdzod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed ba'i skal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
stong de dag la zad pa gang yang med do// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi thad nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin/
gshags pa de mtshan cizhis bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga ka' stsal pa/ yang shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
ston pa'ijig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen ra//
skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam thams cad las shin tu byungab/ 'an pa tsha'i gzi brjidi 'phags pa'i rgyal pa
zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yod pa de dag gi tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin no//
shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi tshad dugyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bgrangar las 'dur zhig byung ngo// shA ri'i bu
de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams den stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rin po che'i mdzod bsam gyis ma khyab po//
[r ]// de'i bu rdzus te skyes pa rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par grub pa sum khri drug stong yod do// de ci'i phyi zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang med do//
shAri'i bu de bzhin gshegs ba de'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa stong phrag brgya thub bo// de nas rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas/ bar gyi bskal ba bzhi bcur bcom ldan 'das de labasnyen/

bkur dang rim gro byas te/ nyin gcig la 'godar yang ra ra ba bye ba stong nyid kyi 'on po ma'i phung po zad par gyur pa de lta bu s bsnyen bkur dang las gro byas te// de nas rgyal po de bsod nams kyis
brtan pas bu'i tshogs dang/ grong gi mo rnams dang/ 'khor rnams dang bcas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// shAri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'kholas
sgyur ba'i rgyal bo lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar ma blta'o// ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
