gang gis tshangs pa brgya byin bkod// de yi bsod nams de snyad mi 'phel lo// sems can de kun dgra bcom bkod pa dang// rang rgyal thog par rab tu bkod pa bas// gang zhig byang chub tsani
sems bskyadanas// dam chos 'dzin pa de ni khyad par 'phags// gal te bsod nams de la gzugs yod na// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad gang bar 'gyur// skyes bu khyu mchog ye shes ma gtog/
bar nyibasod nams de yi snodan yodan yin// ji ltar bskal pa bye ba stong brjod kyang// sangs rgyas ye shesamatha' yod ma yin ltar// de bzhin gshags kyi dmachos 'dzin pa yi// bsod
nams de yang tshad yod ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pas bcom ldan 'dus las dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsod nams bshad pa 'di thos nas
tshil zhing mgu la yi rangs ti/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dam pa'i
chos yongs su'adzin pa la brtson bar mi bgyid pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i
[B4, ]dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan thams cad ni bdag la yungs 'bru tsam du gda' 'o// dam ba'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du bdag 'du shes
'a gnas bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'dasa'adi ltar ba drag sems can thams cad la bde bar 'tshul ba'i slad du/ lus dang srog kyang bor ta/ bde ba thams cad mi btsal bar dam pa'i chos yongs
su gzung ba'i slad du go cha bgo bar bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshadapan/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pas/ phyogs bcu'i

ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tumadab nas byang chub sams dbab nam mkha' mdzod dang blo mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos kyi rnam gras 'di lamachod pa bya ba'i phyir/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas
me tog gi char mngon par rab tu phab bo/ bar snang las kyang sgra bdi skad ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ponam mkha' mdzod kyis 'dus pa'i le'u 'di brgyud de/ yongs su bzung ba'i bar
dusangs rgyas kyi bya babyas so// byang chub kyi sams dngam bral ba'i sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin du dam pa'i chos brgyan par 'gyur ro//
0/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis da'i tsha sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od rab tu btang bas/ 'od dus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i
thog ma dang/ bar m dwang/ tha ma bshad pa na/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa ni byang chub tu sems skyes so// sems can dpag tumed grangs med ba dag ni bzod pa thob par gyur to/
sems can l la dag ni sems rnam par grol lo// la la dag ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/ la la dag ni 'dod chags bral brnyed do// la la dag ni lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa yongs su
bzung bar gyur to/ sangs rgyas gzhan dag la'ang blta ba'i phyir/ rgyu bsags par yang gyur to// duthams cad la'ang bcom ldan 'das rjes su thugasarang ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod dang/ byang chub sems dba' sams dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ltad mo can dang/
byang chub sams dpa' lag na rin po che dang/ byang chub sems dbab rin chen dpal dang/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgyal po'i 'od dang/ byang chub sems dbang bsod nams kyis brgyanapa dang/

byang chub sams dpa'i dan song song ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'ibu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/
mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ dag slong de dag dang/ byang chub sams dpa' de dag dang/ thams cad dang ldan
[B ]pa'i 'khor de dang/ lha dang mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rtan yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar bstod do/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u las
'tshe 'phags panam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba thog bachan po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi dza ya shI la dang/ shI len dra bod+hadang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bon/
klo d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la bab pa//// rgya gar skad du/ ar+yan ga ra ab l^abikAnAm
mahA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/ 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dapa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
dus gcig nA/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyitshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha'
lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang lta 'byachan po dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rtan skyong ba dang rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ dag slong dang/ go slong
tshe dang/ dag bstan dang/ dag bsanam rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla marabyas/ mchodacing rjed do/ pad+ma chus ma gos pa bzhin du bzhugs so// de nas de'i tsho rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de

bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i byar ston zla chung zla ba nya ba'i tshes bco lnga la 'bru mar gyis zangs po che stongabakangasdu dngar nas/ maram sbar ba'i 'od kyis khor khor yug tu dpag tshad bzhir snang bas khyab

bar byas so// de nas yang de'i tshomanyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na dga' byed ma kas bya ba grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhig 'dug go/ dus 'bru mar sran gra'u dang sbyar banyosanas/ zhag bzhi kha 'tshos te/
nyam chung bar gyur to// de nas 'brumar de khyer ta rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul du song nas/ khyams kyi nang legs su mar ma slar ta bzhag nas 'di ltar sems bskyed do/ bcom ldan 'das
bdog dgu ba'i rtsa ba 'disam 'ongs pa'i dusan/ ji ltar da ltar gyi de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du bdag kyang m 'ongs pa'i dusan ston
bar gyur to/ chos ston par gyur cig/ dge 'dun yang sdud par gyur cig ces byas so// 'di ltar yang soms bskyed de/ gal te bdagam 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba zhig
na mar ma 'di bdag phyir mi 'ongs kyi bar du 'bar bar gyur cig ces byas nas/ mar ma dasngar ta grong khyer dusongan/ mar ma de'i 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang bar gyur te/
nyi/ @#// nam nangs kyi bar du'ang maram dam shi'i// da nasatshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos chos gos gyi mtha' mas mar mdu bsad par byas na gsad par ma nus so/// nam nasakyab
dan tshe dang ldan pa mo'u'agal gyi bu chen posa rnam par 'thor rlung gis bsad par byas kyang gsad par mnus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas
mtsha stong gsum 'dir shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char gyi rgyun dbab par byin gyis brlabs te/ mar ma de'i stang du btang yang gsad par ma nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa/
mo'u 'gal gyi bu thong zhig/ mar ma 'din byang chub kyi sams kyis sbyar ba yin la/ byang chub kyisams ni nyan thos kyis zil gyis mnan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan du mad pa'i phyir ro// de nas re zhig na bud med de nyi ma shar te grong khyer nas phyir 'ongs nas/ dus mar me de
tsa na tu 'bar ba mthong ba dang/ de mchog tu dga' bachen po rgyas par gyur to// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di
yin te gang gi blosangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tsho/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od phrar kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang
sar bo dang/ dmar bo dang/ dkar po dang/ btsod ba dang// shel dang/ dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas
nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rtan gyi bar du song ste/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis mnan nas yang slar log sta/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor 'byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
gtsug tor du nub par gyur to// de nas 'od zar da dug gis bcom ldan 'das lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas
bcom ldan 'das la/ tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshogs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyala mchoga rnam par 'dren ba gang zag mchog/ rgyumed par ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// yi
rkyen gyis zhal ni 'dzum mdzad pa// 'jig rten phan pa thugs brtses bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo grong khyer gyis 'tsho 'di bskal ba
nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ta/ rtag tu lha dngami'i phun sum tshogs pa dag nyams su myong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// stobs bculdan pa mchod phyir zangasachen brag
stong gsalargyal gyis// mar mabazang po sngar bas dbag tshad bzhir ni kun tu snang// grong khyer 'tsho ba'i 'brum srin ma gro'u sbyar ba sbyar ba yis// 'dzam gling snang//
[D, ]bas khyabagyur dan byang chub sems kyi mthus// mo'u 'gal gyis mar me gsod 'dod rdzu 'phrul rgya chen byas// rnamakhar 'thor ba'i rlung gi shugs btang gsad par yongs ma nus// tshangs
khayo pa'i 'jig rtan 'dug nas chu rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam// khab kyang gsad bar ma nus mar ma nyi ma'i 'od bzhin snang// de ni zhag bzhi la 'tshos rgyal byed dga' ba'i tshal du 'ongs// dga'
ba'i sogs kyis bde gshagaso zhabs la phyag byas thal sgyur 'dug/ mnyamamad 'dzum pa mdzad pas kun dga' bo yang rab dga' nas// gzi brjid mtha' yas 'dzum mdzad 'di yi 'bras bu
tsa'adra gsungs// dga' byed 'di na bskal pa nyi shu brgyad na rgyal bar 'gyur/ rang byung kun snang zhes bya 'od kyis stong chen bzhi snang byed// ma 'ongs dus na bde bar gshegs pa bye ba mchod/
bar 'gyur// de ni kun tu 'khor los sgyur 'gyur rgyal rnams bkur sti byed// sangs rgyus rtogs pa brjod pa'i ming ni dAda rnams rab dga' byed// skye bo mkhas ba dag gis de thos sams/
kyang 'abo cu dga'// de ltar rgyal ba bsam yas stobs bcu'i chos kyang bsam mi khyag/ dga' babaskyodon rnam smin mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshudang ldan pa kun duga' bo dang/ grong khyer gyis 'tshob de dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ lha dang/ mid
lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba thug pa chan
po'i mdo rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzAn gan+d+hadang/ lotsA ba ban d+haklu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid du ka ra sing ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA
ba ban d+he de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa////// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya brah+mapa'i brid tshanA ma ma hA yAn su cu/ bod skad du/ 'phag
batshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal go/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
grong khyer yangs par tshul chen po'i khang pa brtsigs pa'i gnas ni/ dgaslong bri nyis stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs ga
tu bzhugs te// don bcom ldan 'das mi nyal tsamanam gyi gung thunal skyil mo krung bcas nas/ dran pa mngon du bzhag ste/ rtog pa dang bcas pa// dpyod pa dang bcas pa// ting
ba'adzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang bo lasnyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de las bzhengs nas/ rtog pa med pa// dbyod/
ba mad pa'i ting nga 'dzin las skyes ba'i dga' ba dang bdebacan bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de las kyang bzhengs nas dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang
kaM bral ba btang snyoms pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde bar gnas pa// bsam gtan gsum pa lo snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de las kyang bzhengs nas/ de
ba'ang sbangs te/ sngonas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing/ yid bde ba dang/ yid mi bad ba'ang nub pas/ phyir sdug bsngal yang yod pa/ bad ba'ang mad nga// btang snyoms
dang dran pa yongs su dag ba/ ngosam gtan bzhi pa la soms par zhugs so/ dad nas bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi pa las bzhengasanas/ bsam gtan gsum pa la zhugs
so bsam gtan gsum pa las bshangs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis ba la zhugs so// bsam gtan gnyis lasabazhengs nas/ bsam gtan dang po la zhugs so// bsam
gtan dang bo las bzhi ngas nas/ gdul bya ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la gzugs kyi lus kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das gdul bya ji lta
ba bzhin du/ sems can la gzugs kyi lus kun tu ston pa'i nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de la bcom ldan 'dasangashin tu lhamam lhan n lhang nger bzhugs ta/
mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ba'i gnas na 'dug bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nga ba dang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan/
ba mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang tshangs pa'i 'di'i rten nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i chol chen po 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyisdun sngaraha cang
mang mi'ing ba zhig tu 'dug go/ de nas mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di snyam du bsams te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsAn bar dka'ad/ rnam par shes pa ra dka'
ba yin na/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa la bdag gas ludab bsal ba'i sgra 'am/ smra ba tsam gyis bzhengs par gsol ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag gis
tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das bzhengs par gsol gor ma chag snyam ste/ de nam ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas bla gos phrag pa gcig tugakhrur nas 'dug bzhin du/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de mgo btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bzhengs bar gsol to// ma gos dri ma ma mchisa rnam par dag//
lha dang mi mchog rnams dang dri za dang// klu dang lha min rnams kyis legs mchod pa// sems can sman sladamagon po khyod la mchod// dbaran rin rab tu mi g.yos dang
ji ltar rgya mtsho gtingani mo de pogs ltar// bdud rnams thams cad kyis kyang mi g.yos la// thub pa skyes bu mchog ni bsam gtanamad// zang zing mi mnga'amachan ma mi mnga' zhing//
tha dad mi mnga' rtan pa mi mnga' la// gnas mi mnga' zhing snang ba mimanga' ba// thub pa skyes bu dam pa bsam gtan mdzad// rtog ge rnams kyi yul nimu lags shing/ byis pa rnams
ts+tshA kyi spyod yulam lags la// sems dang sems las byung lasa'ab 'das pa// bsam gtan pha rol gshegs pa bsam gtan mdzad// mgon po song ga bzhin du gsung yang sgrog/ thub
pa 'brug bzhin sgrog pa rab tu mdzad// dpa' bozla ba bzhin du rab tu mdzes// sems can dkon mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalalo// dunas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs
pas bskul pa'itshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag gis bskul bar thugs suchud nas/ jiltar skyil mo krung bcas pa de nyid kyis/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs so// bkas nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag bo tshangs pa la sbran pa'i phyir/ mgur bsal ba'i sgro mdzad pa dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/
ji ltar skyil mo krung bcas pa de nyid kyis bzhugs par mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas to/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu'adug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to//

gal to zhus nus zhu ba lung bstan pa'i sprad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs thobar snang nA/ do bzhan gshegs pa dgrab cam ba yang dag par rdza/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag
phyogs 'ga' zhig khu lags so// deskad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa zhu ba lung
bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs byas/ tshangs pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus shig dang/ zhus pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan
bas [0f10 ]ngas khyod kyi sams rangs bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phyi bas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom
ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen bo dag chos du dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags/ do skad/
cas gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan/
bo dag chos gcig dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran

tsha ba'od/ tshangs ba byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dba'ani'agro 'o snyam pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing/ yang dag pa ji
lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ldog go snyam du dran ba dang ldan pa yin zhing/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyal lo snyam pa dang/ ldang ngo snyam pa dang/ 'chug go snyam pa
dang / 'dug go snyam du dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing yang dag bya ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// da gcig bu dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag bzha gnas 'khrug pa med pa'i yid kyis lus
'di nyid la 'di lta ste/ kyis lus 'don mi brtan pa// mi rtagapa/ rang bzhin gyis nyamachung ba/ snying po med pa/ thor zugam yin ba/ rnam par thor ba'i chos can/ rnam par 'jig
ba'i chos can/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ sgyu ma dang 'dra ba/ zil pa'i thigs ba dang 'dra ba/ g.yo ba/ mi gnas pa/ mi gtsang ba/ rnag gi dri nga ba can/ rlung dang nyims mthar
[d/ ]ga rtags pa/ mthar 'drul ba/ mthar rdul du 'gyur ba ngan skyugs kyi mthar thug pa/ nad mang ba/ gnod ba can/ 'go ba'i nad mang ba/ na ba/ 'jig pa'i ngang can/ rus pa bsog
ba/ dri nga ba 'dzag pa can/ bsgrims te rim gro bya dgos pa yin par yang dag pa'i dran pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin duso sor rtog go/ de de ltar yang dag pa'i dren pas lus kyi skyon rnams yod pa
dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas/ lus la chags pa dang/ lus la kun tu 'adod chags dang/ lus la bdag gi nyidi yin pam skyod da// de lus la mi lta bas srog la chags pa dang/
srog la kun tu 'dod chags dang/ srog la bdag gnyed yin pa ma skyid do// de lus dang srog la mi lta bas/ chos gos ngan ngon dang/ kha zas ngan ngon dang/ mal cha dang/ stan na don dang/
na ba'i gsos sman dang/ yo byad ngan ngon tsam dag gas chog par 'dzin pa yin no// de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi bya ba gang dag yin pa don dang ldan pa rnams sam/ dag ba dang ldan pa
rnams kyang de dag la gtong bar byed de/ yongs sum skyo zhing/ yongs su yi chad pa med la/ yongs su skyo ba'i sems mi skyod do// de mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi gan du 'gro na dran pa dang ldan zhing/
'di snyam dusams te/ mkhan po dgan resnyan par dka' ba/ slob dpon dag ni bstan bar dka' ba ste/ bdag par song ba na/ sdig pa mi dag ba kun tu spyod pa 'ga' zhig gas bdag la glengs shadi dran
par byas na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ de rgyud dang/ rkyen de dang/ gzhi des bslab pa rnams lagus par byed par 'gyur te/ rkun par byed pa dang/ legs par bya ba byed pa dang/ zhi bi/

rnal du byed pa dang/ shin tu yongs su mthar thug par byad ba can du 'gyur ro// de bslab pa rnams la gus par byed pa nyidi dang/ stun par byed pa nyid dang/ legs par bya ba byed pa nyid dang/ zhi ba rnal du
byed pa nyid dang/ na tu yongs su mas thug par byed ba nyid kyis mkhan po dang/ slob dpon gyi gan du 'gro ba na/ bag tsha ba med pa dang/ bag 'khums pa med par 'gro zhing mi 'jigs pa dang/

lhan cig tu byung ba'i rgod pa'i ng mi ston te/ de ci'i phyi'i zhan/ gus pa dang bcas shang/ zhe sa dang bcas pa yin la/ gas kyi bag ma bzhin du 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i phyi'i do// de 'dzes pa dang ldan
bas lus kyi skyon dang/ lus kyi nyes par spyod pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong bo/ tshangs ba byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang/ lus kyi nyes par spyod pa
dedag gangazhin/ tshangs pa srog gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' 'us kyi skyon dang/ lus kyi nyes par spyod pa yin no// tshangs pa ma byin par len ba dang/ mtshos par spyod pan/ byang chub soms
dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang/ lus kyi nyes par spyod pa yin no// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na srog gcod pa spong ba yin zhen/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi dbang
gas srog chags kyi srogakhacod par mi byed/ zhe sdang gi dbang dang/ gti mug gi dbang gis srog gcod par mi byed do// da soms can gzhan dag dang/ gang zag gzhan rnams la bdag tsam du 'du//
shes par byed cing/ sdug ba bu tsam du 'du shes par byed do// bdag nyid kyis sems can gzhan dag dang/ gang zag gzhan rnams kyi srog gcod bar ma byed do// gzhan dag kyang srog gcod du
ma 'jug go/ gzhan dag srog gcodab la'ang rjes su yi rang bar ma byed do// bdag gis kyang mgacod do// gzhan dag kyang gcod du ma 'jug go/ gzhan dag gcod pa la'ang rjes su yi rang
bar ma byed do// bdag kyang mi rtog go/ gzhan dag kyang rdeg tu ma'ajug go/ gzhan dag rdeg par byed pa la'ang rjes su yi rang bar ma byed do// ji ltar na ma byin par len pa spong ba yin zhin/
tshangs pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' na sems can nams kyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang dag yan pa 'daltaste/ gsar dang/ nor bu dang/ chu tage dang/ bskrun dang/ dung dang/ man shel
dang byu ru dang/ sa le sbram dang/ dngul la sogs pa dang/ gos dang rgyan gyi rnam pa dag dang/ non dang/ 'bru dang/ mdzod dang/ bang ba'i rnam pa de dag la chags pa ma skyod/
de dag la rnam par rtog par ma byed cing/ rku 'phrog mi byed do// rku 'phrog byed du mi 'jug go/ rku 'phrog byed pa rnams la rjes su yi rang bar ma byed do// dgrong na yod pa 'am/ dgon pa na
yod pa ma yin zhing/ mganang ba rtswa 'i 'dab ma tsam yang len par mi byed do// ji ltar na mi tshangs par spyod pa spong ba yin zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa'/
dbang po rnams kyi sgo legs par bsrungs shang gnas pa yin/ lags par bstams pa yin/ 'thun pa'i gnas su rgyu ba yin/ shin tu bsrungs pa'i dren pa dang ldan pa yin/ rtag tu bsrungs/
dawaM pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ de dran pas yid kun tu bsrungs pa yin/ lus dang ngag shan tu bsdums pa yin no// 'thun pa'i gnas su rgyu la dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing/ 'di snyam du'ang
sams bskyod de/ ma zhig gis bye ma zhib mo shin tu btsugs pa lag pa gnyis kyi snyam par blangs te mig gnyis bkang ba na bla'i/ chags pa'i sems kyis yul gyi bzung mo la lta ba ni de lta ma yani
no// de ci'i phyir zhan/ bdag yul gyi bzang mo la bltas pas/ yun ring por phung zhing bcom la ma rung bar gyur ba'i phyi'i ro snyam mo// dud ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing bza' ba/
dang/ btung ba dang/ gnas dang/ mal cha dang/ stan rnams la dran pa lags par gnas pa yin te/ de dag la spyod pa na/ rosung bar ma byed tsang chags pa'i sems med pa yin no//
gal te de yongs su spyod pa na bad ba skye ba lta na/ des de la 'di ltar nye bar brtag par bya ste/ bde ba'i snang ba 'di ni/ bzlog pa'i sgo nas sdug bsngal yin ti/ khams gsum pa 'di na 'dus byas

[z//]kyi dngos po bde ba gang yang med do// de ci'i phyi'i zhan/ 'dus byas mi rtag pa'i phyir ro// mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can dag dngos pos rtog pa rnams la bde ba'i 'du shes ji ltar skyod snyam du brtag
par bya'o// tshangs pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spyod pa na/ sdug bsngal kho na skya'i/ bde ba nam yin// sdug bsngal des kyang yongs su gnon cing nyon mongs na/ des de la sems 'di/
ltar nye bar gzhag par bya ste/ lus 'dani bsgrims te yongs su bskyong dgos pa/ gsug gas bsgrub dgos pa ste/ 'din sdug bordal rtsom pas gzung bar mi nus kyi/ bde ba rtsom pas gzung bar bya ba
yin/ de la bdag ga lus brtan zhi nge 'tshob 'dis dge ba'i chos rnams bsgrub par bya'o// dpar na red ba 'dod pa 'tshong pa khur khal rnams stod bran byed/ bcos legs byed pan khur khal rnams rgyan

pa'i phyir ma yin/ bde bar bya ba'i phyi'i ma yin gyi/ gzhan du naji tsam du khal bkal ba bskur ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin dubyang chub sams dpa' kha zas za ba'ang lus brgyan pa'i phyir zas za ba ma yin/

lus bdeba'i bya ba'i phyir ma yin te/ gzhan du na ji tsam du lus dang 'brel ba'i dag ba'i phyogs bsgral ba'i phyir ro snyam dusums nye bar gzhug par bya'o// tshangs pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin/
gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gnyen pos sems shes par byed ma nusan/ des 'di snyam du bsam par bya ste/ soms zhes bya ba 'di ni mthar phyin par dka' ba/ mi mthun pa 'dzan pa 'khor ba la
bya@#/// mngon du phyogs pa/ dge ba'i phyogs lam phyogs pa/ tshul la mngon du phyogs pa/ dben pa lam phyogs ba/ bdu ba la mngon du phyogs pa/ sdug bsngal la ma phyogs pa/
smra ba la dga' ba la mngon du phyogs pa/ spros pa la mngon du phyogs pa/ de kho na la rnam par lta ba la mi phyogs pa/ mi gtsang ba la mngon du phyogs pa/ gtsang ba la mi phyogs pa/ gdul dka' ba/
gzung dka' ba/ gnas med pa/ rten med pa// gsog/ gsob/ skad cig pa/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las byung ba yin na/ mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig 'ad lta bu 'a'ong bzhin can gyi
zla sams kyi dbang du 'gro zhing/ rjes su 'jug snyam du bsam mo// de de ltar sems la dran pa nye bar gnas pas sams gdul ba'i phyi'i nan tan byed do// da sar sna'i sems gdul ba'i phyi'i sbyin pa sbyin
bar byed do// tha na kham gcig tsam mam/ rgya shug tsam mam/ mon sran spe'u tsam mam/ til 'bru tsam yang rung/ de'ang thams cad la sbyin par byed kyi/ sdug pa rnams la ma yin/ 'dris/
pa rnams la ma yin no// du 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems gdul ba'i phyir tshul khrims srung ste/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yud kyis skyon med par byed pa yani/ 'dren mar ma byed pa yin/
nag nog can du mi byed pa yin taM/ tshul khrims des bdag la stod par mi byed/ gzhan la smod par ma byed do// deganod sems kyi sems gdul ba'i phyi'i bzod pa sgom ste/ da grong ngan/ grong rdal du
[za]zhugs ban/ gsha'ang ci mi snyam par byed do// brgyad kyang rung/ brdeg kyang rung/ bsdigs kyang rung/ rnam bar 'joms gang rung/ smod kyang rung sta/ ci mi snyam par bya'o// kum dag sbyong/
'don mgo breg ngan pa'o// kum dag sbyong 'danamago 'og mi sdug pa napa'o zhes 'jig rten gyis dpyas kyang ci mi snyam par byed do// yang dag pa ma yin pas skur kyang bzod bar byed cing dang du len la/

lag bdag gi'i bya ba nyid la ston to/ bzod pa des kyang bdag la stod bar mi byed/ gzhan la smod par ma byed do// de la lo'i sems gdul ba'i phyi'i dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs pa'i chos ma thob pa rnams

thob bar bya ba'i phyir dang/ hor pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang/ 'phelab rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dang/ yongs su smin pa rnams yang dag bar gzung bar bya ba'i phyi'i dang/ yang dag par
gzung ba rnams rnam par dbya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo// dasems can gyi ched rnams dang/ sems can gyi bya ba rnams la yongs su ma skyo zhing/ yongs su yi ma chad de/ yongs su skyo ba'i
sems mi skyid do// da gdol pa la phan gdags kyang rung/ rgyal po la phan gdags kyang rung/ shin tu lam ring por yang 'gro ste/ thadad par ma dmigs shing/ rgyun mi gcod pa yin no//

gal te byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal zhing bkren pa'i sems can rgya de ngos bo thachad ngan pa zhig gas bstabs sam/ 'byor cade nor che ba gang yang rung ba zhig gis dngos po bzang po mchog gya nom pa/
zhig bstabs kyang/ de la byang chub sams dpa' sang brtse ba'i sems bzhag la/ gus par bstod cing/ yang dag par gzengs bstodal/ yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug/

cing dngos po ngan pa de blang bar bya'o// deci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa bya dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro// de rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems gdul ba'i phyi'i/ bsam
! gtan la bsam gtan byed de/ ji ltar bsam gtan byed tsa na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni thog ma kho nas lus legs par bsdams pa yin no// lus dben par gnas pa yin no//
sgyur lus kyi 'du 'dzi rnams kyang yongs su song ngo// lus la lhag par chags pa'i ng 'dor ro// lus lci 'am yang ba'ang shes so// lus dang 'thun pa dang/ lus 'tsho ba dang/ lus kyi stobs
kyang rab tu shes so// ngag legs par bsdams pa yin te/ smra ba nyung zhing brjod pa nyung ngo// don sgrub yin zhing/ rigs par sgrub yin te/ bu mo gtam la dga' ba yongs su spangs
pa yin no// da yid legs par bsdums pa yin te/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams cad yongs su sbyangs so// de de ltar gnas gsum yongs su dag pos/ sngon po dang/ sor po
dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po'i gzugs rnams ma snang bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de/ de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mngon par rtags su mi 'dzin to// rgyan dang gos kyi rnam pa sna
tshogs dag la'ang mtshan mar ma 'dzin cing/ mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no// gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dradang/ ro dang/ rig pa sna tshogs dag la'ang mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing/
mngon rtags su ma 'dzin pa yin no// smyos pa dang/ bud mad dang/ khya'u dang/ bu mo rnams la'ang mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing/ mngon rtags su ma'adzin pa yin no// de gcig pu ban
par 'dug nas/ nang du yang dag 'jog cing sems gnas bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed da/ mi sdug pa la dmigs pa 'am/ byams pa la dmigs pa'i m/ snying rje la dmigs pa 'am//
yide 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yang rung bas ji ltar lus khengs bar tsha 'gyub da ltar dmigs bar byed do/ dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba mi 'gag go/ rgyuna rnams kyang ma 'chad do// rlung 'khrug
par mi 'gyur ro/ sams log par rnam par g.yeng bar ma 'gyur// de 'chag gam/ nyal las/ 'grang ngam/ 'dug kyadamags pa danyid kyis 'dug go/ de nyid la sems gtong
ngo / tshangs po gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa la sems brtan par gyur pa de'atsho/ soms la sems mnyam par 'jog sta/ sems kyis sums kyang mi dmigs so// gang gis
mnyam bar 'jog pa de'ang mi dmigs so// gang gi phyi'i mnyam bar 'jog pa de'ang ma demags so// de 'di snyam du sems te/ kyi ma byas pa so so'i skya bo 'di dag ni gsog gi chos rnams dang/
[n ]@#// gsob kyi chos rnams la mngon par zhen to snyam du sems te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lhag mthong zhes bya// de ltar rnam par mthong bas nyon mongs pa rnams kun
tum 'byung zhing ma 'jug pa den/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas zhes bya'o// tshangs pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag bzhag nas ming dang
yi ge ji ltar thos pa rnams nges pa'i tshig gis gdags pas/ yang dag par 'jog cing/ yi ge de dag lo nye bar rtogs/ de da ltar nye bar rtog ban yi ga rnams gsog dang gsob tu mthong ngo//
rgyu de yi ga rnams gsog dang gsob tu mthong nas/ ming rnams kyang gsog dang gsob tu mthong ngo// gang la ming de 'dogs pa de'ang gsog dang gsob tu mthong ngo// de la gzugs gang dang gang
snang ba de dang de'ang gsog dang gsob tu snang ngo// das gsog dang gsobatu snang bas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// yang dag ba ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas/
@# dal 'dus byas rmi lam dang 'dra bar snang ngo// de la byang chub sems dpa' so sor brtags nas/ sems can la lta bas snying rje chan po'i sams nyaba' bzhag nas gnas so// de bskyal pa'i shes
rab kyi sems gdul ba'i phyi'i shes rab sgom par byed do// ji ltar sgom pa'i byed can/ dkun rdzob kyi tshul du bshad pa 'am/ don dam pa'i tshul du bshad pa'i mdo sde gang dag yin pa de dag brjod pa
[z& {]gsal zhing/ zur phyin pa dag gis mngon par 'dzin to/ mnor bar chos ston pa las bzung nas kyang/ mnor ba'i bsam pas sems par byed do// bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la'ang brtson par byed
de de ye shes kyi stobs dang shes rab kyi bye brag gis sems can ma dmigs/ srog ma dgas/ gso ba mi dmigs/ skya ba ma dmigs/ gang zag ma dmigs/ shad las skyes pa
mi dmigs/ shed bu ma dmigs te/ thams cad kyi thams cad du chad par lta bar yang mi ltung ngo// btags pa'i tha snyad rnams la'ang legs par bslabs pa yin no// da zin ba'i sa'i khams
dang/ ma zin pa'i sa'i khams la yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog go/ zin pa'i chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dang/ ma zin pa la'ang yang dag
pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog ste de gnyis ka'ang gsog nyid dang gsob nyid du mthong zhing/ bams po nyid dang/ snying po med pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid du mthong ngo// des de ltar
mtho bas/ de ltar phyi rol gyi khams rnams la mngon par chags pa med pa de ltar nang ga rnams la'ang ngo// mig gi rnam par shes pa dang/ gzugs rnams la'ang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul
gcig tu so sor rtog go/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sgra rnams dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ dri rnams dang/ lca rnam par shes pa dang/ ro rnams dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa
dang/ reg bya rnams la'ang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog go/ de sa'i khams la ni sra ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes la/ gshar ba nyid dang/ tshab nyid dang/

khong stong nyid du'ang rab tu shas so// chu'i khams la gsher ba nyid du rab tu shes la/ sra ba nyid dang/ tshab nyid dang/ khong stong nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// ma'i khams la tshab nyid du'ang rab
tu shes la/ sra ba nyid dang/ gsher ba nyid dang/ khong stong nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// rlung ga khams la g.yo ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes la/ yang zhing g.yo ba nyid du'angarab tu shes so// de
nam mkha'i khams la khong stong nyid du'ang rab tugs la/ thams cad du song ba nyid du'ang rab tu shis so// rnam bshas pa'i khams la sgyu ma lta bu nyid du'ang 'ab tu shes la/ phyin ci log nyid
zhi du'ang rab shes/ phyin ci ma log pa nyid du'ang 'batushas so// da mag gi rnam pa shes pa la stong pa nyid dang/ gzugs la mi rtag pa nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la

stong pa nyid dang/ sgra la mi rtag pa nyid dang/ sna'i rnam par shes ba la stong pa nyid dang/ dril mi rtag pa nyid dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang/ ro la mi rtag pa nyid dang/ lus kyi

rnam bar shes pa la stong pa nyid dang/ reg bya la mi rtag pa nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// de de ltar shes rab la mkhas pas/ shin tu rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan zhing/ shes rab rno ba dang ldan te//
sa dge ba'i chos rnams kyang rab tugs/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyang rab gas/ nyan thos yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes/ rang sangs rgyas yang dag par 'grub par byed
pa'i chos rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes so// de ma dag ba'i
chos rnams kyis rnam par smin pa chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ chen po sems can dmyal ba rnams dang/ dud 'gro rnams dang/ yi dgas rnams su skya ba'ang rab tu shes so// der skyes pa rnams kyi

tshor ba chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ chen po'ang rab tu shes so// dag ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ chen po lha rnams kyi nang du 'am/ mi rnams kyi nang du smin pa'i ng
rab tu shes so// der skyes pa rnams kyi 'bras bu chung ngu dang/ 'bring dang/ man po'ang rab tu shes so// nyan thos yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon/

du byab dang/ lan cig phyir 'ongaba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rnam pa'i ng rab tu shes so// shes
rab kyis rnam par grol ba nyid dang/ gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba'ang rab tushesaso// rang sangs rgyas yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi yang dag par 'grub pa'i ng rab tu
shes so// 'bras bu dang zhi ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs kyi lam yang rab tu shas so//
[+ ]shes kyi lam yang rab tu shes so// shes nas kyang tshogs kyi lam dang ya shas kyi lam la brtson par byed de// sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i rmos rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul tshe
'tsho ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so// mthu che ba nyid dang/ dam pa nyid dang rab mchog nyid dang/ phul du byung banyid dang chab nyid dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems

rgyu dpa' thams cad dang thun mong ba'ang ma yin na/ gzhan sems can lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so/ de de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing/ dran pa
lags bar nyubar gnas la// sdig pa'i chos thams cad dang ni bral/ dge ba'i chos ni yang dag ba thob/ lus kyi gnod pa ni mad/ rnam par shes pas 'bas pan med/ sems kyis
'phangs pa ni med la/ chos rnams kyi rgyu'i tshogs dang/ 'brus bu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas/ dpar na rgya mtsho'i rlabs bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel te/
ji ltar rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'bri zhing/ yang 'byung ba ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnams las de lta ma yin no// de dper na zla ba'i yar gyi ngo'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar/ dgakha'i
[p/]chos rnams kyis mngon par 'phel te/ ji ltar mar gyi de la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i chos can ya na pa ltar/ byang chub sems dang 'a ni chos rnams las de lta ma yin no// de dang ran dbyar gyi
dus kyi bu chu blug pa ltar/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mngon pa ra 'phal/ ji ltar phu chu drug pa dbyar gyis dus zad pa 'bri ba'i chos can yin pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' na chos rnams las de
lta ma yin no// tshangs pa de ltar bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' n myur du bu na mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// lus kyi skyon rnams rab shesaMn// lus yod skyon rnams mi ston to// lus 'dran pa legs gnas ni/// skyonamad zhi ba'i gnas 'thob bo//
lus kyi skyon rnams mngeshesan// lus la yod pa'i skyon mi rtogs// lus la dran ba ma gnas na// sdug bsngal bzod dka' gnas 'thob bo/ sems kyi skyon rnams 'bangs na//
sams yod skyon rnams ma ston to// sems la dran pa legs gnas na// skyon mad zhi ba'i gnas 'thob bo// sems kyi skyon rnams ma shes na// sams la yod pa'i skyon mi rtogs//
sams la dran pa ma gnas na// sdug bsngal bzod dka' gnas 'theb bo// dge ba'i chos rnams stan byed cing// ma dag chos rnams ma ston pa// chos rnams la mkhas pa'i mi//
skyon med zhi ba'i gnas 'thob bo// dge ba'i chos rnams mi ston cing// mi dag chos rnams stan byed ba// chos rnams la ni ma mkhas ma// sdugabasngal bzod dka'
gnas 'thob bo// danas ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ lham tog mnar ba dag mngon par sprul to/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// mngon par gtor nas kyang bcom ldan
'tsha 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi reng nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsumo bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi thad nas song ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
namanangs par mkhyen nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
dge slong dag mdangs 'di'i mi nyal tsam gyi nam gyi gung thun la nga gcig pu dban bar 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag bzhagan/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshal chen po 'od
kyis snakhar byas nas/ nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga la mngon par bstod de/ lan gsum baskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ mi
mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsolato// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnangan/ bcom ldan 'das
[4]da bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la padag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang/ ngas mimadzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to// tshongs pa zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyi'i/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs a/ tshangs ba khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig dang/ zhus pa de dang de nyid kyi lung
bstan bas/ ngas khyed kyi sems rangs bar bya'o// de nas skangs phyabs ma mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

bo dag chos du dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar 'tshang rgya 'gas/ dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang/ ngas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la

'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa byang chub sems dang sha sems dpa' chen po dag/chos gcig dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/

chos gag gang zhin/ 'di lta sta/ lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa'o// dge slong dag ngas mi jed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa'i rgyu dang/ las dang 'bras bu'ang bstan to//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la gang bstan pa de/ skya bo mang po 'a
sman pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ sman ba dang/ bdapar bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol// dge slong gsar pa gsar pa rnams dang/
chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byun gnas / ri pom lags shing mchis nas/ ring po ma lags pa rnams dang/ theg pa chen po 'a ya nga dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa 'di deg gis thosan dga' ba dang/
wayaM dad pa thob par 'gyur/ bslab ba de la'ang sbyor bar brtson bar gnas par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la gang bshad pa de/ dge slong de dag la'ang
b+hU bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lags bar bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa legs par bka' stsal to//
ma mo red kyi bdag po tshangs pa mdo sde 'di lta bu dag yongs su zhu ba'i snod du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis nas/ zhus pa'i ng legs par smras pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das mamajed kyi bdag

botshangs bas gal te dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan ma mchis na'ang/ zhu ba zhus pa'i mod las skyes ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kho nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das dag ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i mtha' dang mun/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par rngo ma thogs pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas zhu ba 'di/ sems can thams cad kyi spyi'i don du zhus ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin tu//
de de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis 'di tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshul bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bag yod pa 'tshul
bstan ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ dag slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya rengs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstodango/ 'phags pa
tshongs ngas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzan mi tra dang/ zhu chen gyi le ts+tsha ba ban d+he bshes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab bka
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yarat+na koTi'i nAm mahAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ni bo che'i mtha' zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gtsagan/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bo'i kha ban bya rgod kyi phung po'i la dag slob/

[A ]lnga brgya tham pa'i dag slong gi dge 'dunachan po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur ba mtshan mo grod la bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/
bzhugs khang gi sgo drung na 'grang// bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zinabo tsho'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// donas bcom ldan 'das dran pa/
dang mkhyen bzhin du/ ting nga 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ 'jam dbal gzhon nur gyur pa sgo na 'dug pa gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang 'jam dpal khyod nang du shog tsas de skad bka' stsal to//
bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so zhes gsol te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyananas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis
zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'greng ngo// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gcig tu 'greng pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis stan la 'dug ces gnang ba mdzad do/
(bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogasagacig tu 'dug nas/
bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan dus da gdod ting nge 'dzin gang ga shugs bzhugs pa las bzhengs lags/ daskad casag so la//
ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal rin po che'i 'a zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin de las nga da
gdod gnas gnas pa 'dus langs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ de la rin po che'i mtha' zhes bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dang la 'di
lta sta/ dpa' n nor bu rin po chan tu dag cing shin tu byi dor byas pa/ sa phyogs mnyam pa la bzhagan/ de gang dang gang kho nar gzhug pa de dang der rinubo cha bya ba gnas bar 'gyur// 'dzin
da la de bzhin dung ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas/ shar phyogs su bltas te/ shar phyogs su bltas nas/ ngas na 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med ba dag na/ de bzhin gshag
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston cing bzhugs pa dag mthong ngo// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ 'og dang/ stang nas/
phyogs bcu'i bar du bltas na/ ngas 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston cing bzhugs pa dag mthong ngo//
'jam dpal ngas ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin pa'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha'i
phyag rgya 'di ngas phyag rgyar bzhag ste/ dad pa can gyi rigs kyi bu rnams dang/ rigs kyi bum rnams kyis phyag rgya 'di la spyad n/ spobs pa ma chod pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gsol ba/ bcom
tsha ldan 'das bdag sprobs lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag stobs lags so// bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal khyod spobs bar bgyishig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpar
bgyin/ nor bu rin po med nyidi ngos gang dang gang khe nas phab sta/ bzhag pa'i'in po che'i ngos de dang de kho nas 'bab cing gnas par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ chos
thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' kho nas gnas lags so// bka' stsal ba// 'jam dpal khyod kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' shes sam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so//
bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal 'o na yang dag pa'i mtha' gang na 'dug/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dus yang dag pa'i mtha' na bdag gi mtha' gang na mchis pa de na mchis lags so//
yang dag pa'i mtha' na so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams gang na mchis pa de na mchis lags so// yang dag pa'i mtha'an las sam/ rnam par smin pa ma lags la/ chos thams cad kyi mtha' yang
de khon lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar mos pa de dag ni gang las kyang rnam par grol ba ma mchis lags so// gang dag gang las kyang grol ba ma mchis pa de dag ni log pa lasa rnam
bas grol ba lags so/ gang dag log pa las rnam par grol ba de dag ni yang dag par rnam par grol ba lags so// gang dag yang dag bar rnam par grol ba de dag ni spyod yul ma lags pa
la zhugs pa lags so// gang dag spyod yul ma lags pa la zhugs pa de dgan yang dag par zhugs pa lags so// daci'i slad du zhan/ bcom ldan 'dus spyod yul ma lags pa zhes
bgyi banA/ spyod tshul de bgyis las pa ste/ de'i slad du spyod yul ma lags pa zhes 'dogs lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal spyod yul ma yin ba zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla
dgas yin/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das spyod yul ma lags pa zhes bgyi ba de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig bla dgas so// bka' stsal ba/ 'jam dpal lam bsgom pa zhes bya
ba dgang ga tshig bla dgas yani/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das lam bsgom pa zhes bgyi ba den/ lam bsgom pa ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// bka' stsal pa// 'jam
dpal khyod las dang po pa rigs kyi bu rnams dang/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chos ji ltar ston/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdagan les dang bo pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang/ rigs
dkyi bu mo rnams la 'jig tshogs don du mamanyis bar chos ston lags so// bdag 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug rnams spang du ma mchis par chos ston
lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin gang lags ba de ni spong bar rngo ma thogs pa'i slad du lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig tshogs sam/
bzhi 'jigatshogs kun 'byung ba sbyong ba 'tshal ba de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' spong bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag na res dang bo pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams la mngon par zhin
bam mchis pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams gzung bar mi bgyi ba 'am/ mngon sum du mi bgyi ba dang/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams lhag pa 'a ma demags pa 'am/ spang bar mi bgyi
rgyu bde lta bur chos ston lags na/ gdul ba las dang po pa rnams la bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos ston par mdzo gas/ bka' stsal pa// 'jam dang la nga ni gzugs rnam par 'jig pa med nga
dang/ skya ba med par chos ston to// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang/ skyo ba med bar chos ston to// 'dod
chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug rnams rnam par 'jig pa yod ba dang/ skyo ba mdab dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rnams kyang/ thob pa med bar chos ston to// ngasan 'di ltar/

[z/]chos gang yang ma bshag ma bskyod pa de ltar bla na mdab yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'jum dpal sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba dan chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig bya/
dgas so// stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ ma 'dres pa la thug bas ngas rgyas kyi chos gang dag yin pa de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kho na yin par khong du chud par bya'o/
ngas ni chos kyi dbyings la 'di lta ste/ so so'i skyo bo'i chos rnams sam/ dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rung ste/ de
dag tha dod bar rjes su ma mthong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal dbyings de la ni bye brag med de/ 'di lta sta/ chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings ni ma 'dres pa'i dbyis so//
'jam dab la 'di lta ste/ dper na chu klung ming tha dad pa dang/ kha dog tha dad pa dang/ ro tha dad pa rgya mtsho'inang du bab ba rnams lan/ 'di lta ste/ 'don gad+hA'o zha'am/ sa ta'o zhi 'am/

ya mun 'o zhes bya brag tu dbye ba 'am/ tha dad du byar mi nus so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du ming tha dad ba'i chos rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'di na so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams so zha 'am/ nyan thos
dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes tha dad par gdags par mi nus so// 'jam dbal 'di lta ste/ dper na 'bru'i phung bo sna tshog
la ni/ 'di ni 'bru che ge mo zhige gi phung po'o// 'di ni cho ga tsho zhi 'am ga ge zhes gdags su yod pa bzhin du/ chos kyi dbyinges lan 'di dug naso so'i skye bo'i chos rnams so zhi
na'am/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dba' dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes tha dad par ma nus so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dpar na 'bru'i phung po sna tshogs
lan/ 'di ni 'bru chag mo zhig gi phung po'o// 'di ni chag mo zhig gi zhes gdags su yod pa bzhin du/ chos kyi dbyings la na 'di dag na so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams so// 'di dag ni dgra bcom
pa'i chos rnams so// 'di dag nirang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams so/ 'di dgan sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// zhes tha dad par gdags
par mi nus so// 'di ni chos kyi dbyings te/ de ni 'di na 'dug go zha 'am/ ga ge mo zhig na 'dug go zhes de ltar bstan ba 'am/ gdags par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar chos
kyi dbyings ni bltar ma mthong zhing bstan du med de/ gdags pa'i bya ba ma yin zhing/ gdags pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyi'i 'o// 'gro ba 'di de lta bu'i dbyings yin bar ngas ji skad bstan pa
la gal te mtshams med pa byed pa de ltar mos te/ mtshams med pa'i ng de lta bu'i dbyings yin par shesan de kun nas nyon mongs ba can du ma 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal mtshams
mad ban chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs mnyam ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar mtshams med ba'i dbyings dang/ chos kyi dbyangs 'ad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ 'du la ni 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba
'am kun nas ldang ba ma dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'dus la bdag gis kyang chos kyi dbyings ngan song du 'chi ba 'am/ mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/ mya ngan las 'das bar mtsho bar ma mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal gal te
la la zhig khyod la 'di skad du 'dra ste/ khyod kyi ston ba 'gro ba drug dang ldan pa'i 'khor ba ji ltar 'dogs zhes de skad drisan/ 'jam dbal khyod kyis ji skad lan gdab/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'dis de skad du snyasan/ bdag gas 'di skad du lan gdab par bgyi ste/ dper na ma gnyid kyis log ba'i rmi lam du sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'iskyo gnas sam/ yi dgas kyi yul
lam/ lha ma yin gyi roge sam/ lha rnams sam/ ma rnams mthong na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar g.yur lam rmiba'i mose sna tshogs mthong yang g.yar lam sna tshogs ma mchis pa de bzhin
du bdag gis 'gro ba tha dad ba bstan kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyide ni the dad bar gdags par rngo ma thogs te/ de ltar lags pas bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni da skad 'dri ba la de skad ces
lan gdab par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnam dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ 'dra sangs rgyas rnams dang/ nyan thos
can rnams kyi yo sasumya ngan las 'das pa'i ng tha dad par gdags bar rngo mi thogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gnas pa dag kyang tha dad bar gdags par rngo ma thogs lags so//
daci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings las tha mi dad pa'i slad du lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyin/ rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che sna tshogs dung dang/ man shel dang/ byuru
lasogs pa tha mdang/ 'bring dang/ mchog rnams la 'di ni rin po che chog mo zhig go/ 'di ni rin po mchog mo zhag go zhes tha dad bar gdags su mas lags kyi/ chos kyi dbyings la
na de ltar tha dad bar gdags pa'i rngo mi thogs la/ gdugs pa de la'ang tha dad bar dbyer ma mchis lags so// de lan 'chi'apho dang skye ba tha dad par gdags pa'i rngo ma thogs lags so// de ci'i
skad du zhin/ chos kyi dbyings la na 'pho 'am/ skyo ba'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam bar byang ba ma mchis pa'i smad du lags so// chos kyi dbyingasan kun nas nyon mongs pa
can ma lags/ chos kyi dbyings na 'dres pa lags te/ chos kyi dbyangs la ni gang dag spang bar bgyi ba bam/ bskyod par bgyiba'i chos de dag ma mchis lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings shes sam/ gsol ba/ gal te dmigs na/ bdag gtso
'tshal lags so// bka'astsal ba/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gang la spyod shes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtenan sgyu ma sprul ba'i mi gab bon la spyod pa de la spyod lags so//
bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas te/ bdagagos na gang bstan par bgyi ba'i 'jig rten gyi dngos po dang/ 'jig rtan gong la sbyod pa yang dag nga ra rjes su mi mthong
lags te/ bdag gisani 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings las tha dad par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong lags so// da ci'i slad du zhin/ ma mchis pa'i slad du lags so// bcom ldan 'das
kyis 'jig rten gang la spyod ces bka' stsal ba de'ang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags pa de la na 'chi 'pho dang skyobu'ang ma mchis/ de la ni 'jigs pa 'am/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i ng chu mchis na/
gang la spyod par 'gyur lags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam bar shes ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags pa de ni/ gtan ma mchis pa'i slad du skyob
'am/ 'gag pa ma mchis la/ mtshan nyid gcig las mi 'da' ste/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid gcig pa lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dbal 'di ji snyam du soms//
nga da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur pa 'di la khyod 'disnyam du'adra yodra su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mi snang/
bar 'gyur rosnyam du sams sam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das danam lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ chos kyi dbyings na yang dag nga ra grub pa ma lags pa'i slad du lags so/
bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyi dbyings yang dag par grub pa zhig lags nan/ de'i slad du de mi gda' bar yang 'gyur ba zhig na/ de la ni yang dag par grub pa mi dmigs pa ste/ de mi gda'/
zla ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ga la 'gyur lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltabu'i dbyings lags te/ dra'i slad du bcom ldan 'dasan skyoba'ang ma lags/ yongs su
(mya ngan las 'da' bar ma 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dbal bon khyod 'das pa'i de bzhin gshags pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad po de dag yongs su mya ngan
las 'das so zhes de la khyed ji ltar mi mos/ gsol pa// gal te de dag gi skye ba yang dag par rjes su mthong nan/ bdagums lags so// bka' stsal pa/ khyod so so'i skya bongashi/
b rnams nying mtshams sbyor bar 'dod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das so so'i skya bo nyid kyang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong sta/ ma dmigs na/ de'i nying mtshams sbyor ba/
lta ga la dmigs lags/ bka' stsal ba// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa chos gnas par bzhed kyis/ khyed skyobs par gyis shige/ gsol pa// ci zhig las brtsams te
sbobs bar bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa// chos kyi dbyings las rtsoms shig/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi dbyings ma lags pa'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par
sa su ma mthong lags so// bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams skrag bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal tayang dag pa'i mtha' skrag par
'gyur na ni/ de'i slad du mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yang skrag bar 'gyur lags so// de tsa'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag ba'i mtha' yang gzhan la/ mngon ba'i nga rgyal
can yang gzhan pa na me lags kyis/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi mtha' gang lags pa'i mtha' de nyid yang dag ba'i mtha' lags la// yang dag ba'i mtha' gang lags pa de'ang chos
thams cad kyi mtha' lags te/ de'i slad du ma sgrog lags so// chos thams cad yang dag par ma bsgrubs pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rdo rje'i gzhi legs so// bcom ldan 'dus kyis
bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal ci'i phyi'i na/ 'di rdo rje'i gzhi zhes bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mo phyir rolags// de'i slad du 'di rdo rje'i gzhi lags
so// de bzhin gshegs ba bsam gyis mi khyabara'i sladadu chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab ba 'di ni rdo rje'i gzhi legs te/ ci'i slad du rdo rje'i gzhi zhes bas zhin/
chos thams cad sems ma mchis pa'i slad du lags so// chos thams cad byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni rdo rje'i gzhi lags te/ ci'i slad du zhen/ chos thams cad brjod du ma mchis
'go pa'i slad du ste/ 'di na mang gang dang gang gis chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i chos de dang de/ chos de dang de la ma mchis lags so// gang ma mchis pa de ni stong pa lags so// gong
stong ba de ni mid pa lags so// gang mang ba ni brjod pa'i rje mi thigs pa 'gas so// brjod du ma mchis pa ni byang chub lags te/ de'i slad du 'di ni rdo rje'i gzhi lags so// chos thams
ni ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lags te/ 'dzin rdo rje'i gzhi lags so// bka' stsal pa// ci'i phyir rdo rje'i gzhi zhis bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
ni rang gi yul las dban pa lags te/ de'i slad du 'di rdo rje'i gzhi legs so// bka' stsal ba/ 'jam dang la dge slong kun dga' bo da'ang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun 'dzin par gyur
na 'di'i 'ong ba'imtshan ma ngas bya 'am/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos brjod ba 'am/ bstan pa mchis lags sam/ bdag gisan yi ge gcig kyang bstan bar yang
ba dag bar rjes su ma mthong lags na/ mang po lta ga la mthong lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod 'di skad du 'chad pa ni khyod kyis
tshig 'di legs par smras pa yin te/ 'jam dpal khyod legs so// 'jam dang la ngasan phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med ba dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams chos nyid 'di khon ston cing bzhugs pa dag mthong ngo/ des tshodang ldan pa shA'i bu rang ga gnas khang nas byung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nus
gyur pa'i gnas khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs khang ga la ba der song nas/ bzhugs khang gi phyi sgo na 'greng nga/
dang/ gsung ba'i gsung thos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dang 'a dag slongashAri'i bu 'di gnas khang gi
phyi sgo na 'greng lta chos nyan par 'dod na/ 'jam dpal shAri'i bu chos nyan par nang du 'ong bar gyis shig/ gsol pa/ mtha' 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' lags te// gang gi slad rol
dang/ nang dang gnyis ka ma mchis par gda' lags so// bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas yang dag pa'i mtha' ni
ma mchis pa lags te/ de lta bu'i mtha' gang lags pa de la ni tshur mchiba'am/ phar mchib ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i mtha' can gyi/ btsun
pa shA ri'i bu de ni tshur mchab 'am/ nang na mchi ba'i ma rigs lags so// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gal te nga gnas khang gi nang na nyan thos dag dang lhan cig tu gtam zer zhing 'dug
yaM la/ khyod ni phyi rol na 'dug ste/ nang du 'ong ngu'ang mi debangan/ ci khyod sdug bsngal bar ma 'gyur 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasade ni ma lags ta/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos
thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i slad du ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod pa gang lags pa 'di'i nga chos kyi dbyings lags te/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'i slad du//
de bzhin gshegs ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma lags so// chos sam chos bstan ba zhes bgyi ba las/ chos nyan pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'dirigakyang gnyis su mumachis
ba'i slad du bla dad pam mchis te/ de'i slad du'ang chos dbyings las tha dad pa ma lags so// 'jam dbal zhes bgyi ba'i yi ge gang lags pa 'di dag kyang chos kyi dbyings su gtogs te/
bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na bdag cung zad kyang gdung ba ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad du chos ston du lags kyang/ bdag der mchi yang ma
mchi/ der mchi dga' ba 'am/ yongs su gdung ba'ang mi skyid lags so// deci'i smad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis shig mchis na na deg ba ba 'am/ yongs su gdung ba skyed pa'/
gyur na/ chos kyi dbyidis dazhiganyis su ma mchis te/ de'i slad du bdag dga' ba 'am/ yongs su gdung ba mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'dus chos ston pa mdzad pa'i chos bstan ba
des kyang/ chos gang yang sogasapa ma/ 'bro ba 'am/ 'phal ba 'am/ 'grib par mi bgyid de/ 'di ltar chos bstan ba dan chos gang yang dmagis ngas nye bar gnas pa ma lags te/
com ldan 'das de'i slad du'ang bdag dga' bar mi 'gyur zhing/ yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan ba shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa//
shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'jam dbal gzhon nur gyur ba'i spobs pa thos sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das thes lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang/ 'jam
dpe la gzhon nur gyur pa'os pablos kyang ci rung snyam sta/ de'i slad du ba dga'adi namachis lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'dasaMl/ 'jam dbal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu nang du mchi bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu la 'di skad du/ shA ri'i bu khyod gnas khang ga
nang du shog ces bka' stsal to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu gnas khang du 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//
phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la/ 'jam dbal gzhin nus gyur pas 'di skad ces smras so// btsun ba shA ri'i bu khyod don gyi dbang gang mthong
bas 'dare 'os/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal kho bos ni chos nyan par 'dod ba'i phyir 'di 'ongs rta/ 'di ltar gangan bcom ldan 'das dang/ skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu gnas pa de na bstan ba zab
mo yang dag yul du byung ba yod de/ de'i phyi'i kho bos 'ongasaso// smras pa/ btsun pa shA'i bu de ni de bzhin te/ bstan pa 'din zeb bo// smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dang bas
cig tu brtsams pa'i chos bstan par ji tsam du zab/ smras b/ danibatsun ba shAri'i bu'i rtog pa'i m 'gyur te/ gru bcom pa zag pa zad ba ni chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin no// datsan
phyisazhin/ 'di ltar chos bstan pa 'di ni so so'i skyo bo'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos la zhugs pa ma yini/ 'dra sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs ba ma yin/ de
bzhin gshegs ba'i chos la zhugs pa ma yin ba'i phyi'o// 'don tshos gang dmigs ba'i phyir yang zhugs pa ma yin no// 'di ni gang du'ang zhugs pa 'am/ ldogs pa'i ng med de/
ba00(chos thams cad ni dudaben pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis ci las bsams te dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa// chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin zhes de skadaskya/ smras pa//
btsun pa shAri'i bu dgra bcom pa nyid na 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug zad pa yazhin/ de gang gi snod yin zhing/ de gang ji lta bu zhigo ga snod du 'gyur snyam ste/ de las bsam
na dgra bcom ba zag pa zad ba/ rapo bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin no zhes kho bo de skad sma'o// smras pa// 'jam dpal kho bon chos bstan pa 'di'i don du gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag
khang dang/ gnas khang nas gnas khang dang/ gnas phug tu khyod tshol te/ bdag gis khyod las zab ba zab pa yang dag pa'i spobs pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos kyang ci ma rung snyam ste/
'jam dpal kho bo ni bcom ldan 'das dang/ khyod kyis chos bstan pa la chog mareshes so// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod chog bstan pas chogami shag sam/ smras pa/
kho bo chog mdeshes so// lcas pa/ btsun pa shAri'i bu ru chos kyi dbyangs chos tshol bar byed dam/ smas pa/ 'jam dbul mo byed do// smras pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan

la/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu ni gzhan pa ni ma yin na/ ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu chos manyan pa la chog mi shes/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos kyi dbyings ni chos tshol
bar mi byed ba'i phyir ro// gal te de da ltar tshol bar byed na ni de'i phyir da chog shes par 'gyur ba zhig na/ gang gi phyi'i tshol bar mi byed pa de'i phyi tsheg ma shes so//
sas pa/ 'jam dba' de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs nga la kho lta bu chos nyan pa de lta bu khyod kyis ga la rnyed/ am pa/ btsun bshAri bu khyo shA ri'i bu yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i/
kaM can yin pas mos sam/ sbas ba/ mos so// smras pa/ ji ltar mos/ sa ba/ chos thams cad yongs su ma grub pas na/ kho bo'ang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'da' ba'i chos can
[ ]yin no snyam du de ltar mos so// skyes pa/ btsun pa shAri'i bu khyod shi 'pho med pa dang/ skya ba med pa'i chos can yin par mos sam/ lcasab/ mos so// smras pa/ ji ltar mos/ smras pa/
chos kyi dbyings sugatogs pa'i phyir te/ chos kyi dbyings la 'chi'apho 'am/ skya ba med ba de ltar mos so// smras pa// btsun pa shAri'i bu khyod dgra bcom pa thag pa zad pa/ mi shes pa dang ldan
pa'i chos sam/ lcas pa/ mos so// smras pa/ ji ltar mos/ snus pa/ shis pa dang mi shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyi'o/ dgra bcom pazag pa zad ba ma shes ba dang ldan te/ 'di ltar mi shes
pa dang/ shes pa ni mi zad pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir dben pa ste/ de bsan ma shes pa dang/ shas ra ra rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyi'i dgra bcom ba zag ba zad pa rishes pa dang ldan par mos so//
0sus pa/ btsun shAr 'bu khyod dgra bcom bzag pa zad pa/ shes ba dang bral bar mosasam/ lcas pa/ mos so// smras ba/ ji ltar mos/ smas pa/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid dang
bral ba lta/ de bsan dgra bcom kha zag pa zad b/ shes pa dang bral bar mos so// smras pa/ btsun bshA'i bu khyod dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ rnam par grol ba'i chos can du mos sam/
lcas la/ ji ltar mos/ smyos pa/ nyon mongs bzhad pa'i phyi'i ti/ 'di ltanyon mongs pa med na/ gang dag las rnam nga ra grol bar 'gyur te/ de ltar mos so// smras pa/ btsun bshAri'i bu
khyod sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su byung zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos sam/ lcas pa/ mos so// smras pa// ji ltar mos/ smras pa/ 'jam dbel bas mgyis ma khyab pa'i
dbudis lan skyob mdad/ gang la skyo ba de la mi snang bar 'gyur ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ga la yod de/ de ltar mos so// smyos nga/ btsun nga shA ri'i bu khyod sangs rgyas ni/
thams cad gcig yin par mos sam/ lcas pa/ mos so// smras pa/ ji ltar mos/ smas pa// 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyig lan tha dad pa med de/ de ltar mos so// smras pa/ btsun pa shA
ba'i bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yin par mosasam/ was pa/ mos so// lcas pa/ ji ltar mos/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal sa sa rgyas kyi zhing thams
cad ni mi zad pa nyid kyi zhing yin te/ deltar mos so// skyas ba/ btsun pa shA'a'i bu khyod chos thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang/ spang bar bya ba na/
[+ ]yin bdang/ mngon sum du bya ba ma yin pa dang/ bsgom bar bya ba ma yin par mos sam/ smras pa/ mos so// smras pa/ ji ltar mos/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal ngo bo nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su
mi shes pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis rang bzhin spong ba dang/ mngon sum du mi byed pa dang/ sgom pa'i ma byed pa dang/ skya bar mi byed pa dang/ 'gag par mi byed pa dang/ len par mi byed pa dang/ de'i
bar ma byed ba dang/ mtha' de ni mi gnas pa nyid de/ de ltar mos so// smras pa/ btsun bshApa'i bu khyod chos kyi dbyings na phung por mi 'dug kha'i dbyings yin ba dang/ chos gang yang skyo ba 'am/
'gag pa mad ba 'am/ chos gang yang phung bor 'dug pa med par mos sam/ smras pa/ mos so// smras pa/ ji ltar mos/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos gang yungaskya ba 'am/ 'gag pa'i m
phung bor 'dug ba mi dmigs te/de ltar chos so// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod shes rab gang yin pa de chos kyi dbyings yin la/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de shes rab yin te/ chos kyi
dbyings zhes bya ba'i ming yang thob pa dang/ de'i phyir yang dgra bcom pa zhes bya bar mos sam/ smras ba/ mos so// smras pa/ ji ltar mos/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal rtogs pa ra 'gyur ba'i
shes rab kyis dgra bcom pa nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes bar zad kyi/ chos kyi dbyis yongs su shes ba ni 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid dam/ zhe sdang gi bdag nyid dam/
gtatshig gi bdag nyid kyang m yanal/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang dgra bcom pa gzhan du med de/ de ltar mos so// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang
mnyam bar mos sam/ smas pa/ mos so// smras pa/ ji ltar mos/ lcasapa/ 'jam dpal 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyisan/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa ra na ngon nga ra rdzogs pa
sangs rgyas te/ de ltar mosaso// smras ba/ btsunang gA'i'abu khyod kyi yul ji tsam pa de tsam du/ khyod kyis lan btab pa legs so legs so// de tsam zhig khyod la dris kyis/ da ni rang gi
gnas su song zhig/ shAri'i bus smasel/ 'jam dpal 'dirtir 'di nyid ni bdag gi ji sride'aba'i khob gyi gnas yine no// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis/tshodang ldan bapagA'i bu la bka' stsal
ba A'i'i bu 'gisakyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'da'adzin ba 'am/ 'chang ba 'am/ klag nag 'am/ kun chub par byed pa des na/ spobs pa myur du thob par gyur
bo// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das nganadi lta lags te/ ji skad bka' stsal ra de bzhin du rigs bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi slad du/ chos kyi phyag rgya 'di gzhag pa de dag ni
0 @#// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kha bgyi ba pa gyis ba lags te/ de dag de ltar rig bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
ka bcom ldan 'das tshes kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming tsalags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan ba shA ra'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal

lamaM to/ shAri'i bu de'i phyi'i khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dbaba gzhon nur gyur pas zhus nas ngas lan btab pa zhes bya bar zung zhige/ chos kyi dbyings zhes bya bar yang zung zhig g.yang/
dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba dang/ ni bo tsha'i mtha' zhes bya bar yang zung zhige/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo dag tshes kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin ba dang/ 'chang ba dang/
klog ba dang/ kun chub bar byed ba dang/ sgom pa dang/ sbyor ba la brtson bar gnas pa de dag ni mi bo che dang 'dra ba yani// mi skya ba'i chos rnams la'ang bzodapa myur du thob par 'gyur ro//
gzhan dgala'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par skyed bar 'gyur 'o// chos nyung du kun chub par byas pas kyang chos mang po ston par 'gyur ro// spobasab mi chod par yang 'gyur ro/
sku/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri bar bcas pa'i/
'jig rten yi redas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhungs bal mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa'i n po ma'i mtha' zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
mkhan bo pradz+wa bar ma dang/ zhun gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ga shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#// rgya gar skad du/ A
shesha tsan ti brod+ma ba re byed tshanA ma mahAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags bams pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po//
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa'i 'od ma'i tshalan/ dgu

slong stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i de/ slong gi dge 'dunachen bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang thabs cig tu bzhugs// thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon bar khag
pa/ gzungs thab ba/ spobs pa thogs pa med nga/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ mngon par shes pa rnam par rol cing spobs pa ma 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa la mkhasab/
mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams la 'di lta sta/ gzhon nur gyur pa 'jam dpal dang/ gzhon nur gyur pa lag rin po che dang/ gzhon nur gyub lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang/ gzhon nu
gyur pa rin po che dpal dang/ gzhon nur gyur ba nam mkha' mdzod dang/ gzhon nur gyur pa sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ gzhon nur gyur pa dra ba can
gyi 'od dang/ gzhon nur gyur pa rnam par bsgyings pa dang/ gzhon nu gyur ba dpal gyi snying bo dang gzhon nur gyur ba bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang/ gzhon nur gyur ba pad+ma bkod pa
dang gzhon nur gyur ba song gdang/ gzhon nur gyur ba zla 'od dang/ gzhon nu gyur pa zla ba'i zer gyi 'od dang/ gzhonam gyur ba blo gros mchog dang/ gzhon nur gyur ba rgyan thams cad bkodang/
! drang/ bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug la 'di lta sku/ bzang skyong dang/ 1 dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang/ 2 ded dpon mchog dang// mis byin dang/ 9 phug sbas dang/ chus/
byin dang/ dbang byin dang/ 7 dbang pos byin dang/ rA bla ma'i blo gros dang/ []khyad par blo gros dang/ 'o blo gros 'phel dang/ 11mthong ba don yod dang/ 1'ashin tu yang dag zhugs dang/ 13

rab kyi rtsal rgyas rnam par gnon pa dang blo gros mtha' yas dang/ brtson pa ma gtong ba dang/ nyi ma'i snying po dang/ sa 'dzin dang/ de lta bu la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cu rtsa
gnyis dang/ rgyal bo chen po bzhi dang/ brgya byin lha'i debang bo la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang mtshom dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan
ba 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang/ tshongs pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i 'os kyi lha brgyad stong dang/ de ma yin pa gzhan gzi brjid che ba/ gzi brjid che ba'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/
driwa dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang ya ngathabag cig ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas
bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston to/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur ba dra ba can gyi 'od bla gos phrag pa gci/tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas//
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thalamo sbyar ba btud de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tugayo bar byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
kun gyi sems can thams cad la bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadatses gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhub lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyi na/
bdagabcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang
chub sems dpa' dra bcan gyi 'od la 'di yodaces bka' stsal to// dra ba can gyi 'od khyod tse ded ci 'dod ba de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang/ sa pa de dang de nyid lung bstan pas ngas khyod
kyi sams rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan

[A] 'das kyi sku ni blta bas chogamashes ba kha dog nyi ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bas lhag pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gang de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku blta ba 'am/ brtagapag nus pa 'dini ngo
mchog to snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das yang dag nid bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba 'am/ rtog pa de dag thams cad nasosargyas kyi mthu'o snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

zla stsal pa/ dra ba mgyi 'od ji skad zer ba de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas skabs ma phye bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ba 'am brtags par mi nus so// de ci'i phyi'i zhu na/ dra ba can gyi 'od du
bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par bkod ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer yod de/ 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs ba'i skul lta zhing rtogs la/ de dag gi mig gi debang bo
'ang nyams bar ma 'gyur ro// dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer yod de/ 'od zer des reg ba'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshags pa la kun
'dri zhing phyir 'dri bar yang byed do// drab can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer yodade/ 'od zer des reg ba'i sems can rnams 'khor los sgyur ba'i

rgyal po'i srid thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la kun 'dri'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'od zer dag ba'i rnam pa bkod ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin thob par bya/
ba'i phyi'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa la kun 'dri'o// 'od zer bdag po thob pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar bya ba'i phyi'i/ de bzhin gshegs
bal kun 'du'o// 'od zer nyon mongs pa med par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la nyan thos kyi thog pa kun 'dri// 'od zer rtse gcig pa
dban pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des reg ba'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa kun 'dri// 'od zer thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su dbang bskur ba
thob pa zhig bya ba'i 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la theg pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi theg pa kun 'dri'o// 'od zer khyad bar du 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des de bzhi/
gshugs ba byon pa 'am bzhud ba'i zhabs kyi mthal gyis sems can gang la reg ba de dag shi 'phos ma thag tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jige rten du skya'o// rgyan thams cad bkod ba zhes bya ba'i/
'od zer de/ de bzhin gshags ba grong dugshegs pa na 'byin te/ der de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od des sems can su dag larig pa de dag thamasacad bde ba'i mchog dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rgyan/
thams cad bkod ba'ang grong khyer der 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa
[A ]rab tu g.yo bar byed do// bde ba ston ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyisems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal med par byed do// 'od zer byams pa las 'phag/
pa zhes bya ba des ni/ byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can rnams gcig la gcig za ba med par byed do// 'od zer rab tu sim par byed pa zhes bya ba des ni/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i/
zla/ sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal med par byed do// dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i 'od sder des n/ sems can mdongs pa'i rnams mig thob par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i rjes
su 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des n sems can don ba rnams rna ba thob par 'gyur ro// rnam par smongs ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des n/ samasacan m dgu ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas pa
rnams dag ba bcu'i las kyi lam thob bar 'gyur ro// ngo tshashes ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des na sems can myos pa'i rnanas dran pa thob par 'gyur// med par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer/
des n/ sems can log par lta ba can rnams yang dag par lta ba thob par 'gyur ro// rab gtong ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des na sems can sor sna can rnams gtong ba thob bar 'gyur ro//

yongs su gdung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des na sems can ngan pa'i ngang tshul can rnams tshul khrims thob par 'gyur ro// phan pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des na sems can gnod bar sems
ba rnams bzod ba des pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'bar ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dun/ sems can le lo can rnams btson 'grus thob par 'gyur ro// rtse gcig pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni/
sems can dran pa nyams pa rnams bsam gtan thob bar 'gyur ro// ye shes zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des ni/ sems can 'chal pa'i pi shes rab can rnams shes rab thob pa ra 'gyur ro// snyog pa med
pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dusan/ sems can ma dad pa rnams dad pa thob par 'gyur ro// kun 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer des na/ sems can thos pa nyung ba rnams thos pa thob par 'gyur ro// srid pa dang
