srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni nor bu rin po che thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba rdo rngatshogs kyi nor bu 'an po mo chen po zhig yod de/ de nyim bdun shar nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig

rten gyi bar du 'od zer byung yang 'ani po chad tshig par ma 'gyur te/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na rgya mtsho chen po yod paderanor bu 'an po rna de der 'pho bar 'gyur
te 'od srungs gang nor bu'an po chad rgya mtsho chen po gzhan du ma 'phos par 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i tshig par 'gyur bde na gnas pa ma yin zhing go skabs med/ de ni gnas med do/
'od srungs de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de lta bu de dag kyang dam pa 'chos yongs su zad par gyur te/ 'jig rten gnas bar dam pa ma yin pa'i chos bdun byung ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
gzhan du 'pho bar 'gyu'o// bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mu stags can gyi gnas dang/ sdig pa'i grogs ngos yongs su zin pa dang/ log ba'i sbyor ba dang/ gcig
la gag 'tsho ba'i sbyor ba dang/ lta ba'agyur pa thibs po dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'joms par byed pa dang/ ma thob cing mngon par ma rtogs pa ste/ dam pa ma yin pa'i tshes
bdun po de dag 'jig rten gnas par byung ba de ni sems can rnams snod ma yin pa'i shes nas skyes bu dam pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du 'pho bar 'gyur te//
sangs rgyas mthong ba dang/ dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yodzas su 'bab pa dang yang ma 'bral bar 'gyur ro//
'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po la rten cing sems can tshad med pa dang/ gnas so// 'od srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la rten cing sems can tshad med nga
dag phun sum tshogs pa gsum la gnasaso// gsum gang zhe na/ lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang/ ma'i phun sum tshogs pa dang/ mya ngan las 'dus pa'i phun sum tshogs pa ka
'od srungs 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho chen ponesems can gzhan dag gas btung bar mi nusaso// 'od srungs de bzhin du skyes bu dam ba de dag gis gang chos bstan pa de dag kyang pha rol
gyi rgol ba rnams kyis btung bar mi nus so// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dbar na rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nasems can gnas pa de dag ni chu gzhan ma tshol kyi/ de nyid la 'thung
ho 'od srungs de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang gzhan gyi don lta bas chos kyi 'o mi 'byung gi/ rang byung gi ye shesakyi chos kyi 'o 'thung ngo// de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs
chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho[&]na bo'i gting ngam tshad gzung bar nus kyi/
nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi skyes bu dam pa de dag ga gting ngamatshad gzung bar n mi nus te/ de bsanasmyos bu dam pa de dag sems nam
mkha' dang mtshungs zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi rgya mtsho chen bo rnams
kyi gting ngam tshad gzung bar nus kyi/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis skyes bu dum ba blo gros mchog rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan ba de dag gi gting mi
tshad gzung bar ni ma nus so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'dig gsungs so// ji ltar chog mingezhes par chu chen gter// 'bab chu thams cad kun
gyi chu tshol ba// de bzhin de rnams 'di la chos tshol kyang// rtag par chos kyis chog par 'gyur ba med// ji ltar ji snyad chu mang rab bsdus kyang// 'di la rgya mtsho 'grabs gang/
gang gyur mod// dam pa'i chos thos nas kyang chos kyi dbus// shin tu 'phel zhing 'grib par mthong ba med// ji ltar dri med rgya mtsho chu sdud kyang// rtog pa can gyi 'bab chu der
dam 'bag/ de bzhin thub mkhas spyad pa spyod pa yang// de dag rnam dag nyon mongs mi sdud do// ltar rgya mtsho chen po lus chung bas// zang cang gting yas
bas na ma dpog pa/ de bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho'i ye shes kyang// pha rol rgol ba rnams kyis dang ga mi nus// ji ltar rgya mtshor 'bab nga 'a 'bab chu rnams// rnam pa sna tshogs dwag/
kyang r gcig 'gyur// de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs chos thos nas// de dag rnam par grol bar regacig 'gyur// ji ltar chu 'dzin rgya mtsho chen po ni// skye bo gcig gi don phyir mi gnas te//
de bzhin byang chub tu yang zhugs ba dkaM/ de dag 'gro ba kun la phan phyir zhugs// ji ltar rgya mtsho rin chen dbyings yin zhing// de la gnas nas nor bu rin chen 'byung// de bzhin rini
chen 'byung gnas sems can mchog/ de dag las ni rin chen gsum 'di'i 'byung// ji ltar rnam par mi rtog rgya mtshon// rtag par rin chen rnam pa gsum 'byung ste/ de bzhin de dag
chos rnams ston pa yang// theg pa gsum gyis sems can dag par 'gyur// ji ltar 'bab pa dang ni 'gram nyid nas// rgya mtsho chen po mthar gyis gzhol ba ltar// de bzhin sems can
mchog rnams kun mkhyenagazhol// sems can rab tu 'grol phyir rtag tubartson// ji ltar rgya mtsho'o dang mi gnas te// de dag gi ni ma 'as chos 'di yin// de bzhin byang chub/
mchog la zhugs pa yang// dman ba'i theg pa dang ni gnas mi byed// ji ltar rgya mtsho las byung rinaman ni/ rin chen sdud ces bya bas bsngags pa// srug pa'i bskal pa byung
yang ma tshig ste// de yang 'jig rten 'jig tshe gzhan du 'gro// de bzhin dri ma mad pa'i chos 'jig tshe// brtson 'grus mchog ldan de dag 'bad cing 'dzani// snod min 'jig rten
chos min 'dod riges// mkhas pa rgyal ba gzhan gyi drung du 'gro// nam zhig bsngags pa'i bskal ba byung gyur to// mig mtshodang lteng ka skam par 'gyur// rgya mtsho 'di ni phyi nas
skam par 'gyur// stong gsum chen po 'di yang rab tu 'jig/ nyi ma'i stod la nye bar gnas pa yi// de la mchog tu bya ba'i chos nub pa// du tshe 'di'i nas mas can mchog chos 'di/
lus dang srog kyang bor nas srung bar byed// bde gshegs 'dus na'ang rtag par bag byed pas// de dag rnams la chos 'di ma 'jog go/ de ltar de rnams bsam pa'i ng rnam par
dag/ chos la gnas share spyod pa rtag par spyod// ji ltar rgya mtshos mas can tshad med gnas// sems can gcig gi don du ma 'dug pa// de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad
rnam sgrol phyir// grags pa chen bo 'di dag rab tu 'jug/ 'jig rten khams 'di rgya mtsho jisnyad pa// ma lus pa ra ni tshad rnams shis rung yang// rgyal ba de dag kun gyi spyod
pan/dgra bcom rang rgyal dag gse shes mi nus// ma lus phyogs kyi nam mkha'i dbyings rnams kyang// mchog rnams kyis na tshod gzung nus srid kyi//
nam mkha' thas kyang lhag ba de dag gi yos tshad nams kyang gzung ma nus// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtul brtan zhing// gang dag 'jig rten ma lus dgrol
ba'i phyir// rgyu cha yangs ba'i sems rab gzhol byas pas// 'od srungs de dang mtshungs med ga la lhag/ de dag rin chen 'byung gnas rgya mtsho 'dra// de dag bsod nams yin
la bsod nams zhing// de dag dpyad pa'i rgyal po sman pa'i mchog/ sems can yun ring na ba thar par byed// de dag gnas yin skyabs dang dpung gnyen te// skyob pa sgronan de
btsun 'od byed pa// skye boados pa rnams kyi mig skyidar// de thob pas ni de dag bdud rtsi 'thob// de dang de dag chos kyi rgyal mchog 'bul// de rnams brgya byin don mang sams
pa sta// tshangs pabasam gtan bzhal gnas pa yin// de dag tshangs nga 'a chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// de dag ded dpon mkhas pa 'dren pa ste// log pa 'i lam du gnas la lam ston
pa[}]de dang de dag bdud 'jom dpa' bo ste// soms can dam pa byang chub snying por gnas// de dag chos dkar tshad yod zla ba bzhin// de dag 'od zer mngon 'phags nyi ma 'dra//
0/ sprin lta bu yang tshad med blo grogs shing// 'jig rten gsum du bdud rtsi'i char pa 'bebs// de dag song gi lta bur 'jigs skyon med// glang po che ltar tu dul ba'i sems// de
dga'i rab ri bo 'dra mtshungs te// de dag pha rol rgol bas ma thub bo// de dag rnam par dang ba chu bzhin te// rtag tu bstan par dka' ba ma dang 'dra// de dag rlung ltar rtag tu chags mad
cing// sa dang 'dra bar tho ba rab tu sbyangs// gnod sams nga rgyal ba ba phrag dog bral// de dag rtswa 'am shing ltar rtog pa med// 'jig rten chos rnams brgyad pos mges shing/ da
dag tshul khrims rnam dag pad+mabazhine// de dag u dum wa ra ma tog ltar// dge zhing bskal pa bya bar sgra thos dka'// de dag rkang gnyis gtso byas pa gzo// de dag sangs rgyas
rigs la gnas par brtson// de dag snying rje che zhing brtul zhugs brtan// byams la gnas dang dga' la mngon par 'phags// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la btang snyoms shing//
rtag tu rgyal ba dag ga nog rnams tshol// de dang de dag sbyin pas khyad nga ra song// ngashes tshul khrims la yang rab tu gnas// de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis gcig tu dpa'// brtson
'grus 'phags shing rtag tu mthu dang ldan// de dag bsam gtan mngon par shes la mkhas// de dgatshad mad zhing du 'phrul gyis 'gro// thubab dam mchog la yang chos nyan cing/ [}]
[ri ]// ji ltar thos pa dag kyang ston par byed// ji ltar 'du mos rnam par 'grol ba yang// skya bo dag gi spyod pa de dag shes// ji ltar mos pa mkhas shing rtogs pa ste/
tshes nAn tanasnying por byed cing mu stags thob// 'di rnams tshogs pa las na 'di skya zhes// de dang de dag chos kun rab tu shes// de dag rgyun la mkhas shing rtogs pas// mtha' gnyis
lta ba sngangs shang mnyan la dga'// chos 'di gang nas 'osangashing gar 'gro zhes// de dag chos la tshul bzhin rnam par lta// chos kun 'os pag yan byung ba min// gnas pa tshes nying mtshungs

par rab tu shes// ji lta ji ltar 'dus byas rdzun du mthong// de lta de ltar snying rje can du 'gyur// mi bde nyon mongs skya bo sdug bsngal te// de dag thar par bya phyir spyad pa spyod// nga dang nga
sa[]zhes ni rnam thartags nas// byis pa mi mnyam pa la brtson pas spyod// chos de yang dag ma yin shes nas ni// lta ba spangs ba'i phyiren chos pa spyod// bdag med bdag tu mi
sdug sdug par to// sdug bsngal bde bar mi rtag rtag par yang// sems 'og so so'i skyo bo rnams la ni// 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' yang yod ma yin// de dag 'og nga 'i sbyor
ba de shes nas// 'di lo sems can mang dang gang zag med// gang la bdag sdug rtag bad mad pa yi// yang dag sbyor ba la yang rnam par sgom// 'od srungs de yi yon tan
d+ha 'di brjod pa// sa ya rdul phran ji bzhin phyogs tsam ste// byang chub sems dpa' yongs dag spyod yul gang// de dag yang shas bsngags pa mtha' yas so// stong gsum 'jage rtsa
mchod pa ci yod nga/ kun gyise byang chub sems dang 'di la mchod// de las lhag par yang ni mchod 'os te// rgyal ba'i thugs sras dag na phyir mi ldog/ gang rnams sangs rgyas 'gyur
bar brtson ldan pa// de dag gis ni nga dang ma byon dang// gang yang mya ngan las 'dus pa'i rgyal ba dang// ma lus phyogs bzhugs rim gro byas pa dang// de nas tshangs pa khyad
par sams kyas ni/ 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis phyi ma'i tshe dus
lnga brgya pa tha ma la rab tu spyod pa dang rgyas bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gsol ba thob cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang/
'jam dang 'a gzhon nu gyur pas/ tshangs pa khyad par soms la 'di skad ces smras so// tshangs dang de jisnyam dus mas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos gang de bzhin gshegs
pas byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i chos gang yang de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bstan tam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam dang la gyis smyos nga/ tshangs
bde lta bas na 'du la brjod pa med pas na/ chos thams cad byin gyis ma brlabs pa ste/ de ni nub bar ma 'gyur zhing bsrung bar bya ba ma yin no/
tshangs pa gang chos gang la'ang byin gyis brlab par 'dod pa de na nam mkha' byin gyis brlabs par 'dod de/ tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gang yang khas len na de ni chos
ts+tsha sma ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyi'i shi na/ byang chub sams dpa' skya pa thams cad las phyi'i ldog nga ni rtsod pa med nga ltar byed ba yin no// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'di
b+hU snyam du 'khor 'di'i chos 'di ston to snyam du sems na/ de dag la chos thes pa mad do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ thos pa med pa ni chos thos pa'o// smras pa// 'jam dpal thos
pa med pa ni chos thos pa'o// zhes bya ba las bsams te de skad zer/ smras pa// tshangs pa mag dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyis thos pa med pa zhachos
[& ]thos pa lta/ gang skye mched de dag nas gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ rig dang/ chos la ma 'dzag pa de dag ni chos thos pa'o// de nas 'khor de nas lha'i bu stong phrag sum cu rtsa
gnyis dang/ dge slong stong phrag lnga dang/ dag slong ma sum brgya dang/ dag bstan brgyad brgya dang/ dge bstan ma brgyad brgya de dag thams cad kyis 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa 'di thos nas mi sku
[n}]pa'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob ste/ tshig kyang 'di skad du 'jam dbal de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ thos pa mad pa ni chos shes pa 'o zhes 'dzor te/ de nas tshangs
ba khyad par sams kyis/ bzod pa rab tu thob ba'i byang chub sems de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos sam/ rgyas pa// tshangs pa thos pa mad pa'i tshul
gyis shes so// smasag khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji lta bur shes/ smras pa// ji ltar shes pa mdu nga dang/ rnam par shes pa med pa de ltar ro// smras pa/ khyed kyis
chos gang rab tu thob pas bzodab rab tu thob par 'gyur/ smras pa/ chos thams cad rab tuthob nga med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa// chos kyi rnam grangs 'du de ltar rtogs par bya/ smras pa/
gos bar bya ba med pa'i tshulargyas so// smras pa/ sa bstan pa 'di khyed kyis mngon sum yin nam// smras pa// tshangs pa tshesatsams cad bangag dang gzhan med pa'i phyi'i mngon sum yin no//
de nas 'khor de nyid du lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i rtog ces bya ba 'dus par gyur pa des/ tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces smras so// tshangs pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'du las chung
du nan bar 'gyur ba de dag gal te de bzhin gshegs pas lung ma bstan kyang kho bos de dag blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tulung bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
tshangs pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'bras bu dang sa bon chud ma gzon pa'o/ 'phags pa yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba'o// dag
ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par skyed pa'o// bdud dang phyir rgol ba tsha gcod pa'o// bar du gcod pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// dang ba skyed par byed pa'o// dad pa dang ldan
ba rnams dag 'a zha nge mgu bar byed pa'o/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu yongs su gzung ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par bsus
pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni gcig tu nges pa sa phyir ma ldog pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po la ma su ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas
kyi chos rnams kyi bden pa'i 'byung gnas so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos gyi 'khor la skor ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'gyod pa'i rnams sol bar byed pa'o// chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'dzags pa'i she na rnam par sbyong bko/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni thar par 'dod ba rnams kyis legs par thos pa'o// chos kyi rnams grangs 'di ni gzungs
'dod pa rnams kyis legs par gzung ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bsod nams 'dod ba rnams kyis 'gas bar rab tu bstan pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos/
[2/ ]'dod pa rnams kyis legs par srung ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'du ni mya ngan las 'das nga ra 'gro ba'i phyir grangs ni da nga 'o/ dachos kyi rnam grangs 'ad ni pha rol rgol ba/
dmags pa can gyis ma 'phrogs pa 'o// chos kyi rnam gras 'dun sbyin pa ra 'os pa rnams dang 'thun pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di na na khas pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'o//
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lta ba ngan pa dang bral bas shes rab skyod pa 'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni gti mug 'jon sa par byed pas yi nyes skyid pa 'o// chos kyis rnam grangs
'di ni yi ga'i tshig nges pa ni shin tu nges da ni tshig go/ das kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'bru 'brel bas legs par bstan pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni don dam pa yang dag par ston
pas don yang dag bar skyid nga ko/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos brjod pa rnams kyis yongs su ma btang ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shes pa dang ldan nga rnams kyis ma
bor ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni nor 'dod pa rnams kyis gtor ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'du nakun gdungs pa rnams yongs su gdung ba med par byed nga 'o// chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di ni byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyis ma nyam pa nyid skyed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni la lo can rnams kyi brtson 'grus skyod pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni brjed
ngas pa rnams kyis bsam gtan skyong pa 'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ne shes rab 'chal pa rnams la snang bar byed pa'o// tshangs pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nas nigs
rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu legs par gnas so// de nas lha'i bu des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i bsngags pa bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam
ba drug tu g.yos so// bcon ldan 'das kyis kyang lha'i bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gso' to//
bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag las chos kyi rnam grangs sngon gles sam/ bcon ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// tshangs pa lha'i bu 'dis sangs

rgyas bye ba khrag khrage phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos te/ tshangs pa lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i tog 'di bka' ba brgya stong phrag bzhi decu rtsa gnyis na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zin
chen ldan du de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang yang de'i bar du sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag thams cad la'ang mnyes par byed par
'gyur/ bkur stir byed par 'gyur te/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ing thos par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dgeslong dang/ dge slong ma dang/
dge bstan dang/ dug bstan ma dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za gang dag gis chos kyi rnam gras 'du la bzod pa rab tu thob pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gsheg
ba rin po che bkod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'garten gyi khams de na ldan du skya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dri ma med ba'i tog gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'dus gang bdag ni byang chub mi 'tshol/ mi smon mngon par mi dge'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi dmigs mi sams/ mi rtog/ rnam pa ra ma rtogan/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan
'das kyis bdag la lung bstan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa' pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar skyes bu la la zhig gas rtswa dang/ shing dang/ yal ga dang/ lam dang/ 'dab ma dag tshur bcug

nas 'di skad du rtswa dang/ shing dang/ yalag dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma dag ma tshig cage sa smras na/ de de'i dbang gis mi 'tshig pa ma yin no// lha'i bu de bzhin du 'di ltar byang chub sa ma sa dba'i
byang chub la mngon pa la ma dga'/ mngon par mchags/ mi dmigs/mi 'dod/ma smon/ma sams/ rnam par mi rtog kyang sangs rgyas thams cad lung ston te/ lha'i bu 'onakyang byang chub
sems dpa' gang byang chub la mngon bar mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags/mi dmigs/ma 'dod/ mi smon/ mi sams/ rnam par mi rtog pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lung ston to//
[s ]nga@#// de nas 'khor dar lha'i bu lnga brgya tsam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon pa ram chags/ mi

[A+ ]dmigs/ mi 'chol/ masmon/mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdaganag bag med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lungami bstanato// de nas sangs rgyas kyi thusasteng gi/

bar sna nga la sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad nurtsa bzhi mthong// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis de dag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de
dag gsi 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon pa ramachags/ mi dmigs/ mi 'dod/ mi smon/
mi sams/ mi rtog/ rnam pa mi rtog pa de byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur rozhes legs dar gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar ti/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis stong gi phyogs na/sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad
skurtsa bzhi mthong sta/ de bzhin gshags pa de dag thams cad bdag gal byonamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to// danas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
pos gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa dang/ yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs
dkyi bucho gang dag go cha chen po bgos pa dag gi rna lam du gad 'bar 'gyur ba dang/ rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi las skyes/8shing byung ba rnams kyi dbang du mi mchi ba dang//
de dag la bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'os su gzung zhing go chachen po bgos ti/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub yongs su mi ltos par byin gyis brlab par gsol/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal debasan chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa dang/ yun ring du gnas bar
bya ba'i ra/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnodasbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lcam yin dang nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am cidang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ grul bum 'bongs pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa dang/
sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad kyisanyan// rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig de bcangs pas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chog sna bdalha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang gnam
maba' lding dang mi macu dang/ lta'aphya chen po dang/ rgyu la bum rnams kyis yos su bsungab rab tu thob ste/ rigasakyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bumo de dag lamamam lam log par song ma/
gtsug lag khang du song ngag/ gnas khang du song ma/ 'chag pa la zhub/sa sam/ 'khoragyi nang du song yang rung ste/ srung bar byed do// spobs pa skyed par byed/ dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/
bya// rtogs pa'i stobs bskyed pa nye bar sbyor te/ de la pha rol gyi rgol ba 'am/ phas kyi dag gragasal ba dag gis grugs kyang red par mi 'gyur ro// de dran zhing shes bzhin
du ldang bar 'gyur/ 'chag pa/ra 'gyur/ 'dug par 'gyuraM/ nyal bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de la rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di ltasto/ ud d+hu re juts+tsha re/ man+dataTe
tigatsare shi la li/ hi li mi la/ thi li thimi li/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ a bdo ze/ ba ta ko/ kha khar/ thare/ khar ke/ A sAn ni/ ga ti ma hi'/ mAn nan tan mA naso ba gan// ser ru te/

ra bu ba ga te/ sin d+hu le na mo bud d+he byu datsA rid rta/ na mo d+ham ya/ nan tani/ na maHsang glu ya/ bA hita pA de/ phyu pa shAnatAni/ sarba pA pA ne ma tI/ sarbab+hu te bya/ sed rkyan rdo shob h+pha batho/ ma

hA rin+ti/ pra shasta/ tadatra ti na te sarba b+hu tagraha/ nam sarba bud d+hi sh+tsa/ sidatsunatu ma man tra pa dA sA tA/ 'jog dpal rig pa dang snga gsakyi tshig 'di byang chub sems dad 'a gang dgachos kyi rnam
hi/ grangs 'di la brtson pa/ rtag tu shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ mi rgod pa/ khes pa mod pa/ soms mi g.yasar// kun tu spyod pa gtsangab/ sogs pa dang bral ba/ chog shes pa/ ba//
mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ba/ 'du 'dzinyungab/ lus dang sems dben pa// byams pa dang snying rje la mngon par dga'ob/ chos la dga' zhing mos pa/ bden pa'i tshig la rab tu
gnas pa/ mi sla ba/ nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad/
bsUs pa la mngon par dga' ba/ redapa dngam red pa la sems mnyam pa// mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa// 'khor bas 'jigs shing skrag pa/ sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la sems
mnyom pa// 'du shes sna tshogs dang bral ba/ lus dang srog 'dor ba dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba/ spyod pa dang cho ga phun sumatshogs pa/ tshul khrims dang sdom pa la mngon par dga' g
bzod pa dang des da mang ba/ ngan du zer ba bzod pa'i rang bzhin can/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa// sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ni yod ces bya ba la brtson pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa khro gnyer dang
bral ba/ gsong por smra ba/ nga rgyal bcom pa/ des pa/ 'grogasan bde ba/ de lta bu'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos 'jam dpa la sngags kyi tshig
'di reb tu gdon par bya'o// 'jam dpal de ltar na chos smra ba de tsho 'di nyid la stobs skyed pa bcu rab tu 'thob bo// bcu gang zhen/ mi brjed pa'i chos nyid pas dran pa'i stobs skyed pa dang/

chos rab tu 'byed pa la mkhas pas blo gros kyi stobs skyed pa dang/ mdo sde'i tshul khong du chud pas rtogs pa'i stobs skyed pa dang sdom da dang spyod pa mi gtong bas dad pa'i stobs spyod pa dang/ bdag dang gzhan
[0]u@#// srung bas ngo tshashes shing khrel yod pa'i stobs skyed pa dang/ shes rab lo sa su rdzogs pas thos pa'i stobs skyed pa dang/ thos da thams cad yongs su 'dzin pas gzungs kyi/
stobs skyed pa dang/ sas rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yongs su bzung bas spobs ba'i stobs skyed pa dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob pas zab mo'i stobs skyed pa dang/ myur du thams cad mkhyen

pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pasam skyaba'i chos la bzodad skyed pa ste/ 'jam dpal spyod pa la zhugs pa'i chos skya ba gangarig pa dang/ sngags kyi tshig 'di rab tu 'don po de ni stobs skyed pa de bsu/

rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'dibcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po bzhi skrag cing ba spu langs par gyur te/ g.yog brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bkol te// bcom ldan 'das
mi bdag nag rgyal po chen po bzhi da 'di dag ni rgyun du zhugaser/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'asgrub par bgyid pa sta/ gnyen bshes dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs
kyi bumo chos skya ba dang/ chos ston pa dang/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'chang ba dang/ klog pa de dag lo bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ spa bar bgyi'o//
de dag grong ngan/ grong khyer ram/ ltos sam/ stes kyi phyogs gang na gnas kyang rung/ khyim pa ma/ rab tu byung ba'ang rung ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi stobs dang
gnas/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi rim gro bgyi bar bdag cag spro'o//bsungab dang/ bskyab pa dang/ spro ba dang/ grubs pa dang/ gzhan gyis
gnod par mi bgyi zhing mi gtso bar bgyi ba'i slad du bodagazhag spro'o// bcom ldan 'dasas phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der dad ga tshod brgya bo ra
khor yug tu lha 'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gru'abum gyis glags mi rud do// de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag la bu
dang gnyen bshes dang/ []/bran dang 'kho rnams zhi mchis pa// de dang bdagacag grogs bcas pas// bdag po de dgarim gro bgyid// de nas rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis tshigs su bcad
pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bdaganichos kyi rgyal po 'i sa// chos las skyes pa chos kyi sprul// khyod kyi sras gang byang chub tu// zhugs pa de dag rim gro bgyid// de nas rgyal po chen
po yul 'khor srung gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas gsus pa'i mdo sde 'di// gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba rnams// de dag phyogs gnyi rnams su yang//
bdag gis kun tu bsrung bar bgyi// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi lus tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa// de la ci 'dra
mi 'os pa yi// de 'dra'i mchod pa bgyid par ni// sems can kun gyis mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'a// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bden pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba des rin po che sna bdun
paN+Na/ las byas pa'i gdugs gsol nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs las bdaganyid kyis// chos kyi rnam grangs gzung bar bgyi// pha rol la yang bstan de ra bgyi/
bdag gi bsam pa de 'dra'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdagasems dang// sngon gyi spyad pa ci 'dra mkhyen// ji ltar bdag gis sems 'dud pa// bdag ni 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'gyur// sangs
rgyas dang ga med slob da la// bdag gis gdugs 'di phul ba yis// bdag nithub pa khyod 'dra bar// spyi gnug bltar yang mi gdar 'gyur// sangs rgyas skyes bu dam pa yang// bdag gis
byams pas bltas pa yis// yongs su dag pa'i mig thob ste// rgyal bam pham blta bar bgyi// yachos pha rol phyin pa yi// ston pas de nas lung bstan te// khyodani 'di nas phyidusan// dga'/
ldan du yang skye bar 'gyur// dga' ldan nas shi 'phos nas// rgyal ba byams pa mthong bor 'gyur// bskal pa stong phrag nyi shurani// mchod pa byas nas 'byung bar 'gyur// khyodani rab tu byung nas
kyang tshangs par spyod pa rab spyad de// bskal pa bzang 'di'i gang byung ga/ bdag po de dag mthong bar 'gyur// thams cad la nang mchod byas te// tshas dar spyod pa spyad nas ni// bskal pa//
bye ba dru gzhun/ do nas khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni legs brgyan pa// rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba ni// byang chub sems dpa' sha stag la/ khyod ni chos rnams ston par
gyur// tsho yitshad na bskal par 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam chos kyang// ma 'as bsal ba phud du gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
lci'i dbang po brgya byin gyis g.yog brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'as bdag gis kyang chos skya ba mdo snga'adi 'chang ba de dag bsrung ba dang/ yongs
su gzung bar bgyi'o// bsnyen bkur dang rim gror yang bgyi'o// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'drib 'am/ klog pa der cinas kyang chos skya ba de'i stobs dang/ mthu dang/ chos kyi
mtshams sbyor ba spobs par 'gyur bar bdag 'khor dang bcas te chos zhan du mchi'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bu spyod byed ces bya ba de// doshal rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa de
bzhin gshogs pa la phul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// thub pa bdag 'dira mngon sum ste// ji ltar khyod kyis sngon sprad pa// de bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi/ ya
shesatshol bar bsgrub par bgyi// khyod kyis sngan chad ma stsal bar// yongs su ma btang ma mchis// bdog pa thamasacad gatong ba yi// bdag kyang rjes su bslab
[+ ]par bgyi// khyodakyis mdo sde 'disangani/u0f38/'jil rten mgon las mngon du blangs// yang dang yang du bshad par bgyi// bdag po khyed la bgyis pa gzo// mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba// de dag
rgyu bdag gi ston pa 'dra// bdag ni sangs rgyas chos 'tshol bas// da la rtag tu rim gro bgyid// dam pa'i chos rnams yongs srung ba// mgon po nyan thosami nus te// phyi dus 'jigs ba
zla chen po'i tshe// bdag gse gos su bsrung bar bgyi// mgon po bdag kyang dbugs dbyung gsol// lha rnams the tshom gcad du gsol// thub pa khyu mchog khyod 'dra ba// ji srid yun gyis
'grub par 'gyur// kun mkhyen ye shes mkhas pa yi// bde bar gshegs pas de lung bstan// nganitso 'dra de 'dra bar// khyod kyang rdzogs pa'is ngas rgyas 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba phrag
stong dang// bsko la ba bye ba brgya yi tshe// 'jig rten du nisangs rgyas 'gyur// ming ni ya zhes rang zhes bya// byang chupa zhi ba thob nas kyang// bdud rnams rab tu btul nas ni// sems can bye
ba phrag stong rnams// byang chub la yang 'god par 'gyur// de nas m mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan
la gnas pa'i ng btangalta/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par ston pa de la chos nyan dumachi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa ni 'di
las skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bstan bkur dang rim gro bgyi bar spro'o// de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gro bgyi bdang
mchod par 'os pa lags so// de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas 'di skadas gsol to// dge slong dang ni dge slong ma// dge bsnyen dang
ni dag bsnyenam// gang rnams mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa// skye bo kun gyi mchod rten de// gal te mdo sde 'di lan// sems can gcig 'ga'abatsudan yang// 'gro ba'i mgon do bdag spro ba//
chos smra ba de dag la// khri stan gang la de mchis te// mdosde 'di ni rab ston par// chos pa'i 'jig rten man chad du// ma tog dgram da ra bdag spro 'o// gang gi lag nas mdo sde 'di// phyi ma'i dus
na thos 'gyur ba// de la a la la zhes ni// legs smras legs zhes brjod par bgyi// gnamado sde 'di mchis par// ma yi phung pos gang ba yi// bye ba snyad kyi zhing brgyal nas// skyo mi 'tshal/
bar mchi bar bgyi// rin chen phung po ri rab tsam// dga' bzhin duni phul nas kyang// sangs rgyas kyi yang lam sbyong ba// mdo sde 'di yang mnyan par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
gal ba der dong stolkugs pa dang tsam ldan 'dasakya zhabla lamagabaphyag 'tshalanas 'daskad ces gsal/ kham rdzun langs nas khang bar
tshe rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu man bar 'du byas pas/ bdud sdig can dpung gi sto bas nga zhi dang/ bcom ldan 'das
las ka gas pa dang ma 'a'adasakyi 'bu 'am ga 'tshalas 'dis+sadaces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dbung dang bcag/ gagog dang bcas pa 'di ga re[L -]
zlo gshegs ba'i spyan sngar dam bcasate/ gang nachos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyurab 'i ljongs kyi rdzogs der chos nyan pa dang/ chos smab dag 'a bdud kyis mi bgyi ba'i stang du bsrung
zla ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ grwa bar pa nga ngagyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zeragaser gyi kha dog lta bu s sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyab pare mdzad de/ 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur pa la
zla'adi ska da ces bka' late// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos longs su 'dzin b do dag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de
bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis babs so// 'jam dad lachos kyi rnamagrangs 'di yun jisrid du 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir spyod par 'gyur ba yun de srid dudam pa'ichos nub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas
thum phran nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par gtor nas// tshig kyang 'di skad ces u ma ho chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'adzam bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas pa dang/ rgyas par gyur cig/
ces 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo dkyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ngam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das
bdag gis gzung ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang/ bsang ba dang/ bkag pa dang/ yang dag par rab tu bsten pa'i
phyir khyod la yongs su gtad do// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tas/ 'changangam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la ston tam/ yigar bris pa la mchod pa bgyid
na de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yi ga dang nges pa'i tshig ji sud kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa de snyad kyi de bzhin gshegs
pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang/ bzung nas kyang gzhan la ston pa dang/
klog pa de ni de bas kyang bsod nams ches mang du skye da do// kun dag 'bo gang gis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du bris te mchod
na de'i tsha'adinying lagater 'thob pa gzhu thob bo// bzhu gang zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan rab tu thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gter dang/ lha'i rna bas rab tu thos pas
chos nyan pa'i gter dang/ phyirami ldog pa'i dge 'dun rab tu thob pas/ dge 'dun mthong ba'i gter dang/ rin po che'i lag pa rab tu thob pas zad mi shes pa'i las srod kyi gter dang/
rgyu mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa sagazugs kyi gteradang/ g.yog mi phud pa/sa g.yog gi gter dang/ gzusarab tu thob pas thos pa'i gter dang spobs par b
tu thob pas dran pa'i gter dang/ pha rol gyi rgol banor gcod pas mi 'jigs pa'i gteradang/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams kyi gtararo// yang bcom ldan
'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa ya khrag khrig phrag bdunanu rtsa gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// sems can dpag tu med nga
byang chub la rab tu zhugs so// sems can tshad med pa'i ng len pa med par rnam par grol go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ni lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di riming
chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar zung zhig/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkodapa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ tshos ba khyad bar sems kyis kun dris pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ 'jam
dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal sa/ 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur ba dang/ tshangs pa khyad par soms dang/ bram zer shing sA la chen po lta
du'i bu mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'dra ba can gyi 'od dang/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po dang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ phyogs bzhu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' de dag dang/nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstodado//
phapa/sa patshas pa khyadang rasams kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhanango shAkya pra b+hadang/ d+harma pA la dang/ dzin mi tra dang/
zhu chen gyi lo ts+tshababan d+he d+harmAtA shI la dang/ bar zhus kyi lo tsA ba ban rnye de ban dra nIl dang/ ku ma ra shI la la sogs pas zhus te gtanal phab pa
rgya gar skadad deAr+ya ma kinanarA dzapa ri bredatsanA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi 'am ci'irgyal po ljonabs zhus pa zhes bya ba thog pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bam ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i'i la dag slong

sa drug khri nyis stong gi dag slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'dus pa bdun khrinyis stong thams cad kyang mngon
bar shes pa// gzungs thob pa// spobs pa chags pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa// dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogs pa dang/ mos pa dang/ ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel yodad// phun sum
tshogs pa// bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan zhing mi phyadang// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par du 'phags pa la zhugs ba/ bdag
nyid byang chub kyi sams mi 'dor ba/ sems can gzhan byang chub kyi sams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/ yang dag par sdom pa dang/ bzod pa dang/ des pa dang/
'phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ mas tshul khrims kyi rgyanagyis legs par brgyan nga/ sems can thams
cad la sems soms pa dang/ bzod pa dang/ des pa'i stobs kyis go cha shin tu bgos ba/ bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du brtson 'grus shin tu btsa mas ba/bsam la/tan
0 dang rnam par thar ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jugab dang/ mngon par shes pa'i ya rags kyis rnam par rtsen pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba la spobs pa chags pa med pa'i
shes rab dang ye shes la mkhas pa// lhun po'iri ltar sams g.yo ba med pa/ sa dang/ chu dang/ ma dang/ rlung dang/ ri ltar rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba dang bral ba/ byams pa chen po la
gnas te/ 'od zer thogs pa med pa// snying rje chen po ' gnas te/ rtag tu sems can la blta khur btson pa// dga' ba chen po la gnas te/ chos kyi kun dag la dga' ba dang ldan pa//
btang snyoms chen po la gnas te/ gnyis su med pa shes pa thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po red pa dang/ ma red pa dang/ grags pa dang/ ma grags pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ med pa dang
bde ba dang/ sngag bsngal las rab tu 'das pa/ phas kyi rgol ba ngan pa'i tshigs na gyi tshogs thams cad n tu rab tu 'joms pa/ bdud nyon mongs pa'i rgol ba bcom pa/ u dum
wa ra'i ma tog mthong ba ltar shin tu 'byung bar dka'ab/ gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa// yongs su chu na las 'das pa'i bar du
gtan du mdza' ba/ song go'i sgrachen po sgrogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dang mi 'jigs pa sgrogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/ mi 'khrugs par phyin par
lung bstan pa// ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa/ de kho na'i chos kyi tshul la brtson pa/ 'od kyis nyi ma dang thub mog mog por byed pa// phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa/
sas rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos dkon mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod bar yid la byed pa
sangs rgyas kyi zhingamatha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa// shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa la gnas pa'i blo dang ldan pa// mthong ba dang thos pa don yod pasa rnam par gnon pa// rtag par
go rgyun du sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la brtson pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu son pa// sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma
yin pa shes pas ni rigs par chos ston pa// sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya ba la mkhas pas// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi 'jug pa dang btags pa la bde
[5 ]blag tu mkhas pa// mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa med pa dang/ rgo ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med
pa la dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa// stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i chos
thams cad la mos pa// rnam par grolakha smon lam shin tu btab pa// sems can dang/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang/ smig rgyu dang/ rmi lam dang/ chu zla dang/ mig yor dang/ brag cha dang/
nam mkha' dang mtshungs par mos pa// sgra skad thams cad nges pa'i ga gis ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa// chos dang/ don dang/ nges pa'i tshig dang/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa//
'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po la rtog pa rtogs par khong du chud// 'ashugasachen po 'dzin pa'i stobs kunu la nye bar gyur pa// sha'i mig dang/ lha'i mig dang/ shes rab
kyi mig dang/ chos kyi mig dang/ sangs rgyas spyan gyi snang ba thob pa/ lamagyi yan lag gi tshogs kyi rashin tu bsags pa'i lam thams cad la 'jug pa rim shes la mkhas pa// byang chub
mas dnga'i sde snod snang ba la 'jug pa'i chog shos pa phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la
'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa// chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du gyur pa/ chos dakon mchog gi sgronama'adzin pa// sems can thams cad kyi sams kyi rgyud la
rnam par blta ba/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la rnam par lta ba shes pa la mkhas pa// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la nye bar gyur pa// sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi yishes
kyi bya ba so so'anye bar gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchogadang ldan pa'i yon tan rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa// bskal pa thams cad du bsngags pa yongs surjod
kyang mthar mi phyin pa 'astag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang/ dga' 'byung dung/ lab na rin po che dang/ rin po che ma rtog dang/ rin po che'i tog dang/
mthong dgar dang/ dga' ba'i blo gros dang/ mig gis mthong dga' dang/ sa 'dzin dang/ dga' zhing mchog tu dgo'abyed dang/ spyan ras gathigs dbang phyug dang/ mthuchan thob dang/ dpal
pa chen dang/ bdud thul dang/ me tog mnar ba'i dri dang/ rlung lha dang/ bden dga' dang/ mnyam lta dang/ mnyam mi mnyam ltadang/ kha la sgyur dang/ gsol ba ma btab pa'i sems can kun
gyi bshes gnyen dang/ byams pa dang/ 'brug sgra dang/ lhun po'i rtse mo 'dzin dang/ lcan po partsegs pa dang/ lcan po'i mchog dang/ 'od kyi tog dang/ 'od dar la dang/ sgronama'i
myu rgyal po dang/ mngon sum blo gros dang/ 'od kyis yang dag brgyan dang/ sna tshogs cod pan dang lha'i cod pan dang/ lha yul ba'i cod pan dang/ mdzes pa'i mig gis lta ba dang/ lag/
bzangs dang/ legs par basams pa goms pa dang 'khor lo rab gnas pa dang/ migayo rkang pas rnam par gnon dang/ rdo rjerkang pas rnam par gnon dang/ rkang pas 'jig rten/
[S]'a gsum rnam par gnon dang/ dga' spobs dang/ sdobs myur dang/ spobs pa mi 'chad pa dang/ spobs pa byin gyi rlabs dang 'jam sgra dang sems can thams cad tshims
byed dang/ du ba nan gyi 'od dang/ rgyal ba'i blo gros dang skya bar tshims phyed dang/ 'gro 'dzin dang lha'i rgyal pos mchod dang/ mchog gi blo gros dang/ thogs med sems dang/
sku ring blo gros dang/ mi bskyod pa dang/ dbag med na chonamadzod dang/ byang chub blo gros dang/ sna tshogs me tog dang/ lha'i ma tog rgyal po dang/ tshangs dbyangs dang/ bzang
skyong dang/ kona mchog 'byung gnas dang/ ded dpon bzang po dang/ mis byin dang/ chu lha dang/ 'jam dbyas dang/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chan po 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang/
tshangs pa dang 'jig rtan skyong ba dang/ de las gzhan ba lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phyechen
podang/ mi ma mi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bstan bkurabya ba dang/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur
[4s]@#/ ta radugago/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus pa des// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
chen po de 'dus par rig nas/ stan las las te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba/
byas nas/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon bar
bstod do/ 'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad// khyod ni 'jig rten don mdzad blo gros ldan// snang ba bar saShashing nyon mongs dri bsal ba// 'jig rten snang mdzad khyod lab/
'tshol la// sbyin la dgyes shing stobs gnu'i mchog mnga' ba// dul ba btul ba gdul bya'i b.rol phyin// bcom ldan lha dang mi dang krus mchod pa// gdul ba mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
rnamtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad pa// 'dom gang 'od zhi gsar gyi kha dog 'dra// dge ba'i mtshan gyis dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba// srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs 'joms shing// phas kyi rgol ba'i rgol 'joms mi g.yo ba// somasazhin gzhan gyi sems kyi stod la mkhas// thugs rje mchog ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
[44 ]dgra bcom rgyal po na mongs rdul bsal ba/ 'tsho ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims gnas// lha yi lha mchog dri med dri ma bral// pha rolatshogs 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde
gshagasazhi chen mchog tu dga' mdzad pa// dgon par rtag gnas rtag tu dgon par dges// rdul skyon gti mug rnyog pa mi mnga' ba// nam mkha'i mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshol go/
chu bo bzhi la bden bzhi bka' mchid gsung// mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyibaka' mchid can// 'gro ba'i don mdzad 'jig rten gsum rgyu ba/ 'khor lo zhabs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lta dang
ma yis mchod pa'i mthu bo che// mgon po lha yi dbang po bdud 'joms pa// mi dang lha klu tshog sakyis mchod pa yi// mi mchod dam de khyod la phyag 'tshol lo// rtag tu bden sdud dam pa'i chos la
dgyes// mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs// chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams (kha la sgyur// yon tan mthar byin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag
dang ldan tshongs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur 'jam pa'i gsung// dbyangs kyi yan lagarab tshul kuzhu rdzogs pa// bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal la// stong pa mtshan ma med cing smon dang bral
zab mo lta da12 shin tu rtogs par dka'// thar la 'jug par mkhas pa blo gros ldan// thar pa'i lamangos khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu la rten pa mkhas pa'i bcom ldan 'das// mtha' gnyis lta ba
rtag tu mi mang la ga/ las rnams rnam smin kho na'i 'bras bu gsung// lta ba'i mun bro la khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ gang nas ma khyon gang du'ang gnas su ma lag//
rtag tu bden pa'ichos rnams rab gsungab/ smig rgyu sgyu bzhin nga yirami mnga' ba// dag pa'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skye ba mi skyo gang du'ang skya ma lags// skye dang 'jig dang
gang du'ang mi bas dang// chos kyi gnas nyid ji ltari ba/nas la gnas// gnas la mi gnas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin kho na de bzhin yang dag gsung// rtag tu mig po de bzhin nyid la zhugs/
lhun po'i rgyal mtshan rdo rje'adra ba'i sku// mi g.yo ri'i ba mtshungs la phyag 'tshalal// skrun dban zhingamanyam thugs blo ldan ng// grags chen thar yis 'jig rten gsum du grags// skyes bu
sa mchog la zhu ba zhus pa rnams// 'jig rten zla bas myur du skabs dbyar gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan po la cod pan gyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/
'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstodanaso/ 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs khyo na/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bem ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
[4/]dba' chen po lha'i cod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang/ ngas/
dribasi ba de dang de'i lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dang rasams dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
la legs so zhes gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyanacing/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sobs pa sna
tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams lags/ jiltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa ngashes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang/ mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so ni rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams lags
ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sums can thams cad kyi sams kyi spyod pa shes pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sams dang 'a rgyu dang/ bya ba dang/ las
kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar n byang chub sems dpa' spyan pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams logs/ ji ltar na byang chub
nga@#// sams dbang tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar n byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub
sams dpa' brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shos
rad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar n byang chub sems du ba man da ra shes pa la ni nyanas la
sgyu rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dada' brgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar
na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la/ ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams
lags ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khorab la'ang blta la/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi gnos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khams sna tshogs
la'ang rnam par blta la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don yang mi 'dor la/ gnod par yang kun tu dga' ba rnams lags//
ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sod nams kyi nor dang ldan la thabs kyi nor mod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i a zhes bgyi ba'i sgos rnam da ra ma mchis pa'i sgor 'jug pa rnams
lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam par phye ba shin/
tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sams dpa' 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub
sams dpa'i gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar
na byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos tshan rnams lags/ ji ltar n byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams blangs pa ma mchis pa'i slob dpon rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang
chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sas rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor la rdzas su bskor ba rnams lags/ ji ltar n
byang chub sems dpa' s ngas rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems da' sems dpa' chen po lha'i//
gcod pan la legs so zhes bya babyin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyodaskye bo mang do 'phan pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten lasnying
brtse ba dang/ skye bo phal po che'i don dang/ lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang/ rigs kyi bu khyod da ltar gyi dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su
gzung ba dang/ theg pa chen po 'diyunaring du gnas par bya ba'i ri/ rigs kyi bu khyod da bzhinagshegs pa lang don 'di 'dri bar yos su sems pa ni legs so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rab
tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ sa khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsolanas/ byang chub sems dpa' mas dpa' chen po lha'i cod panabcom ldan
'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ spobs bsna tshogs kyi rgyun dang
@# ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa rnams yin/ rin po che dang 'bangs de'i dngos po thams cad yos su gtong
zhing yid 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/ chos smra ba la gzhan dag gis bshad pa mi zlog tsang rjes su yi rang ste dga' ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ dang ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba thob nas legs so
ruhA/ zhes bya ba byin pa dang/ chos mnyan pa dang/ chos 'gro ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi phyir ram/ mtshonamo 'dug par skalan mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa dang/ byang chub
kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'-ichos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ spobs pa n+naM
tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sams dang 'chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos zab mo rnam par sa da la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi
gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang rjes su 'thun pa dang/ bdag gi rang bzhin ltar sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa dang/ 'du byed thams cad gor yang mi 'gro/
gang nas kyang m 'os par rab tu shes pa dang/ chos thamasaM cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas btab ra mos pa lta/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sa mas dpa' chos bzhi bo 'di dag dang ldan na/chos
zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog gam
yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gangazhan/ chos kyi dbyis kyi sgo shin tu sbyangs ba dang/ sgrib pa med pa'i sgo mngon sum du gyur pa dang/ mngon par shes pas rnam
par rtsa ba shes pa dang sems las su rung zhing ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/
sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ so so'i rigs/
par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 1 so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang/ sems can gzud par shes pa dang/ chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa dang
bdag gi so mas sbyangs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems sbyangs par rab tu shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dapa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ so so ni rigs par
chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa rnams
yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ shes rab kyi 'phrod pa dang/ ye shes chags pa med pa dang/ thabs lamakhas pa la zhugs pas sgrib pa thams cad rgyun chad pa dang/ blo shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu
byang chub sogs dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod ba shes pa la 'jug par mabs pa rnams M yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'a chos/

[4/ ]ba'i ngang ldan n rgya dang/ bya ba dang/ las kyi rnam pa smin pa la 'jug pa zhes pa la brjod da med par spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par smra ba ma yin pa dang/ rtag pa ra sbyangs/
yin pa dang/ rgyu dang/ byab dang/ las kyi 'bras bu la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jugab dang/ chos la chos nyid du byed cing chos la chos su sna'i/ 'di khe [ ]nga bdag gis mi sna ba ste de ltar
bya ba la 'jug pos rgyu dang/ bya ba dang/ las kyi 'bras bu chud mi gzon pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'a chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na nga/ byab dang/ las kyi rnam
par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjod pa med pa na spyod pa rnams yin no/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chen bzhi ngang ldan na/ sbyin pa la brgyan pa rnams yin te/bzhi
gang zhe na/ mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa rnams yin// dpa byad bzang pos rnam par spras pa rnams yin/ gzugs blta bas mi ngoms pa rnam/4 da[A ]/ 'ag na rin po che rje 'u pas//
longs spyod mi zad pa yin te/ rigasakyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ srin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpan
chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur zhing/ byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang/ lha'i
dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur zhing/ byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur zhing/ byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang/
[S/ ]ngan 'gro thams cad yang dag par bcad nas lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung bar gyur cing/ byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa yin te// rigs kyi bu byang chub sams dang 'a chos bzhi po de
(dag dang ldan na/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub so mas dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bzod pa'i rgyan sa brgyad pa rnams saM na te/

bzhi gang zhan/ tshongs pa'i skad dang sgra dbyangs lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin 1 ka la ping+ka'i sgra dang rnga sgra lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/ skya bo mang pos mthong na dga' ba dang sngag cing yid du
'ong ba rnams yin/ dge ba'ichog rnams la yi dam la brten pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan/ bzod pa'i cha nas nga ra
kyi rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dram bcu ga nga nyams 'og/
tu chud par bya ba'i cho ga shes pas dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dam brtan pa rnams yin/ pha rol gyis mnan par med pas rdo rje'i lus rab tu thob pa rnams yin/ bya ba yod ces
(bya ba la mos pas gsol ba ma btab par sun sa can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa rnams yin/ thos pa'i tshogs bsags pas mi ngoms pa'i phyir/ yeng song/
su mi skyo ba rnams yin te/ rib sa kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig 'bu'o rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mi rgod pa rnams yin/ ma khengs pa rnams yin/ mu cor smra ba mang pa rnam pa/
nang shesakyi sems mi 'dor ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o/
rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpar chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zher/ 'di lta ste/ bdag dang sems carudang/ srog dang/
gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag tu smra ba med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa chags pa med pa rnams yin/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la ma bas pa rnams
yin chos thams cad la som nyi med cing btsom dang bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyud pa/
rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'a chos bzhi dang ldan n tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta skyo/
sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i snying rje chen
po dang/ chos thams cad la dga' bas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i btang snyoms te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ tshangs ba'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos pozhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams
yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bsam gtan bzhi sdud pa'i shes pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgrub pa'i thabs shes pa dang/rang gisams la dbang sgyur ba'i chos
shes pa dang/ sas rgyas la blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mngon dar/shes pa'i so mi nyams
ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi ba dang/ pha rol du mi
0/ rgyu ba dang/ chos thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rtogar 'ashes pa dang/ yid shes kyi stobs can yin gyi/ nyon mo ngasada'i stobs can ma yin da ste rigs kyi bu byang chub se na dang sha
po'i do 'di dag dang ldan na g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ba la nas pharo' thang la gnas pa rnams yaM rate bani
gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i chu bo'ang rag tu shesal/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'anga mngon sum du ma bab pa dang/ srid pa'i chu po'ang rab tu shesal/ na sa bzhin du rang skya ba dang
lta ba'i chu bo'ang rad tu shes la/ lta ba'i ngacing bas bcings da 'ang mi 'don pa dang/ ma rig pa'i chu bo'ang rab tukazhes la donacing 'brel par 'byang ba'i rdzas su 'a blun da ra yang byed dang
rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na ]brgal nas ra rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang+ga 2
nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cud dang/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston 'a// ma brtags pa'i kun spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams yin te/ 5 zhe 3/
'di ltaste/ sgyu ma lta bu'iting nge 'dzin shin tu yongs su bsgrubs pa dang/ choso thams cad rnam par basgrubs pas so sor nyobar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shin tu rtags[-] son
par shes pa lngas rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang/ yid kyi lus mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'a chos
bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la/ ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams
yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos ng shi dang ldan na/ 'khor ba la'ang lta la/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi gnas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste
sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ snying rje chen po'i soms dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang/ sngonagyi yi dag mi 'dor ba ste/ rigasakyi bu byang chub sams dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan//
'khor ba la'ang lta la/ myang n las 'dus pa la'ang mi gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sams dpa' chos bzhidang ldan na/ khams sna tshogs la'ang rnam par lta la/ chos
kyi dbyings las kyang mig lo ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'odilta sta/ sems can rang bzhin med pas chos rang bzhin med par rtogs pa dang/ chos rang bzhin med pas sems can rang bzhin med
bar rtogs pa dang sems can rang bzhin med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rang bzhin med par mos pa dang/ sems can rang bzhin med palasomanyi mad cing the tshom dang bral ba yin te/ rigs
kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ khams sna tshogs pa la'ang rnam par lta la/ chos kyi dbyingasalas kyang mi g.yo'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpar chog/
bzhi dang ldan na/ don yang mi mngon la/ gnod par yang kun tu snang ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa rnams yin/ sbyor ba 'bar ba ' gnas
pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang bar bsam pa gnas pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul 'a 'ang kun tu snang ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi
bu byang chub gnas dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ don yang mi 'dor la/ gnod par yang kun tu snang ngo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sa mas dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsod
nams kyis nor dang ldan la// thabs kyi nor mang pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgya chen po la mo da 'i sems can gdul ba'i phyir bsod nams kyis 'khor lo sgyur
ba dang/ brgya byin dang tshengs pa'i bsod nams kyang nye bar ston pa dang/ 'gro ba phal pa 'dul ba'i phyir/ dbul zhing dman par ya nga nye bar ston pa dang/ slong ba mthong na bdog pa thams/
mos su gtong zhing nor med par yang gyur ba dang/ nor chen po dang ldan pa mthong na bsod nams kyis longs spyod zad mi shes dpar yang nye bar ston pa ste/ rigs gyi bu byang chubs mas dpa'
chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na bsod nams kyis nor dang ldan pa yin la/ thabs kyis nor med pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan
na a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa mad pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par shesapa sbyong ba dang/ 'du byed thams cad gzod ma nas sdug
bsngal lo zhes byang chub rab tu red pa dang/ chos thams cad bdag med do zhes lta bar gyur pa yongs su sbyong ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni gzod ma nas zhi ba zhes yo shesal 'jug da ste/ gos
kyi bu byang chub sems dada' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dada' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi mig shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams yin/ chos kyi mig gis snang ba thob pa rnams
yin sangs rgyas kyi spyan mngon sum dugyur pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams sa nate/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'chon bzhi po 'di dag dang
ldan na/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub soms dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam par phyabi na
[z}]tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa sgrib pa med pa dang/ bden pa bzhi rnam par dgod pa shes pa dang/ rton pa la gnas su
shes pa dang/ gzungs la g.yeng ba med par shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu
rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu bung chub sams dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams
yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta sta/ 'jig rten gyi chos mngon sum du gyur pa dang/ 'jig rten las sems can yang dag par spro la bdang/ rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba spong ba dang//
gzod ma nas rnam par dag cing 'od gsal bas rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa nam yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ 'jig rten bya
ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yino// rigasakyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzhan dgagis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos
kyi dbang phyuga rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi dbang phyug dang/ shes rab kyi dbang phyug dang/ ye shes kyi dbang phyag dang/ thabs kyi dbang phyug ste/
rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ gzhan dag gi bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang/
chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sems na rnams yongs rgyas la lta ba yang dag
par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang/ sems can rnams chos nyan pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang/ yums can rnams byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang/ sangs
ba rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub soms dang/ 'a chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ de bzhin gakashegs pa ma shong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin
no rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnad yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'ji 3ste 'jab pa 'jig rten las
'das pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang/ bden pa la nye bar brtags pas chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin dang bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor/
ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa la mkhas par gyur pa dang/ nyon mongs pas mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan
na shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang na chos rnanas blangs pa med par glel dpon rnams 52 taM bzhi gang
zhen 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po phun sumatshogs pa rnams yin/ sems can yongs su smon par bya ba la brtan zhing bsam pa rgya che ba rnams yin/ bdag gi bde ba la
michags pa rnams yin/ gang ye shes yongs su tshol ba de sems can thams cad kyi ched du yin gyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyi ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang chos ni 'di dag
dang ldan na/ chos rnams blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang
zhin 'di lta ste/ bdag gi don btang zhing gzhan gyi don byed pa rnams yin/ bdag gi bde ba thams cad gtong zhing sems can rnams la chos kyi bde ba sprin pa rnams yin/ ji ltar byos/ nga Ti chos ston pa
la ngal ba med pa rnams yin/ chos kyi 'tsho bas 'tsho'i/ zang zing gi 'tsho ba ma yin da/ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dad chos bzhi po 'digadang ldan na/ sems can thun da ston par gyur
ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs
[s, ]// rab tu 'thob pa dang/ spobs pa rgyun mi 'chadapa dang/ soms can gyibasam pa la shes pa 'jug bdag/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du khrid cing mi byed pa'i chos/
ston pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'a chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
blo dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spyod pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa rnams yin
ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las phyir mi ldog cing mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams yin te/ bsams bzhin du tshodang 'chi 'pho dang/ skye ba'ang ston la/ phyir mi ldog pa'i
phyag rgyas kyang btab pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshags pa'i phyag rgya la yang dag par gzhol zhinges banus nges par byung nas/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu
byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnamagrangs
'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tug yos nas/ snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to// stong gi bar snang las
lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis lha'i rgyudabyangs blangs te/ lha'i ma tog mnar ba'i char rab tu phab nas/ 'di skad ces kyi ma bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis tipa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyad cing bshad de rab tu bstan to//
bcom ldan 'das gang bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'din pa dang/ thos nas kyang mos pa dang/ mos nas kyapo'adzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid/
pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang ston pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba'i sems can de dag ni dge ba'i sku la ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags te/ de dag ni ji ltar de bzhin ga[]shegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas daltar seng ge 'i sgra sgrog pa bzhin du lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du sang ge'i sgra sgrogs par
'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas red pa legs par red do zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub
pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i srogachags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams skyes so// byang chub sems dang 'khri
nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis
'di skad ces gsolato// bcom ldan 'das gangadagade bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgyacher rab tu ston pa'i
zla byang chub sems dang 'a de dag chos du dang ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu

'dzin pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a de dgazhichos brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na 1 'di lta ste/ de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
( byang chub la bsam pa nges te/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i soms med de/ shin tu byams pa sgom pa dang sgoms par 'gyur ba dang/
sams na thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la gnas te/ snying rdzachen po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ chos 'dod de/ chos don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba dang/ thos pa tshol bas mi don sa/
te mtsho chen rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ba dang/ lus dang srog 'dor zhing/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags te/ dge ba'i rtsa bas
bstan par 'gyur pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs te/ smon lam gyis yang dag par byang bar 'gyur ba dang/ 'khor gyi nang du 'jigs pa mad da sa bdud dang phyir rgol ba
bcom par 'gyur bsto/ rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i med sngo 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston da'i byang chub sems
dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshisangs rgyas kyimathusastong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to//
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din gang dgas phyogs mtho dman can dang/ ri nag po dang/ chu mig dang/ mcho dang/ mtshe'u dang/ lteng ka dang/ rgya mtshochen po de
dag thams cad mi snang bar gyur to// sachen po 'di dag thams cad kyang lag mthil ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur to// chu na gnas pa'i sams na rnams la gnod pa med par gyur to//
stongagasum stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din shing skam gang dag lo brgya len pa de dag thams cad las kyang ma tog dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs skyes par gyur nas/ bcom ldan
'das ga la ba der legs su btud/ mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de ma yin pa shing gzhan thams cad las kyang ma tog dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs skyes nas bcom
@#// ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su btud/ mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// sa chen po las kyang pad+ma tshad shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sna/
tshogs blta na sdug pa kha dog dang ldan pa// dri dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba dag mngon par 'thon te// snang ba chen pos kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par
gyur to/ misnang zhing ma dkrol bar yang steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil sAnadang glu dbyangs kyi sgra byang ste grag par gyur to// ri'i rgyal po gas dang/ ri'i rgyal po spos kyi daldang
laMs kyang lha'i me tog sna tshogs sngon dri yi mnam pa rnams kyang mchog gi drungad byung ste/ dri des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dri zhim po mnam par gyur to//
ri'i rgyal po gangs dang/ ri'i rgyal po sdosakyi ngad ldang de las ma tog gi char chen po bab sta/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi kyil 'khor gang na ba der mngon par babanas sa chen po
'dir ma tog gi char de dag gis pus nub tsam du gyur to// ma tog gi shing de dag lasalha'i ma tog snatshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab cing sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna chogs kyi sgra dag
kyang byung go/ stong gi bar snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdugs dang ga tshod brgya stong phrag drug nu'i tshad tsam kun tu gnas par gyur to// rin po che'i gdugs de las mu tig gi
rtson 'phreng dang/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yeraka'i dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba 'phyang bar gyur to// dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra yid du 'ong ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa// chags par byed pa/
des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di go bar byas par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das dga' bar bgyid pa// mgu bar bgyid pa'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyanathams cad kyis brgyan par gyur pa
gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'asnyal pa/ shAri'i bu 'din mo 'amatsi'i rgyal po ljon pAri'i rgyal po spos ngad ldang nas 'khor mi 'am cu stong phragadumadang
'khor stong phrag du ma dang/ 'khor lha stong phrag du ma dang bas 'ong ba de'i snga ltasaso// deskadagasungs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la mi mni'i rgyal po ljon pa sil snyan dang/ glu dbyangs
len pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/'khor brgya stong du mas bskor nas/ stong gi bar snang lam tog gi chun po'i char 'bebs shing/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'khor dang bcas pas
bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabs la phyaga'atshal to/ bcom ldan 'adas la lan gsum bsor ba byas nas// bcos ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngarami 'am
ci'i rgyal bo sdong po bdag nyid kyis pi wang gi khog pa be cha rma las byas pa// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi bsamale'u can/ sa le sbrum dang/ nor bu dang/ ri ni bo
che du mas smras pa// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su sbyangs pa blangs ti/ sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong bo de dag dang lhan cig tu grags par byed de/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po srong

(1 pos pi wang de blangs ma thag tu de nas pi wang gi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur to// pi wang gi sgra des 'dod pa na stong pa'i rgyud kyi sgra dang/
gla'i sgra dang/ lha'i glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnams khril gyis gnan te mi gsal bar gyur to// de nas pi wang gi sgra des bskul bas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis lha'i rol mo bor/
bcom ldan 'das ga laM ba der lhags so// mi 'amanyi'i rgyal po sdong pos bo wang gang de blangs ma thag tu/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi khams 'dishing dang/
ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang/ gas can dang/ sngos kyi dad ldang dang ]btung bzung dang/ btang bzung chen po dang/ de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po rnams dang/ rtsa dang/ shing gel ba/
dang sman dang nags tshal jisId pa de dag thams cad lngagi rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ g.yo rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gulato ]
'di lta ste/ dper na chang gis ra ro ba'i mi 'khyor/ rab tu 'khyor/ kun tu rab tu 'byor ba de bzhin du/ shing de dag thams cad dang/ ri thams cad kyang 'dud/ rab tu 'dud/
kun tu rab tu 'dud do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos li wang khog pa ba zur las byas pa byas ma thag tu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dIr 'dus ba'i nang
nas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' m gtogs par 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge slong dang/ gaslongam dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dag bsAn ma dang/ lha dang/ klu dang
gnod sbyin dang dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ni dang/ lto 'phye chen bo dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ mi dang/ mim
yin pa dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis pi wang gi sgra de thos pa dang/ pi wang gi sgra de ma badrod nas rang
rang gi stan las langs te/ 'dar rab tu 'dar/ kun tu rab tu 'dar ro// 'dud rab tu 'dud/ kun tu rab tu 'dud do// gar byed rab tu gar byed/ kun tu rab tu gar byed do// nyan
thos chen po de dag thams cad kyang rangarang gi stan la mi dga' ste/ 'gul rab tu 'gul zhing spyod lam yang 'khrugs nas// byis pa chung dubazhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston to/ de nas
[73 ]@#/// byang chub sems dang ba lha'i cod pan gyis/ nyan thos chen pod de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos chen po dag namongs pa dang bral ba//
rnam par thar pa brgyad 'khasam gtan pa// bden pa bzhi mthong bar gyur pa yin na/ 'o phurerang gi lus 'jog par mi nus shing/ tshodang ldan pa dag byis pa chung du bzhin du/
