tshul khrims ldan gyur kyang// tshul khrims kyis ni rlomasamasamed// theg chen bla na med pa la// tshul khrims 'chal pa smin par byed// byang chub sems dpa'igazugs rnams kyis smas pa// byang
chub sems dpa' tshul khrims ldan// stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems med// byams khachen po skyed pa ni// tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs smin byed// sil snyan rnams kyis smas pa/ ji lta bur na
sems can gyis// spros shing bsgrigs pa bzod byed cing// sa mas kyis gnod pa mi byed la// mchog tu da ga' ba skyed par 'ag/ byang chub sems da pa'i gzugs
rnam ra kyis smras pa// bdag ni sa mas na thamasacad kyi// nyon mongs gso ba'i sman ba mAmag/ de dag nar smras pa yis// tshig thos zhe sdang mi 'gyur// salamAn rnams kyis smras pa/
wA de dag 'tshon 'thus ji lta bu// bculab yang ni 'dra zhig/ jiltar zhum pa med sems kyis// byang chub spyad pa spyod par 'gyur// byang chub sems M dang/'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// chos/
dang sems can srung ba ni// rtal ba dang ni brtson 'grus so// dge ba'in pas brtan pa ni// des nase chos n zhum mi 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag ji ltar dren dang ldan//
blo gros rtogs par khong du chud/ jiltar bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de la chags pa med par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis snus pa/ g.yang ba med pa dran
dang ldan// tshul 'chos yod pa blo gros ldan// thabs kyis bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// dosan de la chags mi 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis skyes pa// ji ltar shes rab ldan
ba dang/ yang dag lta ba drang po dang// chos rnams rnam par dbye ba la// mkhas shing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// byang chub sams dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smas ba/ thos pas shes
rab kun tu 'phel// rten pas lta ba drang por 'gyur// chos kyi sbyin pas nges 'gyur te// tshul bzhin gyis ni don rtogs 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyi sa smras pa/ ji ltar thos pa
btsal bas na// de dag thos pa mang du 'gyur// gang gis che ba'i bdag 'gyur bar// thos pa'i chos rnams ston par 'gyur// byang chub si mas dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/
gus par byas te thos tshol zhing// grub bas thos pa mang du gyur/ khang gling med par chos sbyin pa/ des ni ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smos pa/ de dag byams pa ji lta
bu tade dug snying rje ni 'dra zhig/ de dag dga' ba ji ltakhu// btang snyoms kyang ni 'dra zhig/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// sems dang btang snyoms byams
ba ste/ (soms can dgrol ba'i snying rje'o// sangs rgyas chos dag dga' ba ste// gnyis sbyangs ba nibatang snyoms so// sil snyan rnams kyis sas pa/ ji ltar sangs rgyas mthong
bar 'gyur// sems kyang jiltar dang bar 'gyur// chos thos nas nii jil bur// de dag the tsom skye mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis sbas pa/ sangs
rgyas rjes su dran bsgoms pa/ des ni 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur// the tshom med cing bsam dag pas// chos thos nas ni som nyi med// sil snyan rnams kyisasmras pa// bsong
nams tshogs ni ji lta bu// ma shes tshogs kyang ci 'dra zhig/ de dag zhi gnas lhag mthong l// tsog pa yazhi ji lta bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs
rnams kyis sbas pa/ ngoms mi shes pa bsod nams tshogs/ 'drib rnams ni yi shes tshogs zhi ba'i sams nizhi gnas te// chos zhes pa ni lhag mthong sil snyan/
rnams kyis smas ba dedag gi ni spyod yul gang// de dag gnas kyang ji lta bu// de dag gnas pa zhi'adra zhogo/ de dgasbyorab 'ang ji lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis
smras pa// de dag spyod yul stong ba nyid/ gnas ni pha rol phyin pa'i lam/ gnas pa bsam gtan bzhi rnams te/ sems can rab dgrol sbyor ba 'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/
de dag bdud kyi las gang yin/ sangs rgyas 'phrin las ji lta bu// ci 'dra ba yi las byas na// byang chub lan gzhal bar 'gyur/ byung chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras
la theg pa dman ba bdud kyi las// sangs rgyug 'phrin las thog par// sdig pa thoms cad song bani// byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur ba'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ dadeg
grogs brtan ji lta bu// sdig pa'i grogs po ci 'dra zhig/ log par lta la mi gnas shing// jiltar yang dag song bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/
0 gang zhig byang chub lam ston pa// rtag tu bde sbyin grogs po'o/ byang chub sems las gang zlog pa// de dag sdig pa'i grogs bor shes// sil snyan rnams kyis sa pa/ lam du 'jug
par 'gyur ba gi/ lta ba drang po dzil bu// sbyor ba rnam par shes nas su// ji ltar lta de 'jig mi byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ las dang bya bar 'jug pani/
de dag drang por ltab yin/ lag bar sbyor ba rnams nas// lta ba de dag 'jig mi byed// mi la snyan rnams kyis gas pa// ji ltar dam pa'i chos srung zhing// sems can yongs su smin par
byed ji lta bu yi thabs kyis ni// de dag byang chub sgrub par 'gyur// byang chub sems da pa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ brtson 'grus kyisanichos srung sku/ bsdu bas
yongs su smin par byed// mtha' gnyis rnam par so pani// byang chub sgrub par byed pa yin// sil snyan rnams kyis smyos pa/ de dag shes pa'i lam 'dra// ngo rgyal
las nidzolta bu// dziltar ba ka'ablo bde ba dang// thams cad dus su'athun por 'gyur// byang chub sems pa'i gzugs rnams kyis sbas pa/ rtsod pa med pa shes pa'i las//
nga rgyal la ni rtsod pa 'byung// nges pa bka' blo bdebs/ gus pa yisazhi'athun par 'gyug/ sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag lamanidzo lta bu// lag pa'i lam
ba/ @#// yang 'dra zhig/ bla med byang chub lam du ni// ji ltar samasaca'ab tu 'god// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// lam ni pha rol phyin
[MA]pa drug theg pa dman pa log pa'ilam// shes rab thabs la bslab pa ni// sems can lam la 'dzud pa'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji lta buran nor chen 'gyur/
de dag red pa'i ng ci 'dra zhig/ gter rnams kyang ni ji lta bu// gang gis de dag 'gro tshim byed// byang chub soms dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis sbas pa// nor bdun dang ni rtog
tuldan// chos nyan pa nird pa'o// de dag gteranigazugs yin te/ rab turedazhas tshim par byed/ sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag gis ni pha ma lang// 'du'i tshogs ni ji
lta bu g.yog rnams kyang n 'dra zhig/ gangagis mkhas pa de dag mdzes// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa// ma nishasu rang phani thabs// nye du byang chub
phyogs rnams yin// dge ba rnams ni g.yog yin te// des ni mkhas pa de dag mdzes// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ jiltar ba dag med rtogs nas ni// byams pas
'gro ba khyab par byed// bdag med pa dang byams pa dag/ de la jiltar mtshungs par 'gyur// bya tshub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis sbas pa/ gang dag stonganyidarab tu shes/
0 de ni bdag med khong du chud// gang gis 'gro ba stong shesapa// deni de yi byams pa mchog sil snyan rnams kyis sbas pa/ 'du byed rnams rang bzhin gyis/// 'ong ba mdacing//
'gro mdun// las dang las kyi rnam par smane// ji lta buran h+phar par gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis slas pa/ dam pa'idon du'ong med de// gang du'ang 'gro ba
yodam yin// kun rdzob tun lam 'jugatsang/ rnam par smin pa nye bar ston// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med// smon lam rnam par spangs par ni//
mtshan nyid gcig tu rab rtogs nas// ra bon ni jo ltar shes// byang chub sems dpa'i thugs rnams kyisisbas pa/ stong nyid gang yin de mtshan mad// mtshan ma don dug/nyaremad ba/
mtshan nyid gcig cing don gcig ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgor ston to// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// gang gis mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i// stong par rtog pa jilta bu// ses can lta
badzit+ta// yongs su smin byed ji lta bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis skyas pa/ shes rab kyis ni stong par rtog/ klubs kyis sems can rnams la lta// sAng rjes
yongs su smin par byed// des nimya ngan 'das par 'gro// sil snyan rnams kyis smras te// chos 'di dag ni chos nyid kyis// skya ba med cing 'byung med par// tshul mchog 'di/
ga 'a shas nas ni gang gis 'khor bar skye bar gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smasab/ mi skyo ba dang mi 'byung ba// de ni shes rab
spyod yul/ khasams bzhin du nigangaskyo ga/ de no bsakyi tshul mini'o// sil snyan rnams kyis sa kha/ gtong l dga' bar ji ltare'agyur// ji lta bu zhi ba'i mi ldog/ ji ltar brjod pa
k+kA phunasu mtshogs/ jiltar rnam par nges bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyisams te/ mnyam par gnas pa gtong la dga'/ chos kyi dbyings las phyir mi ldog/ miskyab
la bzod pa ste// chos shas nas nii rnam par nges// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar byang chub snying po gang// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mtshonanyid gang
niphyir rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya//
de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar grol/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis snus pa/ byang chub snying ponam mkha' ste// byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do// gang yang kun nasagati
zla mug med// de bzhin nyid de de bzhin gshegs// de nas mi 'amatsi'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la brjod pa thob bo// de dag gis bzod pa
[z]sangs rgyas nibad ga cag gi chod dbyung ngo// bcom ldan 'das sil snyan dang glu dbyas 'di dag las the tshom 'di ba'i sgra 'di lta bu byung ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gisadris
pa de dag thams cad kyis lan btab pas 'khor 'di'i dogs pa thams cad spangs pa dang/ bdag cag kyang chos kyisnang ba bdag tu ma mchis pa skyes pa ngomatshar to// bcom ldan 'das sil snyand dug
las sgra 'di lta bu byung ba'i rgyalags/ su'i byin gyi rlabs kyisan/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis lan 'debs bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'acul pa/ bzhinabazas
dag de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs su blta'o// bzhin bzas dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nam mkhar las kyang chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu 'abyungan/ sil snyan las
chos kyi sgra'i phyir mi 'byung ste/ bzhin bzangs de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byon gyi rlabs nibasam gyis mi khyab 'og mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu de dgagis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das sams
can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig/ de nas mi 'amatsi'i rgyal po ljon pa'i rgyas mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mu tig bdog sna tshogs
kyi doshal thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyags 'tshal nas/ ji ltar thogs pa mu tig gi doshal de
dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bab bo// mu tig gi do shal de dag phul ma thag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'igatsug gi drang thad
kyi steng gi bar snang la mu tig gi dolagyi khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gyur te/ khang pa btsugs pa de dag thams cad kyang gru bzhi lham pa// kab bzhizug ba/ chamanyam ba/ ngos
nyin ta rnam par phye bsha stag go/ khung ba bsags pa de dgan rin po ches spros pa'idrirtsa ba rang napo che las byas pa/ lha'i ras btsog bu'i zung du ma bkram pa dag byang bar gyur to//
khri de dgathams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo/ de nas mi 'tshani
ba mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas tshom zhing mgu sta yid rab tu dgarinas/ dgarab dang yid bde ba skyes te bsam pa thag pa nas dran med/
ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub tu sems bskyod do/ de dag byang chub tu sems bskyedanas/ dga' zhing mchog tu dgu'i sta dang ba thob nas/ thams cad kyis sgra skad dang
dbyang sagacig tu tshul dang 'dra ba'i gis su bcad pa 'di dgagis bcom ldan 'das lo mngon par bstodade// bla na med pa'i dgra bcom mchog gsung ba// don dgos
mtshungs pas ma mas bsam mi khyag donodang chos dang 'dul ba rab brlabs pa// sems can mchog la mgo bas phug 'tshul go/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug tha ba'ajig/ dgon par
zhugs dgyes bsungs pa mi mnga' ba// rin chen mdzod dang rin chen ston pa po// bcom ldan rgyal po'i rgyal la phyag 'tshol lo// spyanasnga dri bralanyon mongs mi mnga' ba// sa yi dbangado
ba rol dgra bcom pa// pad+ma lta bur srid gsum mi gos pa// bde gshegs mchog brnyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i nanganamig dang 'ang spyod cing// nyizla 'di yi 'od ni
bkongab// 'khor los sgyur pa'i rigs su rgyal poraskyes// 'khor lo'i mtshon mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ming dang gzugs la nam yang mi chags shing// mgon dang dpung
dang skyabasu mnga' ba'osagyu'o// khyodadang mtshungs med lhag pagalazhig/ mtha' yas dbyangs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal 'go/ b.ros dang b.reg lanam yang chags mi mnga'//
'jig rten chos rnams zil gyis mnanate bzhugs// chags sred 'khrashing dra ba 'grol mdzad ga/ bcom ldan 'ajig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal la/ 'dul ba thugs ni rtag tu
mnyam par gzhag/ nyon mos bsregs te stobs bcus rab zhugs shing// 'grol zang zing mi mnga'asbyin stsolakha/ sbyin pa'i gnas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 'go/ snu mchog
wa/ @#// dam pa mtshon gyi 'od 'phros pa// lam log phyin ci log ni rnam par spangs// 'jam zhing snum la snyan pa'i gsung gsungs pa// srid pa gsum las 'phags
la phyag 'tshal lego mi mchog gdung bas gdungs pa mi mnga'// rdzu 'phrul gyisan bye ba'i zhing du gshegag 'gro bar tu sgrol ba'i khri mdzad pa// bcom ldan bran 'dra khyod
la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag pa ston mdzad pa// chags shing zhen pa'i 'gro dang mnos drug/ ldan zhing mkhas pa'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'grel// 'gro
druganye gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshol la// gser gyi kha dog 'dra la phyag 'tshol ko/ zhi gnas dbang po dul la phyag 'tshol lo// ston gyi zla 'dra'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo// mi
mchog yon tanamanga' la phyag 'tshol la// nyon mongs bsregs shing bsnyas pa mi mang 'bag/ skye dgu redi dag bsgral dka'achu bzhi sgrol// bsdams shing dbang po dul ba'i
bcom ldan 'das// khyod la skyabs su mchi bar mchid kyis 'tshal// thub pas sbyin pa bsamagyis mi khyab stsal// bslas nas dbang po skyes par rab 'gyur// pha rol dag
la sbyin ba mchog stsol ba// gtong ba bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can ng rgya la rgyags khengs gtinug ba// rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba 'ga' bgyid rnams// 'phags pa blan

0ma/ med pa'i lam mchog la// rnam par 'dren pa chen po khyed kyis bkod// phung bo rang bzhin gyis ni stong ma len nas// las dang nyon mongs hril gyis mnanatabazhugs// 'dren pa 'gro ba rnams kyi so ma'i
gcod// bam ldan dusagasung khyod la phyag 'tshal go bden pa'i chos la brtson zhing mnyam par gzhag/ chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin// bla na med pa kha la sbyar ba mchog/ bcom
ldan ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bcos ba mi mnga' g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral// bdud kyi sde rnams 'dzoms pa'i stobs po che// mi mchog lam dang lam ma lags la mkhasaM// rlung mar lta bur
la'ang chags mi mnga'// gzi bar gyur bsal ba'ol shin tu gnas// thub pa bas pa ma 'tshol bang mdzod mnga'o// spyad pa spyod pa'itshon gang yi// bye ma snyad kyi mi mchog rnams lamachod/
mthu bar s mi g.yo bsam gyis mi khyab pa// chags pa'i skyon mi mnga' shing thang la bzhugs// gnas na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyis stan/ de slad mi rnams mchog la phyag 'tshal la// skyo dang
nadang shin m bar s pas/ tshar bas khye babs mgyis mi khyab dgongs// bcom ldan 'dusakyi mkhyen pa'i gdugs 'od kyis/ 'jigs pa chen po'i dra bar tu 'bral// 'dren parmi 'drar
chos rnams thugs su chud// phyag dang zhabasal bkra shis mtshan mang zhing// bgrashis pa las 'jam pa'iran slong ba/ bcom ldan bkra shis mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// gzungs
de rnams ni dbang gi pha rol phyin// zang zing mi mang 'chos kyi sbyin ba stsol// thub pa chos kyi rngani rab rdung// chos rdzabcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shAkya'i
[+ ]rigs rus rgyal po las byung// dbang po zhi zhing thugs kyang rab tu zhi// ston pasrid gsum 'jig rtena rnams gzigs pa// bde gshegs zhi thugs khyod la phyag 'tshol la// bdud
rnams dpung dang bcas pasarno ba yi// ral gri thogs nas byang chub drung lhags kyang// khyod bzum yang g ga gos te/ bcom ldan lhun bo 'dral phyag 'tshal lo// mi yi dam pa
bzod pa'i pha rol phyin// sku rnams kun lanongs par bgyis kyang barjodo/ yang 'byung ba dang skye dang 'chi nges pa/ bzod gsungs bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal la// mthu b.res bde
bar gshegs pa mi g.yo ba// gnas dang gnas min mkhas pa bsrungs mi mnga'// khyod kyis lo mas can mang po byang nub bkod// chos gnas rgyal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dus bgyi/
a nyam chung snying bo med par mkhyen// skye ba'i tshogs ni nyung ba ma lags sel// khyodakyi mkhyen pasrid gsum khyad par 'phags// ya shos pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can long pa
sdug bsngal mgon med pa// de dag khyod kyi dkona mchog gsum tshim bgyis// khyodazhibadud dpung bcas pa skrag mdzad pa/ bcom ldan mgon gyurakhyod la phyag 'tshol la// stobs dang
bsam gtan dnganidabang po bsgoms// khyod kyis bdud ni dpung dang bcas pa bcom// srid pa rnams kyi nang na mchog gyur pa// grub pa dbang po bsgoms la phyag 'tshal le// 'dun
pa'i rtsa ba rgya chen chos gsan pa// mtshungs med byang chub la ni chags mi mnga'// grib ma lta bur mkhyen nas bde gsungs pa// bcom ldan gdugs 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo///
'dren pa rmi 'drachos rnams thugs su chud// 'phags pa'i 'khor lo rmi 'drarab tu bskor// 'dus ngagyis yang dag tu ni rmi lam 'drar// mkhyen nas sems can mang bo dran par
mdzad// khyod kyi lcags mchog dag pa dri mi mngar// lcags kyis rang gi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khabs// ljags ni 'ad+ma 'dab ma brgya lta bu// ljags skyon mi mnga' khyod la phyag
'tshalale// srid gsum kun la chags pa mi mnga' ba// 'gro ba rnams la 'dun pa'i mi skyon gsung// 'dun pa'i 'dod chags bralab ma smad pa// byang chub mchog la srog
chags 'dunapar mdzad// nyon mongs dgra dang sdig pa'i dgra sdus pa// sorasna'i 'dod chags bral zhing chags mi mnga'// mi yi dam pa gser ltar dpal sdug pa// khyod
kyi mtshan dang gras pa chub par grags// gnas dang dbang po rnam par 'byed la mkhas// 'di na bzhugs shing 'gro ba'i mo bed tu gyur// gnas dang yig 'bru tshig go/
rgya// don bslabs pas// khyodakyis chu bo bzhi la zam pa btags// glang po rini tangam mchis sbyin pa mdzad// 'dren pa mi dang lha rnams sgrol ba po// khyod
[M/ ]kyi yon tan ma[E]'a ma mi rid de// mgon po khyod la bdag phol mo sbyor// mi yi mchog la rdul ni sbyin byin pas// mi mjed 'dzam bu'i rgyal por gyur lags na// 'dirini dbang po
dang pas thal sbyar nas/ skyabasasu nyebar mchibasmos ci 'tshal// phung po gsog ste nyam chungasAng po med// stong pa sgyu mAnu zla'i dra bani// go'u ta ma khyod kyis de dag yang dag mkhyen//
phung po khams mkhas khyod la phyag 'tshal go srid pa'i srad bus dam dumadud bor te// srodang 'i 'gro ba dra par rab gragasaM ba// srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi dra ba de// bde gshegs khyod
kyis mkhyen pa'i 'od kyis dra la// tshangs pa'i sgra skad lta bu'igasung rjod dag/ sha de ma lag sa mi 'gyur 'di ma lags// phun tshogs gsung ba de dag thos nas ni// thal mo sbyar te
la skyabs su nye bar machi// phyag gi mthil gyis sa 'dir rig pa na// nags tshal bcas paro rnam pa drugag yos kyang// 'dir ni zhangs la gnod par 'gyur ma mchis// bdud phyogs
dgra bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal la// lha yi rgyal po che dang mkhas pa gang// khyod kyi chos don gnyer zhingamachis pa rnams// de dag so sorechos bstan thos nas su// zhabs gnyis
lani rab tu gtug par bgyid// de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i smos rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis man par bstod nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces//
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag blan med pa yang dag par rdzob sa pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas/ bud med kyi dngos pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nusan/ ji ltar bdag cag bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob pa dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par
rdzogs da ra 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la legs par bshad du gsol/ deskadatses gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi 'am ci'i
rgyal bo ljon pa'i slas de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sring mo dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ ji ltar bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ rgyas pa'i
dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon pa ra rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'gyur ba ngas khyed la bshad par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i rgyal bo'i
slas rnams kyis btsemaM ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la 'di skadabyes bka' stsal to// sring mo
dag chos gcig dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po lar gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po'i thob cinga myur du bla na med ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ chos gcig pu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems skyed pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems skyed pa dang/
mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems skyed pa dang/ 'jig rten gsum las khyad par du 'phags pa'is mas skyod pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brjod pa mad pa'i sems
skyod pa lta/ sring mo dag chos gcig pu 'di dag dang ldan na/ gad mod bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ spyas pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur dusla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur ro// sringamo dag gzhan la nga chos gnyis dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'grobacing myur
du blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'agyurati ]gnyis gangazhen/ 'di lta sta/ phrag dog med pa dang/ sorasna med pa ste/ sring
mo dag chos 'diganyis dang ldan na/ bud med bud mad kyi de ngos bo las gyur to/ skyes pa 'o dngos po 'thob cing/ myur du sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub kyang mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag go/zhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing/ myur du bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang/
ngag gi sdom pa bzhi yongs su dag pa dang/ yid kyi sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa to/ sring mo dag chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te//
skyos pa'i dngos po 'thob cing/ myur du bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'gyur// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bzhi dang
ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa 'i dngos po 'thob cing/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgyu bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo med par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang/ g.yo med pa rab slab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa dang/ g.yo med par tshul khrims ston pa dang/
g.yo med par chos nyan pa ste/ srong mo dag chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan no/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing/ myar du blon med
ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos
bo las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur dubanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byanguchub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhen/'di lta ste/
zla/ chos don du gnyer ba dang/ chos thos nas tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs pa dang/ lhag pa'ibasam pas bud med kyi dngos po la smod pa dang/ rtag par rgyun du skyes pa'i lus thob par soms
skyed pa dang/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa ste/ sringamo dag chos lnga pa 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes po'i dngos po la thob cing/ myur du gran
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sringamo dag gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na/ bud med bud medakyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i
dngos bo 'thob cing/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ drug gang kun/'di lta ste/ drang ba dang/ mnyenapa dang/
sgyu med pa dang ( g.yo mdo pa dang/ gsal ba dang/ bcos pa med ba sto/ sring mo dag chos drug bo 'di dag dang ldanon/ bud med bud med kyi dgo do las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob
cing myur du blanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldan na/ bud med bud mad kyi dngos po
lasagyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing/ myur du bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang min par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bdunagang zhen/ 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas
kyi sku thob par bya ba'i 'i/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par bya ba'i phyir/ chos rjes su dran pa dang rang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i dga' dun pasnga ba'i phyir/
dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang/ smon lam yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad yo sa su dor pa'i phyir/ gtong nga rjes su dran pa dang
byang chub kyi sems rnam par g par bya ba'i phyir lha rjes su dran pa dang/ de dag dgrol ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la sems pa sta/ sring mo dgu chos bdun po 'di dag dang ldan na//
bud med bud mad kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
sring mo dgagazhan yang chos brgyad dang ldan na// bud med bud med kyi dngos golas gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos go 'thob cing/ myur du dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ bras 'asrid pa ma yin pa dang/ skom la srid pa ma yin pa dang/ me tog dang/ srog
[A/ ]dang 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma la sodapa ma yin pa dang/ skyod mos tshal du 'gro ba la srid pa ma yin pa dang/ dgod pa dang 'jo ba la srid pa ma yin pa dang/ gla dang//
zlagar dang/ rol mo 'i dbyangs sgra la srid pa ma yin pa dang/ dga' ba dang rtogs pa la srid pa ma yin pa dang rnab dang/ sna dang/ dri dang/ lce dang/ dga' ba la srid pa ma yin pa ste/
sring mo dag chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thobacing/ myur du blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang
mungon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos dgu dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing/ myur du bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chad par lta ba ma yin pa dang/ rtag par lta ba na yin
pa dang/ bdag tuts+tsha ba ma yin pa dang/ si mas can du smra ba ma yin pa dang/ srog tu smra ba ma yin pa dang/ gang zag tu smra ba ma yin pa dang/ 'byung bar lta ba ma yin pa dang/ 'jig
0 par lta ba ma yin pa dang/ rgyudang rkyen la 'jug pa la mkhas pa yin pa ste/ sring mo dag chos dgu po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dengos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po
'a thob cing/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bcu dung rwa non/ bud med bdamed kyi dngos
po lasagyur ta (skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing/ myur du blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te// bshu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang/ gzhan gyi longs spyod la brnabasems mi skyed pa dang/ skyes pa'i sems su yid la byed pa skyed pa dang/ srog gi phyir yang brdzun

gyi tshogi mi smra ba dang/ phru ma'i tshog mi smra ba dang/ zhe gcod pa'i tshig mi sla ba dang/ tshig 'khyal pa mi skya ba dang/ pha rol po dga' zhing rtse ba la phrag dog med cing gnod sogs kyi bgro la
nyal mngon par mi sgrub pa dang/ yang dag par lta ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang/ rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bcu po 'di de dang ldan na/ bud modabud med kyi
dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dengos po 'thob cing/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring
mo dag gzhan yang bud med zab mo la mos pa yin te de gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa lta bu so sor rtog kyang gzugs kyis rgyugs shing myos par mi 'gyur ba dang/
tshor b.latshu+inubur lta bur so sor rtog kyang bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes sutshugs pa med pa dang/ sdug bsngal kyi tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal kha'ang
ma yin pa'i tshor bas kun tu gti mug par mi 'gyur ba dang 'du shes la mig rgyu ba lta bur so sor rtog stakhud modakyi 'du shes mi skyad skyes pa'i 'du shes mi skyod pa dang/ 'du byed
sgo rnams 'chungashing gi phung po lta bur so sor rtog pa ste/ 'du byed thams cad la snying po med par rtogs nas/ 'du byed thams cad la mi se nas shing de la chags pa mi skyed pa dang/ rnam par
shes pa la sgyum lta bur so sor rtogasta/ soms dang/ yid dang/ rnam par rig pa de sgyu ma byas pa bzhin du rtog po nas/ chos thams cad la chags pa med/ zhe sdang med/ gtimug
mad pa dang/ lus la byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan par so sor rtog sta/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i khrims dang ldan pa dang/ chu'i khams dang ldan pa dang/ ma'i khams dang ldan pa dang/ rlung gi/
khams dang ldan par lus la so so'i rtog go/ lus 'dini bsdus ba rtswa dang/ shing dang/ bong ba dang/ rtsig pa dang/ mig loralabuste/ 'di bdag ma yin/ so mas can ma yin M/ srog
ma yin/ skyos bum yin/ gang brag ma yin gyi/ phyin ci log sngon du song bas rgya dang/ bya ba dang/ las kyis byang ba'o// gzhan yang bud med mig la kha bris las skyes pa'i sha'i
gong bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag pa jilta ba bzhin du so sor rtog bu dang/ de bzhin du rnab dang/ sna dang/ rtse dang/ lus dang/ yid la ngobo nyid kyis stong par
rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag pa jilta ba bzhin du so so'i rtog pa'o// gzhan yang bud med lus l gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jug pa dang/ ngag la brag cha lta bur 'jug pa dang/ soms la
sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa 'o// sring mo dag chos 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur ta skyes pa'i dengos bo 'a thob cing/ myur du blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs/
po'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu'agro/ de nas mi 'gaci'i rgyal bo len pa'i sras de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das las bud mad kyi dngos po
las bsgyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/
tshul dngo 'drapa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// dri med dri bral dri ma gcod mdzad pa// rdul med rdul bral lhag pa'i gzi brjid mngar//
mthun@#/ bad+ma'i 'dab 'dra'i spyanadang mdzes pa'i thugs// dri med zla zhal khyod la phyag 'tshal go/ dga'i mdzad zhi mdzad nyon mongs gcod mdzad pa// dga' ba ston pa rtag tu dgon
par gyis/ zhe chen 'byung gnas rin chen mdzod mnga' ba// yon tan mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal// pha rolagshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs rnams 'joms// pad+ma lta bur stong mchog/
bka' mchid gsung// l^am mchog sogs shing dam pa'i don ston pa// mchog tu dga' mdzad khyodal phyag 'tshal lo// chu bo bzhi brgal bden bzhi bka' mchid gsung sa la rgyu ba 'di/
mag stsol mdzad pa/ 'khor lo mchog gi mtshan ni stong mnga' ba// rdul med phan mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs rdul bsal dam pa mthu bo che// mgonapo 'gro la mi mchogag
don mdzad pa// bdud kyi dpung rnams stobs med 'jig mdzad daM/ bcom ldan stobs bcu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa'i 'khri shing gacod mdzad mnyam pa med// bden
rgyab dag dang ma b.rus mtshungs pa'i thugs// 'jig rten mthar 'byin sna ba'i sgron mdzad pa// rgya mtsholta bu khyodal phyag 'tshal lo// dul zhing stobs bcu chen po dam pa mang 'do/
sbyin ba sol cing rtag tu gtong la dgyos// dul ba'i gnas yon tan pha rol phyin// nyon mongs rdul bsal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan mchog 'grobakun la dam pa stsol/ de
skye bo'i 'dren pa lha yi mchogapas mchog/ sems dang stobs dang bzed la sa pa ra dgyes// mchod 'os bder gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshol la// mar ma lta bu jimad zla pa 'dra//
phyin ng nyon mongs dri ma gzod mdzad pa// nyon mongs spangs pa yon tan bsod nams gter// zhi ba thugs zhi khyod la phyag 'tshol la// dad pa stsol ba dag skyobazho mdzad pa/ ston pa skye
mched drug las thar mdzad pa// rjes su dran drul shin tu yongs dag dran// rgyal ba dge sbyong rgyal la phyag 'tshol la/ 'dom gang 'od ni gsar gyi kha dog lnga// gsung snyan dam pa rnam par
dag pa'i dbyangs// bcom ldan ng thog dam pa skyes bu mchog/ srid gsum zhi mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab mun pa ma mchis pha rol gshegs// rtag tu dka' thub brtul zhugs rab tu spyad
de bzhin bon gzhan min de bzhin gsung// mun par sgron ma 'dzin la phyag 'tshol la// bder gshigs grags ldan yon tan bsam 'tshol// de dag nyid kyi chos kyi gnas ston dang// yon tanabarjod
pa mtho zhing grogs bsgrags pa// mchog tu dgar mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bsngags la gnas shonge brtul zhugs dka'agrub 'phags// khengs dang rgyal rgyugs pa gcod/
mdzad b// ye shes 'byung gnas rdul bral blo gros mchog/ skye bo mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ka la ping katshangs dbyangs thugs rjecan// 'dod pa rtsod brgyud dri ma
(sal mdzad pa// phung po yos mkhyen mkhas pa bde bar gshegs/ yon tan tshogs ngadza' a'atshal le/ yon tan ston dpon na bstod
mchod pa// brab mo blta dka'ashin tu rtogs par dka'// 'dzum zhal zla 'dra gsong par gsung mdzad pa// bdud stobs 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam thugs
kha lo sgyur ba rab dul thugs/ kun gyis mngon bstod mnyam pa'i lam la gnas// thub pa mchog gsungadaben pa'i bkang ed na// bde gshegs mnyam thugs khyod la phyags su lo
thalam sil snyan pa shin tu 'jam pa'i dbyangs// bdud kyi sde mang 'jom mdzad ng rgyal dang/ lhag paring rgyal ma/ mi 'chos// thub pa dag sbyong rgyal la phyag 'tshal 'o//
pa stobasadang mthu dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dgyes// rtag tu 'dod chags skyon dang rab rib bral// bde bar gshegs pa mi g.yo gnas la bzhugs// stobs bu'u mchog mnga' khyod la
phyag 'tshal lo// phyag dang zhabs ni dri med dra bas 'brel// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba mi mnga' ba// rgyal bar 'os pa spyi ya/ kun las rgyal// nam mkha'i mnyam thugs byed pa la/
de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i slas mi 'a ma ni'i mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa dang// bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa'i
bas ma pa mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de de'itshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal
gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs pa byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ sngon bo dang/ bar po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ le ba rgan dang/shel dang/ dngul gyi kha dog lta bu 'o//
de dag gis 'jig rtan gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par 'od kyis khyab par gyur tetshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas// nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od thil du brlag par byas te/ slar log
nas bcom ldan 'das la lanagasum ba skor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nuba'o// de nas tsho dang ldan ba kun dga' po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig
tu gzaranas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ zhe sa dang bcasashing gus pa dngabacas par/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshigs su bcad pa mngon
bar ba sgrub pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ni smad 'dzum ston ba// zla badrim mad zhal khyod la zhu/ dri ma da gzibarjid mnga' ba khyod
la zhu[0f38]gsar gyi kha dog lta bu khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa'i slad 'dzum ston pa// dam pa gi gzugs rnams ma nga 'a ba khyod la zhu// 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad khyod la zhu// lha
mi rnams kyis mchod pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// sbyin dang dul la brtson pa khyod la zhu// tshul khrims yongs su dag gyur khyod la
zhu bzod pa'i stobs dang stobs stsol khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ni smad 'dzum ston pa// brtson 'grus stobs dang mthu mnga' khyod la zhu// bsam gtan mngon shos des
pa khyod la zhu// shes rab nam mkha' mnyam pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ni slad 'dzum ston pa// rtag tu byams pa'i thugs rtenakhyod la zhu// rtag tu thugs rje ldan pa
khyod la zhu// dga' dang btang snyoms dgyes pa khyod la zhu/ bde bar gshegs pati slad 'dzumaston pa// sridab gsum po mthar 'byin khyod la zhu// spyan gsum dri ma mi mnga'
khyod la zhu// bdud rtsi chos rnams gsung ba khyod la zhu// bde bar gshags pa'i slad 'dzum ston pa// bduda rnams tha mar 'byin pa khyod la zhu// na pa'i tshogs rnams 'jo
pa khyod la zhu// bden pa dam pa gzigs pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa'i slad 'dzum ston pa/ stobs bcu dam pa mnga' ba khyod la zhu/ the tshom dag ni gcod mdzad khyod la
zhu[j]yon tan stong gis rgyas pa khyod la zhu// doskadabyis gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'a'adi skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod
kha05 kyis mi 'gazhi'i rgyal bo ljon pa'i slas rnams ngalA dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ lhag pa'i bsam pas blan med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dung chub tus nas ba smyung nas bud med kyi dengos
bo las bsgyur zhing/ skyes ba'i dngos bo thob par bya ba'i phyir 'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mthong lags ga/ bcom/
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo mi 'an ni'i skyes brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'dis 'dis shiShabos nas bud modakyi dngos po las
gyur te/ rgyas pa'i lus thob nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang sa la pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyams pa dang lhan cig tu
saMs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun bgro ba byed par 'gyur ro// byams pa de bzhon gshegs pa byang chub thob pa na/ mnyis bar byed cing dam pa'i chos kyang kun bgro
ba byed par 'gyu'o// bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la'ang rin gyis mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ de dag gi dam pa'i chos kun 'gro ba byed par 'gyur/ 'dzin par
'gyura'o// de dag rim gyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi tshes la nga dag par bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kun tu rdzogs bar byas nas/ gang gi tshe mi 'am ci'i rgyal bo ljon pa bla na med pa yang dag par
tsa @#/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma ngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de 'tsha/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur te/ de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pas bdag cag la
sku/ sa rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do// ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad kyi rogal bkum mo/ de 'gro thams cad kyi shul rnam par sbyangs so// bdag cag byang kyi shul la rab tu bkod do//
bdag drug la chos kyi gter bstan to// bdag cag ye shes kyisal bkod do/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad 'bar bar mdzad do// pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs bstan to// thabs la mkhas
pa bstan to// bdag cag byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du stsal to// chos bsgrags pas rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// dga' ba dang/ dang ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba thob
pas yang dag par gza ngas bstod do/ chos zab mo bgrod pa la dga' bar mdzad do// bdag cag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rag tu bkod de/ bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la bus pa
gatho ba lags kyi/ byas pa mi gablob ma lags kyang/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sha dang khrag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la lan mi nan/ gzhan gyis lan ldon par mi
'gyur ba lta smos kyang watshol/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sams dpa la kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la mi 'am ci'i rgyal bo ljon pa 'di ji srid cig na bla na med pa/
yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ 'di'i ming ni dziskad thos bya bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/
longs spyod dang yongs su sdod pa nitso 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/ de yis sems can bkod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa nitso 'dra zhig 'gyur snyam mo// de nas btsimaldan
'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugasakyis mkhyenanas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang/ khatshom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi so nas 'od zan dum kha dog za dad pa kha
dog brgya stong phrag dus byung lta phyogs bcu kun kyi phyogs ra rar yang sangs rgyus kyi shong/riklung gi bye ma snyed snang bar byas te/ sems can rnams kyi ngan songagi sdug bsngal thams cad
'bar byas nas/lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du gnas pa'i 'jig rtan 'dunapar byas te/ slar le gnas bcom ldan 'das la lan stod du bskor ba byas ti/ bcom ldan 'das/
kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ donas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon chad ma mdzad pa'i 'dzum pa mthong nas/ stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/
thatsha bu@#// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
btsugs nas// bcom ldan 'das za 'a pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ gcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad nga su gsolo da// bad par gshegs pa'i 'dzum pa 'dra ba//
de ring phyung ste thugs mad bye ba'i zhing// rgya cher phyogs bcu gang+gA'i klungamatha' yas// khyab pa de 'dra sngon chad yongs ma mthong// tshangs pa de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ nor bu mi
dang nyi ma bla ba'i 'od// mi dbang gzi brjid kyis ni brel du brlagi/ 'dzum mdzad 'di yi rgyun lung bstan gsol// su yi ched du dpa' bo khyod kyis 'od phyung bas// 'diraningan
song gsum ni byang chub yan lag rdzogs// chos kyi rje yis bdag cag rnams kyi dogs pa sol// ma rnams kyi ni yo da gnyis ma lus pa khum// 'khor kun dga' bas rtog/
bgyid na// su slad de ring 'dzum pa bstan// de nas tsho dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bskor ba byas te/ rang
gi stan la 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe glang po che'i lta stangs kyis phyogs bcur gzigs nas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad thos bka' stsal to// kun
0/ dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'dis tshul 'di lta bu dang/ rgya che ba 'di lta bu dang/ rnam pa 'di lta bu 'dis de bzhin gshags pa la mchod pa byas pa mthong ngan/
gso pa da bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mi 'amaNi'i rgyal po ljon pa 'di bskal

pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug zhu rtsa brgyad na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu ste/ dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i bskal ba la 'jig na
gyi khams zla ba dri ma medaces bya bar/ de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa//
bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du
'byung ngo// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams zlob dri ma med pa de ni lego mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur te/ bo 'ad+ma dkar bo lasagrub pa lta bur snangab/ shin tu dri ma med pa/
shin tu rnam par dag pa/ ]mching bu med pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang tshad mad par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldeg pa/ rnam par thar bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa sha stag go/ byachub sems dpa' de dag ni nam mkha' la khang pa brtsigs pa
[A/ ]na langs spyod do// de dag nam mkha' la khang pa btsugs pa na gnas pa na/ bawudakar po las grub pa'isachen po der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal por/
pa/ snang ba da'i gzugs bar mthong bar 'gyur ro// de dag gis mthong ma thag tu chos 'di dag thamasaM nad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu 'o zhes dran pa skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems/
dpa' gang chos bod la thu tsos grwa ba na/ do de bzhin gshegs pas de la snang bar gyur pa de la zhu bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la/
zhus pa'i lung bstan pas sems ras par mdzad par 'gyur ro// byang chub semaMs dpa' de dag gis chos dra thos nas mi skyo ba'i chos la bzodapa thob por 'gyur ro// kun
tsho dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de nasrongadang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khon yod par mi 'gyu/ sems can de
dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' la khang pa brtsigs na 'khod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der budamed du gdags pa'i med par 'gyur ro// sems na de dag thams cad kyang
gas pad+ma'i snying po las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten gyi khams den kha zas su gdags pa med de/ sems can de dag thams cad ni bsam gtan la dga' ba dang/ chos la
dga'obu'o des can du 'gyu'i// 'jig na gyi khams de na thogapa gzhan rnam par bzhag pa med de/ samasacan de dag thams cad zhi theg pa chen po la nges par 'gyur ba ngag go/
'jig rten gyi khams de na tshul khrims leg par zhugs pa 'am lta ba log par zhugs ba'am/ cho ga lag khar zhugs pa las/ 'tsho ba log par zhugs pa'i sems can
'ga' yang med par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams tsad nan tan dang ldan pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur bsha stag go/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud dmaM/ dud kyi rjes kyi lha 'am/ gzhan mu stags can spyod pa dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/ dmigs pa la lta ba la mngon par zhen pa dang/ phas kyi rgol ba med par
'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad nizub mo'i spyod yul stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams den ming du btags pa tsam dang/ 'du shes
tsamaM ma gtogs par lha dang mi zhes tha dad du bya ba med par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag thams cad ni yongs su spyod pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de
tsha/ @#/ pazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal bor snang ba de'ang lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ su bo
mang po la bde ba'i phyir/ bar gyi bskal pa bshu tham pa tshang bar bzhugs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan
las 'da' bar bzhed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba 'di de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu bkodang chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha la sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro// zhes byang chub sems
dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar bzhes bya ba lungabastan nas mnalas 'das par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bar gyi bskal pa der yang sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang/ chos dkon mchog dang/
dga' dun dkon mchog dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ bar gyi bskal pa deni dkonamichog 'byung bzhes brjod do// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal bo ljon pas bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan
pa thos nas/ dga' zhing mgu sta yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ byang chub sams dpa'i dag da mchog tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis
sa las stong gi bar snang la'ang ta la bdun tsam du 'phags te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dad pa rgya cher spel ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyod pa'i phyir/ sangs
rgyas kyi mthu dang/ rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pasu/ de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chos 'di thamasan+dad rab tu dben pa dang// dros mdu do nam mkha'i ngo
bo nyid// rgyud kyidam pa 'di rnam shesan// de phyir de dag thub sus thubor 'gyur// rmi lam bzhin du mthong ba cung zad med// thams cad mdudogazung mad gso ba dang/
gsog/ tshes rnams thams cad rmi lam 'dra shis nas/ 'dus byas dag lo nam yang skyo ba med// la la sgyu ma'i rta dang glang chen dang/ shing rta dpung bu chung dang bzhon
mthong ba// dam pa'i don du snying bo med pa ltar// phung po 'di dag sgyu 'dra snying po med// gzugs kyi rang bzhin dobu ba rdos pa bzhin// tshor ba'adin chu yi chu bur 'dra//
'du shes dag ni smig rgyu 'dra bor gsungs// 'dus byas thams cad chu shing snying po med// srid gsum 'di nas mas yid rnam par shes// rgyal bas de bzhin rgyu 'a dragasog
tu gsung// gzugs kyi rang bzhin stong par rig nas// 'dus byas dag la nam yang skyo ba med/ ]khams bzhi po 'di chos kyi dbyings 'dra dang//
[+ ]mched rnams ni grong stong lta bu dang// chos 'digasog dang gsob ltar rnam shes pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos mdzod 'dzin pa yin// rab tu dul phyir sbyin dang dul ba dang// de
bzhin tshul khrims rnam dag tshul khrims dang// rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshul gyis bzod mi brad// stong pa nyid phyir brtson 'grus rnam par dag/ bsam gtan rang bzhin 'gyur ba med
rmapa dang// de ltar shes rab chags med ma spros pa// gang gi 'jug pa de 'drar gyur pa de// pha rol phyin pa 'i pha rol rab tu phyin// bdag med bon nyid phyir byams pa mnyam//
nam mkha' lta bur gong du snying rje dag/ zhi phye'i dga' dang btang snyoms bcas pa yi// lam 'di tshengs pa'i lam sta rtag tu zhi// bsdu ba bzhi po khyadapar 'phags pa 'di// rnam
par 'dren bas rjes sugazung phyir gsungs// 'dzin pa med cing rnam rtog gang med pa// da na bsdu ba'i dngos po'i pha rol phyin// sems can 'di dag bdag med sems na med
srog dang gso ba gang phrag mo rnyed do// dbang po drug 'di stong ste rab zhi bar// gang shes de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin// sems can med cing byang chub sems dpa' med// denigang
du ring bdag med rlom sems med// gnyis dang bral zhing ma chags spros med pa// sems can byang chub sems dpa' de dpal ldan// chos 'di snying po med de sgyu ma 'dra// gang
du'ang 'onam yang 'gro mi 'gyug/ chos dbyings 'di yi gnas derarigenas ni// rgyal bas de bzhin nyidanamanyam sangs rgyas/ gang na'ang yod pa 'am med pa mdamod kyi// rgyu la
brten nas chos rnams 'byung bsan// mkha' la glog mthong 'jig pa lta bu ni// sems kyi 'khri shing da lta shes par bya// rlung ni nam mkha' mi chags rgyu ba bzhin// gzugs med
sams ni 'dus byas dag la rgyu// sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag de shes nas// nyon mongs gzugs med sogs par mi 'gyur ro// lus ni ge pa lha dang la ma 'dra// bum bo rje med
rdoshing nab ltar/ de yisaM snga ma'iring ban 'drar shes nas// lus kyi chos la gnas par mi byed do// tshig ni rtag tu gzung mad rlung dang 'dra// ridangaphug gi khragacha lta bu ste/ de 'drar
sbrani rab tu dban shes pa/ sgra rnams kun la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags med// bdagazhi nam mkha'i ngos nas mi ltung ste// mkha' las ltung ba'i gnas kyang yod ma yin// chos 'dizhes mkha'
'dra bar bsgomasanas nii// de ltar sems can s mas can med mtshungs gnas// bskal pa brgya phrag mang po bsregs kyang ni// jiltarinam mkha' nam yang sngonam tshig/ chos rnams thams
[rsg/ ]cad nam mkha'i 'drar shes pa// de sreg bsalam zhi drenams brgyar yang 'gro// ri dang ri rab kho ra khor yugari// da bzhina'idang bcas pa'i sa rnams kun// nam
mkha'i so kyis phye bar rig nas de// rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis bye ba'i zhing du 'gro// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dag dang// sa gzhi 'di dag nam mkha'i ngos mnyam par// dpa' bo tshul 'di
khong duchud pa dag/ mkha'alas bye ba mtha' yas zhing du 'gro// srid pa gsum na sgra dang skad kyibag/ bzang ngan de bzhin 'bring bo na yod pa// de yi mtha' ma bskul pa brgyar brjod kyang/
sngonagyi rang bzhin mi snang rgyu ba med// rang byung ba ni mtshan mchog ma yin yang// sa mas kyi chos kyis gzugs kyis rab tu phye// soms dang yid zhi mtshungs par dben par 'gyur//
rgyal bathams cad chos mtshungs nyid phyir mnyam// sngon gyi srid par byingachub spyad spyod cing// dge ba brgya stong rad tu bsags nas ni// byang chub mnyam zhing mnyam par rab shes pa/
grags pachen po rnams lung bstan 'gyur// chos rnams kun nirang yul yongs dag sta/ mtha' yas phyir ni rgyal ba'i yul du mnyam// mnyamanyid 'di dag gang gis rab shas
pa/ yon tan ldan pa de dgalung bstan 'gyur// bdag ni gzugs mnatshor min 'du shes min// soms pa ma yin rnam par shes mod kyang// byang chub khong du chudapa sa bdag
lung bstan// bung do khams kyis bdag ni lung ma bstan// bzod pa gang zhig gzod ma nas zhi yo// skad cig pa ni zad dang 'dra minal// mtshungs med mi skya ba la bzod pa na// mi dbang/
'gyur zhes rgyal bas lung bstan to// chos rnam sa kun dang bdag turang bzhin mnyam// bdagani bdag med stong pa'i rang bzhinate// stong pa nam mkha' 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid// byang chub rtag tu mkha'
mnyam rang bzhinano/ khrad par bya phyir zad pa shes mi nus// mi zad pa ni zad pas bad gi 'gyur/ 'dapa'i sgo yi chos rnams kun ma skyes// bzod dang ldan la sangs rgyas lung ston to//
mtshan med gnas 'jug pa yi gnas ma dade/ yang dag 'dus ma byas ba dus las grol// ma lus byed dum cug byung ba min// de bzhin nyid 'drar rgyal bas bdag lung bstan// galato/
bdagan lung bstan 'gyur snyam na// chos lam tshul la tshigs mnyam sbyor ma yin// sems dang yid kyis sbyor ba sbyor na// chos spyor khyad par 'phags 'dimatshungasashing mnyam// khyed cag
thams cad s yi stengan 'bod// bdag ni nam mkha'i khyilana rnam par gnas// sa dang nam mkha' mnyam par shes nas ni// srod pa gsum na chags med pa shes 'jug/ de nas mi
'am rtsi'i rgya pa po ldan pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ stong gi bar snang las babs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas ba dag gi ched du byung ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
nam mchis pa ma bcos te sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bdug ma bskus bso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du/ blunamed pa/
pas rang dug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas 'khor de'inang nasaM byungachub soms deng yab cig 'dirtobu'i sems skyes te/ mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon da sa de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas galas dang po blanasod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams bskyod snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems
dpa' rtsed pan gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gisamasakyi rnam par rtog ba sa masakyis shesanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dis da ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal
bono bas de bzhin gshegs pa gang las byang chub tu sems bskyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'imtshan nilags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'dus pa'i
dus bskal pa grangs med ba'i yang ches grangs yod pa/ rgyus nga/ tshod ma dpa/ bsam gyisami khyab par gyur pa'i dusan/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'ibasal pa bzang po lo 'jig rten gyi
tsa 'am sa dge bzhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rtenam khyen pa/ skyes du
'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blanamad pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen phung po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag kharardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen phung po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag drug cur gyur te/ thams cad kyang brtson
'grus brtsams pa/ bzod ba thob pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog sha stag go/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drug cu thub par gyur to// 'jig rten
gyi khams dge bzhes bya ba de 'ang bslu las grub pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris lta bur khang khyim dang/ lengs
spyod dang/ nye bar spyod pa dang/ bzla' ba dang/ tung ba bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhong don theg pa chen po mgatogs par thog ba gzhan rnam par gzhag pa
mod bar gyur to// rigasakyi du de'i tshe de'i dusanagling bzhil dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya ba rin po che sna bdun dngaldan pa zhig byung sta/ de'islas ni stong phrag
bzhi bcu yod do// de'i buni stong tham pa yod do// de dag dbu 'ab/ rtul pho dpa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa// pha rol gyi snga rab tu 'jom pa sha
stag go/ rigs kyi bu rgyal pos 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen bung ba de dang/ byang chub sams dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu le lo bye ba tham par yid du 'ong ba'i chos
gos dang/ nabaza' dang mal cha dang/ nuba'i gsos smon dang/ yo byad rnams dang/ bde bar sbyar ba bdo ba la reg par gnas par bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/
lhades bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung bo de la mchod pa dang gtumadapa byas to/ dgaba'i khas nye bar bstan nas/ bung mod pa'i stong po de dag dang/ bu stong po de dang
srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan tsi tu sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sem sa bskyod do// des byang chub tu sems bskyod nas kyang la bye bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la bsnyen bkur byas so// de nas dus gzhan zhig na bu thu bo brtul zhugs yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba rgyal por bcug nas rgyal srid thams cad bor te/ sgra
dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pa sa khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo// de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis kyang rim gyis buthu
bar 'i rgyu la por bcu gnas/ la'i rjes su ri gtu byung bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na rnam grangs 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshong tshad ring bar gyur to// rgyal bug zhon
nu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dalas rab tso byung nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu pachung snying rje'i blo zhes bya ba gcig pu ma gtogs te dan chos kyis rgyalaM sridabyed pa chad pa yod pa dang
mtshon cha med par chos dang 'thun par dbang byed du bcug gi/ rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal bo sa 'dzin de bu dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas thog ma dang/
kharam dang/ tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de'i dam pa'i chos rab tu bzung ngo// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dusazhagling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bos 'dzin
nas bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyodadogs shing the tshom ba 'am yid gnyis su gyur ba blta na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de lo'i phyir zhen/ mi'am
mi'i rgyal po ljon pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dusan rgyal bo sa 'dzaces bya bar gyur to// rgyal bo de'i khur gyur pa de dag thams cad n daltar phyogs btsun byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do//
rigs kyi bu de ltar na mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po dalas blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams bskyed do// dabla
named pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang bo sems bskyed tshud chad de'i bar thams cad dusangs rgyas mthong ba dang/ chos nyan pa dang dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa
na dang ma bral bar gyur te/ 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyang myur du yang dag bar bsgrubs pa sa/ 'di la ngas 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal po snang bzhes khya bar 'gyurolas lung yang bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
rgya chen po lnga'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dzim du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pa dang
ldan pas// 'diltar dag ba'i tsakha mngon par 'du bgyis pa'i rgyu bas na/ yun ring du lags ba 'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa mi mnga' pa'i mkhyen pas gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar to//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu da dra bzhin no// ji skad snas pa de bshin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nithogs
ba mad pa'i ye shes mthong bldan pa 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyud zad pa/ 'gags pa dang bral ba/ rnam par
gyurapa/ rgyu gang dag las sems kyi rgyud dedag byung ba dang rgyu gang dug mad pas zad pa dbeb 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ lung du bstan pa'i m/ lung du ma bstan pa dedag thams cad
rnam pa dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas/gtanatshogos dang gnas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyirgyud 'byung ba/ dge
ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ lung du bstan pa 'am/ lung dumo bstan pa 'ang rung sta/ soms gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung ba de dag thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang/
bcas/ gzhi ni las gyur pa dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bshes so// gangam 'ongs pa'isems can thams zad kyi sa mas kyi rgyud dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba
'am mi dge ba 'am/ lung du bstan pa 'am/ lung dum bstan ba'ang rung ste/ sogs gang gi 'og tu sams ganga'abyung bar 'gyur ba de dag thamos tsadakyang rnam pa dang bcas/ tshul
phyogs dang bcas// zhi so las gyur ba dang bcas pa redi bzhin bshegs pas rasatu shes so// rigs kyibu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i yongashes dang ldan no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba bstan pa 'di bshad ba na/ srog chags sum 'bum gyis bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas mi 'am ci rgyal bo ljon pas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sogs dang 'a dang/ nyan thos kyi dge/
'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa la zhag bdun bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi khang khyim dang 'khoragyi khyams de'ang bcom ldan 'das
'a phul te 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rtag tu 'dir gshegs shing bzhugs par gsol/ de naskye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skya bo mang po la
bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la thugs brtsi ba dang/ skye bo phal po che'i don dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ wa dang/ lce'abu chen po rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas mi 'am ci'i
rgyal bo ljon pa'i bu dri ma ma dpa'i mig ces bya bas bcom ldan 'das la nor bu rin po che'i dra ba phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di sa daces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'am/
cibadagaceg blanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub la yang dag par zhugs lags kyang/ bdagacagani sol snyan dang/ rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang/ rgyu dang gar la rab tu chags// ma
tog dang/ sngos dang/ bdug pa dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma la bag ma mchis par dga' zhing rna b.lags na/ ji ltar bdag cag bag mchis par 'gyur zhing/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
mtha0 rnams yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i chos rin po che'ilug rgya'i sgo'i gdams ngag bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bka'usal bar gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyiso/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu drin mdu pa'i mgo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzhin bzungs dag di'i phyir dang phyin chadasil snyan dang/ glu dbyangs de dag las byang
chub yongs su smin par pyad pa 'i chos drug cu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar khyad la byin gyis brlab par bya'o// drug cutsa bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang/ sdug bsngal gyi sgo
dang bdag med pa 'i sgra dang/ la'isgradang/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i sgra dang/ dben pa'i sgra dang/ mi skyo ba'i sgra dang/ dngos po med pa'i sgra dang/ 'byung ba med ba'i sgra dang/
gnas med pa'i sgra dang/ jilta babazhin gyi sgro dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang/ sems can m da pa'i sgra dang/ srog ma dpa'i sgra dang/ gangozag
mad pa'i sgra dang/ sbyin pa'i sgra dang/ tshul khrims kyi sgra dang/ bzodapa'isgra dang brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang/ bsam gtan gyi sgro dang/ shes rab kyi sgra dong/ byams
pa'isgra dang/ snying rje'i sgra dang/ dga' ba'i sgra dang/ btang snyomasakyi sgra dang/ los pa med pa'i sgra dang/ 'gro ba mod pa'i sgra dang/ rgyub med pa'i sgra dang/ gnas med
tha[, ]/ba'i sgra dang/ brtan pa med pa'i sgra dang/ stong pa'i sgra dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang/ smon pa med pa'i sgra dang/ 'dod chags dang bral pa'i sgra dang/
'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang/ rtan pa'i sgra dang/ rtan m da pa 'i sgra dang/ sangs rgyus kyi sgra dang/ chos kyi sgra dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra dang/ byang chub tshad med pa'i sgra dang/ dran pa nye
b.rogazhag pa'i sgra dang/ yang dag par sdong ba'i sgra dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkangapa'i sgra dang/ dbang po ri sgra dong/ stobs kyi sa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra deng/ lam gyi sgra
dang zhi gnas kyi sgra dang/ lhag mthong gi sgra dang/ thabs kyi sgro dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sgra dang/ soms can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang/ bdud tshor gcad pa'i sgra dang/
dam ba ri chos yongs su gzung ba'i sgra dang/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang/ rmi lamaM dang/ gzugs bar n dang/ chu zla dang/ brag cha lta bu'i sgra dang/ chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med
pa'i sgra dang/ la borabs yongs su mi skyo ba'i sgra dang/ 'byung ba'i sgra dang/ dgu b.ris ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgra dang/ lhu ba dang/ chu'i chu bur dang/ smig rgyu dang/
chu shing gi phung po dang/ rgyu ma dang/ hUM ngolo med pa'i sgra dang/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bya zhing chos sgrub pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyor ro// bzhin bzos dag de ltar na sangs rgyas
kyi mthus sil snyan dang/ glu dbyangs de dag las gang gis khyed bag yod bar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgrub bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas thams
cad dang ldan pa'i 'a khor dungo mtshar du gyuranas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcol ldan 'das rnams kyi byung
chub 'di byon gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ chos bstan pa dang/ ji tsam du deng zhin gshogs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tuyongs su bzung ba ni ngo
mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// grogs po dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang nub sa mas dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung
ngo// de'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dang 'a yongs su bzung bse soms na thams cad yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/ grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas
byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bzung ba gang yin pa des ms bon thams cad kyi don nyid do// de ltar n sems can thams cad kyi chod du da dug go cha gang gis sems can tshad mad
gras med pa 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du gzud par 'gyur ba'i go cha chen po byonon// grogs po dag rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar da ltar bzhugs kyang rung/ yongs
ga/ su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su bzung ba mdzad pa gang yin pa des sems can thams cad yongs su bzung ba yin/
par rig par bya'o// grogs po dag byang chub sa mas dpar lags dang/ bsod snyoms dang [ ]mal chadang/ nuba'igasos sman dang/ yo byad rnams kyis rim gror byes la ni
sams na thams cad la rim gror byas par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' la bde bar sbyar bar nye bar bsgrub pa ni// sogs na thams cad la bde bar sbyar ba nyi
par sgrub par 'gyur ro// de'i phyir zhe na/ grogs po dag than byang chub sems dba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang/ rdub po gang yin pa de thamatsad kyang sems can thams cad la
snying rjechan po rab tu thob pa dang ldan pa dang/ soms can thams cad la phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir yo nges su 'dzin to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang/ gzugs na sprod pa dang
gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am tso dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa 'i 'khor du bcom ldan 'das
kyis legs par gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nasaM/ lha'i me tog rnam pa mang po kha dog sna tshogs pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// de nas mi 'amasi'i rgyal po ljon
0 pas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bcom ldan redus nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sam/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'irdzu'aphrul gyis bdag gi gnas bya rgod kyi phung bo ri la gshegs
pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir shing rta gang la bcom ldan 'das byang chub so mas dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang/
nyan thos kyi dga' dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa de lta bu'ishing rta bkod pa bsgrubs te/ shing rta de'ang bdag 'khor dang bcas pas drangs nas/ daltar n bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa
la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon paso yid las byung ba'i lha'i rin po chasna bdun gyi shing rta'aphang du dpag tshad lnga khyon du dpag tshad lnga pa//
'khyer rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/ shing ljon pa sna tshog sakyis legs par brgyan pa/ stong dun po tshadra ba bres pa/ rinapo che'i skud pas mig mangs ris su bres pa mngon par
sprul nas/ shing rta de la bcom ldan 'das kyigadanes ngaga'i khrobakra ba/ bstan sdug pa// 'phang du mi bdun yod pa// ras bcos bu zung brgya stong mang po bkram pa mngon par sprul/
byango chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad kyi ston yang so sor mngon par sprul te/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan byi bzhi m ring du 'brang ba brgyu/
byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang 'dod pa naspyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa dang/ gnus gtsangama'i rigs kyi lha'i bu de dag gi stan yang
[+ ]shing rtadi'icung dbyi rigs par sprul to// de nas mi 'am 'i rgyal po ljon ngas de lta bu'i shing rtabakod pa de sbrulanas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di
skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs bco ba'i slad du shing rta 'di la jiltar gdan bashams pa rnams la 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs su gsol/
denas seng ge 'i khri dol bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhugs/ byang chub sams dpa 'dang/ dug slong gi dge 'dun dang/ 'khor thams cad kyang rigs pa ru 'khod do// de nas
( mi ram tsi'i rgyal ba sbyin pa sa rdza'athul gyi stobs kyis shing rta de lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ shing ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la sngags nag/ de nas mi ran si'i bu
mo brgyad khribazhi stong de dag thamasacad dang/ bu brgyad stong po de dag dang// gzhan yang mi 'am ci dang/ dri ba dang/ lta'ang chen po brgya stengaphrag dum dang/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po len pa
nyid kyang rin bo tshe'ithog bzlogs nas shing rta la btags te nam mkha' la drangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'adas stong gi bar snang gi shing rta la bzhugs shing nam mkha'i kyol nas gsheg
0 pal mi 'amani'i bu mo brgyud khri bzhi stong po de dag gis sil snyan dang glu dbyangs blangs nas// mchod pa byed d mdun du 'dong zhing/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
mngon par bstod do// mi 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po// gabrugs kyi dam pa dngani ldan pa dag/ sil snyan rnams nirab tu dkrol bgyidatsing// yang dag bsngags pas 'dren
la stod par bgyid// mtshan mchog bsod nams kyis ni gzi brjed gyur// gzugs mchog mthong na dga' bar bgyid pa'i gzugs// bden pa'i yon tan lani rtag gnas pa//
yon tan mtsho chen khyod la phyag 'tshol la// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams dang khyod mi 'dra/ g.yas g.yonan yang rnam par mthong ma myong// ji ltar ri rab rtan zhing mi g.yo ba// da ltar
khyod kyi skun dpal gyis mdzes// 'dren pa khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// chags pa ma mchig bar yang mkhar las mchi// nam mkha' lta bur dag cing mi mnga'//
bcom ldan nyon mongs bsal la phyag 'tshal lo// lce dbang lha min dbang dang srin po dang// brgyu byin tshangs pa dang ni dag pa'i lta// nyi ma zla ba skar mar bcas ba'i 'od// khyo/
kyi mdzod spus 'od ni ma mchis gyur// shes rab 'byung gnas shas rab rgya mtsho ldan// sems can kun gyi samasakyi spyod la mkhas// 'jig rten gsum na 'jig rten
gsum gyis mchod// 'jig rtan grags pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud bzhi po yi skyon rnams bsal ba bo// bden ba bzhi la bsgom zhing dpyod mdzad/
pa rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi stobs kyis bsnyangs ma mnga'// sangs rgyas gshegs pas gshegs te gshegs pa mdzes// bskal pa brgyar yang skyo ba mi mnga' zhing//
rtag tu dul la thugs ni mnyam par gzhag/ legs par gsungs pas 'gro ba tshami mdzad kyang// khyod ni tshig dang skad la gnas malags// khyod kyi gsungan yid 'ong rab tu snyan
zhing brgya dag tu thogs pa med par ma/ sgra de sems can gang gis thos gyur pa// de dag thams cad bde bas tshim par 'gyur// sems can kha lo sgyur ba spu gcig tu// stong gsum rgya
mtsho'i cheb rnams zhugs gyur kyang// sems can rags pa rnams la 'dim gnod// rdzu 'phrul la yang skyon ni yongs gda'// stong gsum gyo ni ro rab ri bo dag/ phyag gcig gi ni
mthil du bzhag nas su// zhingamang bye ba dag tu gshegs mdzad kyang// khyed kyi sku yi stobasan zhum ma mchis// bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag bsam yasan// brtul zhugs dka' thub
tshul khrims yon tan dang// sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang bzodapa dang// brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab shin tu bslabs// sangs rgyas bye ba mang la bsnyen bkur mdzad// de dag rnams kyis
bshad pa'i chos kyang bzung// thugs rjeldan zhing 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir// khyod la yongs su skyo ba'i thugs mi mnga'// rim gro ma bgyis zhum da ra mi 'gyur zhing// rim gror bgyis pas ma blo bar
'gyur ma lags// dog sa lta bur snyomasangashing mi g.yo sgyu// 'jig rtachos gnas mi gos pad+mabazhin// chos rnams stong pa mtshan ma ma mchis dang// chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma lta bu dang// dbu
brdos 'drarmi lam glog 'dra dang// smog rgyu'i mtshan nyid lta bur rab tu mkhyen// ngo bo nyid kyis gang zag bdag ma mchis// gdodas stobazhingami ga yo rdzas ma mchis// nam mkha' lta bur dag
cing dri'i mchis// dngos bo bas par dngos po ma mchis 'dra// las dang bya ba rgyudang rkyen rnams las// byung ba lags kyi rjes ni ma mchis par// tshul 'di rnam par sbyang mdzad pas
na da phyir khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bgyi// gang dag 'dren pa mthong zhing thos gyur pa// dedag la ningan song 'jigs ma mchis// de dag bde 'gro dag tu mchogagonol te//
srog chags de rnams kyi nored pa la gas// bdag cag rnams kyis gangazag dam pa khyod// kun tu machod pas mchodapa bgyis nas su// byang chub tu ni sems kyang baskyod bgyis te//
gang zag mchoga'adra'atham sa cad 'gyur bar shog/ nam mkha' la ni dpag tu nus kyang gda'// rgya mtsho'i chab ni bas bgyis nus kyang gda'o// nyi zla mkha' las sarani nga gdar gi/
sangs rgyas yon tan bas bar 'agyur mi gda'/ danas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bzhugs te/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas gshegs pas gshegs
shing gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sku las 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od phyung ba dang/ 'od dus rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
khyer chen po dang/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'ang rab tu khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'dasashing rta des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dang/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro ga la ba der
gshegs so// dunas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na/ grong khyor gyi rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang/ rgyal bu dang/ tshong dpon dang/ grong rdal pa dang/ khyim bdag tu bcas pa dang/
dag slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams 'od des bskul nas/ phyi dro'i dus kyi tsho ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/
rtsa gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan thogs to/ bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rings pa rings par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byang ste/ bya rgodakyi phung po'i ri lo bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der dongango// ljon pa'i sras rnams shing rta 'dren bzhin dusi la snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong byed do// mi 'am ci rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra des bya rgod kyi phung po'iri thams
tsa04 cad du grags par gyur to// de ltar mi'am ci'i rgyal po len pa dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil nas khyer te[4]
bya rgod kyi phung bo'i ri la bzhag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta de las babs nas/ rang gi gnas su gdon bshams pa la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/
nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang shing rta de las babasanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te/ rang rang gi stan la 'khodado// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa dang/ gnas gtsang ma 'a res kyi lha 'i bu de dag kyang
shing rta de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgru blon po dang/ rgyal bo dang/ rgyal bu dang/
tshong da ponadang/ khyim bdag dang grong rdal pa dngabacas pa dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slongam dang/ dag bsnyan dang dag bsnyenam rnams kyis ma tog dang/ bdugab dang/ spos dang
'phrang ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ chos gos dang gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan ji ltar thogs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchodapa byas nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la sku ma mnyel tam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sa ma zhes gsol nas// phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sa mas dpa' 'di cod pan gyis 'di skade nus gso la to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'o rgyal po ljon pa g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas/ com ldan
ts+tshA 'das 'khor dang bcas te/ shing rta la bzhugs pa nam mkha'i dkyil nas dras pa'i dge ba'i rtse ba 'as mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pas ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi 'am ci'irgyal po ljon pa slas dngabacas/ bu dang bcas g.yog dang bcas pas 'dir byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de dag thams cad
nam khung chu ba kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du mngon pa rags pa las mi nyams pa rab tu thob par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du phan tshun 'gro bar 'gyur/ sangs
rgyas mthong ba dang/ chos nyan pa dang/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur/ lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur/ dam
pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson par 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras mi 'am ci'i bdag po ljon pa la 'di skad ces
ba00 smras so// mi 'a ma'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa mdzad pas khyod kyis red pa legs par red kyis/ khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de las shas shig kho/
bos kyang 'thob par 'dod do// mi 'am ci'o rgyal po ldan pas smas pa// rgyal po chen po dgaba'i rtsa ba 'di thams cad bdag gis khyod dang so mas can thams cad la dbul le// de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ rgyal bo chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de gang yang med do// rgyal po chen po byang chubs mas dpa'/
thams zad ni ser sna can ma yin te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ser sna mi spyod do/ dgu ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi
'gyur/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i dag pa'irtsa ba gang yin pa thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pa de'ang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho
bar 'agyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas byed pa dang/ sems can la sbyor ba dang/ sems can
gyi phyir 'o brangabar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gang gi phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa red de/ de gnyis las khyod kyis
dam pa'i chos thos nas/ des mi shes pa'i mun pa dang/ gti mug gi longe tog chen pos na tshums pa'i 'gyod pa byang ba'i sems bsal nas/ khyod kyis/
chos la chos kyi snang ba chen po thob ste/ chos kyisnang ba des khyodad ltar sgrib pa med pa thob cing gnas bas/ khyod kyis kyang red ba legs par red do// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na byang chub
sa mas dang 'a bu mas dang 'a chen pos gus par byas te/ ci nas kyang chos kyi tshig dang/ yi ge 'bru gcig thos pa 'ang brjod pa mi 'gyurab dang/ chudab bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ kun tu gzung
ba dang/ yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ bdag chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'a das la/ byang chub sems dpa' phyu'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sgyu'i rtsod pa na la 'di skad ces bka' su la
@#to rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum shurtso gnyis dang ldan na/ chos kyi snodadu 'gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/byang chub
so mas dpa'i snod sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang byang chub kyi lamanyo bar rton pa'i snod sbyor ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par du 'gro ba'i snodalhag pa'i bsam pa
0 dang (mang du thos pa'i snod dran ba dang lam la 'jug pa'i snodablo gros dang/ don rtogs pa rjes su rtogs pa'i snod rtogs pa dang/ longs spyod chen po'i snod spyin pa dang/ bsam pa yongs su/

rdzogs pa'i snod tshul khrims dang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa'i snodabazedapa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thums cad 'grub pa'i snod brtson 'grus dang/ sems las bsam 'grub pa'i snad brtson 'grus dang/ soms las
thag pa thams cad bskyab pa'i snod snying rjedang/ chos la dga' ba'i rtsed dga' ba dang/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro sngang ba'i snod btang snyoms dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ra dzin du
ga nadang dgas pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i snod shes rab dang saman bya lasams snyams pa'i snod byams pa dang/ dbul zhing nyam
'jug pa'i snod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod thos pa tshel bas ngoms mi myong ba dang/ mi ltos pa'i snodarab tu 'byung ba dang/ don nyung zhingabya ba nyung
ba'i snod dgon ba la gnas pa dang/ bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa'i snod dben pa la dga' ba dang/ samad can yongs su smin par bya ba'i snod bsdu ba'i dngos po dang/ chos snang
ba'i snod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ thos pa'i chos thams cad 'dzin pa'i snod gzungs dang/sems can thams cad kyi tho rtsom gcod de'i snod spobs pa dang/ sangs
rgyas mthong ba'i snod sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge ba'i rtswa ba bsrung ba'i snod zhe 'gras pa mad
pa'i sems dang/ lta bar gyur du thams cad spong ba'isnod stong pa nyid la mos pa dang/ mthar 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su spong ba'i snod rtan cing 'brel par 'byungab dang/ mi 'khrugs
