phats+tshA shing tshud par lung ston pa'i snod mi skya ba'i chos l bzod ba thob ba dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ste/
rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos kyi snod du rig par bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khris bla
named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi snod du gyur cig/ bdug pa/
kyang bcom ldan 'dasakyis ji skad du bstan pa'i chos do lta bu'i snod du gyur cig ces smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la 'di skadabyas bka' stsal
dodo mi 'am ni'i bdag po khyod kyi 'khor 'di skyo bar 'gyur du'ong khyodarang gi gnasasu song zhig/ mi 'amatsi'i rgyal po ljon pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang yongs su skyo ba de byang
ka chung sams dang 'a zhes mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni skyo pa bzod par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chubs mas dpa' yongs su skyo ba lags/ jiltar na/
yos su mi skyo ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi 'amani'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa 'tshes bzhi dang ldan yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta
sta sa mas can gyi khams tshad med pa thos na skyag pa dang/ 'khor batshad med pa thosan skrag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med pa thos nasgrig pa dang/ bsod nams tshodamed pas mtshan
dang deb khyad bzang po 'grub pa thos na skyag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi bo 'di dag dang ldan n yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub
so mas dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste// bzhi gang zhen/ 'dilta ste/ so mas can gyi khams tshad med pa de'ang bdag gis longs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes
thos nami skrag pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i phyir 'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes thosanami skrag pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i shes tshad med pa de bdag gis yongs
su rdzogs bar bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag po dang/ bsod nams tshad med pa bsags pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po bsgrub sgyu de bdag gis kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa ste/
mi kha ci'i bdag po dung chub sems dpa' chos bzhi bo 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig nga ra bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub su nug/
dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya sta/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skabs skabs su nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang/ skabs skabs su rang sangs rgyas kyi thog
pa 'dod pa dang/ dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pan yal bar 'dor zhing yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang/ gzhan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin dumi 'jug pa ste/ mi
rgyu'am nyi'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta sta/ rab tu nyen kyang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mi 'dod pa dang/ lus dang srog
kyang 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos srung ba dang/ dpag tshad stong du 'gro zhing gzhan dag byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag
dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'gaci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
slong ba mthong n yongs su skyo ba dang/ bsod nyoms byed par sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa dang/ mang du thos pa tshol ba la mi brtson pa dang/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la mi ston pa
ste mi'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa ba chos bzhi bo 'di dag dang ldan na/ yo ngas su skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am rtsi'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
yongos su mi skyo bar rig par byasko/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slong ba la dab ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyedacing/ zhe 'gras pa'i soms med la/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khroganyer med de
tshur shog legs par 'ongs so zhes bya ba'i tshig smakha dang/ bdag bde ba la mi chags shing sa mas can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa dang/ mang du thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms shing/ ji ltar thos
pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher 'du tu ston nga zang bring mod pa'i sa mas kyis chos de gzhan la rab tu ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sa mas dang 'a chos bzhi bo 'di dag/
dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo par rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di
lta sta sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po la mi sbyor ba dang/ sems can yongs su smin par byed par brtson 'grus mi rtsom pa dang/ yon tan
chung tsam gyis chog par 'dzin ngegong dum tshol ba ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi bo 'di deg dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o//
mi 'am ni'i bdagakho gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa 'chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mgo dang gos la ma 'bar ba bzhin du pha rol tuphyin
wA pa ri lam yongs su rtsol ba dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po la rtagatubatson pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin par byed par batson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ dge ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i phyir da
la mi chags pa yin/ mi 'amatsho'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo par rig par bya'o/ de nas pha bom ldan 'das kyis chos bzhi po
bsgrub pa 'dis/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po lcen pa la lan btab nas// rgyal bo ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyed kyis byangunub sems dpa' rnams kyis
yiso gu skyo ba dang/ yongs su mi skyo ba bzhi pa bsgrub pa la 'jug par 'di thos sam/ rgyal pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das thos lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal ba/ rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod byang chub se mes dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su mi skyo bar spyad par bya'o// rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi spyod pa gang lags/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang pa'i phyir/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la bka' stsal pa//
mi 'gatsi'i bdag po khyod ji ltar sams than yongs su smin par byed pa'orang gi thabs mkhas ba'i khyad paro rgyal po ma skyes dgra'adi'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang ba'i
phyir khyod kyis ston g/ donus mi'am pa'i rgyal po ldan pas rang gis pi lung de bcom ldan 'das kyi sngan sngar blangs so// pi wang de blas ma thog tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ mi
'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i dge ba'i rna ba'i gzi brjid kyis// pa wang gi sgra de las sengags bsgyings pa ltar shing sA la du ma g.yos pa'i sgrar byang chub srems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshigs su
bcad pa 'di dag byung/ phan pa spyod pa dag dang don sbyod dang// chos thos nanatan byed pa spyod ba dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyodang// de dag yongs su skyo ba med par spyod
bde ba spyod dang skyid pa spyod pa dang/ sems can kun la sa mas snyoms spyod pa dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gangaspyod pa// de dag rgya chen ma yin spyod pa med// brtan pa spyod dang
bden pa spyod pa dang// bsam pa yongs su dag ba spyod pa dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang sgyu med spyod pa yin// dul ba spyod dang sbyin pa spyod pa
dang dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong spyod dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag sarasna med par spyod pa yin// tshul khrims
spyod bam nyan sa spyod pa dang// lus dang ngagan yongs dag spyod ba dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag tshul khrims 'chal pa'i spyod pa med// brtul zhugs
spyod dang bzod pa spyod pa dang/ khro byon yongs su gcodaba'i spyod pa dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// dedag gnod sems med par spyod ba yin/ brtson 'grus spyod dang
mthu rnams spyod pa dang// 'khor bar yongs su mi skyo spyod pa dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag le la med par spyod pa yin// bsam gtan spyod dngating 'dzin spyod
pa dang/ (lus dang sems ni rab tu dben sbyod dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod de gang spyod pa// de dag g.yab med par spyod pa yin// shes rab spyod dang blo mchog spyod pa dang// chos rnamos/
thams cad ji bzhin spyod pa dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// do dgapags rab 'chal pa'i spyod pa ched// byams pa spyod dang phan 'dod spyod pa dang// sems can kun la snying rje
spyod pa dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag khro ba'i tha ba med par spyod// stongs spyod dang rab tu dben spyod dang// mtshan ma med pa yongs su dag spyod dang// byang
chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag smon pa med par spyod pa ni// yang dag nyid dang de bzhin nyid spyod dang// shes pa thams cad yongs su dag spyod dang// byang chub mchog gi/

spyod pa gang spyod do// de dag gang du'ang chags pa ro da par spyod// dad ba spyod dang dang ba spyod pa dang// dran dang g.yeng ba med pa spyod pa dang// byang chub mchogag spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag
yongs su spyod pa med par spyod// bsam gtan spyod dang rnam thar spyod pa dang/ mngon shes lnga rnams yongs dag spyod pa dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod nga// de dag rgyags pa/
mang par spyod pa yin// sangs rgyas spyodadang dmachos spyod pa dang// dge 'dun dkon mchog nye bar brtan spyod pa// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod//de dag dkon mchog mchog gi spyod pa yin
chos spyod pa dang shin tu rigs spyod dang// sams na thams cad yongs su smin spyod dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pa yin//khyo ba spyod dang chos

rnaAspyod pa dang/ mtha' na yodAsub byed pa'i spyod pa dang/ byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang lta bar spyod pa mod// dag pa spyod dang rnam par dag spyod dang// nyon mongs
thams cad yongs su gcod spyod dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod bo gang spyodapo// de dag yongs su gdung bar spyod pa med// bde ba spyod dang shin tu rnam par spyod// sems can kun
la 'jigs med mchog spyod dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag smon lam spyod ba med pa yin// nyi ma spyod dang zla ba sbyod pa dang// pad+ma lta
bur gos pa med spyod dang byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag lhar bcas 'jig rten phyag bya ba// brgya byin spyod dang tshangs pa'i spyod pa dang// dkar po'i chos rnams
yongs su rdzogs spyod dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag bdud rnams sder bcas skrag par byed// mchog spyod ba dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang// 'dod
chags nyes pa thab gcod spyod dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang gti mug spyod pa med// lam spyod pa dang mu stegs spyod pa dang// shes rab mig
ni yongs su dag spyod dang/ byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag kun tu rtog par spyod pa med// dul ba spyod dang rab tu zhi spyod dang// ming dngagazugs la mi chags spyod
pa dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa dog pa dang// de dag lha dang mi ni mang bos bstod// 'phags pa'i sbyod dang shin tu mnyam spyod dang// g.yon phyogs lam ni yongs su gcod
spyod dang/ byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rtag tu don la 'bab pa dang// dpa' bo spyod dang shin tabartan spyod dang// bdud kyi sdo rnams 'jig par byed spyod dang//
byang chub mchog gi spyod pa ga spyod pa/ de dag byang chub snying bor gzhol ba yin// gzung ba sbyong dang don yod spyod pa dang// gzungs la g.yeng ba med par spyod pa dang// byang chub/
mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang ma rog spyod pa med// dgon pa spyod dang rab tu dban spyod dang// rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar spyod pa dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod bgang
spyod pa// de dag nan tan byed par spyod pa yin// gtso bo'i spyod dang khyad par 'phag spyod dang// 'jog rten thams cad zil gnon spyod pa dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod
pa rnyed dag dman pa lani spyod pa med// rigs pa spyod dang thabs la spyod pa dang// bsam gtanabad las log par spyod pa dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gong spyod pa// de dag mi shes/
spyod pa med pa yin// lta ba spyod dang rnam par lta spyod dang// ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag 'jigs po med par spyod pa yin//
thams cad spyod dang kun tu spyod pa dang// dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa dang// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongashes nam mkha'i mtha' dang 'dra// byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ngo wang gi sgra de las byung ba na/ byang nub sa mas dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i tshes la bzod pa thob par gyur to// rgyal po ma
skyes dgra'i khor dang/ rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang/ khyim bdag dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ drib dang/ lto 'phye chen bo dang/ de dag gi 'khor gyi srog chags/
[A ]brgyad stong blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyedanas/ tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dbyang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'dil bslab par bgyi//
b+h+yA nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya// sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'dinyid yang dag par 'dzin du stsal bar bgyi'o zhes smas so// de nas bcom ldan 'dus
kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'gror gnang dro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snang bas mi 'am ci'o rgyal po ljon pa bu dang gnas/ dpung dang bcas/ sras dang bcas/ gnyon
'dab dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bzod pa gsol nas/ sil
snyan dkrol/ ma tog gi char phab/ 'od zeragyi du ba phyung ste/ sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste/ de skad cig thang cig yudatsam/
de nyidal/ ri'i rgyal bo spos kyi ngad ldang durang gi khyim du phyin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
mi'am ci'i rgyal po len pas de bzhin gshags ba la mchodapa dang/ chos la mchod pas bdag zil gyis non to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka mi 'am
'i rgyal bo ljon pas khyod 'ba'agog zil gyis mnan pa ma yin gyi/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa thob pa ma gtogs par gangadag stong gsum gyi
stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gyi brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan bas hril gyis non to/
deci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag pas/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong
ba thams cad zil gyis non to// ko'u shika de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig na gyis khril gyis gnon/gang byang chub mas dpa' bril gyis gnon par
sams pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pal hril gyis gnon par 'dod pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las ni de bzhon gshegs pa 'byung ngo// de bzhin gshegs
pa las ninyanathos dang rang sas rgyas 'byung ngo// donas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ thal mo sbyaratamachi ma blugs nas/ tshig 'di skadabyes kyi ma'o
bdag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba 'di lta bu las nyams so zhes smras so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bu lca'i bu/
'od zerasrung zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byinel 'di skad ces smras so// yab 'di ltar gangadag rab tu dben pa rnam par bsgrub par nye bar
gnas pa'i mtshan nyi ma lags pa'i chos rnams la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma skyidapa don sems can thams cad la snying rje red pa ma lags/ dog bzhin ba
rgya chen po la mos pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la stan pa ma lags te/ phyis 'gyod par 'agyur ba'o// yab skyonam dpa la zhugs te/ rgyu tshugatsange sa bon tshig sta/ theg pa chonapo'i snod
dun gyurang la dbagyir ci mchis/ bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ sumanu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu las stong tham pa dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sa mas bskyed do//
de nas bcom ldan 'dus la/ lca'i bu 'od zer srung gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dka' ba spyad ba brgya stong phragadzisnyadab
bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub soms dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan btar bani bdag la mngon sum du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub soms dpar gyur pa na/ da bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de la 'jug pa'i rnam par dbye ba bstan pa nyung zad cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//
bcom ldan 'das jiltar na byang chub sams dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la babod pa thob pa gang bdagagis gros nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bsgrubs pas chos du 'thob par 'agyur/ de skad
ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu 'od zer sru la 'di skad rjes bka' stsal to// 'od zer srung byang chub sems pa'i dog pa'i rtsa ba ma skyod pa rnams kyison mo skye ba'i
chos la bzod pa thob par ma 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' dag ba'its+tsa ba bskyod pa rnams kyis ni skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyurar// 'od zerasrung byang chub sams dang/
chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyusakyi mnyam pa nyid dang/ chos kyi mnyam pa nyid dang/ dge 'dun gyi
mnyam pa nyid dang/ zhingamanyam pa nyid de/ lha'i bu byang chub sams dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
sa mas dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhis stong pa nyid la rnam par rtsa ba dang/ pha rol
tu phyin pa drug gis thabs mkhas pa la rnam par rtsa ba dang/ mngon par shes pa las ye shes la rnam par tsa ba dang ]thogs pa med pa'i yashes kyis rdzu 'phrul/
la rnam par rtogs bste/ 'od zer srubyung chub sa mas dpa' tshos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chung sems
dba'achos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ra'agyur te/ bzhi gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ phung po rnams la byang tshub tshol yang phung po rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin
dumos pa ma yin pa dang/ khams rnams la khung chub chol yang khams rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang/ skye mched rnams la byang chub la yang skye mched rnams la
bya chub kyirang bzhin dus rtog pa dang/ chos thams cad la byang chub tshul yang chos shAms cad la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
bo 'di deg dang ldan na/ mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyuro// 'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chub sams dpa' rnyos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
'gyurata/ bzhi gang zhazha/ 'di lta ste/ mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par shes pa dang/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyidang sachos thams cad
de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'jug pa dang/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid 'dres pa med pas chos kyi dbyangs su 'du shes pa dang/ chos thamasacad mnyam pa nyidakyi rjes su song bas nam/
mkha'i rang bzhin du so sor rtogos pa ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sams dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skyo ba'ichos la babod pa thob pa 'gyur// mi skya pa'i chos
la bzod pa thob pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na// byang chubs mas dpa' lnga stong mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha'i bu 'od zer srungoni rjes su 'thun pa'i chos
la bzod pa thob par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'do'o tha mar bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'amani'irgyal
bo ljon pas zhus pa/ pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul ba bstan pa'i sgo'o le'u'i tshes kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste sa su rgyas
kyi mthunyid kyis bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags so// bcom ldan 'das a la la jitsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ab mo rnam par nges pa dang/ don bzang po dang/ tshig
'bru bzang pos brgyan pa ni mdzes te ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam gras 'dir/ btsemaM ldan 'das kyis chos sgo ma bsdus pa de gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan
'das sngon bdag la chos snang bar gyur pa gang lags pa de'ang dachos kyi rnam gras 'di la brten nas 'bum 'gyur du skyes so// bcom ldan 'das bdagani 'od sUm/
du bdag lta bu nyi tshaba'i 'tshal ba dang ldan pa// blo chungongu nyan thos kyi theg pa'i skyon ma mas pa tha chadal zhugs par gnas pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kyang 'di lta bu
chos kyi snang ba 'di skyes par gyuran/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po ye shes tshad ma mchis pa'i snod du gyurab/ blo rgya che zhing rgyumarolta bu dang ldan pa/ chos rin po
che thams da yongs su 'dzin// gsol ba ma btab par soms na thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/
chos kyi snang ba ji snyed cig thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ni 'tshol snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo stengagasum gyi steng nan po'i 'jig rten gyi
tshikhams kyi nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba ji snyed pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbra gcig gi 'od kyis mog mog por 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu/

thams cad nas 'od ji snyed byung ba de dag ni shes rab kyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang/ stong phrag brgya'i cha dang/ bye ba'i cha dang/ bye ba khrag khrig ri rgya stong gi
chadang/ grangs dang/ tshad dang/ bgrang ba dang/ dab dngargyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// dani'i phyi zhan/ snang ba thams cad ni shes rab kyi snang ba las byung ba'i phyir ro// kun dga'/
bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba gang yin pari shes rab kyi snang ba de dang ldan na/ dbazhon gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i saMngs rgyas kyis 'ongs pa
dang ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams zad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang/ g.yo ba rnams mkhyen pa'i shes rab kyis snang ba de lta bu dang/ rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs
kyi bu mo dag dang ldan par 'gyur// kun dga' bo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang/ thos nas kyang mos pa dang/ mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang// klog pa dang
kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang/ tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs pa dang/ de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de dag ni byang chub kyi sanas mi brjod pa dang/
soms can yongs su smin par bya ba don du gnyer ba dang/ snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang/ byams pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang bdud dang phyir rgol bo bcom pa dang/ byang chub kyi
snying bor gzhol ba'i skyes bu dam par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam gras
'di thos nas mos pa dang/'dzin pa dang/ 'changab dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa'i rigasakyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed gcig spyod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dirin po chasnabadunagyis rab tu bkang ste rgyun du zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom
pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyin pa sbyin pa dang/ de bzhin dunyima'i gungadang/ phyi ma red kyi dus dang/ nam/
gyi chostod dang/ namagyi gung thun dang/ thorangs stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ de bzhinagshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar la sbyin pa dang/ rnasu grangs 'di lta bu s lo gcig gam/ le brgya 'am le stong ngam/ le brgya phrag stong dusbyin pa byin na/
kun dga' bo de ji snyam dus mas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mngadaskyed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ ma ldan 'das song sta/ tshad ma
mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so/ 'om ldan 'das gdugs gcig bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung bo de'ang tshad ma mchis na/ dgung lo brgya phrag stong du/
bsags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub don du gnyer ba dang/ chos kyi
'khor lo bskor ba don du gnyer ba dang/ sems can r tu thon par bya ba don du gnyer ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos sam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chad dam/ klog gam/ kun chub
par byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sa mas dpa'i theg pa de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du spyad n/ gang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ditsi'i
phyir zhe na/ kun dag 'a bo gang dug chos kyi rnam grangs 'dilas tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa sbom 'dzin rten/'chang ngas/klog pa 'am/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag
la'ang ston na/ don sbyin pa zhes bya sta/ des ni sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa thams cad kyi mchog go/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyis
phan 'dogs pa de ni phan 'dogs pa rnams kyi mchog go/ 'dilta ste/ chos kyi gding bden gding ba rnams kyi mchog go/ 'di lta ste/ chos yongs su 'dzin pa don yongs su 'dzin/
pa rnams kyi ma chog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo chos kyi sbyin pa byin pas ni nyon mongs pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro// zangabring gi sbyin pa byin pas ni//
[+]lus brtan pa byas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo dalta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa 'bri bar byed par 'dod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi gnang ba chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byas
ta chos kyi sbyin pa des ni yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ni/ yon tan gyis phan yon yang dag phul sum cu rtsaganyis
rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/
'dod chags chung bar 'gyur ba dang/ zhe sdang chung bar 'gyur ba dang/ gti mug chung bar 'gyur ba dang/ bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa tshoragacod par 'gyur ba dang/ skya bo mang
po dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ de'i bsngags pa lha rnams kyis rjod par 'gyur ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang dri'u rnams kyis srung bar 'gyur ba dang/ las byas nas
bsod snyoms za bar 'gyur ba dang/ chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal cha dang/na pa'i gsos sman dang/ yo byad spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ grags pa dang/ sgra dang/
[ze]/ tshigs su bcad pa phyogs bcur grags pa 'gyur ba dang/ mi ma yin pa rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags par gyur ba dang
dam pa'i chos yongs su srung ba dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'gyur ba dang/ ngan song thams cad kyis 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing/ de la lha dang mir skye ba
dka' bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ chos nyan pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang 'bral bar
'gyur ba dang/ skye ba dran par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skya bar 'gyur ba dang/ nam du'ang dbangapo ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ skyes bu chen po'i
mtshan sum cu rtsaganyis thob par 'gyur ba dang/ gzi brjid can gyi gzus kyi sa bon sgrub par 'gyur ba dang/ spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/
skya bo mkhas pas g.yog bya bar 'gyur ba dang/ shes rab chen po'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/ myur du chos kyi snang ba thob par 'gyur ba dang de'i sams la
bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa kun tu mi 'byung ba dang/ 'jig na gyi zang zing gi sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ de chos kyi gtor zad mi shes pa yongs su 'dzi/
ra sa yongs su mya ngan las 'das bags pa 'di dang/ bsod nams bslang ba'i phyir/ 'i mdun songayer ni pham par 'gyur/ lha rnam+mawanas ba med pa'i
[]@#// par 'gyur bsta/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sgrim pa de/ yon tan gyi khyad par yang dag thul sum cu rtsa gnyis bro 'di dag thob par/
'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te/
btsom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na/ sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du bsgrag par bgyi/ mos par bgyi/ kun basrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du
zhen bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang/ bsod nams yongs su 'dzin pa don du gnyer ba'i slad du'o// de nas brjom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang
po brgya byin la 'gas so zhes bya ba byin te/ ko'u shi ka khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ pa'i mdun dusangage'i sgra bsgrags la legs so legs so/ ko'u shi ka dag
gi ba'irtsa ba 'dis nga'i dam pa'i chos yun ji srid gcig tu gnas pa de srid du lha dang lha ma yin g.yu' 'gyed pan lha ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur/ lha rnams ni rgyal bar
sbyin pa'o// kongashika gang nyung zad 'jigs pa skya ba de dag thams cad ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba la dmigs shing rab tu gnas pa las byung ngo/ ko'u shi ka gangami dmigs pa de dam pa'i
chos lo sa su 'dzin pa'o/ donas bcom ldan 'das la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan gyi bde ba la gnas pa tshad ma
mchis pa btang ste/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ltos dang/ yul 'khoradang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam gras 'di rab tu spyod pa de dang
de dag tu bdag chos nyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o// mchis nas kyang chos smra ba de dag chos dang ldan pas bsrung ba dang sba ba dang/ bskyab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhin
bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang/ ring sa ngas rgyas dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshas pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams ni 'di las 'byung ba'is da du'o/
da nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po bzhi po bdag cag dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chen po de dag dang/
bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rong du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bsrung ba dang/ sba ba dang/ bskyab pa la brtson par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis 'khor gang dag sangs rgyas
dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa de dag kyang/ ci nas de bzhin gshags pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du brtson bar 'gyur bar dad par bgyi'o//
bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyan dang/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la brtson pa dang/ gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon
par dad pa srung ba ma mchis pa dedag bsrung ba'i ched du gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kha ton du bgyi'o// gsang sngagasakyi tshig de dag gis gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ dri za dang/
mi 'amaci dang/lto 'phye chen po dang/ grul bum la sogs pa dang/ mi dngam ma yin pa lags pa dang/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhosdang bar bgyid pa rnams shAn tu tshor
gcod par 'gyur ro/ tad+ya thA/ ta ra bi a ra ba/ a no ba/ sa ra pa hulu/ mah+pha hulu/ hu lu hulu/ A bdaDa/ bi kad zi/ parits+tshadAni/ ni spro tsA ti/ rtsa sgyu tani/ id
Ta id/ bde Di bod [ ]/ade tshog+hats+tso/ mAr ni gra hanasarbab ra pra bA din gra han/ sarbamed ra pra mA (nananig han/ sarbab+hu tani gra han/ bud d+hAha bar ni/ dman yin ta shA ya/
bud d+ha na bud d+ha bar tan/ tsa tur mah+pha rA dzanar de shAn/ man trab lan/ a ba tA ra prak+Sha nAn gro sgra ya/ de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i byams ba dang/
[za/]byang chub sams dpa' lha'icod pan la bka' stsal ba/ skyes bu dam ba dgra sa bas la pa mtha' yas grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di tsho nas yun ring du
gnas dar 'gyur pa dang/ nud par mi 'gyur par bya ba'i phyir/ khyed gnyis kyi lag tu bzhag go/ gtad do// de gnyis kyis gsol6/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag
gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sladan chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi// rgyas par bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos sna ba dang//
dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i rogs kyi bu'am rigasakyi bu mo de dag gi lag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// de dag mdo snga'adal mos par bgyi ba dang/ yongs su 'dzin par bgyi ba'i
slad du de dag gi yid rab tu gzung par bgyi'o/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe sladama'i dusan/ chos kyi rnam grase 'di gang dag gi rna lam du thos pa dang/ thos nas 'dzin pa dang
'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ 'chadab de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lta'i cod pan gyi byin gyi rlabs lags
bar rig par bgyi'o// de nas bdud sdig can 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de gdong las mchimazag cing nga ro byunas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadabyis gsol
to (bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'dasakyisanagros kyi theg pa las btsugs te chos bstan pa de la ni bdag spyan spu zing zhes bgyid pa tsam yang ma mchis so/
gang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi lam la
'jug pa// sems can thams cad kyi ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsung ba des bdag myang nagyi zug rdu dang ldan zhing bdag rnyes par gyur par snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan
'das bdag la phyag brkyang ba sul du gsol// gang thos pas bdagamya nagyi zug rdu dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam gras 'dirta bu'ang mi gsung bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// sngagacan khyodadang 'thun pa'i sems can chos zab mo 'di lta bu la mi mos pa'i mang/ gang dag mos pa'i sa mas nan de dag ni tung gis mya ngan ma byed/ sna sngags ma
[& ]'donacig/ sdig can khyod 'di lta sta/ dbaranasa'i steng nas rdul bas ba snyad kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam gras zabamo 'alta bu la mos so// sa'i rdul ji snyid pa ded
kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di la mi mos te/ de dag thams cad ni khyod dang 'thun no// sems can gyi khams tshad med pa khyod dang 'thunagyis/ de bas na sngagican/
dga' bar gyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs ' bshad pan/ sems can dpag tu med pa ni byang chub la yang dag par zhugs/ byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong ni mi skya ba'i
chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stongani chos rnams la chos kyi mgo rdul med cing drin dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ dge slong brgyad stonganitri bar len pa
med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas snang ba chen pos 'jig rten khyab par
gyur te/ lha'i ma tog gi charani rab tu phab/ sil snyan brgyad stong dag na me dkrol bar rang brel lo// lta bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams ni stongagi bar snang las kyi ma bdag skya/
sgos 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lolan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstanata bshad nas/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa
gang lags pa 'dini grong khyer wA rA NA si chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ Da sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa de bsaches mchog go/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang
bdang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa dang/ than glegs bam la bris te 'chang pa'i sems can de dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar gyur
@# ro zhas ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ byang chub sa mas dpa' lhacod pan dang/ tshe dang ldan pa/
kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam gras 'di'i mod lags/ 'didziltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs

kyi bu dag de'i phyir khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi 'am ti'i rgyal po ldan pas zhus pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa dang/ dam pa'i chos rin po che'i le'u zhes bya bar zung zhig
zla/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// byang chub sems dpa 'byams pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lha'i tsodapanadang/ tshe dang ldand kun dga' bo
dang lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi ris to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mo 'am ti'i rgyal po
len pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// gzhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpalagyi lhun po dang/ ban d+he dpal brtsegs rika tas bsgyurang zhus te gtan
la phab pa/// rgyagar skad du Ar+ya su bi kan ta ni ta de ba pu tra par pots+tsha nAm mahAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phagaso ba lha'i bu rab rtsal
ba sams kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
gis thos pa dus ga ga na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong khri'i dge slongagi dge 'dun chen po dang/
'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag rab tu mang po dang/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang/ de las gzhan

lha'i bu rnamA dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa gnod spyin gyi 'o 'ong mang po rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po stobs chen la sogs pa nam mkha' ldingagi 'khor mang po rnams dang/ lha ma yi na gyi dpang
po sgra gcan la sogs pa lta ma yin gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang/ ma 'amani'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ni'i 'khor mang bo rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po 'i dbang po las/
bzes la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang po rnams dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas ba rnams dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang/
gtsas pa dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshos res kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa dang/
nyu@#// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dngabacas pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de dag la sogs pa 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis yongs su bskoracing mdun gyis
bltas te chos ston to// de'itshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor nyid du'adus par gyur te 'dug go/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sams dba' chen po bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg pa rang rtsal sems kyang 'dus par gyur to 'dug go/ de nas lha'i bu rab tsal soms kyis 'khor phal po che de 'dus par
rigo nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhongs la butsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas// bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa'i chen po thog ba chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa chen po brtsam pa thams cad l brtson 'grus ban pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par
'phags pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sa mas dpa' chen po ya shes kyis chags pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sanas dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyin ng du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar n
byang chub sems dpa' so mas dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams lags/ ji ltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams
lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dang ' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams lags ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sams/
dpa' chen pa soms can rnams la chos sa ba rnams lags/ 10ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams lags/ 10jaltar na byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams lags/ 'ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams lags/ 13 ji ltar na byang chub sem dpa' sas dpa' chen po
'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnamA lag/ ji b+hasha byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing brab mo la spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar n byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ jiltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas/
pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcad pa 'i slad du stsal zhing bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bgyi ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar n byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing
'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sams dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams lags/
ltar na byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po bas ma pa yongasaM su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras
pa'i sems ma mchis shing brjod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar n byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams
la lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po 'jig
rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dapa 'a so mas dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams lags/
ji ltar na byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la rmas pa ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
dug la rgya mtsho lta burnams lags/ jiltar na byang chub sems dpa 'asams dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyurabs dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar nabyang chub sems dpa'
sa mas dpa' chen po bgyi ba thams cad la slobadapon dugyur ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du khan ma tho ba ma mchis shing yon
tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis Da lha'i bu rab tsal sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab rtsal
sams legs so legs so// lta'abu khyod byang chubs mas dba'asu mas dpa' chen po 'jig rtan thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rtenagyi yosasu 'drenapa/ snying
rjechen po dang ldan pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas go cha bgos pa/ brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa ded dpon chen po/ sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa/ samasacan dang gtu med pa
thang bde ba la rab tu 'bod pa la mkhas pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu baniyang khyod legs so// lta'i bu shiphyir legs par rab tunyon la yid
lazung zhig dang/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang/ zhan dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//
lha'i bu rang rtsal sams kyis bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshul le zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' su la to// lha'i bu byang chub san sa
dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshes bzhidang ldan na/ brag pa chen po lagazhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yi nang/ bzhi gang zhen b+he las ras mngon pa rayapak+Shashas rapa dang/ sA[]
pachen pos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang/ don dang chos kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spobs pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam par mngon par bsgra ces pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga
po dag sta/ lha'i bu bye chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po dag dang ldan na/ theg pa chen po lagazhan gyi dro mi 'dzes pa rnams yano// de la 'di skad ces pa/ grapa
la mkhas pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa yi// mngon sum shes rab rtogs par khong du chud gyur cing// thams cad bskyab phyir snying rje chen po yangs pa la// gnas pa'i byams pa mngon par
sgrub par bye gyur la// don dang chos langashin tu mkhas par 'a ra ba yi ge so so yang dag rig la spobs pa thob gyur la// byang chub lam la mngon shes dag gis rnam tsa na// des na gzhan
gyi dring la 'jog par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus bstan pa rnams yin// bzhi gang zhe na/ phyir mi
ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang/ bsam pa dag pa'i rtul ba dang/ byang chub la 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ches yongs su bsgrub pa la yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang ldan pa ste/
bu byang chub sems dang 'a sams dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ pa rnam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya sta/ brtson 'grus brtan zhing
rab tu ra nas nga med gyur cing// bsam pa rog pa med cing yongs su dag gyur la// sangs rgyas ye shes don phyi'i 'dun pa drag ldan zhing// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dod ngo rtag tu yongs
ni skyo gang la chos bzhi rgyu chen khyad pa nga de yod pa// de ni byang chub sems 'byung ba rnam pa brtanu'agyur zhing// byang chub yan lag lag mtho' bzhag pa bzhin 'gyur la// dang po ma
thogs 'jig rten gsum gyi chos rgyal 'gyur/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa mas dpa' chen po tshes bzhi dang ldan na/ bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phogs pa rnams yin te/
bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms par byed pa dang sems can geng dag byang chub tu sems ma skyid pa de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed
du'ajug pa dang/ sprul pa lta bur dus gsum yongs su spo ba dang/ byang chub kyi sems ma bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de
dgadang ldan pa'o/ dal 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa gang dag shes rab pha rol phyin 'doms shing// byungachub zhugs pas byang chub sems 'dzin 'jug byed la// gang dag byang chub zhugs pas/
dus gsum yi rang zhing// yid dang ma bral sprul 'dra byang chub 'dod byed la// dag bgang yin zung thadabyed pa thams cad ni// thams cad mkhyenanyid sams la rten par byed pa yin/ lta'i
bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yaphashes kyis chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shes pas byas pa'i bya ba rnams byed cing/
nga rgyal gyis bya ba rnams mi byed pa dang/ chos thams cad rkyen la rag las shing byin gyis rlob pa med la gang brog dang bral bar shes pa dang/ stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul du gyur cing/ sems can
thams cad mi gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang/ chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing skye mched drug yongs su shes pa srung ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dong ngo// de la 'di skad
ces bya ste/ shes pas las byed de dgang rgyal yod min zhing/ brtan la mkhas pa yin zhing de dag lta med la// stong nyid spyod yul de dag sems can mi gtong zhing// chags pa kun las 'as shing/
[d]/ phyi nang gnas pa med// chos mchog bzhi po de la shin tu rab gnas pa/ (kashes pas pha rol phyin cing chags mad srodapa yin// lca'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang
ldan na/ shes rab kyi mun dang bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pas ngoms pa med cing tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba dang/ zang zing med pa'i soms kyis chos ston pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings
dbyaramad pa shes par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang/ tshul gcig la 'jug pas tshul thams cad kyi 'jug pa la 'jug pa ste chos bzhi po de dag dang/
ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag thos tshol ngoms med tshulo bzhin rtog byed cing// de mnyam ston cing klog 'dzin rAd pa tshol ma byed// nyon mongs sprin 'dra sgyu ma rmi lam lta buralta//
chos nyid tha dad mi byed de dag tshul gcig 'jug/ cha bdag chos bzhi de stanakhyadapar thob 'gyur zhing// shes rab sgron 'das mun bsal zla ltar 'jig rten rgyu// lha'i bu byang chub se mas dpa' sems
dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khor rnams kyin ng du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin ti/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs thob po dang sems can thams cad kyi h+phatsim/

gcod pa'i spobs pa thob pa dang/ sems can thams cad la bdag med pa ston pa'i snying rje chen po dang/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba mngon par shes pa'i mngashis kyi go cha bgos pa ste/ chos bzhi/
[7 ]@#// po de dag dang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thon tu chud mi za bar 'gyurab 'igazungs thob cing// de dag spobs ldan sems can som nyi gcod par byed// snying rjes/
chos 'di thams cad bdag mad ston byed cing// mngon shes shes pa'i go bgos nyon mongs bdud ma nyams// byang chub sams dpa' chos bzhi po dag gis 'jug na// 'khor kun nang du song
ts+tsA yang de la 'jigs pa med// lca'adu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshes bzhi dang ldan na/ thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa thams cad mi 'dzin pas
thos pa dang mi ldan zhing/ sgrub pa nyams pa'i byis pa thams cad yongs su song ba dang/ yi ge dang/ sgra dang/ skad dang/ tshig gi lam thams cad mngon du rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir brag
chadang mtshungs pa nyid khong du chud pa dang/ don 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir thos pa yongs su tshol zhing dga' mgur bya ba'i phyiram yin pa dang ( brjod pa med pa'i don la 'juganing brjod pa'i don la
ma yin pa sta/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji tsam mang du thos kyang don la mi rtog pas// byis pa bros dngami ldan rtag tu sgrub chos nyams// srid gsum sgra
skad dbyas dang tshig lam gang yod pa// brag cha 'dra shes de las don ldan sgra thos nas// don nyid rtogatsang dga' mgur nyes kun phyirami 'jug/ chos nyid 'den don mchog yin te
[s/ ]brjod du med// 'din don dang sgra skad thos par gyur pa las// 'gro ba rnams su 'gro bar byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sa mas dang 'a sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang
ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bu mo gtam byed pa rnams la chos ston pa dang/ skye bo phal po che 'dus pa dag la 'chib rjes su dran pa dang/
gtong ba chen po dag la rjes su yi rang zhingabyang chub tu yos su sngo ba dang/ 'du 'dzi thams cad las dben par gazhol ba sta/ chos bzhi po de dag dngango// de la 'di skadacis bya sta/
gang che skye bo mang po'i dbus su son gyur pa/ darani mkhas pas chos kyi gtam la 'jug par bya// skye bo mang po 'dus par gyur pa'i tshogs rnams la// 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i 'dunas
rab tu bsgom par bya// danas bag yod gzhan gyi gtong ba rnam lnga yi// gtong la yi rang byas nas byang chub bsngo bya zhing// gang 'du 'dzi dag dang phrad par gyur pa'-itshe// deranidangon par
gzhol ba rab tu 'dod par bya// lha'i bu byang chub sems dang 'as mas dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsus pa bzhin du smra ba rnams
yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang/ thos pa sgrub pa snying por byed pa dang/ ji skad smras ba de bzhin du byed pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa la 'jug pa ste
chos bzhi bo dedag dang// de la 'di skadathog bya sta/ nyamangaganod bar gyur kyang byang chub sems mi gtong// de dag skyob pa'i chos thos sgrub pa snying por byed// bka' blo bde/

[M]sa 'thunaji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// mkhas pa de dag chos kun 'ang pashin badug mda'ajug/ daltar brtson pa'i shes ldan snas bzhin byed 'gyur zhing/ rtag brtson mi 'dorardzas 'thun bdag med tsi
yang med// gtusnyan pa'i 'phrang ba phyogs bcur grags 'gyurazhing// daltar chos sna de dag chos kyi shes las 'phags// lha'i bu byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang gan
sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'daganyid sgrub pa la gnas shing sems nyan rnams la chos ston pa dang/ bdaganyid dul ba dang/ bsrung ba dang/ sgrol ba dang/ brtul
ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing sems can gzhan dag dulabar bya bo dang/ bsrung ba dang/ dgrol bdang/ gdul ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang
bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsam pa nges par gyur nga/ sems can rnams kyang theg pa chen po la rab tu 'god par byed pa dang/ bdag nyid chos 'dod cing chos 'dod pas
gzhan dag la'ang ston par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sgrub pa snying por byed cing 'gro la chos ston la// dul bsrungs legs btul shin tu myan
'dus nas kyang// gang dag ma dul ma bsrung dmag tul mya ngan las/ ma 'dres de dag chos kyi dkon mchog 'byor pa ru'adzud// de dag byang chubs mas dpar bsam pa nges gyur cing// theg
pad la 'gro ba rnams kyang 'god par byed// rtag tuchos 'dod don ldan ma gus byed cing// sems can rnams la'ang de dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams ston// lha'i bu byang chub so mas dpa'
sems dpa' chen po chos bzhidang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te/ pazhigangazhan/ yang dang yang du chos pa'i gnas pa bzhis gnas pa dang/ rtag par
rgyun du rab tu dben par gnas pa dang// chos zab mo la bzodapa dang/ lus dang sams mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo// de la'adiskad ces bya ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas sa
lo rtag tu rab gnas shing// dben par gnas pa la yang dga' ba skyed byed la// shes pas zab mo'i 'bod la dris pa thobagyur cing// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan parogyur pa sto
de ltar mngon par brtson pa'i 'jigs pa med pa rnams// mngon shes lnga po dag gis mngon par 'phags gyur cing// de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyanasngar 'dug 'dra la// sems
can mang bo rnams kyang yongs su sminabyed 'agyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams yin te/
bzhi gang zhe na/ stong nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'ibasam gtan bzhi dang/ sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i snying rjecan po dang/ dkon mchog gsum
gdung mi gcod pa'i brtson 'grus dang/ thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrobs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya sta/ mtshan med stong pas/
nges pa'i bsam gtanabazhi sgom zhing// sems can yongs su bskyab phyir rtag tu snying rje ldan// dkon mchogagasum rgyun mi gcod brtson 'grus thob gyur cing/ kun tu thabs ldan pa rol phyin pa drug
la 'jug/ de ltar spyodamakhas blo ldan m bdag yid gzhungs pa// dedag bdudapa'i dag las yang dag 'das gyur cigo/ bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa'i 'gro bamagon med rnams// mya ngan 'da' bar
'gro ba'i lam la 'god par byed/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ blos gting dpag dka' rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ chos brang mo'i tshul la
'jug pa dang/ rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dka' ba dang/ rtag tu yid byung zhing chos sems par byed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrib pa med pa la sems kyis nges par rtog pa 'byed/
pa ste chos bzhi po de dag dang// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs par gyur pa dang/ rtas/ tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dka' 'gyur la// rtag tu yid byung chos
la bsam ba zhugs gyur cing// sems kyis nges par rtog pa rabyed pa gang yin pa'i// mkhas pa theg pa che la brtan pa la rab gnas pa/ blo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' bar rab 'gyur zhing
chags pa med pa'i yolags yang dag sgrub byed pa// de phyir blo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' ba yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chanapo chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten
gyi chos brgyud kyis mi gos pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang shon/ rUd pa dang/ snyan pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ bde bar 'angs ba mad pa dang/ marUdapa dang/ ma sAn pa dang/ smad pa dang/ sdug bsngal
gyis zhum pa med pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ phung po rnams la yongs su spyod par byed ba dang/ phung po yongs su shes pa srung shing dbenapar lta bste/ chos bzhi po de dag

dang go/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rUdadang snyan dang bstod dang bde ba kun thob kyang/ de dag la ninamos kyang khengs bar 'gyur ba med// ma red mi snyan smad dang sdug bsngal thob gyur kyang/ dedug
pad+ma bzhin dachags med 'jig rtan spyod// sems can sminapar du phyir phung po yongs spyodacing// lungapo skyam gsoga'adra ya ma brlar shes pa// sems can phan bde'i don du 'jig rten spyod
byed kyang// 'jig rtan chos kyis mi gos tshul khrims sros dang ldan// lha'i bu byang chub sam sa dpa' samos dpa' tshanabo chos bzhi dang ldan// gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams
(min// bzhigashen/ bdag bdag med pa dang/ sems can la soms namad pa dang/ chos dben pa dang/ shes pa chags pa med pa lta/ chos bzhi po de ga dngo
na da la'adiskad ces bya ste/ bdag la bdag med nyid du longs su shes gyur cing// sems can sems can med par rjes su rtogs gyur la// chos rnams dben pa nyid du yongs su rtogs gyur cing//
mkha' la lag bzhin shes pa chags sa yodamin pagi/ dwapa' rnams zab mo dag la yongs su spyod byed l// spyod pa med la rtag tu spyod par byed gyur cing/ 'dzin dang kun 'dzin kun dang/
rnams bral bas// sems can dag pa de dag de phyir gting dpag dka'// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhidang ldan na/ chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas
pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gung zhen/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang/ shes rab rnob dang/ sngon gyi smon lam rnam par dag pa sta/ chos bzhi po de dag
dang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni rab tu thob gyur cing// shes pas so u0f7c yang dag rig pa mi zad 'gyur// rtag tu shes rab rnon por gyur cing sngon yang ni//
yang dag bsags pa yongs su dag pa thob gyur pa// sems/tsana rnams kyi dpang po yongs su shes byas nas/ de dang 'dra ba'i chos rnams yongs su ston par byed// de dag bstan pa 'bras
pas/ bu med pa ma yin te// de'i phyir mya ngan 'das nas mya ngan 'da' bar byed// lta bu byang chub sems dbar gams dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas
rnam par thar pa'i sgor zhugs pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid sbyod yul du gyuracing lta ba 'ching bas bcus pa'isems can rnams thar par byed pa dang/ mtshan ma med
pa la gnas shing rnam par rtog pa spyod pa rnams yos su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang/ smon pa mod pa la gnas shing sems can yongs su smin par bya pa'i phyir bsams bzhin du skya pa
len pa dung/ thabs la mkhas sho shes rab kyis nges par byung ba sta/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya sta/ stong nyid spyod yul de dag ltas bcings grol byed cing/
mtshan mada gnas nigashing sems can 'di dag yongs smin byed// smon pa med la gnas shings mas can sminapya'i phyir// bsams bzhin skye zhing grang du 'dod pa na skye 'gyur// shes
rab thabs kyis nges byung+ga rnam thar sgor gnas kyang// 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings ni sa mine thob ma byed// lcare'u byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/
lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshorag 'i phyir snul zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin// bzhi gang zhen/ chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgo yang dag par shes pa dang/ chos thams cad slob
byu/ pa med par mos pa dang/ kun tu rtog pa'i tsa ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhinatsan gyis chos thams
[+ ]cad la nem nur med pa sbyo/ chos bzhi po de dgadang ngo// de la'adi skad ces byusta/ sems mnyam chos kyi dbyings su nges par byung gyur cing// de dag rnams kyi sgrib pa 'ga' yang mthong
zla 'gyur// nyon mongs kun tu rtog pa'i rnalas rab byung bar// shes nas de las sne yazhir kun tu ston mi byed// chos 'di thams cad rang bzhinamya ngan 'das po dang// ma skyes
a ma 'gogs ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa yin// de dag kun mkhyen yongs btsal mya ngan 'das gyur nas// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag tshar gcod byed pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan nu/ las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhon/ longs spyod chen po'i rgyu sbyin pa mi spong ba dang// mtho ris su skye ba'i

rgyu tshul khrims mi spong ba dang/ shes rab chen po'i rgyu thos pa mi spo ba dang/ grol ba'i rgyu sgom pa ma spongab sta/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lo sa sprod che rgyu spyan
pa mo slong de'i 'bras te// mtho ris skye ba'i tshul khrims thob cing de'i 'bras to// shes rab nyon mongs 'joms rgyu thos pa de'i 'bras te// rnam grol rag rgyu sgom par bodacing de'i
wa'abras te// rgyu bzhi de la rtag brtson khas ba de dag ni// byang chub snying bor dbang bskur 'bras phyir nyin mtshan spyod// lha'i bu byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po chos bzhi dang
ldan na/ lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin// bzhi gang zhe na/ tshad par smra ba ma yin pa dang/ rtag par s ba ma yin pa dang/ ma rig pa
byungan rga shi'i bar du 'byung bar lta zhing bdag tu lta bar yang mi byed pa dang/ ma rig pa 'gags na rgya shi'i bar du 'gags par lta zhing srid pa 'gags par yang mo byed pa sto/ chos bzhi bo
dodugadang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam yang rtag par ma lta chad par ltung mi byed// des ni chos rnams rkyen byung byed pa po dang ni// tshor ba po med rang bzhin rnam par dag par
shes ma rig rtsa nas rga shi'i bar du'abyung 'gyur ba// rgyal ba kun gyiso gsungs te de 'gag rgyu dang ni// rkyenazod de phyir byin chad skyo mi 'gyur zhes gsungs// lha'i bu byang chub
sams dpa' so mas dpar chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ goms na yo sa su smin par byapa'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can
thams cad la rag las par lta ba dang/ dge ba'i rtse ba yang dag par bsags pa la skyo ba med pa dang/ khorab 'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su tshol ba dang/ sems can rnams
kyi mos pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i mos pa'i thabs kyis nyams su myong bar byed cing/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis ma yin pa ste// chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
sangs rgyas byang chub 'din sems can rnams la rtan// dge ba sogs shing 'dod pas yongs su skyo ba med// 'khor ba'isgo nas mya ngan 'das pa yongs tshol zhing// sams na ji bzhinamos pa thabs
ts+tshA kyis yongs su shes// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ longs spyod mi zad pa dang/
sa chos ston pa mi zad pa dang/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang/ sams sa dang mnyam pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo// de la 'disnyed ces bya ste dudag rnams kyi longs spyod rtag tu mi zad cing/
rtag tu chos kyis mi zad rgya mtsho 'drab yin// de dag mnashes lnga po mi byed rtag mgayo// rtag tu dran ldan basam pas dang 'dra ba yin// mnyam med byang chub phyir ni yang dag zhugs gyur cing/
mya ngan ma 'das gang la chos rnams de yodapa// de dag 'gro ba kun gyi nye bar 'tshor 'gyur zhing// byang chub mchog phyir myur dunges par 'byungabar 'gyur/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zheno/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis gnas pa dang/ bsdu ba'i ngos
po bzhis sdud pa dang/ bden pa bzhi shes pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rmongs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis/
gnas byed cing// bsdu ba'i dngos po dag la rtag tu dga' byed la// bden pa bzhi po ngag la 'jigs med dpa' bo rnams// 'gro bas rimo byas shing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// so so yang dag
rig pa'i pha rol son gyur cing// 'chad dang klog pa dag la rtag tu brtson gyur la// pha rol bde bar gyur pa'i bde bas mgu byed na// de phyir de dag yid du 'ong zhing sdug par 'gyur// lha'i bu
byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa dang/ tshul khrims dang ldan/
zhing tshul 'chos pa med pa dang/ des shing 'grogs na bde ba dang/ dben pa la dga' zhing dbang po bsrungs pa dang/ bdag nyid bde ba la lhug par chags pa med cing rtag tu kha na ma tho ba la lta
bste chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos pa'i yon tan thob cing tshul khrims pha rol son// tshul 'chos med cing rtag tu des la brtul zhugs bzang/ nags
dang nags 'dab gnasashing dbang po sdom byed la// dran ldan bdag bde mi ltos kha na ma tho lta// gangal rtag tu dge ba'i yon tan de yodapa// de dag rtag tu semaMs tshan phan phyir brtson gyur
@#/ zhing 3de dag sems can don yang rtag tu byed 'gyur la// de dag rtag tubyung chub phyir yang yi dogazhol 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po chos bzhi dang ldan/ dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa med pa rnams yin te/ bzhigangazhan/ dadab phunasumatshogs pa dang/ brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa dang/ snying rje/
zla chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang/ thog batshan khor mo sasu sngobal mkhas pa rnams// chos bzhi po dag dang// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag dod dang ldan la rtul ba brtan ldan zhing
dedag brtson 'grus mthudang stobs dang ldan pa yin// 'gro ba kun la byams dang snying rje ldan shing/ byang chub ched du yongs su sngol mkhas pa ste// daphyir dag ba kun la smras pa yod monazhing
zla ba nya ba'i zlob ma la bal skar ma gi/ tshogs kyi dbus na gnas pa rnam bdamadzes pa ltar// yang dang yang du dge ba kun la rnam 'phel 'gyur/ lta bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpachen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab dag la rgya mtsho lta burnams yin te/ bzhi'ongazhen/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang/ sgrub pa snying por byed pa dang/ blorab tu gnas pa
dang lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo ltar ba stan pa ste/ chos bzhi po der gdago/ de la 'dik+kadatses bya sto/ mkhas ba de goji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ dodag sgrub pa snying po'abyed tsing blob gnas

gang dag btson pa de dag rdo rje lta bu yi// phyug pa'i bsam pa ba rten pa dag dang ldan bar 'gyug/ mkhas bag nga dag chos bzhi de dag ston byed pa// de dag rtag tu da la'i bshes gnyen stan byed cing/
dam bcas rnams pa snying por byed par 'gyur ba dang// rtag tu sa ngas rgyas gsung yang 'dzin bar byed pa yin/ de lta bu byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos
la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnamaMs yin ta/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ya sa kyi stobs cano rnams yin zhing nyon mongs pa'i stobs can rnams ma yin pa dang/ sems la dbang sgyur ba
rnamag yin zhing bdud kyi dbang sgyur ba rnams ma yin pa dang/ gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin pa dang/ 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa rnams yin te chos bzhi po di dago
dang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya de dag ye shes stobs ldanonamongs dpang mi 'gro// shes rang stobs kyis blun sbyangs lta rnams kun dang bral// soms la dbang sgyur byed cing
bdud bzhi sras gyur la// spobs pa brtan par gyur cing gzungs kyis 'khrugs pa med// de dag ston pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur te// de phyir myur du dbang phyug nyid dang ldan pa ra
'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldonan/ bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ nga rgyal med pa dang/ bla
mal gus pa dang/ bag yod pa dang/ 'dun pa drag po ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nga rgyal med cing blam gus pas gnas gyur la//
kun nas lag yod byang chub mchog la 'dun drag cing// bsam pa thag pas smon cing rtag tu drang gyur la// slob dpon dab mkhyadam dpa rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur// mkhas pa 'jig rten 'jig
rten 'das pa'i don mkhas shing// tshul dang tshul ma yin la mkhas pa'i brtan pa rnams// 'jig rten kun mdza' thamasazod rtogs par khong duchud// dophyir 'gro bas spyi bor thal sbyar de la 'du

sgyu lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ spams cad dukha na ma tho ba med cingayon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes
pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang/ sangs rgyus thams cad kyis dgongs pa'i spobs pa dang/ dge ba thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing bag chags dang bral ba dang/ dag pa'i chos thams cad dang ldan
zhing /dbang bskur ba thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste 1 soms can dag pa rgya chen mngon shan shes pas sne// bde gshegs kun gyis dgongs pa ma bar 'dra'i
spobs dang ldan// brtson 'grus thogs mod mi dag bag chags kun sbas shing// dge dang ldan zhing dbang bskur thob par gyur pa ste// chos rnams de dag la ni rab tu gnas gyur pa//
de dag ban ma sngo med pa'i yon tan ldan// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi ba sgrub pa 'di bstan ban/ lha dang mi rnams las srog chags sa ya nyis 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu sems bskyedad// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gisani mo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srogachags 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi
mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug rab tu g.yos shing/ 'jig rten thams cad snang ba chen pos
khyab par yang gyur to// lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog gichar rab tu phab cing/ lha'i saMl sAnu dag gi sgra yang phyung bar gyur to// klu rnams kyis kyang mu tig dmar po dang/ klu'i me tog gi
char rab tu phaba'o/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lta'ipa chen po dang gnodano rnams kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mchod pa dag gis mchod pa byas so/
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang a la la chos/ a la la chos/ a la la chos zhes lan gsum ched du brjod nas// mchod pa chen po dag kyang byas so// de nas
lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ dzam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyisachos sum du rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang/ tshig gis rnam
par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa de bka' stsalagyis/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang chos sum cu rtsa gnyise bo de dag gi don dang tshig rnam par gtan la dbab pa de la spobs par gyis/
shig 'jam dpal joltar nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi drangami 'jog pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
zla dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba de ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus
smras pa/ 'dzam dpal ji ltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsams pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dbal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dang/
sems dpa' chen po rnams nyon mongs pa tham sa cad nges par 'jom par byed pa da ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ba rnam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus bstan pa rnams yin no//
zla 'i dusas pa/ 'jam dpa la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyis mi g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa de lta na/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa
rnams yin no// lca'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal jiltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yazhes kyis chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jam dang 'a gyis smras pa//
lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yul thams cad la chags par mi byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po yashes kyis chegs pa
med par spyod pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus snyas pa// 'jam dpa la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
lta'abu khung gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes par byed pa deltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen pos
rab gyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smas pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/
'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chun po rnams chos thams cad rnam par phya mi redapar byed pa de lta na 1 lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyin ng du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa
rnams yin/ 'dzam dbalagyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gangag tsho phung chusems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad brjod du med pa shes par byed pa de lta na/
lha'i bu byang chub sems dang sams dpa' chen po thos pas den la rton pa rnams yino// lha'i dus sas pa/ 'jam dpalaji ltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul
gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gitshe byang chub sams deba' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings zhibanyid du shes bar byed pa de stan/ 'o
bu byang chubs mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rtonab rnams yin no// lce'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal dziltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems nabo sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du stsa ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'ibu sengagatsho byang chub sanas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgra thams cad la
rten par mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin smra ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ ramadapal
ltar nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen posems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
rnams smra ba thams cad las ldog par byed pa de ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems na rnams la chos snab rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpalajiltar
nabyang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis snasal/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad las g.yo bar mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po man par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no//
lta'i dus smras pa// 'jam dpa la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe
byang chub sems dpar sams dpa' chen po rnams stong nyid rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub yin par yos su tshol bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
dbar go mas dpa' chen po bdu thams cad kyis thul bar du 'a ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus snyam pa/ 'jam dpal jiloran byang chub sa mas dparasams dba' rnapo blos gting dpog dka'
ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal rgyas smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chanapo rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gting rtogs par byed pa de stan/lha'i bu byang chub
[7]@#// sams dpa' mas dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltan byang chub nas dba'asams dpa' chen po 'jig rtenagyi chos brgyad

kyis mi gos pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha ri bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pe rnams 'jig rtan n spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis gos pa rami 'gyur la de lta na da
bubyang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rtan gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal tshe ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sams dang 'chen po gting dpa ga dkar

zhing thal mo la spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha rilu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' so mas dpa' tshan po rnams bdag la bdag med pas skyid lug par mi 'gyur ba de ltan/lha'i dubyang chub

sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka'azhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin no// lci'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dpang po la mkhaMs pa/

rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lci'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dbang po drug gis dbang po thams cad la lta bar byed pa de lta na/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chu sems dbasams dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gzhas pa rnams yin/

'jam dpal gyis smyos pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgo thams cad nas thar pa ston par byed pa de lta na/ lca'i khu byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas

dang ma 'dres las rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin no// lce'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar n byang chubs mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag ba'i nga rgyal can tsha gcad pa'i phyirebasgrub pa la mkhas pa

rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lca'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa tshol zhing lta bar byed la/ myongan las 'das pa los kyang 'khor ba

tshol zhing lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'chobo lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tsha gcad pa'i phyir snal zhi bsgrub pa la ma bas pa rnams yin no/ lce'ibus sasal/ 'jam dpalaji ltar
na byang chub soms dab 'asems dpa' chen po las kyi bya bkrams cad kyis rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bulang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rnams chos thams
cad mi 'pho bar lta bar byed pa de ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyis bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smas pa 'jam dpal ltar na byang chub
soms dpa' sams dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin M/ 'jam dpal gyis smas ba lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i
ka @#// chen po rnams chos thams cad bdag po med par shes par byed pa de stan/ lca'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnams dang bral zhing nacing 'brel par 'byung ba la/
mkhas pa rnams yin// smyu'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal khriltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis

wa sa pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi tshul la smod par mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par
bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin no// wA'i bus sas pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin/ 'jam

dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtogs pa nyid byang chub yin par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su
dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chon po zhe 'gras pa'i soms med cing/ bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin

'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/lha'i bu gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gtan du yos sumya ngan las 'das par shes par byed/ lta kharabyed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
pasems dpa' chen bo zhe 'gras pa'i sa mas medacing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yino// lha'i bus smras pa ]'jam dbal jiltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa

thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe bu chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad bcol las mthong bar byed pa de ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tuphyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin no// lca'i lus stsas kha/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bo sems can thams cad gyi nya bar/

tsho ba rnams yin/'jam dpa lagyis smras pa/ ltu'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyidabyis mi zad pa rab tu rtogs par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpas mas
dang ba chen po sems can thams cad kyinye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin no/ 'i bus smras pa/'jam dpaladziltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' manabo 'jig rten thams cad mnapar 'dubar 'gyur ba rnams yin/

'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gangagi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi snang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad n snang ba de lun/ lci'i bu byang nusems dpa' sams pa chen po
'jig thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpaladziltar n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srogachags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin no// lce'i dus smras pa/ 'jam dpalajiltar nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la snas

pa med pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang tshobang nub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad la nam mkha' dung mtshungs pa 'dra bar shes par byed pa de stan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la sbas pa med pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag lasnying por gyur pa rnams yin/'as

dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' so mas dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'byed pa mi 'byed pa de lta na/ lca'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por
