gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
khangagi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po rnams bsam du med pasams pas sems thams cad shes par byed pa da lta na/ lca'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'chen po chos la dbang sgyur
[z/]bas dbang phug tugyur ba rnams yin no/ lcabus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sa mas dpa' sums dpa' chen po khyab thams cad la slob dpon du gyurapa rnams yin/'jam dbagyis smras pa/

lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshul gcig gis tshul thams cad shes par byed cing/ tshulathams cad kyis kyang tshul gcig shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub
soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po khya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dzoltar n byang chubs mas dparasams dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med
nga bon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras po// lta bu gang gi tshe byang nub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad ganyen po med par rtogs nas chos 'ag/2
yang sgrub par mikhyed/ chos 'ga' yang sel bar mi byed pa de ltan/ lta bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha nam thoba medacing/ yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin

no 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'dir bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri brgyad stong gis mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lca dang mi rnams kyi skyo dgu 'dumakhrinyesestong

ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ srog chags 'bum lhag tsam niblan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems bskyod do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bal
mchod pa'i phyi'i lha rnams kyis kyang stongagi bar snang lasalca'i mi tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu bab bo// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur
gyurab sabastan pa 'di thos nas yi ras pa dang dga' ba dang/ yid badebaskyas nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis kyang chos de dag thob par gyur cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurapa'igrogs
la ji lta ba de lta bu'i spobs pa mi chod pa 'ang thob par gyur ces smras so// btsom ldan 'dasakyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos rnam par gtan la dbab ba bstan pa/
di legs bar snas te/ legs so legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no/// bam po gnyis pa// de nas lha'i bu rab stsal sems kyis/
'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ci khyod kho bo las chos kyi dogs pa 'dod dam/ 'jam dpalagyis smras pa// lha'i bu 'di skad du/ khyod chos kyi dgab pa 'dod
dam zhes zer bani lha'i bu legs par gsus pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la chos kyi dgab pa zhes bya ba 'din srid pa dang 'dod pa sbas pa yin te/ chos 'di ni sI sor rtogs pa med pa'i phyir 'dod pa med
pa yin no// chos 'di'i mig gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir bltar mi snang ba yin no// chos rangani mngon par grub pa ma da pa'i phyir ma byas pa yin no// chos 'di ni yul drug dang ma

[a ]'dres pa'i phyir mi mthong ba yin no// chos 'di ni sems dang/ yid dang/ rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med pa yin no// chos 'di'i gtan yongs su ma grub pa'i phyirab zung ba med pa//
yin no// chos 'din yul med pa'i yul du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhi med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir zag pa med pa yin no chos 'don sngon gyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir

'ong ba med pa yin no// chos 'dzin phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyi'i 'gro ba med pa yin// chos 'di ni de ltar byang ba rnam par dag pa'i phyire gnas pa med pa yin no/ chos 'di ni brtag cingasal

ba'ang bral ba'i phyi'i rtsol ba med pa yin no// chos 'dononam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyiramanyam pa med pa yin no chos 'di noge nyen po med pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no/chos 'di'i bdudakyi
yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyiragayo ba mapa dang/ rlom sems med pa dang/ ma brtags pa dang/ rnam par ma brtags pa dang/ rnam par m bsgrubs pa dang/ kun tu m btsan

pa yin no// chos 'di ni skye ba dang/ 'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir blang ba'od pa dang/ dor ba med ba yin no// chos 'di'i chos kyi dbyi sa su yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyi'i gnas chad par gnas pa yin no

chos 'di ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i phyir dbyer med pa yin no// chos 'din spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu spyod pa med pa yin no// chos 'di rang bzhin gyis nyebar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa dang bral ba

[s; ]@#// yin no// chos 'di ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba yin no// chos 'di ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad nges par bcom pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa che dang yin no/

[P, ]chos 'di ni'i dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba'i phyi re shin tu 'phags pa yin no/ chos 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa yin no// chos 'di ni nges par m brtags pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yin no//
chos 'di ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i phyir smon pa mdad yin no// chos 'deni rtsa ba yongs su chud pa'i phyirami gnas pa yin no/ chos 'din grogs med pa'i phyir mi ston pa yin no// chos 'di ni mi
napa'i phyi'i mi g.yo ba yin// chos 'di ni gzed ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa yin// chos 'di ni gtan mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyiresems can med pa yin no// chos 'di ga byed m

nas ma byung ba'i phyi'i rtag pa med pa yin// chos 'din gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ma byung ba yin no// chos 'di ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yin no/ chos 'di ni mtshan nyid thams cad/

dang bral ba'i phyiramtshan nyid med pa yinego/ chos 'di nig zod ma nas yang dag bar rgyun chad pa'i phyir zhib yin no// chos 'dinagazod ma nas nye bar zhiba'i phyir yang dag par rgyun chad pa med pa yin no// chos/

na ma byed pa dang mi snang ba'i phyir nam mkha'i mtshan nyid lta bu yin na/ lha'i bu chos de lta bu de la chos kyi dgab pa ji lta bu zhig yod/ lca'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa la chos 'di'i degob pa ni kun tu 'gro ba med pa yin no/
'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu legs so legs so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos 'di dgab pa ni gangal lus dang/ ngag dang/ soms kyis tshul ba med pa de lta bu yin no// de ci'i phyir na/
na/chos 'di ni gsal kha rog pa med pa yin pas de ni so mas rtog pa chen gyis mchod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// lta'i'us smras pa// 'jam dpalaji ltar n sems rtog pa na yin/ 'jam dpal
gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gzugs kyi mtshan rjes su dran par byed pa'i sams rtog pa can yin no// sgra dang/ skad dang/ dbyas dang/tshig gi lam gyis chos rjes su dran par byed pa ni samasarog
pa can yin no// 'bras bu thob pa mngon du byed pas dge 'dun rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rtog pa can yin no// nyon mongs pa gtanaslongab rjes su dran par byed pa ni sams rog pa can yin no//
skya ba la rtan pas lha rjes su dpar byed pa ni sams rogapa can yonen// ma dul pa'i sbyin pa'i ma nis mas rog pa can yin no// ma zhi ba'i tshul khrims kyi sams ni sems rtog pa can yin
no sems canul napa'i bzodapa'i samasanas maso rog pa can yin no// spros pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi soms nis mas rtog pa can yin no// bdag tu 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i byams
pa'i sams nasams rog pa can yin no// sams la sa par ma bsams pa'i bsam gtan gyi sems ni sems rtog pa can yin no// thecom can gyi snying rje'i sems ni sems rtog pa can/
@#// yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang bral ba'i dga' ba'i sa mas nasems rtog pa can yin no// gnyis la gnas pa'i btang snyomasakyisems ni sems rtog pa can yin no//

lus su 'du shes pa'i tshora'i sems ni sems rtog pa can gi go/ chos su 'du shes pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sems nisems rtog pa can yin no/ skye ba dang 'jig par 'du shes pa'i yang dag pa ra srong ba'i
sa ma ni sems rtog pa can yin no// lus dang sems la rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sam nisams rog pa can yin no// dbang po drug la rten pa'i dbang po lnga'i sems ni sems rog pa can yin no//

zla lta ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'i stobs lnga'isams ni sams rtog pa can yin no// chos su 'du shes pa la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi yanalag gi sems nas mas rtog pa can yin no// 'dubyed yid la byed pa la brtson
pa'i lam bsgom pa'i sems ni sams rtog pa can yin no// sdug bsngal la yongs su rtog pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ni sems rtog pa can yin no// kun 'byung ba la bsgom pa'i 'du shes can gyis ma/
nas mas rog pa can yin no// 'gog pa zad par 'du shes pa'i sems nusems rtog pa can yin no/ lam bsgom pa la bsgom pa'i 'du shes pa'i sems ni sa mos rog pa can yin te/ lha'i bu ji tsam du/
rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nyid la sgro 'dogs par byed ba datsam dusems rtog pa can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems rtog pa med pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
00 smras pa// lha'i bu gang dag gi so mas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dgago/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha' la sams cung zad kyang yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lhar buji ltar
nam mkha' la sa mas mad pa bzhin du sams de'ang de dang 'dra ste/ gang gi sa mas de 'dra bde ni sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin go/ lha'ikhus smas pa/ 'jam dpale gnas de lasu zhig mos
par 'gyur/'jam dpal gyis smas ba/ lta'ibu lhag bar byed pa la btson pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba yin no/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag par byed pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/
'jam dpal gyis smas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi sa mas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi bye'i lhag par byed pa'o lca'i bus smras pa// rim dbal ci zhig lhag par byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
lha'i bu rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no// mi rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ sdug pa dang/ mi sdug pa dang/ bdag dang bdag med/

bar byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no/ stong pa zhes bya ba dang/ gang zag ces bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba dang/ smon pa med do zhes bya ba de nilhag par byed pa yin/
no/ (stsam dang/ rmi la ma dang/ mig yor dang/ gzugs bar n dang/ zog chadang chu zla dang/ smig rgyu dang/ sprul pa'i dab nye bar dgod pa dag gis chos rnam par 'jog par byed/ mtshon par byed/
[s/ ]ka/ 'jug par byed/ ston par byed pa de lhag par byed pa yin no// ji tsam dus rnam par 'jog par byed ba de tsam du lhag par byed pa yin te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa la skyon du byed

[+ ]kha dang rnam par byong ba la skyon med pa byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// 'khorab la skyon du lta bar byed ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta bar byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin te/ lha'i bu de

ts+tshA dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal tsana rnams kyi lhag par byed pa dag yin// lha'i bus smras pa 'dzam dpal ji ltar na lcagapa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nges par

'byung ba'i dbyings rtogs shing nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas kyang/ 'gog pa 'gog par la mi byed la/skye bgad pa skyed par yang mi khyodagling ga sgra thams cad kyi sa skag par ya mi

byed la/ kun nas nyon mos pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa de lta'ang shesaNanang chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral ba dang/ blang ba med pa dang dor bamed pa thob pa de nilco'ibu

lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/lci'i bunyi khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi tsho'i rdul medacingedrim dang bral ba rnam par dga'o/ dge slong lnga stongani

len ba ma da bar zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri nyis stong gis na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis ni blo na mad pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ dag bstan stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba las bud med nyis stong yang chos rnams

la chos kyi mig rdul med cing drim dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ de nas lha'i bu rang la sems kyiso/ nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces sbas so// tshodang ldan pa dag khyed cag kyang the tshom yodapa dag
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris kyi/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srungasachen pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam
gtan byed pa/ ci zhig la bsam gtan byed pa yin/ 'jam dpa la gyis smras ba/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po dag slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pani/rtsa ba med pa dang/ mtha' med
pa dang/ gnas med pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang/ mi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang/ yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no// 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ni las
bsam ted skad sna/ 'jam dab lagyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po rtsa ba nirang gi lus yin mtha'anir 'dzin pa yin/ gnasazhi khams gsum yin/ 'khrugs pa ni nyon mongs pa
rnams yin/ mi menyam pa zhiganyis yin te de la des lus pa ba med par shes par 'dzin pa ni mtha'amed pa shes/ kham gna gnas amed bar shes/nyonamodA ba rnamAn mo'akhrug bar shes/ bsam gtan rnams ni/
khyu// gnyis su med par shes pa san/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po kho bos de las bsams nas dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang/
[A/ ]gnas med pa la bsam gtanabyed pa dang/ mi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang/ yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no zhes smras so// shAri'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpaladziltar/
blon byang chub sems dba'achags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gang chags de thams cad la spyod par byed kyang chags/
pa thams cad kyis gos pa rami 'gyur shing nyon mongs pa thams cad la mngon sum du byed kying/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i nyon mongs
pa de dag kyang spong bar ma bye pan/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa'i chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin no// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa 'jam dbal ji ltar na byang chub sems
ba' rdzu 'phrul che ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa// btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po byang chubs mas dpa' gang 'dus byas kyang m klob/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma thob la/ slob pa dang mi
slob pa rnams kyang 'dul bar byed na/ datsam gyis ne byang chub mas dpa'i rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no// rab 'abyor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub so mas dpar nyon mongs pa med par

gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sams dpa' chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes par byed la/ pha rol dang/ tshu rol dang bral zhing byang chub kyi sgra//
kha rang gi slobal/ ting 'dzin las kyang mi snang zhing/ bya ba thams cad kyang stong par byed n de tsamachis na byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa yin no// byams ma'ibu gang
bos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos smra ba yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thams cad kyis srobs par
byed po 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed la/ bsal ba stong brag rnams su don dang/ tshig dang/ yi lo ston pa rnams kyis rgyas par ston par byed kyang mthar/
thug par mi 'gyuranA/ datsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chos ston ba yin no// nam grus smras pa/'jam dbal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
btsun banam gru gang gi byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par gzhag pa nyid yin par yang shes par byed la sems rnam pa 'gayengs pa rnams la snying rje chen po brgyad
da phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar du sdod par byed kyang/ bsam gtan la gnas pa las g.yo bar mi 'gyur/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan pa yin no//nyi bar 'khor gyis smras
kha('jam dpal jiltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa min/'jam dpal gyis sa gabatsun pa nye bar 'khor ga nga gi byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams gtan dul ba/

nyid du'ang shes par byed cing/ ltung ba dang nyon mos pa dang bral la/ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa gdul ba'i phyi chos ston par yang byed cing/ de lta'anyon mongs pa rnams rtogs par l pa byed la byang chub kyang tshol
pash+tsa par byed na/ demagyis na byang chub sems dpar 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin no// ma 'gags pas smas pa/ 'jam dpal ngaltar na byang chubs nas dpar lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dang la gyis sbas pa/
u/ btsun pa ma 'gags pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcu'i gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang mthong bar byed la/ gzugs dben par mthong bas chos thams cad dben bar ma spong ba rjes su rtogs
bar byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lta'i mig dang ldan pa yin no// ba ku las smras pa rajam dpa la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa 'dabang bo bsus pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa//
gang gi tsho byang chubs mas dpa' yul thoms cad sangs rgyas kyi yul yin pa rab lta zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yang yul mod bar ba stan de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bsus pa yin no//
go'amo'i 'phreng bas smras pa/ 'jam dbab ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rnob yin/'dzam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sor mo'i 'phrang bgang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub rang gi

gyis ma skyes pa'i 'i/ mtshams med pa dang mnyam par lta bar byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin no// kat+yA'i bu chen pos sbas pa/ 'jam dpalaji ltar na byang chub sa mas dpa'

mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po gang gi tshe byang chub se mas dpa' so so yang dag pa rarig pa mi zad pa bzhi thob cing tshig gcig gis kyang bskal pa/

'bum gyi bar du rgya cher rnam par 'byed tsadzaston l/ cinas kyang kun nas nyon mos pa sbyong bar mi byed pa dang/ rnam par byang ba len par mi byed pa de ltar ston par byed pa dang/chos nyid gnas pa las kyang mi
g.yol/ gnas grumasacad la rangami rtan ng de ltar ston par byed na/ datsam gyis na byang chub sa mas dang 'a mdosdo rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin no// gsus po che chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal

jilta na byang chub sa mas dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// btsun pa gsus po che gang gi tshe byang chub sa mas dpa' brjod du med pa'i don gyis donaso so yang dag

par rig pa ston pa dang/ chos kyi dbyi sa gnas pa nyid kyis chos so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang ming dang mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang/ brag cha dang
mnyam pa nyid kyis spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa 'byed na/ datsam gyis na byang chub sams dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin no// sgragacan zin gyis smas pa/ lojam/
dbal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin/ngagi tshabyang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang//
brtul zhugs yang dag bar blangs shing/ sems can yongasasu smin par bya ba'i phyiratshulakhrims 'chal pa'i 'gro ba gang yin par 'gro b.redan/ datsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang
ldan pa yin no/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/ 'dzam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dag 'a bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs/

rgyas thams cad kyis gsus panyan par byed cing thos pa thams cad kyi don kyang rtog par byed l/ jiltar thos pa 'ang 'dzin par byed cing/ ji ltar gazung ba bzhi naston par yang byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub

sams dpa' mang du gyos pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu rang rtsal sems kyiso/ nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshodang ldan pa dag khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skadu bstan

gyi pa de lta bu'i chos 'ga' dang ldan nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag cag la ni chos de dag las 'ga' tsam yang med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de ltan khyed caganyan thos chen po mchog tu gyur
ba ma yin par mi 'gyur ram/ri'i bus smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di lta sta/ dper na gnag rjes las brtan n rdzongabu mchog yin pa de bzhin du/ nyan shos gzhan dag las brtenan kho bo cag kyang mchog yin no/

[re ]'di lta ste/ dbaranargya mtsho chen bo las brtenan 'og gi tshur lung bo mchog yin pa de zhin du/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la brtenan/ byang chub sems dpa' mchog yin no// lcag ba'i nga rgyal med/
ba yin no/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin te/ legs so legs so/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhinate/ nyan klosani lhag pa'ing rgyal med pa
yin no/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no// lha'i bus lcas pa// 'jam dpal nyilas bsams te de skad/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'ibu 'di ltar nyan thos rnams ni rang/

sas rgyas khas brtan nang rgyal sras pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lcage pa'i nga rgyal na yin l/ ngargyal des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub par byed pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa'ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no// lha'i dus smos pa/ 'jam dpal lcag pa'i nga rgyal can ni bdag la stod par byed tsang/ gzhan la smod par byed pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa'
yang de lta bur mi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis sa ba/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag la stod bar byed cing/ gzhan la smod par byed pa yin no// lce'i bus smras pa//
'jam dbal ci las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam sras dmar theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i
bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod par byed pa dang/ ji ltar sems can rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur snyam nas/ bdag nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos rjod par byed cing 'od la dga' ba'i sems

skyed par mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/ theg pa dman pa la rnam par sdangapar byed pa yin pas/ lha'i bu de ltar nabyang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa chen po la stod par byed pa dang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la spyod/
bar byed pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dbal de ltan byang chub sems dpa'i ltungab dang bcas par mi 'gyur rama'ajam dpa 'gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nor bu mching bu'i bsngags pa
ma yin pa brjod cing/ nor bu rin po chab rma'i bsngags pa brjod par gyuran/ de'ang ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ram/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'dzem dpal den mo 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa de

lca'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags ba ma yin pa rjod par byed pa'i ng ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/ klu'i bu 'od lta ste/

dparan skyes bu shin tu stobs dang ldan pa gang zhig gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod cing/ khams kyi rgyal po la de lta ma yin n de smad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin snyam mam/ lta bu s/
smras pa/ 'jam dpal de lta ma yin no// 'jam dpa la gyis smras paM/ lha'i bu de bzhin dubyang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la stod par byed cing/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la smod par byed pa'i ng smad
[ne. ]pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyi tshig de ni legs par smyos te/ 'jam
dpal theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pas den thig bkrams cad kyi bsngags pa rjod par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyizhan/ 'jam dpal theg pa thams cad na de las nges par byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro//
gzhan yang lce'i khu rab rtsal sems kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang las brten nas byang chub tu sems skyid par byed/ 'jam

dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' n sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa las brtenanas byang chub tu sems skyod par byed do// lha'i lus smras pa// 'jam dpal ci'i phyiren byang chub sems

dang rasems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa las bstan nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mo sa pa dag byang chub kyi theg pa ma yin du
khrinanani byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub tu sems bskyedanas go cha gyon par mi 'gyur ro/ lca'i 'us smas pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi sams tsa zhog la rten/ 'jam dpal gyis smas pa/
lha'i bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rtan to// deci'i phyir zhe na lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni byang chub sems kyi rtsa ba las bton nas/ skye bar 'gyur
ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad la rten/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lca'i bu chos thams cad ni rtsa ba mad pa'i gnas la rten pa yin/
no/de'i phyir zhen/ lca'i bu chos thams cad ni ma gra' yas pa'i phyir rtsa ba mad pa dang/ mngon par skabs yodapa dang/ nam mkha' larten pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ lca'i lus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal
sas rgyas kyi chos rnams ji snyad yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos thams cad jisnyad pa de snyadab yod do// de'i phyir zhe nA/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad sangs rgyas pas na/

lha'i bu de'i phyir chos thams cad ji snyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang de sodado// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o ci 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin

nam 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa lha'i bu de de bzhineta 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin no// de ci'i phyibazhin/ nyon mongs pa de dag gi rtsa ba'i gnas rjes su
rtogs pa ni sangs rgyas yin no zhes ston pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa// jam dpal gang gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
lha'i bu rnam grangs med pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyis/ rnam grangs kyis ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni sa mas can thams cad rtogs par
thugs su chud pa'i phyira'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpaladzi ltar rtogs par thugs su chud/ 'jam dbal gyis smras pa/ wA'ibus mas can m da pa'i rnam pa dang/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam
pas so// lce'i dus sas pa/ 'dzam depal stong ba nyid kyis ci zhig rtogs par byed/ 'jam dbal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te cung zad rjes su rtogs par byed nani de stong pa nyid du mi
'gyur ro/ ci'i phyi'i zhi na/ lha'i bu stong ba nyidan rnam par rtog pa med pa dang/ rtsol ba mad pa yin pa'i phyi'o// lha'ibus sbas ba ]'jam dpal de bzhin gshaphags pas stong pa nyid
rjesaMsu rtogs pa ni byang chub yin no zhes ma gsungs sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa nyidabyang chu ba yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang stong
panyidirjes su rtogs pa khon byang chub yin no zhes gsungs so// lha'i bus smras pe/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ci zhig la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dbal gyis sbas pa/ myu'i
bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni 'dod pa dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugos med de la gnas pa ma yin/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ lus dang sems la
gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bod gnas ba gang gis gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas pa de'ang stong pas na/stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i phyi'o//lta'i bus smras pa/
'jam pa la re bzhin gshegs pa don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis gnas pas gnas par mi mdzad dam/ 'jam dpal gyi se smras pa/ lha lib de bzhin gshegs pa nyid stong pa nyane in la/
stong pa nyid gang yin pa de 'ganyis su med pa yin pas na/ de bzhi zhi gshegs pa ni se nyas sumed pa'i gnas bas gnas pa mdzad do// lha'abus smras// badramadabal gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa gang
zla yin 'jam dpal gyis smras ng// lha'i bu gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa gnyis sumadapa nyid yin rgyu/ de la gnas pas/ zhanamed do/ de ba gnas pa gnyis su med pa de las gzhan med pa de nyid kyang
gnyis su med pa nyade yin no// lha'i bus sas pa/ 'jam dpal gnyis zhes bya ba gang/ gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba nagang/ 'jam dpal gyis smyos pa lha'i bu 'dod chags dang/ 'dod/
chags bral bar byed pa nib/nyes so// 'dod chags kyi rang bzhachen gnyis suchod pa'o// zhe sdang dang/ zhe sdang med par byed pa de na gnyis so// zhesdung gi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'o// gtumug
dang gti mug med pa byed bdeniganyis so// gtimug gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// nyon mongs pa dang/ nyon mongs pa med par byed pa de ni gnyeg so// nyon mongs pa'i dang brten
gnyis su mad pa'o/ bdag dang bdag med par byed pa de/gnyis so// bdag gir bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal bdag gi'ang bzhin yin/ 'jamadapal
[} ]gyis sbas pa de lha'i bu bdag gi rang bzhin ni bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa nyid yin// bdag gi rang bzhin na gzod gnas su dag ba'i phyiragazod gnas dben pa nyide dang/ gzod/
mnas ma skyes pa nyide dang/ gzod ma nas 'byung ba nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras ba 'jam dba'a'a'i phyi'i rang bzhin zhes khya/ 'jam dpal gyi snus pa// lha'i bu den 'gyur ba med pas

de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya 'o// den ga zod ma nag gsal zhing nyon mongs pa can m yin pa 'de'aphyore 'ang bzhani zhes bya'o// de zhinam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing tshad med pas de'i phyi'i

rang bzhin zhes bya'o// den spros pa dang bral ba dang/ den rgyu ba dang bral ba dang/ ngana'od gasal bas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// den blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pas de'i phyi'i rang bzhin
zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras l/ 'jam dpal rang bzhin mi shes pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal rgyas smas pa/ lha'i bu gang dag chos rnams kyi rang bzhin mi shes pa dag go/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
dang la'ang bzhin sa bdag gang yin/ 'cham dpal gyis zas la/ lha'i bu gang dag de dag ga rang bzhin shes pa dag go/ lhathus snyas pa/ 'jam dpal dad pa dang ldan ba rimtshan nyid gang yin/
'jam dpal gyis smras l/ lha'i bu dang pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyidi ni chags pa thams cad las yang g pa 'das pa yin no/ lha'i bus smras ba/ 'jam dpal dge slong dad pa dang mi ldan pa ji ltar
dad pa sa byanyid la dad par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dad pa dang ma ldanung zhes bya ba nagang mngon sum dugyur pa'i chos thams cad lagazhan gyi dengs

'jo/cing/ gzhan gyi ded pas yang dang yang du ma 'gro ba mnabs de'i phyir dad pa dang malcenapa zhes bya ste/denaded pas byanepa sbyong bar mkhyed da de'i phyir zhi na/ gzod mnas dag pa 'phyarir// lha
bus sna pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan tsag ma'i nus pa de skad ces bya 3dzamadapal gyase smras pa/ wA'abu dgaslo gang dge 'dun dang lhan cage a gnas padon/ des n 'jug

rten na gnasasu 'gyur ro// deci'i phyir na/lta bu dge 'dunani 'dus ma byas pa ne la/ byang chub sems dang kan 'dusamabyas dang lhan cig ma shes pas de'i phyore dan dedzage ldan gyi smyone gsu'agyur ba mne da[']
phyi// lha'i dus ma pa/ 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpal dus sku dus dpa lhan tsuge gnas par gyur nanyes pa ri 'gyur// 'jam dar lagyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
ra 'dus ma byas thob na sems can rnams skye bar ma byed cung nyanathos su 'gyur bas de'anyis pa na dIr 'gyur ro// lha'abus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus byas na se sa'i skye bo'i saan la/
'dusam byas na 'phags pa rnams kyis yin no// donadzaltar byang chub dapa' 'phags panyis spangs shing so sa'i skyob sa la gnas pa 'jigartenagyi sbyin gnas su gyur/ 'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa 'an de dus byus la 'ang mginas/ dusam byas la'angama gnas apas de 'phur de'i jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro// de'i
phyir zhun/ lha 'bubyang chub sems dpa' n 'du byed las mdebaskyod pa dang/ 'dusamakhyas la mgenas pa yin pa'i 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral ba dang/ 'dus ma byas shes pa rtog pa'i
tu de 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral bas de dus byas lam gnas la/ 'dus ma byas shes pa rtogs pas naa'adus ma byas su maltung ba'ophyir ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ dparanamtshan po
chetshan pas steng gi bar snang lamad lta'aphangs par gyural/ de nas mda' de nam mkha'al ma gnas par 'dug cings la'ang ma sbyong n/ lha'i bu doladaka' bcung zad yod dam/ lha sa
bsab/ 'jam dpal dka' 'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha bu de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dzin pa gang dag 'dus byas kyang ma sbyong zhing 'dus ma byas
kyang thabapar byed l/ 'dus masasu'ang ma lhung zhing de 'dus byas thob pa rnams kyang yongasasusmin par byed pa ni ches dka' bainano// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub
sems dpa'i 'jig pa 'dus byas sam/ 'on te dusam byas sam/ gang las 'byung bar 'gyur 'jam dpal gyisoslus b/ lha'akhu byang chub sems dbazhi'ajigapan 'dus byas las kyang
[t ]@#/ 'byang bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de 'i phyir zhin/ lha'i bu 'dus byas las ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung la/ 'dus ma byas las ni
nyon mo ngas ba mad pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i phyir/ lha'i busasdusaM pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa med pas 'jigs pa ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis sas pa/ lha'i bu khams gsum n ni
blo nyon mongs ba'i 'jigs pa yod la/ byang chub sems dpa'i gangakhams gsum du nyon mongs par mi byed na/ don nyan thos su 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dang la ji ltar na byang chub sams
sbyar dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sangs dpa la gang shes rab kyi shes pas 'dus byas la spyod par byed cing/ thabs kyi shes pas 'dus ma
byas su mi ltung ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta bas 'dus byas srong bar mi byed cing/
sangs rgyas kyi chos la stabs 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dang ba 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems da pa' bsod nams kyi tshogs te
bar bsags pa'i phyir 'dus byas la sbyor bar byed cing/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas su mi ltung bde lta naM/ byang chub salas dpab 'jigs pa med
[7s8]ba yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gangagi tsho byang chub sags dpa' 'dus ma byas la bzhus te bsam gtan rnams skyed par byed cing/ thabs gzhus tre bsam gtan rnams las ldog bar byed pa de lta
na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lhakhu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sams la gnas te dge ba'i rtsa ba nya ba'akhasogs bar byed cing/ snying rje
chen bo la gnas te sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bgazhan yang gang gi tsho byang chub sams dpa' dben pa la gnas
te bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par byed cing/ thabs la gnas te bdud kyi las rnams sbyong bar byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sams dpa' 'jigs pa med ba yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi
byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po la gnas te chos ston par byed cing/ snying rje chen bo lagazhas te za bring gi sbyin pa sprin par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa yod pa/
yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tsho byang chub sams dpa' 'khor ba la gnas tecu ngan las 'das pa longs su spyang pa'i las byed cing/ mya ngan las 'dus pa la gnas te 'khor ba yongs su sbyang

ba'i las byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dba' 'jigs ba med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshabyang chub sams dpa' skye ba med pas skye bar byed cing/ 'pho ba med pas 'byung ba'i byed
ka/ @#// po dang [0f10 ]chos la lta bas snang bar byed cing/ phung bo dang/ khams dang/ skye mched kyis rab tu phya ba ma yin bdang/ thams cad dang rjes su 'brel cing/ zhi ba dang/

[+ ]nye bar zhi der gyur pa dang/ 'bar du byed cing 'bar bas tshig par mi byed pa dang/ rtson mo ras pa thams cad la lo ngas su spyod par byed cing/ nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis mi gos pa dang/ slob pa
ngani slob pa rnams 'dul bar dang/ nyanazlos kyi rnam par grol ba la reg par mi byed pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi bosam pa la 'jug cing/ chos kyi bsam pa srong bar gi byed ba dang/ bdud
kyi lcags kyu zhes bar byed cing// chos kyi lcags kyu spong bar mi byed pa dang/ shes pas 'jug par byed cing/ thabs kyis ldog par byed pa dang/ 'phags pa'i rnal paston par byed cing//

'phags pa ma yin pa yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar byed pa dang/ sangs rgyas mthong ba la mngon par rtags bar byed cing/ chos mthong ba la kun tu 'dod par byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems
dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu lnga khri chos rnams la chos kyi mkhog rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ lha'i bu nyi

khri lnga stong ni len pa med par tshig pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa lnga khri nami skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri
spobs pa thogs pa med pa skyes so// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang bo dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshags pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
pa la lha'i mchod pa dag byas so// gzhan yang lha'i bu rab sku la sa mas kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpa la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa
yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tsho byang chub sems da pa la 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir yang chos ston pa'i byed la/ 'drod chags dang bral ba mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang/ zhe sdang

spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston pa'i byed la/ zhe sdang slong ba mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang/ gti mug spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/ gti mug sbyong ba mkhon du'ang ma byed ba dang/ nyon mongs pa

spang ba'i phyi'i chos ston par yang byed la/ nyon mongs pa sbyong ba mngon du'ang ma byed pa de tsam gyisan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa la lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tsho byang chub sak+Sha
pa' sems can rnams la stong pa nyid ston bza lang byed la/ stong ba de mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang/ soms can las la mtshan ma med pa ston bar yang byed la/ mtshan ma med pa mngon du'ang mi byed/
ba dang/ sems can rnams la skyon ba med bstan par yang byed la/ smon pa med pa mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang/ de bzhin du sa mas can rnams la mngon bar 'du byed pa med pa dang/ skya ba mad pa dang/
'byung ba med pa dang/ dngos po med pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mi ldan pa dang/ 'gog pa'i chos ston par yang byang la/ 'gog pa mngon du'ang mi byed pa de tsam gyisan
byang chub sems dpa' las ' gnas pa yin go/ lha'i bu gzhan na nga gang po tsong chub sems dpa' yongs su ma ga tong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin bsgrub par byed pa dang/ tshul khrims las yang dag

par 'ad pas tshul khrims kyi snga rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang/ gnod sems kyis bgrod kha'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang/ le losi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrapa bar phye da
pa dang/ brjed ngas khas pas ba tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang/ bams po dang lug ltar lkugs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems
dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpel ce las bsams te de skad sgra/ 'jam dpal gyis smyos pa/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi longs su mi
gtong ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang/ chos yongs su mi gtong ba dang/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su mi gtong

ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi bzhi bo de dag yongs su mi gtong bas spyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed do// lha'i bu tshul khrims las yang dag bar 'dab ba zhes bya ba de ni/ de'i rang bzhin ma
yin pa'i tshig bla dgas yin te/ tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas ting nge 'dzin dang/ ting nge 'dzin las yangs par 'dar bas shes pa dang/ shes rab las mang dag par 'da' bas zlum par

grol ba shes ba sgrub par byed de/ lha'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs de/ gang tshul khrims las yang dag par 'darab de tshul khrims kyi ba rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin par ris par bya'o// lha'i bu byang
chub sems da pa ba gang gnod sems la zhugs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las log par zhugs ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa las khog par zhugs pa yin pas de ni theg pa chen po la legs pa'i

zhugs pa yin te/ gang theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa de ni bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin ba sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis tshul bar mi byed cing/ ngag
dang sems kyis rtul bar mi byed pa de ni le lo can yin la/ gang de ltar chos la mngon por brtson ba de ni brtson 'grus kyis 'o tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha 'bu gzhan yang
byang chub sems dang ba ni rmi lam na bad lags gnyis bo dag la dga' ba'i sems skyed par mi byed pas de ni brjed ngas pa yin la/ gang nyan thos dang 'dres ngas rgyas kyi thag pa la brjed sa ba de
ni theg pa chen po la mnyam par gzhag pa yin pas/ des ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin bsgrub par byed ba yin no// lha'i bu chos thams cad na bems po sta/ snudang/ shing dang/
@#// rtsig pa dang/ lam dang/ mig loradang/ lug ltar lkugs pa dang 'du bar 'dabazhin gyis zhus ba mad pa yin pas/ gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang/

la shes kyis de ltar chos thams cad bams po dang lug lta skyug pa lta bu s byang chub sgrub bar byed pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub bar byed pa yin to/ de ltar lkugs pa'i byang chub sangs
dpa' ni lam sgrub bar byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i lam yang mi slong la/ mya ngan las 'ongs ba'i lam yang tshol bar byed pa dang/ lam gyi 'bras
sgyur kyi rgyun yang mi kicod cing/ lam gyi bya ba'ang sgrub par byed pa dang/ lam ngan par zhugs pa'isems can rnams kyang lam la 'god par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' las ' gnas
pa lon no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chube sams dang 'a sems can thams cad dang/ chos thams cad 63 nyim rnyed pa dang/ byang chub kyi lam stongabarami byed pa dang/ 'bras bu yod par

bsam gtan byed pade lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tsho byang chub saMms dpa' nyan thos kyi lam yang rab tu shes la/ nyan thos kyi lam gyis

nges bar 'bad bar yang mi byed pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang rab tu shes la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyi sa par 'byong bar mi byed pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'i lam yang thob par byed la/
lam des kyang dbang po 'ongs su ma rdzogs par nges par 'byung par mi byed pa de ltan/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa zhi ba 'o/// khan yang gang de tsho byang chub sems dang 'a dag ba'i rtsa
ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba'i 'bras bu don du mi gnyer ba dang/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i skyon gyis sku gongs ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad

byung chub cu yongs su sngo bar byed pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyi'i bab la pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang/ 'bri ba yang dag par rjes su mi la stong ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa 'a lam la gnas pa
yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshabyang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las lam yo ngas su tshol bar byed pa dang/ lam yongs su btsal nas kyang nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na/ byang chub
sams dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems da pa' lam ngan pa las lam yongs su tshol bar byed/ 'ojam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu

lam ngan pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa bzhi da la gnas nas sems can nges par 'byung ba'i phyir lam yongs su tshol par byed kyi/ bdag nyid nges pa 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no//
lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni 'o jig rten thams cad dang thun pa yin no// 'jamadapal gyis skyes ba lha'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten na//
spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos ba dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa ston par byed pa dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa nyid du mi ltung ba dang/ rgyab dang/
[A ]'chig ston par byed kyang/ chos thams cad slu ba med pa dang/ 'byung ba med par shes shing/ skyon med pa mngon du mi byed pa dang/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched yongs su spyod par byed/
kyang phung po dang/ khams dang/ sku mchod don du mi gnyer ba dang/ khung bo dang/ khan dang/ sa mched yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston kyang/ yongs su shes pa de
dag yongs su shes par mi byed pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dag mngon par sgrub par byed cing sa ma sa snum par g.yang pa rnams nyid

yabar 'jog pa'i byed kyang/ nye bar 'jog pa la byang bar mi byed pa dang/ bdud kyi yul nye bar ston par byed kyang/ bdud kyi las rnams kyis mi 'phrogasaM pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul sbyong bar mi byed ba/

an+naM drung bdud kyi yul gyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yul las ldog par ma byed pa dang/ sems can gyi khams kyi yul nye bar len par byed pas na/ de'i phyir sems can chen po de dag/
ga spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mthuzhu ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dbal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu

bsam pa yongs su dag cing nang du phyi la dben pa nyid kyis lhag ba'i bsamakho la spyod pa dang/ rab tu spyod pa med pa nyid kyis sbyor ba la spyod pa dang/ sems mi brjed pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi sam
ma brjed pa la spyod pa dang/ soms dul ba nyid kyis sbyin pa la spyod pa dang/ soms zhi ba nyid kyis tshul khrims la sbyod pa dang/ smras pa med pa nyid kyis bzod pa la spyod pa dang/ lus dben
pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus la spyod pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings rnam pa'i gsang ba yod pa nyid kyis bsam gtan la spyod ba dang/ spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab la spyod pa dang/ sems can la

badrag med pa nyid kyis byams pa la spyod pa dang/ nyon mongs pa yodapa ma yin pa rab du zhi bo nyid kyis snying rdo la spyod pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dga' ba la spyod pa dang/ mtha'

gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir btang snyoms la spyod pa dang/ gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir mi rtag pa la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang/ longs su rtog pa sdug bsngal ba'i phyir sdug bsngal la so sor rtog

ba la spyod pa dang/ phyin ci log rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag med pa la so sor rtog ba la spyod ba dang/ 'du shes mos su shes pa'i phyir shi ba la so sor rtog ba la spyod ba dang/ phung bo sgyu ma lta

bur yongs su shes ba'i phyir sdug bsngal lo ngas su shes pa la spyod ba dang ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir kun 'byung ba shes pa la spyod pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'i phyir 'gags par shes pa
la spyod pa dang/ 'dus byas la mngon par zhen ba med pa'i phyir lam shes pa la rtsod pa dang/ 'bras bu yongs su shes ba nyid kyis rgyu shes pa la spyod pa dang/ rten cing

'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir skyon shes pa la spyod pa dang/ du ma'i phyi tshogs pa la spyod ba dang/ brjod du yod pa'i phyir don so so yang dag par rig pa la sbyod ba dang/ chos kyi dbyinges dbyer med pa'i

phyir chos so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang/ ming dang gzugs 'byung ba med pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig soso yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang/ sgro brag cha dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spobs ba so so

ra yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang/ chos 'bru gsal ba nyid kyis don la rton pa la spyod ba dang/ rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma spangs pa nyid kyis langashes la rton pa la spyod pa dang/ las kyi rnam

par smin pa ston pa nyid kyis nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa la spyod pa dang/ gang brag yongs su sminapar bya ba nyid kyis tshis la rton pa la spyod pa dang/ las rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i mig la spyod pa

dang [0f10 ]tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyi'i lha'i rnab la spyod pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol gyi samasashes pa la spyod pa dang/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis phyi'i sngon gyi gnas rjes

su dran pa shes pa la spyod pa dang/ sems la dbang sgyur ba'i phyi'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa la spyod pa dang/ mi phyed pa'i phyir spyod ba brtan pa la spyod pa dang/ mi lhod pa'i phyi'i spyod pa sra ba la

spyod pa dang/ bskyod du med pa'i phyi'i gnas pa med pa la stod pa dang/ tha dad pa med pa nyid kyis spyod ba mnyam ba la spyod pa dang/ thams cad du rjes su ma brtags pa'i phyir sa dang/ chu dang/ ma

dang rlung dang/ nam mkha' lta bur spyod pa dang/ rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sgyu ma lta bu la spyod ba dang/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rmi lam lta bu la spyod pa dang/ rnam

khar chos pa'i mtshan nyid kyis yig rgyu lta bu la spyod pa dang/ bdag mi srid pa'i mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang/ sams rang bzhin med ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa

dang/ khams gsum rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan khyod kyis smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang/ 'dus byas rang bzhin mad ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa mad pa la spyod pa dang/ soms dang/ yid dang/

rnam par shes pa 'jug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud tshar gcad pa la spyod pa dang/ spyod pa thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pa'imtshan nyid kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun ma gcad pa la spyod pa ste/
lha'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no////bam po gsum pa skyo thu ma'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal

byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'dus ba yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'/
gang dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang/ chos kyi rjes su 'brangabam min pa dang/ gang brgyad ba ma yin pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pas yin pa dang/ lan cig phyir bong/
ba ma yin pa dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang/ rgyabcom kha ma yin pa dang/ gang nyan thos ma yin pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang/ gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa dang/ de
bzhin gshags pa ma yizhi ba dang/ bcom ldan 'dasam yazhe ba dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang/ ston pa na yin pa don byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi sgra'o// lhagi bu
kho bo ni byang chub ngesams dpa' gang so so'i skya bo'i chos can ma yin pa dang/ 'dod chags kyi chos can ma yin pa dang/ zhe sdang gi chos can ma yin pa dang/ gtilug gi chos can s yin pa dang/ gang
'khor ba'i chos can ma yin pa dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'ad ba ba'i chos can ma yin pa de na byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi g+hagog lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyi las ba
dbal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad bas rjes su 'brang ba dang/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ brgyad pa dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang// dgra
bcom pa dang/ nyanazlog dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang de bzhin gshegs kha dang/ brten ldan 'das dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/
0 ston pa dang/ so so'i skya bo'i chos can dang/ 'dod chags kyi chos can dang/ zhe sdang gi chos can dang/ gtimug gi chos can dang/ 'khor ba'i chos can dang/ longs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos
can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshabyang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dad par byed pa dang/ chags pa thams cad la dad par byed kyang de la chags par mi 'grul
ba dang gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam la dad pa bskyed cing 'dzin par byed pa dang/ chags pas chags par gyur ba rnams thar pa ra byed pa dang/ chags pa med par ya

shes yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang/ 'khor ba la chags par mi byed pa dang/ mya ngan las 'dus par mi ltung ba de tsam gyis na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no// lha'i bus
smras pa 'jam dpal jiltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis skyas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsus pa/
'dzin par byed pa dang/ kun 'dzin ba'abyed pa dang/ chos kyi bras dang ldan zhing brang thing gi bas med pa dang/ chos la gnas shing nyon mongs pa lami gnas pa dang/ chos kyi stobs can yin gyi/ nga

rgyal gyi stobs can ma yazhe pa dang/ chos smra ba yin gyi/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gtam smra ba ma yin pa dang/ chos kyi dbang phyug yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i dbang phyug ma yin pa dang/ chos la rton pa/
minagyi ( gang khrag la rten kha ma yin pa dang/ chos smra ba yin gyi/ chos ma yin pa mi skya ba dang/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la rton pa yin gyi/ brtson pa btang
pa'i chos la mi gnas pa dang/ chos skyon med ba nyid du chos thams cad shes pa'i byed pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo tshogs pa med pa dang rdzun pa dang/ nor bdun dang ldan pa dang/ dag pa 'i chos
yo sa su 'dzin khar byed pa dang/ chos kyi khyad par la gnas pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
sems dpa' brgyad ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' khog ba nyad brgyad las yang dag par bdas pa dang/ yong dag ba nyide brgyud la rab tu gnas
pa dang lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par sbyang ba la mkhas pa dang/ sbyor ba 'os su ma rdzogs par lam sa bar 'byung bar ma byed ba dang/ mi khom pa brgyad du sus ba'i sems can rnam
dal ba phun sum tshogs bdag la 'god par byed pa dang/ skyes bu dam ba'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad la gnas pa dang/ zlum bar thar ba brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i lhag
ba'i bsam ba mi spong ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' brgyud pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa la dza ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rgyun du zhugs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
[d]/snus ba/ lha'i bu gang gitsho byang chub sems dpa' sems can rgyun phyogs su ded pa rnams rgyan las zlog par byed pa dang/ 'khor ba'i rgyun thams cad gcod par byed la/ 'khor ba mi gcod pa
dang/ na song thams cad kyang gcod par byed pa dang/ sems can rnams bde 'gro dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i lam la 'god par byed pa dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/ lho
dang ma lo gzhol ba dang/ bden pa ston par byed pa dang/ rlom sems su mi ltungab dang/ tha tsom dang bral ba dang/ nges pa dang/ sos rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba dang/ so so'i skya po'i bam
las yang dag par bdas pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi lam la rab tu gnas pa dang/ 'khor ba'i gting nad pa dang/ rgya na las 'dus pa la mngon du phyogs par gyur ba dang/ 'jig rtan gyi spyan
gnas su gyur pa dang 'dus byas la snang ba dang/ 'dus ma byas bas rab tu byab dang/ phyi'i ldog bar ma gyur ba dang/ dge 'dun la yang dag par gzhol ba de ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub
sems dpa'i rgyun du zhugs pa lanano// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
sems dpa' chos thams cad kho ba med pa na/ 'gro ba mad par shes nas sems can longs su smin par bya ba'i phyi'i bsams bzhin du bod pa dang/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed
@#// sa dang/ long ba dang/ gro ba ston par byed pa dang/ chos nyid la 'ong pa dang/ 'gro ba med khar ma shong ba dang/ 'ong ba 'ang nyon mongs ba med pas khong pa dang/ rang gi las longs

ka su dag pas 'grol dang bod ba ma nyam pa nyid ni sgong ba dang/ bdud kyi dbang gis mi 'gro ba dang/ byang chub kyi lag rtse bar ston pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang/ lte bar blangs pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir 'ong ba dang/
byang chub kyi lhag pa'i bsam ba sa zhing la khyad pa de ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no// lha'i busags pa/ 'jam dbal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong
ba yin 'jam dpa la gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa la lta ba rnams dang/ phyin ci log rnams dang// sgrib pa rnams su'ang mi 'ong ba dang/ 'dun pa dang/ 'dod
chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ gti mug gis yang 'ong ba dang/ 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ byas pa nges par ma gyur cing/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma rdzogs par mi 'ong ba dang/
'ong ba med pa dang/ 'pho ba med pa la mkhas pa dang/ rgo'i mad pa la thob ba dang/ mthar gnas dang/ byas pa rjes pa dang/ lung bstan pa thob pa dang/ dmigs pa med pa dang/ rnam pa
med pa thob pa dang/ shes pas gzhan la rag ma las ba da lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sams dpa' dgra bcom
pa yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chags ba med cing 'dod chags gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang/ sdang ba med cing zhe sdang gdul/
ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang/ rmos ba med cing gti mug gdul ba'i phyi'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang/ chos thams cad l nyon mongs ba med par gnas pa dang/ sams/
can thams cad la sems ma btang ba dang/ sas rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson 'grus brtsams ba dang/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pas dgar ba dang/ dgrubacol ba dra/
pad+ma bzhin du nyon mongs ba thams cad kyis ma gos pa dang/ shes pas 'apags ba dang mnyal ba dang/ thabs kyis 'phags pa ma yin par gnas pa dang/ nye bar len pa thams cad la bdag gi
med cing yongs su 'dzin pa da pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bdag gir byed cing yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ rang gi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ gzha
gyi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med pa gzhas pa' byed pa dang/ sdon dam bcas pa dag la brkug pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ tshu rol dang la mol la gnas pa rnams kyi pha rol tu son pa dang/ chu
rol gyi yanas ma sangs pa dang/ gzhan gyi sems can gzhan thar par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang
chub sems dpa'i nyan thos yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sa kha/ lha'i bu gang gi tsho byang chub sems da pa ba sems can thams cad la ma gos pa'i chos sgrogs par byed cing skul/ rgyapham dbang ska
[A ] rnams la rgyud bar mi byed pa dang/ langadag pa'i dam pa'i chos dang/ skya ba med byedung/ 'gag pa med pa'i chos sgrogs par byed pa dang/ rgyudang/ rkyen dang/ bdag med ba dang/ sems can
zla med pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis g.yo ba med ba sgrogs par byed ba dang/ sas rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dang/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams sgrogs par byed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yu shes
dang/ ye shes chen po la chos thams cad rgyus nye bar 'gro bar rtsoms shig ces sgrogs par byed pa dang/ sgrogs pa 'ang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang/ thos bas kyang rlom sems mi byed pa dang/
sgrogs pa brams cad kyi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi 'chad pa yongs su shes pa dang/ so so yang dag bar go ba mi zad pa thob pa dang/ don dang/ tshig dang/ yig 'bru mi 'od ba dang// sems can/
thams cad kyi sems dang/ spyod pa dang/ shes pa ston par byed pa dang/ so so ru rogis pa ra chos ston bar byed pa dang/ zhi ba'i sa la gnas pa dang/ spros pa med pa dang/ sngon gyi smon lam la
spyod pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub soms dpa' nyan thos yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpa la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin/ 'ab dbal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi
tshabyang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rkyen la rag las pa dang/ sa mas can med pa dang/ srog med pa dang/ gang bag med pa dang/ bdag po yod pa dang/ rnam par bsgrubs pa nye bar gnas pa'i ma

nyid du shes pa dang/ des rkyen rnams legs par mthong ba'i phyir byang chub 'dren par byed pa'i rkyen 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin ba thams cad kyi phyogs dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi phyogs dang/

bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i phyogs dang/ tshad med pa bzhi'i phyogs dang/ mngon ba rags pa'i phyogs ya nga drug par sgrub par byed pa dang/ de rkyen nye bar sgrub par byed cing/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas/

byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa drang/ sa ngan pa dag las sems skyo bar byed ba dang/ nye tsho ba'i shes pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang/ theg pa chen po la legs par rab tu gnas pa dang/
chos thams cad la mngon du gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sags dab 'a 'dasangs rgyas yin no// lha'ibus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas min/ 'jam
dpal gyis smras kha/ lha'i bu gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' chos thamasacad gazod ma nas dben pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang/ sems can thams cad gabod mnas bdag med pa nyid du rtogs par
byed pa dang/ ming mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyi'i spyod pa dman pa dang/ mchogadung bar ma thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang/ nga gi nyon mongs kha stong ba nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams ra/
[s/ ]@#// rtogs par byed pa dang/ skad cig gcig la rjes su rtogs pa'i rim gyis sa dang spyod pasnatshogs ston par byed pa dang/ sems can gyi dbang po dang mos pas chos ston par byed pa//
dang 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
kha yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tsho byang chub sams dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lamadu 'gro ba dang/ de bzhin nyid mi brjed pa dang/ de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas pa dang/

wA de bzhin nyid kyi sbyin pa dang/ dngazhig tad kyi tshul khrims dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi bzod pa dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi brtson 'grus dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi bsam gtan dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab dang/

de bzhin nyid kyi thabs dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi smon lam dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi stobs dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan ba dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi sems can med pa dang/ sems can longs su thar

bar byed pa dang/ sems can gyi gzhas 'khor ba na'ang spyod la/ spyod pa thams cad las kyang yang dag par 'das pa dang/ spyod pa las sgrol bar byed pa dang/ de na rang yin la/ de na'ang ma yin pa dang/
'di na'ang yin la/ 'di na'ang ma yin pa dang/ gnyis ka las dag pa dang/ mun pa dang bral ba dang/ rtag tu gsal ba dang/ rkun pa med pa dang mun pa'i lang tog dang bral ba dang/ de bzhin nyid

[a]kyi rjes su song ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song ba de lta na/ lha 'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhishes/shegs pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa la ji ltar na byang chub sems
dba' bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa bcom pa dang/ chu bo las brgal ba dang/ srid pa mthong ba dang/ sems can thams cad
kyi zur dang/ srid pa 'joms pa dang/ srid pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang/ bdud bcom pa dang/ khur bor ba dang/ srid pa'i 'gro bar 'a'abo ba dang/ skya ba drang/ bya ba shes kha dang/ srid pa'i/
'dod chags bsal ba dang/ lus dang sems bsgoms pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ shes rab bsogs pa dang/ srid pa'i skyon legs par mthong ba dang/ srid pa'i srid pa dang bral ba dang/ som
can s bsam pa ma btangab dang/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba dang/ chu len dang zam pa legs bar byas pa dang/ mi kho nas bas legs pa mthong ba dang/ rtag tu bsgom pa la lade sabartson
ba dang/ sems can gyi srid pa khrid par byed ba dang/ srid pa thams cad las rnam par rtog pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad thul bar rlog pa'i byed pa dang/ srid pas
rnam par rtse ba la mkhas ba dang/ srid pa gsum n chod pa rnams kyis mchod pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras ba/ 'jam dpa la
ji ltar na byang chung sams dpa' yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin+d+he/ 'jam dpal gyis sa ba/ lha'i bu gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' mtshams che da pa

in dang mnyag ba byang chub kyad dadadamanyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang/ lta ba'i rnam pa rnam dang/ phyin ci log bdamu dang/ sgraye pa rnams dang/ chod pa rnams

zla7dang / kun nas ldang ba rnams nga dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gang dang mnyam

pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thums cad gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam ba nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang/ so so'i skya bo'i chos rnams dang/ slob pa 'i chos

rnams dang/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams gang dang dam ba byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzo ga/
par byang chub bar byed pa dang/ mnyam pa nyid du rnam par 'khrug par mi byed pa dang/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed ba dang/ chos thams cad gabrod na

nas dag ba'i phyir rkyen la rag las pa dang/ yod pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas kun nas byung ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon bar rdzogs bar byang chub par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang
00chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ston pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smas pa/ lha'i bu gang
gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang la ston ba dang/ rab tu ston ba dang/ rjes su ston par byed pa de dag thams cad mi g.yo pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang/ bstan pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/
ba dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ston pa dang/ rab tu ston pa dang/ ston pa gcig pur 'gyur ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang/ gling dang/ dpung
gnyen du 'gyur ba dang/ mtshan ma thams cad zhi ba dang/ rab tu zhi ba dang/ nye bar zhi khar 'gyur ba dang/ the tshom dang bral ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi tho chomagacod pa la mkhas pa dang
brgya byin dang/ chos pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong gis phyag byas pa dang/ yang dag par sla ba dang/ khams gsum pas phyag byas ba dang/ sams nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing khongs pa chod
pa dang / yang dag pa'i mthur legs par mthong ba'i phyir snyadu ba dang/ brdag pa dang/ dgong ba dang/ gnyung ba dang/ khro ba dang/ spro ba dang/ bsdigs pa khralasarud dang/ rlom sems
thams cad kyis zhu bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ sems can gyi rang bzhin legs par mthong pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan zhing sId brtsi ba dang/ 'jig rtan la ston pa'i grags par 'gyur
ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ston pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal jiltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal
gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyis so so'i skya bo'i spyod pa thams cad kyang ston par byed la/ shes pas so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad la chags par ya nga
zla mi 'gyur ba de ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems da pa 'a so so'i rgyu bo'i chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin/
'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi sku la kun tu chags par/
'gyur ba dang/ bsam gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms ba ra 'jug pa sgrub pa'i phyir rta gzhu dgon par gnas pa la rjes su chags ba ra 'gyur ba dang/ sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po
bzhis bsdu ba la rtag tu rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'isamasamadapar 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'adod chags kyi chos can yazhe no// lha'i
bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa la ji ltar na byang chub sems da pa'i zhe sdang gi chos can yan/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas rnams la gcig tu nyes pa 'i
[no/]skyon chags par lta bar byed pa dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sdang bar byed pa dang/ nyon mongs ba thams cad dang// 'du byed thams cad la skyon du'ang 'dugs la/ nyon/
mo sa pa rnams dang// 'du byed rnams sbyong bar yang mi byed pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rgyun ma gcod par byed pa dang/ nying rje chen pos yang dag par
zin pa'i yid kyis snying brtse ba rgya chen po yang dag par skyod par byed pa dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab las 'byin par byed pa dang/
sems can zhe sdang can rnams la bzod pa rkabar sgrub par byed cing/ nyon mongs pa rnams la nyes pa sbyin par byed pa dang/ 'chi 'pho'i thabs b+hums cad dang 'khor ba sun 'byin par byed pa de lta
na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yin no// lha'i bus snyas pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
smras ba lha'i bu gti mug ces bya ba ni gang cung zad kyang mi shes pa yin pas/ de la gang gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa phashes par mi byed/ rnam
par shes par mi byed/ kun tu shes par mi byed/ len bar mi byed/ spong bar mi byed/ 'byung bar mi byed/ 'jig pa ra mi byed/ g.yo bar mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/ skyo bar
mi byed cing/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta na/ lha'i bubyang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras ba/ 'jam/
dpal ji ltar na byang chub sams dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dbal gyis smas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshabyang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba las kyang mi g.yo la/ de nyid las sangs rgyas kyi
chos rnams tshol bar yang byed pa dang/ bdud thams can dang thun mong ma yin zhing spyod pa dman ba rnams dang ma 'dres pa dang/ sems can rnams spyod pa dman pa las bral zhing sbyod pa rgya chen po
s+sa la 'god par byed pa dang/ don 'thun par byed pa dang/ mi dge ba thams cad la mi bsngags pa rjod par byed cing 'dun ba zlog pa dang/ phyir zlog par byed pa dang/ byang chub 'khor ba la gzhol par/
'ashes bar byed ba dang/ 'khor ba mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang/ 'khor ba las mi g.yo zhing gnas par yang mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i
'khor ba'i chos can yin no// lha'i bus sgyus ba/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu la nga
gi tsho byang chub sems dpa' sems can rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta bar byed pa dang/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes par byed pa dang/ sems can thams
cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang/ skabar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang/ sems can dpag du med kha ma gsum gyis 'bar bar gyur pa rnams nye bar zhi bar byed cing/
yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang spyod par byed la/ gtan du longs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi
byed ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems da pa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin te/ thabs mkhas pa dang/ thabs shes pa la nges par skyes pa dang/ sems can thams
cad la phan pa dang/ rjes su snying brtse ba dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags 'bum lhag tsam chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med
cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ srog chags drug khri ni len pa med par brag pa rnams las sams rnam par grol lo// sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas
pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sa mas dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis ni mi zad pa'i rnam ba'i mdzod ces bya ba'i gzungs so sor thob par gyur to//
srog chags sa ya phrag gnyis dang lnga 'bum gyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// stong gi bar snang las kyang bcom ldan 'das dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
nyu// kha la mchod pa ra bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu phabago/ de nas lha'i bu rab rtsa la sems kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces nas/
so/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab kyis nges bar 'byung ba yin/ dunas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu rab rtsal soms la tshigs su bcud
tshud smas pa/ gang tshorams chags med pa// blamed byang chub sems yin te// sams kyi rang bzhin mngon sum pa// de ni shos rab mtshan nyide do// sems rnams bskyed pa thams
cad no/ byang chub tun yongs sngo zhing// byang chub sems las zab rtas pa// don thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// sems can thams cad bdag med cing// ma bden ya ma brla gsol tu// gang tshe
shes pas shes byed pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// gang phyir sems can thams cad dag/ byang chub phyir ni sbyin byed cing// bsam pa thag pas sdud byed pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid
do gang tsho bdag dang byang chub dang// gtan du mthong ba'i mu khyud cing// 'khor gsum yongs su dag gyur ba// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// nang dad yung ni phyi rol dang// thams cad yongs su
gtong byed cing// sa mas can kun la yongs bsngo ba// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// zhi zhing rab ni gtsang dag cing// tshul khrims rlom sa masam byed la// lus dang ngag yid zhi gyur pa
tsa dani shes rab mtshan nyid do// tshul khrims 'a ni zhugs gyur cing// gzhan yang tshul khrims sbyor byed la// sangs rgyas tshul khrims so byed pa// de phyir shubs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams
thams cad rab stong shing// bdag med bzod pa sgom byed la// lus dang sems kyis ma smras pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyi'i// lus kyis sbyor bar mi byed cing// ngag dang sems kyis/
ma yin la// chos sems kun la dben gyur pa// de ni shes rab tha rol phyin// sems can kun gyi khro ba dang// gsod dang 'ching ba bakhrod byed cing// sems can de dag ge slong ba// de ni
thabs kyi pha rol phyin// sa mas can yongs su smin bya'i phyir// bsam gtan bde ba rab sangs nas// grong dang yul 'khor snang byed pa// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// tshu rob ma yin pa
rol min// mthun pa'i pha rol rab gan+tas shing// spros pa'i lta ba rgyun bcad pa// shes rab pha rol phyin rtogs yin// gang gis stong nyid rtogs gyur nas// de ni btang snyoms mi byed cing
sems can stong nyid sbyor byed pa//de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no// sangs rgyas gzung med mkha' 'dra bar// chos kyi sgo nas lta byed cing// de tshagazugs la zhen med pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid/
do sangs rgyas mtshan nyid mchod 'dod cing// sa sa rgyas bye ba mchod byed la// 'dren kun mchod du 'jug byed pa// de phyir thabs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams rdul med rdul bral zhing//
@#// mkha' dang mnyam pas mnyam gyur la// chos 'ga' yang 'dzin par mi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// chos ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// lus dang srog//
[%A ]ni 'dor byed cing// 'jig rten kun gyis dben gyur ba// de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no// chos dbyis gnas pa nyid kyi phyir// yang dag mtha' la rab gnas shing// de bzhin nyid las mi
zla g.yo bas// de shes rab sgo yin no// gang gis chos nyid ci 'dra ba// sems can de 'drar shes byed cing// de ltar rtogs par byed pa'i mtha'// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// chos kun 'chi
'a/ 'pho yod min zhing// skya ba med par shes byed la// mi 'gro rgyug bar mi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// sems can yongs su sbyin bya'i phyir// mkhas pa 'dod dang gzugs rnams su//
bsam bzhin du ni skye byed pa// de dag thabs kyi yon tan yin// dgon pa gnas rab gnas byed cing// nyon mongs med la rab gnas la// bsam gtan rnam thar stan byed pa// de dag shes
rab mtshan nyid yin// grong dang yul 'khor rnams su ni// song nas snyan gtam ston byed cing// mi phrad zhum pa yod min pa// mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa yin// 'jig rten gsum
po thams cad la// skrag cing 'du 'dzi rten med la// bdag nyid dul zhing zhigyur pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// 'gro ba dag na 'dus chen dang// tshogs dang 'du 'dza ji snyed pa//
kun na snang ba de dag ni// thabs kyis smras pa med pa yin// brtan pa chags med sngod byed cing// yi gi don gnyer mi phyed la// brjel8 ngas don don gnyer pa// de shes rab pha rol phyin//
mkhas pa chags pa thams cad na// snang zhing chos rnams ston byed la// dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags brjod pa// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// mngon shes shes pa mkhas gyur cing
zhi zhing dul la thug pa med// gdeg med bzhag pa yod min pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// ma ngon shes dag la rnam 'phral mi zhing rnams byo bar 'gro byed la// sangs rgyas bye ba mchod
byed pa// de ni thubs kyi mtshan nyid yin// phung po sgra ma 'dur shes shing// nyon mongs dngos med shes byas nas// de dag bdud bzhi zha gyur ba// des ni shes rab pha rol phyin// bdud rnams
thams cad ston byed cing// bstan nas rgyal bar byed gyur la// de las sems can tha'abyed pa// de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no// stong nying mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon par byed pa yod min pa'i//
rnam thur sgo kha sta na byed pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid yin// chags med snang ba yod min zhing// rmongs med shes pa'i spyod yul dang// blang med dor ba yod mazhi pa// de ni shes rab mtshad+ha/
nyid yin// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing// stong nyid rab tu bstan gyur la// kun gyi pha rol son gyur pa// mnyam med 'gig pa'i mtshan nyid yin// khragamed brtul ba ma yin pa// de/
dag shes rab ldan 'gyur zhing// 'khor ba'i spyod yul de dag ni// sems can kun spyi grogs su 'gyur// bsod nams tshogs kyis mi ngoms pa'i// mkhas ba thabs
la mkhas pa yin// shes rab thabs la mkhas pa yige// yan lag gnyis ldan lam de ni// shes ldan byang chub sems dpa'i ste// des ni 'dren rnams nges par 'byung// thabs dang mi ldan
ka'a shes rab kyis// ma byang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med// shes rab med pa'i thabs kyis ni// mkhrub rab tu zhi mi 'gyur// shes rab dang ni thabs shes pa// de gnyis kuno tu 'dres gyur cing//
'a gnyis ka sbung du 'jug 'gyur no// de ni dam ma rtogs par 'gyur// gang dag bgrod pa 'di'i 'gro ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsngags shing// gang shos la rol phyin gyur te// da ni chos
rnams chos nyid do// de dag sangs rgyas spyod yul gyis// chos dbyings dbyer med dga' byed cing// sangs rgyas byang chub bla med pa'i// rdulamed byang chub rtogs pa la 'gyur// lha'i bu rab/
nu la sams kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub kyi yul gang yon/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi yul
ni rang gi yul dben pa nyid yazhe no// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub na nam mekha'i mtshan nyid do// lha'i bus/
sa pa 'jam dpal byang chub kyi mtha' gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi mtha' ni stong pa nyid yin no// lha'i bu smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi
gzhes gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas ni chos thams cad kyi gnas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal byang chub kyi sgo gang yin/ 'jam
dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi sgo ni kun nas so yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi skyo ma pa gang yin/ 'jam dbal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang
chub kyi rtsom pa ni sems can thams cad bdag med pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub cidang mnyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni chos thams
cad ma skyo ba dang ma tam mo// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal byang chub kyi bgrod pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi bgrod pa'i sems can thams
cad kyi sems dang spyod ba yin no// byang chub kyi bgrod pa ni 'gro ba mad pa ra 'gro ba dang/ rgyu ba med par 'gro ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa la byang chub gang gi rgyu 'thus
pa yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub na snying rje chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal snying rje chen po gang gi rgyu 'thun pa yin/ 'jam
dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu snying rje chen po ni sems can thums cad rab tu phan par bya ba'i rgyu 'thun pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ga las/
/btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rjes su rtogs pa las btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
nyon mongs pa rnams ga las btsal bar bya[ ]'jam da la gyis sas lha mo dang// pase' sgra 1na phrag brgyad pa [7/]tshul ker bya'o// lha'i bus
h+phas kha/ 'jam da pal nyi 'phags pa'i lam chen mongs pa rnam pad/ d+ha pas// ltas sam/ na 3paka rgyas smas pa/ lha'i bu ga te 'gas da lnga la gnyis su gyur ba
zhig yin na ni/ 'phag08 'i lam nyon mongs pas/ 19 sa ba[0f7c ]da ka pa pa eka lta'i bar gas pa'i lam kyi gte ga ba rgyus la lan des/ nyon 'o
tshol ba gang yin pa de nyid 'phags pa'i lan 6 ni/ na sa da pa la bya ba byas ba yin/ 'jam pa/ lha/ du ga
gi tsha btsal na nyon mongs pa rnams mind cing 'khor ba'ang ma red/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngam red pa de lta na/ lan gyis lam gyi bya ba bya pa min no// lha'i bus sas pa/ 'jam
dpal byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang/ phyin ci log bzhi dang
sgrib pa lnga dang// mi dag pa'i phyogs kyi chos thams cad do// lha'i'us smras pa// 'jam dpal kyi las bsags te da skad sbas/ 'jam dpal gyis sas pa/ lha'i bu byang/
chub sems dpa' ni sems can la sbyor ba yin pas/ sems can rnams kyang lta ba'i rnam pa dang/ phyin ci log dang/ sgrib pa dang/ mi dag pa'i chos skrums ma gtogs pa/
gzhan las btsal bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang gis sems can rnams rab tu phya ba'e lta ba'i rnam pa dang/ phyin ni leg dang/ sgrib pa dang/ nyon
mos ba de dag nyid tshol bar byen de/ de tshol bar byed pa na/ sems can yang mi rnyed/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi red do// ma rnyed na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la
skyo bar mi 'gyur te/ lha'i bu rnam grangs des na nyon mongs pa tshol ba ni byang chub sams dpa'i lam yin la/ sems can tshol ba'ang byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin/ phung po dang
khams dang/ skya ma chen dang/ nyon mo ngas ba tshol ba'ang byang chub sams dpa'i lam yin no// lha'i lus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag byang chub sems
@#// dpa'i lam ma yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis skyas pa/ lha'i bu stong ba nyid legatsal bar mi nus la/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa khang ba tsal bur mi
de ci'i phyir zhen/ lha'i bu de la ni sems dang/ yid dang/ rnam par shes pa 'jug pa ra gi 'gyur la/ gang la sa mas dang/ yid dang/ rnam par shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur
ba de ni btsal bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus snyas pa/ 'jam dpal lag ji ltar mngon par rtol/gas par bya'ajam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yang dag par lta ba gang dang mnyam pa
log pa'i lta ba rang de dang mnyam pa de ltar mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de na ldam paNon par rtogs pa yin no// yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang drang mnyam pa 'og pa'i rtog pa'i ng de dang mnyam
pa dang yang dag pa'i ga gang dang mnyan pa log pa'i dgag pa de dang a tan nga rta/ gdams kyi mas gad dang mnyam pa log pa'i las kyi ba spu'u ang de dang mnyam pa dang/ gang
